25a8(dkon brtsegs): khyad rnams chos thams cad la mi gnas par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag khyad rnams nam chos thams cad la mi gnas pa de na/ khyad rnams mi 'byung / mi 'jig go// khyad rnams nam mi 'byung mi 'jig pa de na/ 
25a9(dkon brtsegs): khyed rnams skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/ 
25b1(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal las yongasu thar bar 'gyur ro// zhes bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcang ba 'di dag gsungs so// skye ba dang ni mchi ba yis// 'jig rten 'di kun nas
25b2(dkon brtsegs): 'bar/ dbyis pa skyabs med gtse ba ste// de dag 'phags pa'i lam las nyams// brgya lam 'jig rten snang mdzad pa// de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur// dab ba chung zos ma byed par// brtson 'grus brtar bar rtsom
25b3(dkon brtsegs): byos shig/ gang la gnas te rnam sgom pa/ shes rab kyis ni nga yang ltos// shes rab kyis ni de mthong ste// rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// gang la gnas te sems sgom pa// thams cad stong par shes par bya/ 
25b4(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams stong par rig nas ni// byang chub nyid kyang stong pa yin// 'dod chags zhe sdang de bzhin gti mug dang // ma gsum de dag shin tu mi zad pa// des ni 'jig rten 'di kun tu rab 'bar yang / 
25b5(dkon brtsegs): byis pa ring nas gnyid log khong mi chung // skye dang rga dang na dang 'chi ba nga nga ka/ sgra sngags 'don dang sdug bsngal yang mi bdes// 'jig rten 'di dag gtses par rig nas mi// chos rnams kun la gnas par ma
25b6(dkon brtsegs): byed cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam po dadag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das las rab tu byung ba rnyed par gyur cig/ bdag cag rnams kyis
25b7(dkon brtsegs): bang bar gshegs pa las bsnyen par rdzogs pa// dge slong gi dngos po rnyeng bar gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag tshur sheg ces gsungs pa dang / de nyid kyis tshe dang ldan pa de dag rab tu byung bar gyur te/ 
25b8(dkon brtsegs): nga nyid kyis bstan par rdzogs pa dang / nga nyid kyis dge slong gi dngos par gyur to// 'ang la chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ ngal 'di skad ces bya'o// de dag gis ni ngur smrig bgos// de dag gis ni skra yang bregs kun kyang lhung / 
26a1(dkon brtsegs): bzeng thogs gyur nas/ de nyid du ri dgra bcom gyur/ ston pas dgra bcom rab mkhyen nas/ dge slong gi ring ge 'dun dang / lha rnams mdung du mngon sub du// cheng du brjod pa ched du brjod/ 
26a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi ni mgor po la// snga ma cad sbyin pa byin pas na/ gang nabang bamang ba dang // shin tu dga' zhing 'ongs par gyur// de dag gis ning mthong nas// ngang pa rab tu bskyed par gyur// de dag sems ni dang ba la// chos rnams
26a3(dkon brtsegs): mchog bstar to// dgra bcom gyi ri gsungs thos nas// bag tu lta rnam par bshig/ stong nyid mngon tu byas nas ni// de dag skye bkun las grol khyim bdag gi le'u zhes bya ste dang po'o// 
26a4(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lam gyi bang du khyim bdag lnga brgya tsama'o// dmi g.yo ba'i gnas la bkod nas/ kun nas mdzes pa/ rgyal tshakhab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs so// denas rgyal po'i la gyi grong
26a5(dkon brtsegs): khyed gyi lha rnams dang / gnod sbyir ci 'jigs 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gis 'di lta bu'i spyir gnas/ 'jig rte ma shin tu dkon pa'i bcob ldan 'das la bsod spobs dbul lo snyam mo// de nas
26a6(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyis bsod snyoms kha dog phur sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs pa/ reg pa phun sum tshogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das la phul nas/ gnod sbyin ci 'jigs la thugs
26a7(dkon brtsegs): brtsa ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod snyoms nga bzhes so// bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyis bsod snyoms phul ma thag du/ de nas de'i tshe steng gi bar snang las/ ci 'jigs kyi 'khor
26a8(dkon brtsegs): mang po gnod sbyin drug khri brkyang stong gis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rjes su yi rang ba'i sgra phyung ngo // de nas de'i phyir gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyis rang gi 'khor rnams la bos te/ bdag gi ning bzong de bzhin gshes
26b1(dkon brtsegs): bal bsor songs dul gyis/ khyed kyis ni dge slong ging ge 'dung rnams la dul cig/ ngadi khyed rnams kyi yung ring po'i ngon dang / phanang dang / bang bar 'gyur ro// gdong spyang rnams kyis dge slong gingag 'dud la bsod sobs
26b2(dkon brtsegs): yul ras/ gnod spyir de dag la sring brtse ba'i phyir/ dge slong ging dge 'dun gyis kyang bsong spobs blangs so// deras bcor ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs pa las/ nges bsod sabs blangs par dbyed
26b3(dkon brtsegs): nas/ sa phyogs de nas slar log go// da ltar de'i tshe lha stong phrag dum dang / klu stong phrag dur dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lba ba yir dang / ra nga mkha' lding dang / mi 'am he dang / lto 'ab chen po stong phrag du ba
26b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / mi dang mi pa yid pa stong phrag du ma dang / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ra rnams bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa'i zha 'bring du dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das sa phyogs yangs shing rgya
26b5(dkon brtsegs): che ba zhig tu gshegs te byon nas/ gdan pa shams pa la bzhugs so// de ras gnod sbyin ci 'jigs 'khor dang bcas pa sa/ lha'i me tog mar bar dang / ud pal dang / pad+ma dang
26b6(dkon brtsegs): ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// gtor
26b7(dkon brtsegs): mngor par gtor/ mngor bar rab tu gtor ras/ thal me sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod spyir ci 'jigs kyi bsams pa yang
26b8(dkon brtsegs): mabyed/ de'i 'bar ba sbyi mang po'i bsam pa 'ang mkhyen nas/ 'dzum pa mdzang ngo // chos 'didi 'di yid te/ nabasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rapas 'drub pa mdzad pader/ ral gyi sgor ma 'ong ba
27a1(dkon brtsegs): ngog dur kha dog sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / seng po dang / dmar po dang / dkar ngo dang / leb rgar dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta du byung ste/ nges 'dzeg
27a2(dkon brtsegs): rjer gyi khabs mnga' yas mu med pa snang bas khyab par byas nas/ bi ma dang zla ba'i gzi brjid med par byas te/ sems cad dmyal ba'i sems can nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags
27a3(dkon brtsegs): slar log nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lar 'dud bskor ba byas te/ kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu rung bo// kha cig ni phrag par rub bo// kha cig re pus mor nub bo// chos lteng ri 'di yir te/ nab
27a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams/ sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams la lung ston bden/ 'od zab zhabs gnyis da kyi 'og tu rub bar 'gyur ro// nam dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa'i sengs
27a5(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la lung stor ba dren/ 'od zer snam logs su rub ra 'gyur ro// nam ga sher rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can/ rnams rung ler/ 'od zer mdur du rung par 'gyur ro// 
27a6(dkon brtsegs): nam mi rnams la lung ston pa de na/ 'od zer g.yon du nub par 'gyur ro// nam lha rnams la lung stor pa den/ 'od zer g.yas su nub par 'gyur ro// nam nyan thos rnams la lung ston pa de ra/ 'od zar pus mor rub
27a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// nam rang sangs rgyas rnams la lung stor ba na/ 'od zer phrag par nub par 'gyur ro// nam sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs
27a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa den/ 'od zer steng gi dbu'i gtsug gi mtshams su nung par 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzub pa mdzad pa mthong ste/ mthong ras chos gos
27b1(dkon brtsegs): drag pa gcig tu bgos te/ pus po g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsug nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung ras/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcang ba 'di dag gsol to// ci rgyus 'jig
27b2(dkon brtsegs): rder snang mdzad pa// 'jig rten kun la smar pa'i slad// 'jig rje mo 'ong mdzad pa// ci zhig sla du 'dzub pa bstan// sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub phyir// de ring su yis sa bon btab// de ring su la lung yang ston// gang
27b3(dkon brtsegs): zhig mthar phyir rab tu zhugs// dpa' bo rnam par 'dren pa rnams// rgyu ba mchis par 'jub mi mdzad thub pa ci slang 'dzum pa bstan// 'od zeng ngos ri bshang du gsol// de ras bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa
27b4(dkon brtsegs): kur dga' bo la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis slar gsungs pa// 'ji garten mgon po skyob pa la// ci 'jigs rab tu dang sems kyi sa// bsod snyoms dag ni phul bas ra// de ltar da par 'dzum
27b5(dkon brtsegs): pa mdzad// gdong sbyir 'di ras ri'i 'phos nas su bcu rtsa gsum la gro bar 'gyur// sum cu rtsa gsum shi 'phos ras/ 'thab bral du yang 'gro bar 'gyur/ 'ja' bral nas ni dga' ldan 'gro/ 
27b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod la 'dod pas dgar byas ras// mi'i rang du skye 'gyur te/ rgyal po rdzu 'phrul ldan par 'gyur// 'khor los sgyur ba mi'i dbang // gling bzhi dag gi dbang po ste// mi'i 'jig rten shi 'phos ras// tshangs
27b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'jig rter 'gro bar 'gyur// bskal pa bye ba'i shur ni// rtag tu sti stang bas par 'gyur// lha'i rang dang mi nang du// yang dang yang ni kun tu 'gro/ phyis de rgyal sring bor ras ni// khyim med par yang rab tu 'byu
27b8(dkon brtsegs): rkyer gyis byang chub thob 'gyur te// pa mi mthar yang thub par 'gyur// gnod sbyin dag ri sub khri rnams// gnod spyir skye gnas 'phos gyur ras// su bcu rtsa gsub skye bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas la ri gus byas ras/ 
28a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas byabs par thong gyur cing // nga dngapar ribug 'byung / dgra bcob pa yang thong 'gyur pa/ stor ba la ri mu rdzod // gcod skyer sdong du nga ba rnams byang chub log lar ba zhubs
28a2(dkon brtsegs): pas de ngag dag pa'i rtsa bangs// ram dus 'gro mi 'gyur// 'bing srog chags kur par phyir// byang chub dab parab tshol zhing // sangs rgyas 'dra pa stong rnams la// bkur sting ba ni byed par 'gyur// 'i sag sangs
28a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas byang chub phyir// bstod drag gnyis dang gsung dag kyang // de rog phreng ba dri rnams kyis/ mdzad dngas ni byang bar 'gyur// dgang sgoms pa'i bdag nyid car// 'drer ba bye ba phrag stong la// 'bag bkur bsti
28a4(dkon brtsegs): byed 'gyur te// 'di dag phyis ri byang chub reg/ der ci 'jigs de'i bu// ri bo las brdzu 'phral che// 'jig rten sangs rgyas bdag gyur ces// des kyang ser sa bskyed par gyur// nges ri sangs rgyas sde
28a5(dkon brtsegs): stang byas// thabs cad yang spor lam bdag/ nga mthong ras ni rachod bas pa// byang chu par ri sems 'dung ngo // de ri dge ba'i rtsa ba ngas// ngar 'gro thams cad spangs gyur nas// sangs rgyas byams
28a6(dkon brtsegs): pa mthong nas ri// gdugs rnams bye ba 'bul bar 'gyur// gdugs rnams bye phul nas ni// na bza' bye ba 'bul bar 'gyur// rabaza' bye ba phul nas ni// de nying du yang rab tu 'thung // srog chags kur la par pa'i
28a7(dkon brtsegs): byir/ byang chub dang pa rang tshol zhing // lo yang lha ba rgya tshang bar ri// tshangs par sbyang ba spyong bar 'gyur// 'di lta bu'i rnam grangs kyis// sbyin ngang tshul khrims yang dag spyod// gang+gA'i byer ji sed pa// de sang
28a8(dkon brtsegs): bskal bar spyod par 'gyur// dper gsungs pa ring skad du// de dag khyed kyis reshes par gyis// de dag dper yang shes nas ni// de bas lhag par sbyang bar gyis// sngar ring dazer rnams gang brjed pa// pang+ga 'i
28b1(dkon brtsegs): nibyang snyed kyi// nga sang sangs rgyas mthong gyur ras// deng ga kur la sti stang byed// e ra lo ye shes e ra nga bas er 'o blar meng ba'i sengs// sems cad kun gyi 'dre pa ri// de ltar nus par mi 'gyuraro/ dbyes
28b2(dkon brtsegs): sems cad kun gyi ma'og/ sangs rgyas su yang nge 'gyur te/ de ri nga'i mchar brtags pa// smar pa'i rgyal por rnam par grags// le ri byeb bdud cur yang // srog chags rnams la chos bstan te// phyes gdong dang
28b3(dkon brtsegs): gnyis gtso ba ri/ nged bya ngaran 'das par 'gyur/ rab tu ru nga ba'i sems rnams kyi// 'dus pa dag ni 'i dbur 'gyur// de la tha ma gcig por// dge slong bya ba'i shur 'gyur// 'dus pa rnams ri gang brjod pa'i/ 'ang
28b4(dkon brtsegs): thos dpag tu meng pa ste// de'i nyan thos ji skad pa// byang chub zhugs pa'ang de snyed do// sems cad rnams kyi dor mdzad nas// de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan 'das// lo ra brgya phrag stong dag du// de yi dpa
28b5(dkon brtsegs): chos gnas par 'gyur// bskal pa lnga brgya tshang bar ni// sangs rgyas mang po 'byung bar 'gyur// bskal pa gcig la'ang 'byung 'de// der stong rnams 'byung bar 'gyur// ri rnams pa'as
28b6(dkon brtsegs): pa gang dag ni// sangs rgyas chos rnams bsnyer 'dod pa// tshul bzhin rang du thos pa dang / rab tu 'dun pa nyid du bya// tshul bzhir pa yid rnam par spong // tshul bzhin la ri rtag tu sgoms// yang du thos par
28b7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bya// nges ni shes rab rnam par 'phel// byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa yi// rtsa ba'i ngor ri chos ba'i ste// spyir nga tshul khrims thos dang gtong // byang chub kyi ri la pa la bzang // bla med pa'i theg pa mchog
28b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi ri lam yang bstar/ thag tsom gcod pa bzang po yi// nyar thos kyi ri lab bstar to// sems can gang ngag 'di 'dong ba// de la ngas ri skabs dbye'o// ches rnams kyi ri mchog stor pa// 'jig
29a1(dkon brtsegs): rngar sdang mdzad dang par dka'// dengs gnod sbyid ci 'jigs kyi bu ri bo 'di skad du sems par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ras re'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la gshe/ 
29a2(dkon brtsegs): shes grags gis bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la dag pa'i rtsa ba brgya cher po zhig bskyed ngos po// de nas gnod sbyir ci 'jigs kyi bu ri bos rang gis 'khor bsdus pa/ grogs po ga shes par gyes
29a3(dkon brtsegs): shig/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khad kyi grong khyer chen po nas/ ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po'i raM la gshegs kyis/ nga la grogs po dag mthu ce yod pa dang /  nus kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i
29a4(dkon brtsegs): las la spro ba skyed cig/ de nas gnod skyer ci 'jigs kyi bu ri bo g.yog dang bcas pas// rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer cher po ras bzung ste/ ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po'i bar gyi lam de thams cang gseg
29a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / gyo mog dang / sdong dus dang / cher mdzams med/ bar byas so// me long gyi dkyil 'khor ltar dag par byas so// lam de dag thams cad bsal ras/ spos kyi chus kun du chag
29a6(dkon brtsegs): chag bang ba'o// lam deng dgos mtshams med par bting ngo // lam dang mi gang tsam du me tog gis chal bar bkrab po// lam de dag gdugs dang / rgyal mtshar dang / bdar gyis rishin tu brgyar to// lang
29a7(dkon brtsegs): bdug spos dam pa'i snying po rab kyi sdod nas bdugs so// sdang gi bar snang las dar gyi lnga ldi sbyangs tra shin tu brgyan to// lam der sil snyad sna tshogs kyi sgra 'khrol bar byas so// lam de nas rangar rgyang gang tshun chad
29a8(dkon brtsegs): tsam me tog ud pa la dang / pad+ma dkar pos khebs shing dur ba sgra 'byin par byas so// lam nga gser glegs pas rab tu g.yogs so// lam de gser gyi dra ba dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi dra bas rab
29b1(dkon brtsegs): tu g.yogs so// de ras gnod sbyiran ci 'jigs kyi bu ri bos lam du nga lnga bu'i bkod pa byas nas/ lus chen po mngon par sprul te/ 'khor dang bcas pa dga' mgu rang rab tu dga' ste/ mos shing yid bde ba skyes
29b2(dkon brtsegs): nas/ dga' ba'i sems dang / bde ba'i sems dang / mnyan po'i sangs dang rnam par dang ba'i sems dang / sgrib pa med pa'i sems dang / rab tu sim pa'i sems dang / sangs rgyas la gzhol ba'i sems
29b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / chos la gzhol ba'i sems dang / dge 'dun la gzhol ba'i sems dang / byang chub las mi g.yo ba'i sems dang / mi bskyod pa'i sebs dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems dang / 'jig rten
29b4(dkon brtsegs): gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i sems dang / sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i ser sa dang / dga' ba'i sems dang / btang snyoms kyi sems dang / 
29b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sdong du gyur pa'i sems dang / snying po'i sems dang / brtan pa'i sems dang / mi phyang ba'i sems dang / ma zhig pa'i sems dang / nyan thos dang / rang
29b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ba'i sengs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad sgrub pa'i sems kyis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyi ma ngas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'angs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bam
29b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la la gsum bskor ba byas ras/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ gdod sbyir ci 'jigs kyi bu ri bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcang ba 'di dag
29b8(dkon brtsegs): gsol to// sangs rgyas 'jig rten rnams kyi mchog/ chos rnams kyi ni dam bston/ 'jig rted mgon la bdag gis ni// bla ma mchis mchong ba bgyis// 'drer pa ji ltar mdzad pa bzhir// stobs bcu dang ri
30a1(dkon brtsegs): rab ldan te// mi 'jigs bral rab gnas nas// sems can dor rnams bgyid par shog/ sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rnams dang / dpe byang bzang po brgyad cur ldan/ 'jig rted dgod pa
30a2(dkon brtsegs): 'a byed pa/ 'jig rten sdang babyid pa shog/ srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir// sA pa'i chos ni rabastod cing // rnam pa bcu ga nyes ngam pa yi sa chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar shog/ rgyal 'ji lta de bzhin du// chos 'phrul rngubs 'i
30a3(dkon brtsegs): rab ston cing / srog chags bye ba du ba yi// sems can rnams kyi ngor bgying shog/ ngang 'a cher gang rnabs mabyor pa/ 'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad ltar/ byang chub dam pa rab rtogs nas// lam de rab tu stong par shog/ sems
30a4(dkon brtsegs): can mdongs pa kun gyi phyir// mig dang ldan pa nyid gyur te// gnas dang rten dang skyabs ngag dang // de bzhin dung gnyen 'gyur bar 'ashog/ ji ltar 'dred pa grol mdzad bzhin// 'gro ba lngar ni skyes pa yin/ 
30a5(dkon brtsegs): srog chags rnams kyi mgon du shog/ bdag gis sdug bsngal kun/ las dgrol ka 'jig rten ni ni mtshungs pa yod med pa// lha/ dbang lha ma yin dang klus mchod pa/ gzi brjing ngag ni mtha' yas
30a6(dkon brtsegs): 'od mdzad pa// rkang gnyis mchog la bdag gis mchod par bgyid// bdag ni las mchog pa 'di dag gis// mi dbangs steng mchog tu gyur pa bzhin// bsod rams rab mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan ldan/ 
30a7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi bdag po de dang 'dra bar shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das/ gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi bu ri bo la tshigs su bcang ba dag gis gsungs pa// chos kyi dam pa rnams kyi phyir// ston pa'i rib mgro gang byed pa/ 
30a8(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyi mchog yin te// de dag byang chub rnyed mi dkar// 'jig rted mgon po 'od mdzad pa// 'jig rten snang mdzad mchog la ni// lha dang klu dang mi rnams kyis// mchod pa bya bar 'ongs par 'gyur/ 
30b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mchog tu sangs rgyas ras// shing mchog drung du rab du dag ste// sdig can bdud las rgyal nas su// sog chags rnams la chos ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das lnga stong phrag du ma dang / gnod sbyin dang / 
30b2(dkon brtsegs): srir po stong phrag dur dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po stong phrag dum dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa song phrag dub dang / srong chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas bskor cing bdun du bdar nas/ 
30b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi mthu cher po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzi ba rjed cher pos// 'od zer na rab tu 'gye/ 
30b4(dkon brtsegs): 'ang ri rab tu g.yos par byas/ me chog gi char ni ri'i du 'babs/ sil sa dbye ba bras brib ni rab tu 'grol bar bya ste/ gdod sbya ci 'jigs kyi bu ri ngos/ lam du kong ba ji ltar mngon par byas pa
30b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhing du shing rta'i phang lo tsam gyi pad+ma la zhabs bzag ste/ ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la dngar gshegs te byon nas/ tshe dang ldan bkun dga' bo la/ kur dga' bo khyod kyis/ de bzhin
30b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i gdar mchog/ chos kyi gdar/ gdan dam pa/ gdan bzang po/ 'jig rter gsum po kur las khyad par du 'phags pa'i gdan/ sangs rgyas kyi gdan shoms shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang na de
30b7(dkon brtsegs): la bzhugs skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten rnams la snying brtse ba dang / ldang mi rnams kyi ngor dang phan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde sdong ces bya ba'i mdo
30b8(dkon brtsegs): sde sems cad thams cad la phar par rab tu bsngags pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyu mthur ba 'chang bar 'gyur te/ de'ang sems can thams cad bcom du gyur pa la rab tu stor bas/ sems can
31a1(dkon brtsegs): zangs cad kyib cong dathong ba/ sems can thangs cad kyis com skye ba so ba// de ba'i gshegs pa'i mdo sde 'di 'chang dar 'gyur dugs bka' stsal pa dang / meng ba ldan pa
31a2(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bos/ com ldan 'das kyi gdan bshams te/ ngar lha byed drug bcu rtsa brgyad kyis/ ras bcos pa re re/ nga bzhin gshegs pa la dul te/ dngag kyang dang gang dgating bar gyur nas// bcom ldan
31a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das gdan bshams pa de la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bung rnams la tshigs su bcang ba dag gis gsungs pa/ 'jig rten mgon gyi gdan du ri/ lha'i gos rab dam pa mchog
31a4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i yi rab tu bting ba la/ de la rnam par 'drar pa btsugs thams cad chos kyi pha rol phyin/ sangs rgyas bzhugs par gyur ma thag/ 'jig rten rnam pa drug g.yos shing // skye bo rab tu dga'
31a5(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur// sangs rgyas zhing ni ri dang bcas/ der rab tu snang bar gyu/ ra// den chos 'dod rnams la ni/ skyob pas sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul ston// lha dang klu dang mi rnams dang // grub
31a6(dkon brtsegs): bum yi dgas srul po rnams// de dag gcig gis gcig mthong ste/ sgrib pa dag ni med par 'gyur// lha rnams bye ba phrag stong dang // khrag khrig phrag ni brgya rnams ngag/ rnyed dka' yin tshig gsung ba
31a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas la dga' bas lha// rgyal po'i gzugs can snying po yang // nga tshe blon pos yongs bskor cing // 'jig rten gyi ni mgon po mchog/ sangs rgyas drung du 'ongs par gyur// ston pas lha dang klu rnams dang / mi rda
31a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dus par mkhyen pa dang / srog chags kun la phar pa'i phyi ba phyogs pa ni gdu sa gzigs nas/ 'jig rten the com gang yod ba// rkang nyis mchog 'a dris shig dang // sacom dgi ni dris pa rnams/ rnam
31b1(dkon brtsegs): bar 'dran pa ngas gcang ngo // da ltar de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji skad 'dus nas/ chos nyan pa de dag thams cad kyis 'ar bar shes nas/ sems can thams cad kyis
31b2(dkon brtsegs): bsams te phyag 'tshal nas// chos nyan pa'i phyir rna ba blags te 'dug par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo gal gyi bu cher po la bka' stsal pa/ mau gal gyi bu chen po dge slong mi 'dug pa rnams la
31b3(dkon brtsegs): sems la/ ma lhags pa rnams kyang tshol te/ rgyang ring po na gnas pa rnams kyang sdus shig/ nga'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'od srang chen po ri'i rgyal po kha ba can lho phyogs kyi ngos la gnas so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo
31b4(dkon brtsegs): dgal gyis bu chen pos bsams te/ bsams nas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od sangs chen po ga la ba ngar song ste/ phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad
31b5(dkon brtsegs): ces smras so// btsun pa 'od srungs chen po longs shig/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / bdud du da sa pa dang / tshangs par bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang brab
31b6(dkon brtsegs): zer bcas pa'i skye dgu rnams dang / lha dang / mi dang lha mi yan du bcas pa'i 'khor gyi mdun du chos stor te/ ston pas bka' stsal gyis/ btsun pa 'od srung bdag cag gnyis kyi chos kyi bar du
31b7(dkon brtsegs): 'ong gis 'dong ngo // de skad ces smras pa dang / tsha dang ldan pa 'od srung cher pos/ tshe dang ldan pa mo rung bal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa me'u dgal gyi bu chen po khyod song shib dang / khrom
31b8(dkon brtsegs): yang khyod so ba'i rjes bzhin du 'ong ngo // de nas tsheng ldan pa 'od srung chen pos stang de la 'phrul ba sprul te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por zhugs so// denas tshe dang ldan pa 'ong sus
32a1(dkon brtsegs): cher po 'khor bzhis bskor cing mdur du bang ras/ ring rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba der song ste phyir nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la go bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das
32a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyad sngar 'khor gyi rang du/ ha cang yang mi ring bzhig tu// phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de ras tshe dang ldan pa mo'u ngab la gyi bu chen pos sprul pa de bathong ras/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bdar song ngo // 
32a3(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgar gyi bu chen pos/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od sangs chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi sbyar sngar/ ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig du 'khor gyi nang na phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa mthong ste/ mthong nas/ 'di skad ces smras so// btsun
32a4(dkon brtsegs): pa 'od srung khyod star ga la ba ras sprul te/ sprul nas/ 'gyegs par bcom lngan 'das kyi drung du phyin te/ spyar sngar hacang yang mi ring ba zhig du 'khor gyi mang na/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug padi byung ba la ster pa'i rdzu
32a5(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul dang ldan ro// nga skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos// tshe dang ldan pa me'u gal gyi bu cher po 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa me'u dbal gyi bu chen po ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
32a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'drul dang ldan pa'i mchog tu gsungs na/ 'di la kho bo'i rdzu 'phrul rngam par sprul pa lta ci zhig tu 'gyur// gnod sbyir ci 'jigs kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// 'phags pa dkon
32a7(dkon brtsegs): mchis 'phags pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs stong brag dargyag// bab de gsum pa de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyar las langs te/ bla los phrag pa macim tu
32a8(dkon brtsegs): bzar nas// dus mo g.yas pa'i lhangs la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de yongs su thal po sbyar ba btung de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bskur ba'i slad du/ 
32b1(dkon brtsegs): bcod ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phyer/ bcom ldan 'das nga ba'i da gshags pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la'adag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
32b2(dkon brtsegs): tsha dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu byed ngang nir gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas labi pa chini 'dod pa dris shig dang / dris pa ngang nga lung bstar bas/ ngas khye
32b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems rangs par bya'o// nga skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tsha dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos du dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba ma mchis
32b4(dkon brtsegs): padag lags ngag gi las kha na ma thob par chis pa dang / yid kyi las khang ma tho ma mchis pa dang / lus kyi las yongs su dag pa dang / ngag gi las yongs su dag pa dang / yid kyi las yongs su dag pa/ lus kyi las
32b5(dkon brtsegs): g.yos pa dag dang / ngag gi las ma g.yos pa dang / yid kyi las ma g.yo/ nyes pa rnams lags/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyang ba de las bdud dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis bskyong mi nus pa
32b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams lags/ sa nas sar 'bar ba la mkhas pa rnams lags// sems car thams cad kyi 'drer bar gyur pa dang / rngang par 'drer par gyur pa dang / yongs su 'dre par gyur pa dang / sbyor mar gyur pa dang / sngags su gyur pa dang
32b7(dkon brtsegs): zad par gyur pa dang / grur gyur pa dang / sgrol ba po dang / pha rol tu 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / garas dang / mgon dang / skyabs dang / dpung gzhan du gyur pa dang / thams cad mkhyed pa'i sems bskyed pa de las bzlog par mi nus pa rnams
32b8(dkon brtsegs): lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tsha dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ rigs su bcang ba'i dbyangs kyis ngo nga 'id kur nus pa/ gang gis byang chub bzhugs pa// dpa' bo de'i ngor ci lags// gang gis ngam pa 'tshang rgyab// ye
33a1(dkon brtsegs): tan ches rnams brjod du gsol/ sreg chags kur la spar slad du// dpa' bong dag ji ltar spyod// je lta bu mi chos bslangs pas/ me'i dab pa sangs rgyas 'gyur// byang chub seng por
33a2(dkon brtsegs): rab bangs ras sdig par dag ri ji ldar 'dus/ bye ba dag go 'ang bskyong ngas/ ji ldar byang chub chog 'tshang rgya// byang chub sengs dpa' gang po ngos 'di d+ma'i tshig ci rig 'bas// sangs rgyas chos kyi b.ro ga rdzangs dang // 
33a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub dag ni 'dir brjod gsol// srog chags kun la sngang slad du/ pad+ma bamer du bachags shing // sems cad bye grol mdzad par// 'jig rjer 'di ni ji byar spyod// ma khas pa lha dang klung ga dang / mi rang bi ra lags rngams
33a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis// ji lta bur mi mchod 'gyur ba/ zhus pa dag pa shang du gsol de ras bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'dis deces dka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ches gcis
33a5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan ma sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di ga dang / gzhan yang gtu meng bdag yongs su 'dzin to// chos gcig po gang zhen/ 'dzidu ste/ bsam pa phung su tshogs pa'i byang chub kyi sebs
33a6(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i byang chub sems dpa' chos gcig po dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di gzhar yang dpag tu meng ngag yongs su 'dzin // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// 
33a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bsam pa ji lta bu/ bang chub kyi sepas ji lta bu/ de skad ces gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu bsam pazhes pa
33a8(dkon brtsegs): mi phyeng ba'i phyir snying po'o// bstar pa'i phyir mi byed pa'o/ mi g.yo ba'i phyir bstan pa'o// ma 'khrul pa'i phyir mi g.yo ba'o// shin tu gnas pa'i byir pa 'khrul pa'o// mi bzlog pa'i phyir shing du gangs pa'o// sems ca
33b1(dkon brtsegs): la lta ba'i phyir mi zlangs pa'o// seng rje ngar po'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i phyir sems cad la lnga ba'o// yongs su mi skyo ba'i phyir snying rje cher po'i rtsa ba'o// sems can yongs su srir par bya ba'i cho ga shes pa'i bar yongs su me skye 'a
33b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag la bde bar yin pa'i phyir sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i cho ga shes pa'o// lar du phar 'dogs par rab med pa'i phyir/ bdag bang ba ma yin pa'o// zang zing bang po'i phyir lam phan 'dogs par re ba mang nga'o// sen gyi phyir 'brang
33b3(dkon brtsegs): bas zang zing reng ba'o// mthu chung ba'i sems cad la lta ba'i phyir sems can gyi phyir 'brang ba'o// ngagon tu gyur pa'i phyir mthu chung ba'i sabs car lnga'o// skyabs dang dpung gnyerd rje phyir mngon du gyur pa'o// ma 'khrugs pa'i phyir sbya
33b4(dkon brtsegs): rang dadung gnyer ro// sher tu yang dag par brtangs pa'i phyin pa 'a khrugs pa'o// rtsod pa med pa'i phyi ra shin tu yang dag par brtags pa'o// bsam pa dge ba'i phyir rtsod pa meng ba'o// ci yang rang ri'i phyir 'as
33b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dge pa'o// shin tu yongs su dag pa'i phyir ci yang mang ba'o// rab tu byang bar byas pa'i phyir yongs su dag pa'o// rang dri ma be nga ba'i rab tu byang bar byas pa'o// phye shin tu yongs su dag pa'i phyir
33b6(dkon brtsegs): rang dri ba med pa'o// de lA shA ri'i bu mi phyung ba'i snying po las bya ba ras/ phyi shin tu yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ nang dri pa med pa'i bar du ste/ bsam pa ring lta bu'o// byang chub kyi sems ji lta bu cher/ sems deri 'or phongs
33b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis mi rdzi ba'o// sams de ri zag pa zhar mi 'dod pa'i phyir 'bral ba med pa'o// sems de ni pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa'i phyir brdad pa'o// sems re re bdud thams cad kyis mi phang po
33b8(dkon brtsegs): sems nga ni dge ba'i tshogs bsags pa'i phyir rtag pa'o// sems de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos pa'i phyir mi g.yo ba'o// sems de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa la rab tu gnas pa'o// sems de ni gnyen po med
34a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byed bung me nga po sengs 'dis ma byar kyangs padas sa nges pa rigs pa'i byed du ma ma ngesangam tha babs pa bsapa pa la ma dam pa reng ba'i 'angs pa
34a2(dkon brtsegs): sems nga ri rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa'o// sems ri shes rab kyis sdang bar byed pa'i phyir/ dri ba ring ba'// sems ri ri sems car thams cad la skabs 'byung ba'i phyir rgyas pa'o// 
34a3(dkon brtsegs): sems de ri nam mkha' ngang mtshungs pa'i phyir yangs pa'o// sems de ri thams cad bakhyed pa'i ye shes la bang ba'i phyir sgrib pa med pa'o// sams de ri snying rje cher por bcang ba'i phyir/ thams sa kyi rjes su song ba'o// se
34a4(dkon brtsegs): de ni mkhas pas bsngags pa'i phyir dngon du 'gro bar bya'o// sams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sa bor du gyur pa'o// sems dani bang ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi gnas so// sems de ri tshul khrims
34a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi spor lam las byung ba'o// sems de bzod pas bser pa rang ka' ba'o// sems de ni brtson 'grus kyis thul bar dka' ba'o// sems nga ri bsam gtar ngag gis 'bar 'i ba'o// sems de
34a6(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi tshogs kyis gdong ba med pa'o// yang sems de ri nga bzhir gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dziran gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po'i rtsa ba'o// sems de ri nge ba
34a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po'i rtsa ba'o// sangs de ring bzhi gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nga / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams kyi rtsa ba'o/ 
34a8(dkon brtsegs): yang shA ri'i bu sems de ni byang chub kyi rang bzhin te/ de'i phyir byang chub kyi sems shes bya'o// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dang / byang chub kyi sems nga lta bu ldar pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// sarba
34b1(dkon brtsegs): rgya cher po sems cad cho garab ces bya'o// 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las byang bar du gyur pa'i sems can nas bya'o// lus kyi las kha na mtho ba mang ba yin/ ngag gi las khan mtho ba med pa yin// yid kyi las khar mtho
34b2(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa yin// lus kyi las yongs su dag pa yin/ ngag gi las yongs su dag pa yin/ yid kyi las yongs su dag pa yin/ lus kyi las ma g.yos pa yin// ngag gi las ma g.yos pa yin/ yid kyi las ma gasngo
34b3(dkon brtsegs): ba yin/ te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems skyed pa nga las bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis bskyod mi nus pa yin// sa nas sar 'bar ba la mkhas pa yin// 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa yin// sems
34b4(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi 'dren bar gyur pa yir// rnam par 'dren par gyur pa dang / yongs su 'dren par gyur pa dang / sprer mar gyur pa dang / stegs su gyur pa dang / zam par gyur pa dang / glur gyur pa dang
34b5(dkon brtsegs): sgrol bar gyur pa dang / pha rol tu 'gro ba dang / gnas dang / mgo na dang / skyabs dang / dpung gnyer yir ro// thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pang las bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyis lha rnams kyis/ 
34b6(dkon brtsegs): bskyod mi nus pa yin no// da ltar na shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa thag pa nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed ras dang pa yin no// dad pa mang ba dang / 'phags pa rnams
34b7(dkon brtsegs): mthong bar 'dod pa dang / chos nyan par 'dod pa yin/ sar sna med cing lhug par gtong ba dang / lag brkyang zhing rnam par gtong ba dga'ang dang / sbyin ba be gang ba la dga' bi yar/ sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med
34b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sams yin/ rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang / 'khrugs pa med pa'i sems dang / ma 'dres pa'i sems dang / de las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa la mngon par dad pa dang / rab tu rtog cing yid ches pa dang / 
35a1(dkon brtsegs): the tso pa rang cing sapas nyis rang pa yid no// de dag po dang / dkar ba'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu mi stor par shes pas/ srog gi phyir yang sdig pa'i las mi byed pa yin te/ de srog gcod
35a2(dkon brtsegs): pa spong ba yin/ ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yeng pa dang / brdzurd du sla ba dang / phrang dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig kyal pa dang / brdab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lnga pa
35a3(dkon brtsegs): spong ba yin te/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag spangs nas/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yang dag par ler cing byed do// dngang pa dang ldan pas gang dge sbyong dang bram ze dag/ yang dag par song ba dang / yang dag par
35a4(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / dge ba'i chos can dang / mang du thos pa dang / thos pa la brtson pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang ldan pa dang / dul ba dang / zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba dang / 
35a5(dkon brtsegs): rtsod pa'i sgrub med pa dang / mi spar bar smra ba reng ba dang / bsam pa deg zhing mi dge ba'i bsam pa med pa dang / dge ba la yang dgabar sbyor ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su spangs
35a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rgod pa mang ba dang / 'angs pa ma yin ba dang / yab yob po med pa dang / mu cor mi smra ba dang / tshigs ma 'dres pa dang / dra pa'i bar gnas pa dang / sems shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa de dag dang / ji ltar sreng
35a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'dren pa bcad pa dang / zug rngu phyung ba dang / khur bor ba dang / the tsom las rgal ba dang / som nyi las rgal ba dang / yang srid bzang ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
35a8(dkon brtsegs): chen po dag dang / de lta bu'i dge sbyong dang bra ze dag pa'i bshes gnyen du rig nas/ de ngag la bsnyed cing bster te/ bsnyen bkur byed cing / mgu bar byed kyi yid byung bar mi byed do// dga' bar byed kyi/ mi dga'
35b1(dkon brtsegs): bar mi byed pa/ ngas dag pa'i bshas gnyen mgu bar byas pas/ ngadag de la chos kyis phar 'dogs par byang ngo // chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par ston par byang / yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par gzeng
35b2(dkon brtsegs): sdong / yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed de/ sbyin pas longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims kyis mtho ris su skye ba dang / thos pas shes rab chen por 'gyur ba dang / sgom pas 'bral bar 'gyur ro// zhes yang dag
35b3(dkon brtsegs): par rab tu stor to// 'dir spyir ba/ 'di ni sbyin pa'i 'bras bu/ 'di ni ser sna/ 'di ri ser sna'i 'bras bu/ 'di ri tshul khrims kyi rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni 'chal pa'i tshul khrims/ 'di ni 'chal pa'i tshul khrims
35b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam par smi pa/ 'di ri brjed pa/ 'di di bang po'i rnam pa sgring ba 'di 'i 'ang sems/ 'di ni yong sems kyi rnam par sring pa/ 'di ni brtson 'grus/ 'dzi rtson 'grus kyi
35b5(dkon brtsegs): sbed pa/ 'di ri le lo// 'di ni le lo'i rnam par sI ba/ 'di ga ni bsam ga ma/ 'di ni bsam gtan rnams kyi rnam par smir ba 'di ri sems g.yeng ba// 'di 'i sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin
35b6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ 'di 'i shes rab/ 'di ni shes rab kyi rngam par smin pa/ 'di ni 'chal ba'i shes rab/ 'di ni 'chal pa'i shes rab kyi rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa/ 'di ni lus kyis legs par
35b7(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa'i rnam par smid pa/ 'di ni lus kyis nyes par spyod pa/ 'di mi lus kyis nyes par spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa/ 'di ringag gi legs par spyod pa/ 'di ri ngag gis legs par spyong pa'i rnam par srid pa 'di na
35b8(dkon brtsegs): ngag gis nyes par spyod pa/ 'di re dag gis nyes par spyod pa'i rnam par smir pa/ 'di ni yid kyis legs par spyod pa/ 'di ri yid kyis legs par spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa/ 'di ri yid kyis nyes par
36a1(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa/ 'di ri yid kyis nyes par spyod pa'i rnam par smir ba/ 'diri rig pa/ 'diri mi dag pa/ 'di bya ba/ 'di ri mi bab/ 'dri bas ra yur ring po'i ngon dang / pad pa dang / bde bar 'gyur 'ang byasar yun ring por
36a2(dkon brtsegs): gnong ba dang / mi phan pa dang / mi bde bar 'gyur ro zhes de ltar de la dge ba'i bshes gzhan de dag gis/ chos kyi gtanam gyis yang dag par ston te/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par gzeng stong / 
36a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed de/ snod du gyur par yang shes ras/ zab mo'i gtam yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug ste/ 'di lnga ste/ stong pa'i dkyi gang ma dang / mtshan ma med pa'i gtam dang / spor ba med
36a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gtam dang / mngor par 'du mi byang ba'i gtam dang / ra skye sa pa'i gtam dang / ma byung ba'i gang mdang / bdag med pa'i gangs dang / sems can meng pa'i ga ma dang / srog med ba'i bdang rang
36a5(dkon brtsegs): gang zag reng ba'i btam dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo'o/ gang ma rab tu stor to// 'di lta ste/ 'di yod pas 'di 'byung / 'di skyes pa'i phyir 'ang skye ba ste/ 'di ltar ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du
36a6(dkon brtsegs): byang rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis/ rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ring dang / gzugs ming dang gzugs kyi rkyeran gyis/ skye mched drug skye mched drug gi rkyeran gyis/ reg pa/ rag pa'i rkye gyis
36a7(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rgyaran gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis ler ba/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis/ rga shi dang / mya ngar dang / smre sngags 'dor pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 
36a8(dkon brtsegs): yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrungs pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po cher po 'di 'ba' shig 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ 'di yong na 'di 'byung / 'di me ra 'di mi 'byung / 'di 'gags
36b1(dkon brtsegs): ngas 'di 'gag ste/ 'di sa ste/ pa reg pa 'phags pas/ 'du byed dgag kha nas/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po cher po 'ba' shig 'bag par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar dus/ 'di la ni chos gang yang skye ba 'am/ 
36b2(dkon brtsegs): 'bag pa ring ngo // de ci'i phyir bar/ chos thams cad ri rjen cing wal srung ba ste/ bdag po med pa/ byed pa po mang ba/ tshor ba po med pa/ rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba ste/ 'di la chos gang yang 'grub pa med / ldog pa med pa
36b3(dkon brtsegs): rjes su 'jug pa med de/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rmongs pas khams gsum 'dogs par 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa'i lam dang / sdug bsngal gyi lam 'dogs par 'gyur ro// yang dag pa pa yin pa'i rmongs pa yang sa
36b4(dkon brtsegs): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtags ra/ chos gang yang chos gang gi byang ba po ma yin ro// gang la byed pa po med pa de la don dam par bya ba yang mi dmigs te/ de la chos gang yang 'byung ba med/ 'jig
36b5(dkon brtsegs): bdeng po las brjed // des de lta bu'i chos zang po thos nas/ the tse ba bi za/ so ba'i meng cing chos thams cad la chags pa med bar 'jug ste/ de gzugs la mi rags/ tshor rab dang / 'du shes
36b6(dkon brtsegs): dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la mi chags/ mig dang / gzugs dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa la mi chags/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / ling dang / chos dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa
36b7(dkon brtsegs): la ri chags pa/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o// zhes dang ngo // shA ri'i bu de ltar dang pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chi/ sangs rgyas la lta ba las yongs su mi nyams/ chos 'an pa
36b8(dkon brtsegs): las yongs su mi 'ams/ ngage 'dun la bskar bkur byang ba las yongs su mi bams so// de gang dang gang du skye ba de dang de dag tu sangs rgyas la lta ba dang / bral bar mi 'gyur/ chos thar pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur
37a1(dkon brtsegs): dge 'du la ser dkur byed pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyar sngar skye bar 'gyur/ de nga de dag tu skyes nas kyang / brtson 'grus co ra ning / dag pa'i chos
37a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su tshol ba la brtsonar par 'gyur ro// de brtson 'grus brtsams pas/ khyim gyi gangs mi 'dod par 'gyur/ bu po dang / bu mo 'dong par mi 'gyur/ brang po dang / brang mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dag mi 'dod
37a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ yongs su gzung ba thams cad kyi ngor lta ba mi 'dod par 'gyur to// da skyes nas 'dod pa la ma btsas par/ na tshong gnor nur sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa la dad pas khyib ras khyim meng bar
37a4(dkon brtsegs): myur du rab tu 'byung ngo // de dang par rab tu byung nas/ dge ba'i ba shes gzhan dang 'grogs/ dag pa'i gshes gzhan la ga rtog pas/ dge ba'i bsam pa rnyed par 'gyur ro// de dge ba'i bsam pa dang
37a5(dkon brtsegs): ldang pas/ dge ba'i chos lar cing sgrub pa sing por byed par 'gyur/ tshig lhur byeng ba'i blo nga ldan par mi 'gyur/ mang du'o sa pa yongs su tshol bas ngoms par mi 'gyur ji ltar thos pa'i ros
37a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu stong te/ zang zing meng pa'i sems kyis rnyeng ba dang / bkur bsti dang / tshigs su bcang ba la mi re zhing / rang gi tshig yongs su mi spong bar ga zhan la chos stor te/ 
37a7(dkon brtsegs): ltar thos pa dang / ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du gzhan la chos ston to// chos nyan pa rnams la byams pa chen po snang bar 'gyur/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po 'jug par 'gyur ro// de mang du thos pas lus
37a8(dkon brtsegs): ngang srog la mi lta bar 'gyur/ 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes par 'gyur/ rab tu dben pa dang nges par 'gyur/ gso sla ba dang / dgang spang dang / dgon pa la ngaga' ba dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams kyi don la nye bar
37b1(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa dang / ngom la rton gyis/ yig la mi rjod pa yin / lnga dang / mingang lA ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rten du 'gyur// bdag 'ba' zhig gi phyir zhugs pa ma yin gyi/ sems cad thams cad kyi phyir/ 
37b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di ste/ reg pa chen po// blar med pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes 'jig rten ga sum po thams cad las kyang bar du 'phags pa'i ye shes yongs su tshol lo// dang song ba
37b3(dkon brtsegs): byang bar 'gyur te/ ngel bag yod pa gang mer/ 'di lta ste/ dbang po yang dag par sdo pa'o// de la dbang po yang dag par sdeng gang zhe na/ gang ril gis gzugs thong nas mtshan mar mi 'dzin/ mdzan
37b4(dkon brtsegs): rnags su mi 'dzin/ gzugs la chags pa dang / zhes rimigs dang / 'byung ba yang yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de bzhi na du rnabs sgra dang / sngas dri dang / lces ro dang / lus kyis
37b5(dkon brtsegs): reg bya dang / yid kyis ches shes nas/ mtshan mar mi 'dzid mngon rdzogs su mi 'dzin/ chos rnams la chags pa dang / nyes rimigs kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa'i
37b6(dkon brtsegs): ni bag yod pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu brag yeng ba zhes bya ba ni/ gang bdag gi sems 'dul ba dang / gzhan gyi sems bsrung ba dang / nyon mongs pa la dga' ba spong ba dang / chos la dga' ba'i rjes su
37b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba dang / 'dod pa la rngam par rtog pa dang / gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa rnams mi 'byung ba dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnams mi 'byung ba dang / chags pa'i mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mi 'byung ba
37b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / zhe sdang gi mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mi 'byung ba dang / gti mug gi mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mi 'byung ba dang / lus kyis nyes par spyod pa dang / ngag gi nyes par spyod pa dang / yid kyis nyes par spyod pa mi
38a1(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba dang tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byeng ba mi 'thung ba dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad mi 'thung ba 'ari bag yod pa zhes bya'o// da ltar shA ri'i bu bag yod pa'i byang chub se nga
38a2(dkon brtsegs): tshul bzhin yid la byang ba la rab tu sbyor ba ni gang yod pa de yang yod par rab tu shes/ gang med pa yang med par rab tu shes so// de la ci yod/ ci ma cen/ yang dag pa la rab tu sbyor ba la ni/ 'phags pa'i rnam
38a3(dkon brtsegs): par grol ba yod do// log pa la rab tu sbyor ba la ri/ 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba med do// las kyi rnam par smin pa ni yod do// gang gi las rnam par smin pa de ni meng ngo // gzhan yang mig ni yod de/ gang gi mig de 'i
38a4(dkon brtsegs): med do// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / ying ri yo nga ngo // gang gi yid de ni med do gzhan yang gzugs mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 'gyur ba'i chos can de ni yod do// gzug
38a5(dkon brtsegs): rtag pa dang / brta pa dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can dang / ther dru gab dang de bzhin du gnas so zhes bya ba ni med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag
38a6(dkon brtsegs): padang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 'gyur ba'i chos can ni yod do// tshe rab dang / 'du shes dang / 'dadu byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtags pa dang / brtan pa dang / ther zug pa dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can dang / yang
38a7(dkon brtsegs): dag par de bzhin du gnas so zhes bya ba de ni med do// gzhan yang ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byad rnams yod kyi/ ma rig pa mang na/ 'du byed med ba nas skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi'i bar du yod kyi/ skye ba mang na rga shi med do// / 
38a8(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang sbyin pas longs spyod cheran por 'gyur ba'i yod do// sbyid pas dbul por 'gyur ba ni med do// tshul khrims kyis mthongs su skye bani yodang ngo // 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyis mtho ris su skye bani med do// thos pas
38b1(dkon brtsegs): shes rab chen par 'gyur ba ni yod do// 'chal pa'i shes rab kyis shes rab chen por 'gyur ba ni mang ngo // sgom pas bral bar 'gyur ba ni yod do// sgom pas 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba ni mang ngo do// tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la
38b2(dkon brtsegs): byed pas/ kun tu sbyor ba ni yod do// tshul bzhin ma yin pa yang la byed pas 'bral ba ni meng do// brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni byang chub yod do// la lo can la ni byang chub mang ngo // nga rgyal med pa
38b3(dkon brtsegs): la ni rab tu byung bar lung bstan pa yod do// nga rgyal can la ni mya ngan las 'da' ba mang ngo // gzhan yang thams cad du song ba'i stong pa nyid ni yod do// 'di ni bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / skyes bu dang / gang zab
38b4(dkon brtsegs): go zhes bya ba de ni meng ngo // de ltar shA ri'i bu bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin yid la byang ba dang ldan pa ni/ gang yod par 'jig rten gyi mkhas pa rnams kyis kun shes pa de la ni yod do zhes 'dogs so// 
38b5(dkon brtsegs): gang med par 'jig rten na mkhas pa rnams kyis kun shes pa de la ni med do zhes 'dogs so// de yod ces tha snyad du 'dogs pa la yang yang dag par shes par mi byed/ mang ces tha snyad du 'dogs pa la
38b6(dkon brtsegs): yang yang dag par shes par mi byang ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i yang dag pa'i don kyang khong du chud de/ chos thams cad ni nga bzhin gshegs pas bsdus te/ chos kyi mdo bzhir 'dus
38b7(dkon brtsegs): par byas so// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa dang / 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang / chos thams cad bdag med pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba'o// 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa
38b8(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba ni/ rtag par 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams kyi rtag par 'du shes pa spangs pa'i phyir nga bzhin gshegs pas bshad ngo // 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba nas bya ba ni bang bar 'du shes pa'i sems
39a1(dkon brtsegs): car rnams kyi bde bar 'dushes pa spang ba'i phyir/ nga bzhin gshegs pas bshad do// chos thams cad bdag rang ba zhes bya ba ri/ bdag du 'du shes pa'i sems car rnams kyi bdag tu
39a2(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes spang ba'i phyir/ de bzhir gshegs pas bshad do// mya ngan las 'das bzhi pa zhes bya ba ri/ dmigs pas phyir ci log tu gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyi dmigs pa'i phyin ci log tu gyur pa spong ba'i phyir
39a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gang shegs pas pa babang ngo // de 'du byed thams cad mi rtag go zhes thos nas/ shin tu mi rtag pa nyid la 'jug go/ 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba'o zhes thos nas/ smon lam dang bral ba bskyed do// 
39a4(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad bdag med pa'o zhes thos nas/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzir dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo la slob mo// mya ngan las 'ang sa bzhi bzhes nas/ mtshar ba med pa yongs su dris par byed de/ 
39a5(dkon brtsegs): dus mi yin par ni yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon su du mi byed do// de ltar shA ri'i bu lta bu'i chos la brtson pa'i byang chub semasapa pa'i ni/ dge pa'i ches las so su mi 'ams te/ myur dus sa
39a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' la brtag pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ gsum ba'o// / gzhan yang shA ri'i bu ltar dang
39a7(dkon brtsegs): pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos bcu la mngon par dang / yid chas/ rab tu rtog/ the tsom mi za/ 
39a8(dkon brtsegs): rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyeng ras/ ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes skyed do// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon
39b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / yid ches/ rab tu rdog/ bcom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs brnyed nas/ ngo mtshar dang / rmad du 'du shes skyed do// 'di lta ste/ nga bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin ga shegs pa'i dbyangs bsam gyis mi 'ab
39b2(dkon brtsegs): bal mngon par dad pa ras/ ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes skyed pa'i bar du'o// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi da bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bsam gyis ri khyab pa dang / 'de lta ste/ nga bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de
39b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhir gshegs pa'i 'ong bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di lta ste/ nga bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzir bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di lta ste/ nga bzhir ga shegs
39b4(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di lta ste/ de bzhin ga
39b5(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi/ nga bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa rnams pas gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab
39b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi/ nga bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang / yid chas/ rab tu rtog/ the tsom mi za/ rgya cher dga'
39b7(dkon brtsegs): mgu ste/ rangs pa rung nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmang du 'du shes skyed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos bcu po 'di rnams kyi phyir/ brtson 'grus cher po rtsom zhing / mi zhum mi 'god/ ma sgo ste
39b8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsabagyis mi khyab pa ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos bcu po ma thob kyi bar du lus kyi lpags dang / rgyas pa dang / phra dang / dbugs dang / rus pa dag zhig la/ lus kyi sha dang / khrag
40a1(dkon brtsegs): skams kyang bla'i/ brtson 'grus 'ams dar mi bya'o sam dung ltar sams snang ngo // shA ring bu de ltar dang pas mes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ nga bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis
40a2(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab pa/ ngo mtshar dang smad kyi chos bcu po 'di rnams la mngon par dang / ying ches/ rab tu rdeg/ the tsom mi za/ rgya cher dga' ragu ste/ rangs pa rnang ngo // nganas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgya cher rab tu bstan pa'i
40a3(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ de tshe tshigs su bcang ba 'di dag gsungs so// sangs rgyas sku ni bas ma mi khyab// ches kyi sku yi rab tu phye/ mtshan sa med cing snang mang la/ rgyal ba'i thugs sras dang bar byed// 'gro ba tha dang ji snyed kyi/ 
40a4(dkon brtsegs): skang bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ thams cad du ri chos sgrog ste/ sangs rgyas kyi ni spyod yul dang / ji tsam sems can thams cad kyi// dus gsung dag gi dbang po kun/ sangs rgyas kyis ni rab mkhyen
40a5(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis khyab la rab tu dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od mtha' yas// / 'od zer dra ba bsam mi khyab// zhing rnams rgya mtsho mtha' ya sa pa// thams cad kyi ni 'jig rten chos la mi gnas te// rdzu 'phrul
40a6(dkon brtsegs): rkang pa bsam yas la/ byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dang // sangs rgyas rtag tu mnyam par bzhag/ rnam par thar pa bsam mi khyab// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ni// sems can kun gyis shas mi nus// chos kyi dbyangs
40a7(dkon brtsegs): ni dbyer med la// gang gi stobs kyis shas 'gyur ba// drang srong chen po'i ye shes stobs// nam mkha' bzhin du mtha' yas pa// sems can gcig gi don phyir yang // bskal pa rgya mtshor mtha' yas pas// 'dul ba'i/ 
40a8(dkon brtsegs): don phyir bzhug pas na// nga ngag snying rje 'dra'o// sems can thams cad gzhan dang gzhan// dri ba rgya mtsho 'dri byed kyang // dris lan gcig gis tshim byed de/ mi 'jigs pa ni bsam mi khyab// rnam pa thams cad
40b1(dkon brtsegs): mchog ldan pa// chos rnams thams cad thugs su chud // sangs rgyas ches rnams ma 'dres pa thams cad du me shes gzigs/ ngang pa la ni rab ga nas pas / sangs rgyas kun chos chos nyid rnams/ bsam gyis mi khya ba 'di dag la/ 
40b2(dkon brtsegs): dang sa thams cang nga bar byed/ shAri'i buji ltar byang chub sems dnga' de bzhin ga shegs pa rnams kyi da ba'i na gshegs pa'i sbu bsam gyis mi khyab ba la mngon par dang / sing ches rab rtog/ thetho mon/ ra
40b3(dkon brtsegs): dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad du shes skyed ce na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni mi dag pa'i chos thams cad spangs pa/ dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa'o// 'di lta ste/ mi
40b4(dkon brtsegs): gtsang ba dang / mchil ma dang / ngar snabs dang / snabs dang / rnag dang / khrag dang / bshang ba dang / gcib dang / bral ba/ rus pa dang / sha dang / khrag dang / rgyus pa las rnam par
40b5(dkon brtsegs): grol ba'o// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba/ yongs su dag pa/ nyon mongs pa tham sa cad kyi dri ma dang bral ba'o// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs
40b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sku ni 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/ 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni/ yon tan dpag tu med pa dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pas/ 
40b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba'o// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni/ tshul khrims dpag tu med pa yongs su bsgoms pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / 
40b8(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba ye shes gakhrigs pa dpag tu meng ba yongs su bsgom pas/ yon tan thams cad rab tu rgyas pa'o// 'di lta ste/ nga bzhin gshegs pa'i sku na/ yongs su dag pa'i me long gi
41a1(dkon brtsegs): dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs brlan lnga bu dang / tshul zla ba snang blta du'o// 'di lta ste/ nga bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnam pa'i'i byings su yang dag par 'du zhing / chos
41a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbyings kyis klas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// 'di lta ste/ de bzhir gshegs pa'i sku ri/ zug pa thams sa las log par zag pa med pa'o// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbyir/ 'dus byas pa
41a3(dkon brtsegs): bral bas/ 'dus ma byas pa'o// nam mkha' lta bu'i sku'o// mnyam pa mang ba'i sku'o// 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i sku'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni/ dpe med pa/ 
41a4(dkon brtsegs): zla med pa mtshungs pa med pa'i sku ste/ dag pa/ dri mar dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa/ rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o// de ni sngon gyi mthas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ 
41a5(dkon brtsegs): ma'i mtha' rab tu phye ba ma yin// da ltar byung bas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ skye ba dang / rus dang / rigs kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ gzugs kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ 
41a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ ngang byang bzang pos rab tu phye ba ma yin/ sems kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ yid kyis rab tu bye ba ma yin/ rnam par shes pas rab tu phye ba ma yin// lta bas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ thos
41a7(dkon brtsegs): bas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ dran pas rab tu phye ba mi yin/ rnam par rig pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ phung pos rab tu phye ba yin/ khams kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ skye mched kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ skye bas rab tu phye
41a8(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ gnas pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ 'jibs rab tu bye ba ma yin/ 'dzin pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ 'dor bas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ nges par 'byung bas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ spyong pas rab tu phye
41b1(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin/ kha dog gis rab tu phye ba ma yin// rtags kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ dbyibs kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ 'ong bas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ 'gro bas rab tu phye ba ma yin// tshul khrims yid la byed pas rab
41b2(dkon brtsegs): tu phye ba ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin gyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ shes rab kyis rab tu bya ba ma yin/ rnam par grol bas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ rnam par grol ba ye shes mthong ba yang la byed pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ mtshan nying
41b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis rab tu bya ba ma yin/ mtshan nyid mi 'thun pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ chos kyi mtshan nyid kyis rab tu phye ba mi yin/ stobs su sgro btags pas rab tu bya ba ma yin/ mi 'jigs pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ 
41b4(dkon brtsegs): so so yang dag par rig pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ snying rje chen pos rab tu phye ba mi yan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'das par sgro btags pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ 
41b5(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / rmi lam gyi rang bzhin lta bur skye ba'i sku'o// stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa ra nga pa las byung ba'i sku'o// mi 'gyur ba'i sku'o// mi 'khrugs pa'i
41b6(dkon brtsegs): sku'o// rnam par mi rtog pa'i sku'o// mi gnas pa'i sku'o// mi snyams pa'i sku'o// gnas pa dang / rab tu gnas pa dang / mi g.yo ba thob pa'i sku'o// gzugs med pa/ gzugs kyi rang bzhir mi yin pa'i sku'o// tshor ba ma
41b7(dkon brtsegs): yin/ 'du shes ma yir/ 'du byed ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i sku'o// byung ba ma yin/ kun tu byung ba ma yin/ ma byung ba yang ma yin pa'i sku'o// rmad du byung ba'i chos
41b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi sku'o// mig las byung ba ma yin/ gzugs su gtogs pa ma yin/ phyi rol ma yin/ rna ba la gnas pa ma yin/ sgrar gtogs pa ma yin/ phyi rol ma yin/ snas rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin/ drir
42a1(dkon brtsegs): gtogs pa ma yin/ phyi rol ma yin/ lces bskyed pa ma yin/ ror gtogs pa ma yid/ phyi rol ma yin/ lus dang ldan pa ma yin/ reg byar gtogs pa pa yin/ phyi rol ma
42a2(dkon brtsegs): yin sems la 'dug pa ma yid/ yid la 'jug pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa la 'jug pa ma yin/ ldog pa ma yin/ rjes su 'jug pa ma yin/ gnas pad mi g.yo ba thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ 
42a3(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' gtugs pa/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sku ste/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa'
42a4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog// khe com min/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rlang nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmang du 'du shes pa skyed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar
42a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas skad gsus nas/ stong pa yang 'di skad gsu ngo // bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med par/ byang chub/ sems dpa'i spyod ba rnam spyad cing // las rnams gsum 'i shim
42a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs dag par/ mtshungs mang bde bar gshegs pa'i skra tshol lo// phyogs bcu 'gro ba kun la byams pa dang // snying rje rgya cher bskyed nas sbyin po byin// 'dod pa la log par g.yam pa rtag spong zhing // nam mkha' lta bu
42a7(dkon brtsegs): mchog gi sku mchog gi sku tshol lo// gsar ltar dag cing mdzes pa'i gos rnams ni// dpag tu med pa gang ga'i bya ma snyed// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rab spyod cing // rgyal ba'i sras kyis 'jig rten mchog la phul// g.yag
42a8(dkon brtsegs): gi rnga ma bzhin du tshul khrims srung // yan lag nyid lag bcad kyang dgral bzod // brtson 'grus kyi ni pha rol tu phyin spyod cing // sangs rgyas skul smod pa yong mi skyo// shes rab thabs dga' rgya cher bsam gtan pa/ 
42b1(dkon brtsegs): bsapa gtan spyod yul dga' rgyal rnam par blta// chos dbyings dang pa bde bar gang shegs pa'i sku// de 'das bdag gyur ces ni de la smon// srid par 'gro ba dag tu ga byad cing // mi mchog gis ni byang chub mtshungs mang thog/ 
42b2(dkon brtsegs): ngag 'dri med gtsang zhing rdul grol ba/ mar mkha' 'dra ba yangs pa'i sku thoba'o// rang bzhir stong ste bdag dang sems can bral/ mtshan ma med cing sgra dang bral ba thob/ mig gri yul kun las ni rab 'das pa/ de 'dra'i sku ni thub
42b3(dkon brtsegs): pas yang dag thob// gzod ma nas steng ma byas ma byung ba// gzugs dang sgra bral yid kyang rnam dag pa// de bzhin gshegs sku mi g.yo gang mthong ba/ des ni phyogs bcu'i bang bar gshegs pa mthong // ji ltar sgyu ma sprul pa sna
42b4(dkon brtsegs): tshogs lus// rta dang glang po bud med skyes pa'i gzugs// byis pa smra brdzun zhing phyin ci log/ de bzhin stobs bcu rnams la blta bar byas// gang dag 'das pa'i bde gshegs dpag med dang // ma
42b5(dkon brtsegs): byor rgyal ba de bzhin gang snang dag/ chos nyid gcig gyur mnyam pa med pa'i sku/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas shing nam mkha' 'dra/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi/ 
42b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i sbubs pa gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang // yid ches/ rab tu rtog/ the tsom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmang du 'du shes skyed do// shA ri'i bu ji ltar na byang chub
42b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de bzhin ga shegs pa rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang / yid chos/ rab tu rtog pa nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi 'du shes skyed ce na/ 'di ltar shA ri'i
42b8(dkon brtsegs): bung bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir/ 'khor ji lta ba de bzhin du sgra 'byung ste/ sems can thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab par byang
43a1(dkon brtsegs): rod kyi/ shA ri'i bung bzhir gshegs pa 'di skadar du/ ngas ge slong gi 'khor la ni 'di bshang // dge slong pa'i 'khor la ni 'di/ dge bsnyen gyi 'khor la ri 'di/ bram ze'i 'khor la ni 'di/ 
43a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal rigs kyi 'khor la ni 'di/ khyir bdag gi 'khor la ri 'di/ lha'i 'khor la ni 'di/ tshangs pa'i 'khor la ni 'di lta ste/ 'di lta ste/ mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs kyis bstar pa'i sde dang / lung bstar pa'i sde dang
43a3(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcing ba'i snga dang / chang du brjod pa'i sde dang / gleng gzhi'i sde dang / rdzogs pa brjod pa'i snga dang / de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa'i rabs kyi sde dang / shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang / rmad du byung ba'i
43a4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi sde dang / gtan la bab pa bstan pa'i sde rnams bshad par bya'o snyam du mi dgongs mod kyi// 'on kyang shA ri'i bu 'khor ji lta bu 'dus par gyur pa/ tshangs pa'i 'khor gyi bar du 'dus par gyur pa/ 
43a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi dbang po'i rim pa ci 'dra ba dang / sems can ngag la chos kyi mdo ji lta bu thos par bya ba dgos par 'gyur ba de lta bu 'i chos kyi mdo thos par bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi sa
43a6(dkon brtsegs): nas 'byung bar yang dag par shes kyang chos bstan pa de gcig la gcig nges pa'i tshig gnod par 'gyur ba yang med do// thams cad kyang rang gi chos rnam par rig par kun shes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs ni
43a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa las mngon par grub pa/ bden pa'i rjes su 'brang bas 'jug go// yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs de ni 'jam par 'byung / yid
43a8(dkon brtsegs): du 'ong ba dang / yid dga' ba dang / dag pa dang / dri ma med pa dang / snyan pa dang / mnyan par 'os pa dang / shes par bya bar 'ongs pa dang / mi rtsub pa dang / mi brlang ba dang / lus tshim par byed pa dang / 
43b1(dkon brtsegs): sems tshim par byed pa dang / snying dga' bar byed pa dang / dga' ba dang / ba bskyed pa dang / kun shes par byed pa dang / gsal zhing 'thad pa dang / mngon par dga' bar 'gyur bar dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / sang+ge'i
43b2(dkon brtsegs): skad kyi drag shul gyi nga ro'i sgra dang / sprin gyi sgra dbyangs dang / rgya mtsho'i sgra bsgrags pa'i dbyangs dang / mi 'am ci'i klu'i dbyangs dang / ka la ping ka'i nga ro'i sgra dbyangs dang / tshangs pa'i nga ro'i sgra skad kyi dbyangs dang / 
43b3(dkon brtsegs): rnga'i sgra dbyangs dang / dpal dang ldan pa dang / mnyen pa dang / zur phyin pa dang / bsgrags pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mgu bar byed pa dang / 'khor thams cad du grags pa dang / rnam pa thams
43b4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa dang / de dag dang gzhan yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gsheg bI gsungs gi dbyangs 'a byung ste/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
43b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rto ga/ the tsom mi za/ rgya cher dga' bgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed
43b6(dkon brtsegs): nas/ ngo mtshar dang slad du 'du shes skyed do// 'di la chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ nga la 'di skad ces bya'o// tshangs pa yin ni sgra dbyangs su/ 'dren pa gsung sgra rab 'byin te/ tshangs pa rnams ni tshim par byed/ 
43b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di 'dri'i chos ni phun sum tshogs// de yi dbangs ni byams dang ldan/ snying rje las ni yang dag 'byung // btang snyoms dang ni dga' ldan pa/ thub pa'i dbyangs ni rab tu 'byung // srog chags kun gyi 'dod char
43b8(dkon brtsegs): mad zhe sdang dug ni zhi byed cing // gti mug mun pa sel ba ste/ phun sum tshogs dbyangs 'di 'dra'o// 'dzam bu gling gi sna tshogs phyogs rnams na// mar gyur pa'i skad ni mtha' yas pa/ kun
44a1(dkon brtsegs): nade sgra rnam pa sna tshogs pa// dadangs 'di thos nas rjes su rtogs par 'gyur// sa bla dang ni de bzhin bar snang lnga// de dag ci 'dra'i skang la 'jug pa ltar/ daphyir thub dbang dbyangs ni rab zhugs
44a2(dkon brtsegs): ta rnam par nges thos mya ngan 'das reg 'gyur/ rkang gnyis ngag dang rkang bzhi rnams dang ni// rkang mangs ngag dang rkang pa med pa rnams// thams cad la ri de'i sgra dbyangs 'jug/ bskul nas rab tu 'chos shing
44a3(dkon brtsegs): tshar gcod byed// stong gsum 'di'i sgra rnams ji skad pa// tha ma dang ni 'bring dang de bzhin rab// nga dag rjes su 'jug dbyangs de sgrog ste// 'dul ba'i sems can thar pa reg par byed// rtog pa med cing rnam par mi rtog ste/ 
44a4(dkon brtsegs): gzung ba dang mi bcings las byung ma yin// mnyam par bzhag pas 'pha gas pa'i bden pa 'chang // sems can thos ras nyon mongs zhi bar byed// sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin dge 'dur sgra// sbyin thos
44a5(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims de bzhin bzod pa dag/ mtha' yas sgra ri sems can thos byed de// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs ning 'dra'a'o// nga ngas kyang mtha' yas ye shes mtha' yas pa// de'i dbyangs kyi
44a6(dkon brtsegs): tshad ni yong med de// de la byang chub sems dpa' mkhas dad cing // nga bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs la the tsom meng // shA ri'i bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi/ de bzhin gshegs
44a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang // yid ches/ rab tu rtog/ the tsom mi za/ thos nas rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes skyed ce na/ 'di ltar sha ri'i bu
44a8(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i chags pa med pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' mngon par dang / yid ches/ rab tu rtog pa nas/ ngang pas ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du
44b1(dkon brtsegs): shes skyeng ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtsams te/ khyod la dpe bstan par bya'o// shA ri'i bu yongs su brtag pa 'azung ste/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rtsa
44b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / shing dang / yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma dang / chung ngun sor bzhi'i tshad tsam lan cang ji snyed long ba skyes bu la la zhig gis de dag gcig tu spungs te/ gcig tu spungs nas/ mes bsregs te/ tshig
44b3(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur nas/ thal bar byas so// thal bar byas nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams gab+hI klung gi bye ma snyed kyi rgya mtsho chen po gang na yod pa de dag du blugs te/ lo stong du grugs kyang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs
44b4(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu yod de/ nga bzhin gshegs pa ye shes de dang ldan pas rgya mtsho chen po de dang de dag nas/ thal ba de dag blangs te/ 'jig rten gyi
44b5(dkon brtsegs): khams de dang de dag du 'dri ni 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig ni/ shing 'di 'dra ba zhig gi thal ba'o// 'di ni 'jig rten gyi kham sa che ge mo zhig gi/ shi ri ge mo zhig gre rtsa ba dang / che ge
44b6(dkon brtsegs): mo zhag gi sdong po dang / che ge mo zhig gi yal ga dang / che ge mo zhig gi 'bras bu'i thal ba'o// 'di ni phyogs che ge me zhig gi 'dab ma 'di 'dra ba zhig gi thal ba'o zhes rab tu 'byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
44b7(dkon brtsegs): ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings rab tu rtogs te/ de rab tu rtogs nas de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar 'di ni 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig gi thal ba'o zhes rab tu mkhyen nas rgyas par
44b8(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/ da ltar shA ri'i bu nga bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni da ltar rdzu 'phrul che'o// de bzhin/ da ltar mthu che'o// 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa ste/ shA
45a1(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'di la dang / yid ches rab tu rtog cing / de bzhin gshems pabyabs pas yid la byed ba de ngag thabs
45a2(dkon brtsegs): cang Ti/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dri'i mtha' ma thob par/ sdug bsngal mthar 'byid do// de ci'i phyir nan/ 'di ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings shin tu rdzogs te/ de shin tu rdzogs pas de ba'i
45a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rnams las sems bskyed pa gcig kyang chung mi za'o// shA ri'i bu khyod la dper bya ste/ 'di la skyes bu mkhas pa cig dpes pa shang nga'i ngor rnams kun shes te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shA ri'i bu skyes
45a4(dkon brtsegs): bu la la tshe lo brgya pa/ lo brgyar 'chi ba zhig gis skra'i rtse mo bye ba ba rgyar gshegs pas chu'i thags pa blangs te/ nga gang na bder 'ongs nas phyin pa dang / 'di skad ces kye go'u tam bdag gi chu'i
45a5(dkon brtsegs): thigs pa 'di khyod la gdams kyis nam bdag la dgos par gyur pa/ ngan slar byin cig ces zer ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas de/ blangs te rgya mtshor chen por bor nas/ de chu'i rgyur gyis bdas
45a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dres nas lhan cig tu mthar gyis rgya mtsho chen por zhugs so// de nas skyes bu tshe lo brgya pa de lo brgya lor pa dang / ngag la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas 'di skad ces/ go'u ma bdag gi chu'i thigs pa de dgos
45a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis bdag la byin cig ces zer na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes yod de/ ye shes de dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
45a8(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ skra'i rtse me bye ba brgyar gshegs pas chu'i thigs pa de rgya mtsho chen po de nas chu gzhan dang ma 'dres par blangs te/ skyes bu de la slar byin ro// shA ri'i bu 'di ltar nges shes par
45b1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir/ khyod la dpar bstan te/ de gang gi don du blta zhe na/ 'di lngalta ste/ shA ri'i bu'i chu'i thigs pa nga bzhin gshegs pa'i lag tu bzhag pa/ sun ring mo zhig yon yang chung mi za ba de bzhid du/ shA
45b2(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu me gang la la// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ya shas 'di lta bu la dang / yid ches/ rab tu rtog cing / de bzhin gshegs pa byangs pas yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
45b3(dkon brtsegs): la dmigs nas/ de'i phyir nam mkha' la me tog 'thor ba de dag thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di'i mtha' ma thob par/ sdug bsngal mthar 'byin par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshe Da
45b4(dkon brtsegs): pas chos kyi dbyings rab tu rtogs de/ de rab tu rtogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las las sems gcig bskyed pa yang chud mi za'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol
45b5(dkon brtsegs): to/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gang rnam par shes pa ma mchi sa par 'jug pa mchis sam/ bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i
45b6(dkon brtsegs): bu de ma yir ro// bcom ldan 'das ye shes ni gang lags rnam par shes pa na gang lags/ shA ri'i bu 'di bzhi ni rnam par shes pa'i gnas te/ rnam par shes pa de la gnas so// 'di lta ste/ rnam par
45b7(dkon brtsegs): pa gzugs la nye bar song zhing gnas/ gzugs la dmigs/ gzugs la gnas/ dga' ba la bsten pas skye zhing 'phel te/ rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par shes pa tshor ba la nye bar song zhing gnas/ 
45b8(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba la dmigs/ tshor ba la gnas/ dga' ba bsten pas skye zhing 'phel te/ rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par shes la 'du shes la nye bar song zhing gnas/ 'du shes la dmigs/ 'du shes la
46a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas dga' ba la bsdad pas skye'ang 'phel te/ rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par shes pa 'du byang la nye bar seng zhing gnas/ 'du byed ba dmigs/ 'du byed la
46a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas/ dga' ba la bster pas skye zhing 'phel ras/ rgyas par 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ri rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// gang len pa'i phung po lnga la mi gnas par/ rnam par shes pa'i phung po yongs su shes
46a3(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni ye shes zhes bya'o// gzhan yang rnam par shes pa ni/ sa'i khams rnam par 'ashes pa dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / ram mkha'i khams rnam par shes pa ste/ 'di ni
46a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// gang khams bzhi la mi gnas par/ rnar par shes pa'i chos kyi khams kun tu dbye ba shes pa 'di ri ya shes zhes bya'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba
46a5(dkon brtsegs): nigang rig gis shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnam par rig pa dang / rnabs shes par bya ba'i sgra rnam par rig pa dang / snas shes par bya ba'i dri rngam par rig pa dang / lces shes pa bya ba'i
46a6(dkon brtsegs): re rnam par rig dang / lus kyis shes par bya ba'i reg bya rnam par rig pa dang / yid kyis shes par bya ba'i chos rnam par rig paste/ 'di ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// gang nang nye bar ni zhing phyi rol tu mi
46a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyu ste ye shes kyi phyir 'drang zhing chos gang la yang mi rtog pa/ rnam par mi rtog pa de ni ye shes zhes bya'o// rnam par 'ashes pa ni dmigs pa las skye'o// rnam par shes pa ni yid la byed pa las
46a8(dkon brtsegs): skye'o// rnam par shes pa ni yongs su rtog pa las skye ste/ de ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// gang 'dzir pa med pas sems pa dang / ripags pa med/ rnam par rig pa med cing mi rtog pa'i
46b1(dkon brtsegs): mi shes zhes bya'o// gzhan yang 'dus byas la spyod pa'i chos la rnam par shes pa gnas shing / gang 'dus byas la sbyod pa'i chos rnam par shes pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'dus byas l-i ni
46b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa rgyu med de/ gang 'dus ma byas shes pa de ni ye shes zhes bya'o// gzhan yang gang skye ba dang / 'jig pa la rab tu gnas pa de ni rnam par shes pa'o// gang skye ba med pa dang / 'gag
46b3(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa la gnas pa nga ni ye shes zhes bya'o// de ltar shA ri'i bu 'di ni rnam par shes pa/ 'di ni ye shes te/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bsam
46b4(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab la mngon par dang / yid ches/ rab tu rtog/ the tsom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ yid rangs pa rnyeng nas/ ngo mcher dang rmad du 'du shes skyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
46b5(dkon brtsegs): dor de nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag/ gsungs so// ji ltar gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dpag med pa/ de bzhin phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kyi rtsa rnams ni// de dag
46b6(dkon brtsegs): skas bu la las mer bsregs thal bar byas// le ni brgya stong dag tu rgya mtsho dkrugs pa rnams/ de 'dra'i bi'i stobs bcu ye shes phra mnga' bas// thal ba blangs nas 'gro ba dag la lung ston pa// zhing rnams rab 'byam dag
46b7(dkon brtsegs): ga~M 'i rigs 'di/ da tshigathal ba 'di zhes rnam pa thams cad bakhyen// 'di ltar phyogs bcu dag gi 'jig ched khams kyi rdul// thams cad rdul du byas nas rgyal ba rnams ston te// de dag thams cad 'grang yang
46b8(dkon brtsegs): chags med the tsom med // de ltar bang bar gshegs kyi ye shes ram mkha' bzhin// ji snyed phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud// gang dag 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ldan// spyod pa kun gyi tshul
47a1(dkon brtsegs): shes bas pa pa rnabs dang de// gang gis blol mas gang gis thar par 'gyur bar mkhyed// 'jig rter kur mchog stobs bcu rnams kyi ye shes de ji se daphyogs su'i chos kyi
47a2(dkon brtsegs): dbyings su rabazhugs kyang // 'dred pa rnams la rtog dang rnam par rtog mi 'byung // bde gshegs sras po dang brgyal la ngang par byed/ 'phags pa dkor mchog brtseg
47a3(dkon brtsegs): pa cher po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya ba/ dab pa bzhi pa// shA ri li ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi/ de bzhir gshegs pa'i 'ong bas bgyis mi khyab pa la mngon
47a4(dkon brtsegs): par dang / yang ches/ rab tu rtog/ betsom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyedang cing / ngo mtshar dang rmang du 'du shes spyad ce na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings
47a5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu rtogs te/ de rab tu rtogs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mngon par gshegs ras/ lham me/ lhar re/ ljang ngar
47a6(dkon brtsegs): mdzad do// de 'di lta ste dper nga/ sprin med pa'i nam mkha' la nyi ma mdo na par shar ras/ lhar me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge ba de bzhin du/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
47a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mngon par gshegs nas/ lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger mdzad do// shA ri'i bu srin bu ma khyer gyi 'od de bas ni/ gang 'bru mar gyi mar me'i 'ang 'di bzhin
47a8(dkon brtsegs): tu 'phags// shin tu mchog shin tu kha dog dang ldan/ shin tu 'ong gsal/ shin tu rgya che'o// 'bru mar gyi mar me'i 'ong de bas ni/ rtsig pa chen po'i 'od 'di shin tu 'phags/ shin tu mchog nas shin tu rgya che ba'i
47b1(dkon brtsegs): bar du'o// gang rtsig pa chen po'i 'ong nga bas ni/ ma'i phung po chen po'i 'od gang yin pa dang / sman dang / skar pa'i 'od gang yin pa'i bar du rgyas par bya ste/ zla ba'i 'od dang / nyi 'i 'od dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i
