47b2(dkon brtsegs): ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od dang / gzhal med khang dang / lus kyi rgyan rnams dang / de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan
47b3(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi rab dang / gan la med khang dang / lus kyi rgyan rnams dang / gang tshangs pa rnams dang / tshangs ri pa rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdunar 'dor pa rnams dang / tshangs 'khor ba rnams dang / 
47b4(dkon brtsegs): tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyi rab dang / gnal med khang dang / lus kyi rgyan rnams kyi 'od 'di shin tu 'phags// shin tu bzang /  na tu mchog/ shin tu ladog dang ldan/ shin tu 'ong gsal/ 
47b5(dkon brtsegs): shin tu rgya che'o// gang tshangs pa rnams dang / tshangs ris pa rnams dang tshangs pa'i 'dun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs 'khor bu rnams dang / tshangs rjer gyi lha rnams kyi 'od rgyang rgyas par
47b6(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/ 'od chen po dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'ong dang / 'od gsal nas dge rgyas kyi bar dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / 'du shes can dang / 'du shes med pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med mer dang / mi
47b7(dkon brtsegs): che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / bya 'om sdang dang / shin tu mthong gyi ra ba dang / zhal mang khang dang / lus kyi 'od dang / gang 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi ra ba dang / gzhal med khang rnams dang / lus kyi 'od 'di shing
47b8(dkon brtsegs): tu 'phags/ shin tu bzang / shin tu mchog/ shin tu kha dog dang ldan shin tu 'ong gsal/ shin tu rgyache'o// gang 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi rab dang / gzhal med 'ang rnams dang / 
48a1(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi 'ong bas ni gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od 'di shin tu 'phags/ shin tu bzang / shin tu mchog/ shin tu 'dog dang ldan
48a2(dkon brtsegs): shin tu 'ong gsal/ shin tu rgya che'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa tshul khrims dpag tu med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med pa dang / shes rab dpag tu med pa dang / rnam par grel
48a3(dkon brtsegs): ba dpag tu med pa dang / rnam par grol ba ya shes mthong ba dpag tu med pa'i phyir ro// de ltar shA ri ri bu ji tsam stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ra/ 'od tu btags pa gdags pas btags pa de thams
48a4(dkon brtsegs): cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// de 'di lta ste dper na/ b+ha ri 'i bu 'dzam bu chu de'i gser gyi nang du/ gser tha mal pa bzhag
48a5(dkon brtsegs): nasdug tsha'i gar bu bzhin du 'gyur te/ lam mer mi 'gyur/ lhar nar mi 'gyur/ lhang nger mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du shwA ri'i bu/ stong gsum gyi stong cher po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
48a6(dkon brtsegs): na'od du gdags pas btag pa/ ji snyed yod pa de thams cad de bzhid gshegs pa'i 'od kyi mdu na/ lam mer mi 'gyur/ ldan mi 'gyur/ lhang nger mi 'gyur ro// 'od gsal bar mi 'gyur te/ de bzhin
48a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i 'od ni de dag gi nang na mchog ces bya/ dam pa zhes bya/ bla na med ba zhes bya'o// shA ri'i bu gang nga bzhin gshegs pa'i nya tshe ba'i 'ong / las kyi rnam par smin pa las/ mngon par 'grub pa'i 'od nges
48a8(dkon brtsegs): kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas shin tu khyab par 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu zla ba dang / nyi ma'i 'od kyi snang ba yang mi 'byung / nyin mor yang mi shes/ mtshan mor yang mi shes/ zla/ 
48b1(dkon brtsegs): dakhyer nga/ blang ba cig par mang mi shes/ lu 'ong la mi shes mang gyi/ 'di la ste/ de ban gshegs pas sems can la thugs 'dre bar phyir/ 'od ras pang ma du byen gyis zlo ste/ shA
48b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhad na/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa 'od kyis khyab par mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha
48b3(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pa ste/ shA ri'i bu don de nyid rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ khyod la dpe bstan to// shA ri'i bu skyes bu la la zhig gis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
48b4(dkon brtsegs): snyed ba tham pang rdul phra rab du byas nas/ rdu lang dag zu bar blugs te/ sha phyogs su song nas/ rdul phra mo ji snyed pa de snyed kyi khams 'das nas/ rdul phra rab gnyis bor zhing / shar phyogs su song
48b5(dkon brtsegs): na shA ri'i bu rdul phra rabang thams cad ni zang par 'gyur gyi/ shA ri'i bu bar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ni zang ba med do// de \u0f7f/ nadu lho dang / nub dang / byang nas phyogs bcu kun gyi bar du'o// shA
48b6(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu de ji snyam du sems 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi mtha' dang mu gzung bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de mi nus so// bde bar gshegs pa mi nus so// bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs
48b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhed na/ 'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad 'od kyis khyab par mdzad de/ 'jig can gyi khams de dag na/ ji tsam 'ong du btags pa bdags pas btags pa
48b8(dkon brtsegs): nga thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi mdur ra brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba ras/ rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod da/ de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
49a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dab pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// yang shA ri'i bung bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od la ni/ rtsig pa'am/ shing ngam/ ldo pa'am/ khor
49a2(dkon brtsegs): yug gi ri 'am/ khor yug chen po 'ang/ ri spos kyi dang lda dang ba/ rig tang zung ngab/ ri btang zung cher po 'am/ gangs ri'ab/ rigazha' shing 'dzir tam/ nge ba yin pa gzhan ri rag po'am/ ri
49a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po ri rab dang / gang gis kyang sgrib par mi nus te/ nga dag thams cad las thal ras/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par bas kyang / dman pa la mos pa'i sems can rnams mos
49a4(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur te/ de la sems can la las ri de bzhin ga gas pa'i 'od 'dom gang tsam du mthong ngo // gang nga bas rgya chab de dag gis ni/ 'od 'dor do tsam du mthong ngo // gang de bas shin tu
49a5(dkon brtsegs): rgya che ba de dag gis ni 'ong rgyang grags tsam du bathong ba ras/ gang de bas kyang shin tu rgya chen pos ni/ 'od stong gsum gyi sdong chen bo tsam gyi bar du mthong ste/ de ltar shA ri'i bu stong phrag brgya pa'i
49a6(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pas ni 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag brgya'i bar du 'od kyis khyab par mthong ste/ rgyas par bya'o// sa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams bu med pa'i bar du khyab
49a7(dkon brtsegs): par mthong ngo // de ltar shA ri'i bu nam mkha'i khams ji tsam pa/ sems can gyi khams kyang de tsam ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can la thugs brtse ba'i phyir/ de tsam du 'od kyis khyab par mdzad do// de byang
49a8(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpas thos nas/ the tsom mi za/ mngon bar dang / yid ches/ rab tu rtog/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmang du 'du shes skyed ngo // 'di la chos ni 'di yin
49b1(dkon brtsegs): te de la 'di sad ces bya'o// 'im zla nga'i 'ong gang dang // brgya byin tshangs 'ong gang yong dang / 'og mir bar gyi 'od rnams kyis// bcu drug char yang mi phong ngo // 'og mir gyi'i 'od rnams dang // gang rnams stong gsum
49b2(dkon brtsegs): khyad gyur pas/ sangs rgyas sku'i 'od zer gyi// bcu drug char yang mi bong ngo // rab mkha' ngag ji tsam bar// de tsam 'od kyis khyab byed pa/ blo gros rgya cher sems car gyis/ de 'dra bar ri 'ong thong ngo // sangs
49b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas 'od de tha' yas ste// rang mkha' dang ri mtshungs pa'ar ba/ ji ltar 'dul bar 'gyur rnams kyis/ de 'dra bar ni 'ongar bong ngo // ji ltar skyes bung pus long gis// nyi ma'i 'od ri re 'dra ba// ma mthong bas ri 'ong nga la/ 
49b4(dkon brtsegs): 'od ni yod pa min nas smra// de bzhi sems can dmar nga gang / rgyal ba'i 'od ri mir thong ste/ mar thong bsar rgyal ba yi// 'od ni yong pa rir zhes zer// la las 'do ba ngo tsam du mthong // la las
49b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyang grags dpag tshad dang // la las stong gsum thams cad du/ 'od kyi khyab par gyur pa mthong // sa brgyad pa dang dgung dang / bcu pa la ri gang gnas pa// byang chub sems dpa' shes rab cha/ 
49b6(dkon brtsegs): sa cher la ni gang gnas pa// de dag sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od // mtha' yas dkyil 'khor 'jug byed cing // bsapa yas sangs rgyas zhing rnams su// sangs rgyas dag gi bya ba byed// de ltar sangs rgyas bsam yas te// 
49b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas 'od zer bsam mi khyab// bsam mi khyab la dang byas ra// bsod nams phung po bsapa mi khyab// yang shA ri'i bu ji ltar na nga bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims bsam gyis mi khyab
49b8(dkon brtsegs): pa la mngon par dang / yid ches/ rab tu rdog// thetso ba mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste// rangs pa rnyed nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes skyeng ba dang / de bzhir gshegs pa rnams kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa
50a1(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzi bas bgyis kyi khyab pa la mngon par dang / yid ces/ rab tu rdzog nas/ de mtshar dang rmang kyi 'du shes skyed cen/ shA ri bu 'di ltar yang dag par slabs sgrub/ 
50a2(dkon brtsegs): blangs yongs su dag pa'i sebs can 'jig rten du byung ste/ lus kyi las yongs su ngag pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gi las yengs su dag pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyi las yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa 'jig che thung zhing
50a3(dkon brtsegs): skyes nas/ 'jig rten gyi chos kyis mgos pa/ brang ze sdig pa spangs pa/ dge sbyong zhib/ bsam gtan ba'i mchog ting nge 'dzi dngas pa'i pha rol tu song ba'i sems can 'jig rten du byung bde ni/ de bzhin gshes
50a4(dkon brtsegs): ba yin par yang dag par smra bas smra'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / tshangs par bcas pa dang / bdud du bcas pa dang / dge sbyong du bcas pa dang / bram zer bcas
50a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i skye dgu dang / lnga dang mi dang ldam yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rjen/ ji lta de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang gangar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lta'i tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin
50a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi phung po yongs su dag pa/ tshang rang ba de lta bungs ma mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngam pa pha rol tu son pa'o// shA ri'i
50a7(dkon brtsegs): bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa'i dpe tsam nyan par 'dod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar dge slong dag la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims
50a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtsams te/ dpe tsam bshad na bcom ldan 'das las ji ltar thos pa de bzhin du 'dzin par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das nga'i dus ni 'di lags so// bde bar
50b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa de'i dus ri 'di lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu rjes pa dus pas/ sems can gyi 'ams dang / sa'i 'das gang dang / gsol ba/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis
50b2(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa'i ngor bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ bco ldan 'das sems car gyi khabs ni rab tu mang gi/ sa'i khams ni pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no// shA ri'i bung de bzhin
50b3(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu sems can gyi khams rab tu rang gi/ sa'i khang sa ni ma yir ro// shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rter gyi khams na/ serbasan ji seng sgo nga las skyes pa 'am/ rang la nas skyes pa 'am/ dro ga
50b4(dkon brtsegs): las skyes pa 'am/ rdzus te skyes pa'am/ gzugs car ram/ gzugs meng ba'am/ 'du shes car rab/ 'du shes mang ba'am/ 'du shes pang 'du shes rang pir gyi sems can rnams/ ji rnams
50b5(dkon brtsegs): can du gdags pas bdags pa de thams cad yongs su bcam bcu nga ste/ skad cig thang cig yung tsam gcig gis/ snga phyi med par pi'i lus thob par gyur la/ shA ri'i bu pir gyur pa'i sems
50b6(dkon brtsegs): can de dag thams cad skad cig thang cig yud tsam gcig gis// snga pa med par blar red pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur cing yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/ de bzhir gshegs
50b7(dkon brtsegs): ba re ngas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs par ngon par sprul te/ de bzhir gshegs pa re re la yang // dbu stong du gyur/ dbu re re la yang / zhal stong stong du gyur/ 
50b8(dkon brtsegs): zhal re re la yang / ljags stong stong du gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad stobs bcu dang ldan par gyur/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
51a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / chags pa med pa/ sgring pa beng pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spobs padang ldan par gyur la/ shA ri'i bu de lta bu'i de bzhi gshegs pas/ de bzhir gshegs pa gcig gi
51a2(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtsams te/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du bsngags pa brjod kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po ni de 'dra ste/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i
51a3(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims kyi phung po yang mi zad/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi shes rab dang spobs pa blar med pa yang mi zad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad de'i bar du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i
51a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir ce na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / de'inan gshegs pa de dag gi shes rab dang spob pad+ma med pa nyid dang / de gnyis ni tshad med/ grangs med/ bsam
51a5(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab nam mkha' mnyam zhing mtshungs so// shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can lta zhog la/ shA ri'i bu shang phyogs kyi 'jig rter gyi khams pang+gA'i klung gi bye
51a6(dkon brtsegs): ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed pa dang / de bzhin du/ lho dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs dang / de bzhin du phyogs mtshams dang / phyogs bcu kur gyi 'jig rten gyi khabs gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
51a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems can de dag thams cad skad cig thang cig yub tsam gcig gis/ mi'i lus thob par gyur pa nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa'i bar du gong pa bzhi
51a8(dkon brtsegs): du rgyas par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi shes rab dang spobs pa bla na med pa dang de gnyis tshang med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis
51b1(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab/ rab mkha' dang panyam zhing batshungs te/ da ltar shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa'i pha rol rol tu sod pa'o// shA ri'i bu khyod de bzhir gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin
51b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dpe tsam du bya ba nyan par 'dod dam// gsol ba/ ji ltar dge slong rnams bcom ldan 'das las thos nas/ de bzhin du 'dzin par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i dus 'di lags so// bang bar
51b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa de'i tshong 'di lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de'i dus/ de'i tshing 'byung ste/ nyi ma bdudar 'jig rten du byung bar gyur nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rter
51b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi khabs 'di 'bar/ kun tu 'bar/ kur tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu 'jigan gyi khams 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa de sa phyogs gang na/ 
51b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhir gshegs pa 'chag gam/ banangs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mngal ba'i sa phyogs ngo ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos ba cu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bcu gang zher/ sa phyogs de lag
51b6(dkon brtsegs): mthil ltar pa'am par 'gyur te/ sa phyogs de ngo tshar dang rmad kyi chos dang po 'di dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar/ kur tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 
51b7(dkon brtsegs): 'bar btsag tu gyur pa deng sa phyogs gang ri de bzhi gshegs pa 'chag gam/ bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mal ba'i sa phyogs de/ gseg ma dang / gyo mo med cing mtho bar gyur pa'i gzugs su 'gyur / 
51b8(dkon brtsegs): sa phyogs de ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos nyis pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu 'jig can gyi khams 'bar/ kun tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas 'tshig pa
52a1(dkon brtsegs): dngas phyogs gang ra de bzhir gshegs pa 'chag gas/ bdengs sapa/ bzhugs sapa/ mngal ba'i sa phyogs pa/ nga bzhid gshegs pa yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir/ yang
52a2(dkon brtsegs): shing mnyam par gyur te/ shA ri'i bus phyogs de ngo mtshar dang rbad kyi chos gsub pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gzhang yang shA ri'i bu 'jig rter gyi khams 'bar/ kun tu 'bar/ ku tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 
52a3(dkon brtsegs): 'bar ba cig tu gyur nas/ 'tshig pa dang sa phyogs gang ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/ bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mnal ba'i sa phyogs der rtsa sngo ba/ 'khyil pa/ 'jab pa/ g.yas phyogs su
52a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khyil ba/ ka tsa lin da ltar reg na bde ba/ dri rab tu zhim pa skye bar 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bus phyogs de ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos ba zhi pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gzhar yang shA ri'i bu 'jig ced
52a5(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams 'bar/ kun tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bara'abar ba gcig tu gyur nas 'tshig pa deng / sa phyogs gang na de bzhir gshegs pa 'chag gam/ bzhengs sam/ 
52a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs sam/ mngal ba'i sa legs der yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu brang ba/ yang ba/ 'jam pa/ ngang ba/ rnyog pa med pa/ rab tu dang ba/ 'thung 'dod pa/ mang du 'thungs kyang nang du mi 'gyur ba dang / yang
52a7(dkon brtsegs): lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu sa phyogs de ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos lnga pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar/ kun tu 'bar/ kun tu rab
52a8(dkon brtsegs): tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas/ 'tshog pa der/ sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/ bzhengs sam/ bzhugs ma/ maral ba'i sa phyogs der/ de bzhin gshegs
52b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smir pas/ rab tu bsil bi'i rlung ldang bang 'di lta ste/ dab ma/ shA ri'i bu sos ka'i thara'i zla ba tshabs gdungs pa'i dus na/ skyes bul la zhig gap+sA'i klung du zhugs nas/ lus bsol
52b2(dkon brtsegs): bar byas te/ rims dang / snyoms pa thams cad zhi bar byas nas/ gang+gA'i klung nas byung zhing slar byung nas/ 'chag cing 'gro ba las/ ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig nu/ nags sdug po yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma grib
52b3(dkon brtsegs): ru stug po dang ldan pa chen po zhig thong nas/ de rags skyugs po gang ma yang bder song ste phyin pa dang / nags stul po ringabus ma khri'i steng du phyar bu bting ba/ be rucus kyis g.yogs pa/ ka tsa lin 'i gding ba 'iting nga
52b4(dkon brtsegs): nga steng ngar gyis g.yogs pa/ ya dog ma tog tu sngas dbang po bsha mas pa zhig mthong nas/ de de la 'dug go// ding la 'dug ste/ greb zhing / phyogs pa ni kun nas bsil ba'i rlung ldang bar 'gyur
52b5(dkon brtsegs): bde bzhin du ri'i bus phyogs der bsil ba'i drung ldang bar gyur te/ shA ri'i bus phyogs de ngo mtshar dang rmang kyi chos drug pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang shI ri'i bu 'jig
52b6(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams 'bar/ kun tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas/ 'tshig pa der sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/ bzhes sa ra/ bzhugs sar/ ma ral
52b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sa phyogs de chu las skyes pa'i me tog ung pa la dang / pad+ma dang / kung bung dang / pad+ma dkar po skye bar 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bus phyogs de ngo mtshar dang zad kyi chos 'dud pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gzhan
52b8(dkon brtsegs): yang shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar/ kun tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas/ sa phyogs gang na nga bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gas/ bzhengs sam/ 
53a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dugs sam/ mal pa sa phyogs / rangalasu skyes pa'i 'i to dzis yin 'as nga / sAl mi tog dang /  shA kA dang / mya nal nga / sAsnu
53a2(dkon brtsegs): reng ka'i mechos dang / ngar mi dang / go ta ril sogs pa/ bang las skyes pa'i me tog sna tshogs pa dog dang ldang pa/ dring ldan pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bus phyegs dngo sas rang rung kyi chos
53a3(dkon brtsegs): brkyang pa 'di dang ldar par 'gyur ro// gnang yang shA ri bu 'jig rte gyi 'angs 'bar/ kun tu'abar / ku bya ba drer med cing bar te/ dbar bapo cag tu gyur nas/ 'jog pa dengs byegs gang dade bzhi dag ce
53a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'achag gam/ bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mnal ba'i sa phyogs nges zhing mi shigs pas gzhi rdo rje ltar 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bus phyogs ni ngo mtshar dang smad kyi chos dgu pa 'di dang ldan par grur
53a5(dkon brtsegs): ngagazhan yang shA ri'i bu song gsung gyi stong chen po'i 'dzi/ nagyi 'ams yang me/ ra tul me/ ku tu tulam me/ ra kun tu nga / kung tu tu mdzod cing
53a6(dkon brtsegs): 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas 'tshig pa der / sa phyogs gang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'chag gang/ bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mnal ba'i sa phyogs
53a7(dkon brtsegs): delhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / bdudadu du bcas pa dang / tshangs par bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang mi ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rter gyi mchod can du 'gyur te/ shA ra'i bu
53a8(dkon brtsegs): sa phyogs de ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos bcu po 'di dag dang ldan par 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu sa phyogs de ni ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos bcu po de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro// yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos
53b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbyings shin tu rdzogs te/ de rtogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji ltar mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems la gcig tu bde bar so sor yang dag par myong bar 'gyur
53b2(dkon brtsegs): ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ras/ bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bya ba sang du bzhugs kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su 'bri ba med par ngas pashang ngo // shA ri'i bu de bzhin gabye
53b3(dkon brtsegs): pa bsod snyoms gcig gis bskal par gnas sam/ bskal pa brgya'am/ skal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa stong phrag brgya 'am/ bskal pa bya ba 'am/ bskal pa bya ba brgya 'am/ bskal pa bye ba stong ngam/ bskal pa
53b4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba stong phrag brgya 'am/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ngam/ de las lhag par yang bzhugs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shAri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
53b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas ri/ pha rol tu phyir ba mchog gi ngam pa'i pha rol tu so na ba ste/ shA ri'i bung bzhin gshegs pa ri de ltar rdzu 'phrul che/ de ltar mthucha/ de ltar dbang che bar grags pa'o// 
53b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste dper na/ shA ri'i bu 'du shes rang 'du shes mang mir skyer ched kyi lha'i nang du/ lha'i bu skyes pa de dmigs pa cig la gnas pa'i rnam par shes pas/ bskal pa brgyad khri bzhi stong du 'dug ste/ bsam
53b7(dkon brtsegs): gtan gyis tshe'i mtha' 'chi ba'i dus ma byas kyi ba du/ rnam par shes pa de las rnam par shes pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du shA ri'i bu gang gi nub mo// de bzhin gshegs pas/ blar mang ba yang
53b8(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / gang gi nub mo phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i bar du de bzhin ga
54a1(dkon brtsegs): pating nga 'dzir las 'das pa reng / sams 'gyur ba dang / sapas rgyung yang / sems rnam par rgyu ba dang / sapas rab tu rgyu ba med/ 
54a2(dkon brtsegs): sems rgyas pa meng / sems kyis 'dre dang mang / sems g.yeng ba meng / sabs batho ba dang / sems dpa' bzeng / sapas kun du srung ba dang / sems sbeng ba meng / sems tshim pa med/ sems
54a3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'thur pa med/ sems 'dud pa meng / sems g.yo med/ sems rab tu dga' bar byed pa ring / sems dubapa med/ sams rtog pa meng / sems rnam par rtog pa med/ sams yongs su rtog pa
54a4(dkon brtsegs): med sems kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par shes pa meng / sems mig la gnas pa med/ rna ba dang / snga dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas pa med/ gzugs la gnas pa
54a5(dkon brtsegs): med/ sems sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos la gnas pa med/ sems chos la 'jug pa med/ sem sa rnam par shes pa 'jug pa mang / sems 'das pa la yang ri
54a6(dkon brtsegs): lta sems ma 'ongs pa la yang mi lta/ sems da ltar byung ba la yang mi lta ste/ de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin la gnas ras/ 
54a7(dkon brtsegs): sems las chos gang yang bsal ba med mo kyi/ lhur gyis grub pa'i tshul gyis/ chos thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug go// 'di ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin
54a8(dkon brtsegs): ni sems dang / yang dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral mod kyi/ gnas kyang mi 'dor te/ lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi bya ba thams cad kyang mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
54b1(dkon brtsegs): ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/ ston pas yang 'di skad gsungs so// bskal pa brgya stong dpag tu med cing gzhal yas par// sngon gyi sred pa'i 'gro bar byang
54b2(dkon brtsegs): chub spyod sbrang tsha// tshul khrims dang ni thos dang ting 'dzin bag yod dang // bzod pa dag kyang byang chub mchog phyir 'dren pas bsgoms// rgyal ba'i rtog dang 'bras bu dag pa 'di 'dra bas// tshul
54b3(dkon brtsegs): khrims shin tu yongs dag 'jig rten kur gyi mchog/ ji ltar nam mkha' dri meng rnam dag spros med ltar// stobs bcu'i tshul khrims dri ba mang par ma mkha' bzhin// gang gi nub mo rgyal bas dang po byang
54b4(dkon brtsegs): chung rtogs// gang gi rub me tha mar mya ngan 'das gshegs tshe// stobs bcu rnams la sar+b+ba rgyu rab tu rgyu ba med// de bzhir bsapa gta na ting 'dzin nyams pa nam yang med// stobs bcu rnams kyi
54b5(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims phung po nyams med de/ rdzu 'phrul stobs dang rnam thar nyams pa'i char 'gyur med// bskal pa brgya phrag stong du sems ri gcig gis gnas// 'dren pa la ni rtog dang rnam
54b6(dkon brtsegs): par rtog pa mang // 'dren pa rnams kyi rnam rtog spyod yul ram mkha' 'dra// dus gsum dag la sangs rgyas ye shes thogs meng 'jud// stobs bcu rnams la sems yid rnam par rgyu ba dang / rtog dang
54b7(dkon brtsegs): gtong ba meng bar sangs rgyas sras rnabs dang // de ltar shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi nga bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzir bsam gyis mi
54b8(dkon brtsegs): khyab pa la mngon par dang / yid ches/ rab tu rtog/ som nyi med/ the tsom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed pa yang ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi 'du shes skyed ngo // shA ri'i bu ji ltar ra/ byang
55a1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' de ba'i gshegs pa rnams kyi/ de bzhi ga shegs pa'i rdzu 'drug gyi stongs pasasagyis mi khyab pa la mngon pa dang / ying ces/ ra
55a2(dkon brtsegs): sa som kyi med/ me tsom min/ rgyache ga ma bu ste/ las brtsenas/ ngos dang rang kyi 'du shes skyed cen/ shA'i'i brang dzin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis
55a3(dkon brtsegs): duganas brtan mo'u dbal gyi bu chen po 'di ni nga'i nyan thos rdzu 'phrul che ba'i nang na mchog go zhes gsungs te/ byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul ngal 'jam zhing yongs su dpyod ngo do// byang chub sems dpa'i
55a4(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul yang 'jal zhing yongs su dpyod do// gzhal ta yongs su dpyad nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul dang mtshungs shing mnyam par ma mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul la gan+d+ha
55a5(dkon brtsegs): zhing yongs su dpyang nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul la 'jal zhing yongs su dpyod ngo // gzhal te yongs su dpyang nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang mtshungs shing
55a6(dkon brtsegs): mnyam par ma mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab bo snyam nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul yongs su
55a7(dkon brtsegs): grub par bya ba'i phyir/ rgya cher brtson 'grus rtsom mo// shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul la brtsams ta dpe tsam du bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa las khyod nyan par 'dod dam/ bcom ldan 'das de'i dus
55a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di legs so// bde bar gshegs pa de'i tshong 'di lags so// 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul la brtsams te dab bshad na/ dge slong rnams bcom ldan
55b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das las nga thos nas nga bzhin du 'dzin par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir shA ri'i bu legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol
55b2(dkon brtsegs): ras/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ gnas brtan me'u 'gal gyi bu chen po rdzu 'phrul chen
55b3(dkon brtsegs): po yi ram/ gsol/ dge slong nyan thos rdzu 'phrul che ba'i nang na/ 'di ltar gnas bcar mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po 'di ni mchog go zhes bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las mngon tu thos te/ mngon sum du bzung ngo // bka'
55b4(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu bal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig can gyi khams 'di 'am dzes rdzu 'phrul chen po ma'u dgal gyi bu lta bus/ 'di lta ste/ dper ra bu ram shing stug po 'am/ 'dab bu stug po 'am/ 'od ma
55b5(dkon brtsegs): stub po 'am/ til gyi zhing ngam/ 'bras kyi zhing bzhin du gang bar gyur pa de ltar gcig tu 'dus pa'i nyan thos kyi chog/ sang lta bus mthu dang brtsor 'grus thams cad dang / rdzu 'phrul dang
55b6(dkon brtsegs): tshe 'phrul gyi stobs thams cad kyang / de bzhir gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul gyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ stong gi char yang / stong gi char yang / bye ba'i char yang / bye ba brgya'i char yang bye ba
55b7(dkon brtsegs): steng ga char yang / bye ba brgya stong gi char yang / grangs su yang / char yang / bgrang bar yang / dper yang / rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu nga nan gshegs pa dgra bcom
55b8(dkon brtsegs): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ rdzu 'phrul dang mo 'phrul gyi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shA ri'i bu gal ting 'i man gshegs pas sa 'di la yungs dkar kyi 'bru gcis pa 'as na/ de bzhin gshes
56a1(dkon brtsegs): pas yungs kar gyi 'dru bzhag pang yang / de lta bu'i 'an thos kyi tshogs mthu dang / stobs dang / brtsor 'grus dang / drag shul thams cad dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gyi
56a2(dkon brtsegs): stobs thams cad bstan kyang / de bzhir gshegs pas bzhag pa'i yungs kar gyi 'bru skra'i rtse mo gcig tsam yang bskyod par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
56a3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa pha rol tu sor ba'o// shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lta 'og la/ shA ri'i bu shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
56a4(dkon brtsegs): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa dang / de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs mtshams dang / phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams
56a5(dkon brtsegs): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji tsam sgong las skyes/ pa 'am/ mngal nas skyes pa nas/ 'du shes med 'du she sa med min gyi bar gyi sems can de dag thams cad yongs su brtags
56a6(dkon brtsegs): pa bzung ste/ nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po lta bur gyur la/ shA ri'i bu de lta bu'i nyan thos kyi tshogs thams cad kyi/ stobs dang / mthu dang / dra shub thams
56a7(dkon brtsegs): cang dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / chos 'phrul gyi stobs thams cad bstan kyang / yungs 'bru yang bdag par mi nus te/ tha na skra'i rtse mo cha tsam yang bskyod par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gakye
56a8(dkon brtsegs): ba ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa ste/ shA ra bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ de ltar rdzu 'phrul che/ de ltar mthu che/ de ltar dang ngo che bar grags pa'o// de nas bcom
56b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyod kyis nam 'jig pa'i bskal pa 'dus kyi tsher gyur pa dan/ kun tu 'jom pa zhes bya ba'i rlung ldang ste/ rlung de langs pan/ stong gsum gyi
56b2(dkon brtsegs): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / Shi hU~M mu gi ring khong yug gi ri chen po dang / gling chen po bzhi dang / gling brgyad khri dang / ri chen po dang / rgya mtsho tshor ba yang dpag tshad srid du mngon par
56b3(dkon brtsegs): 'ben cing rab tu 'bor bar 'gyur ba khyod kyis bos sam/ gsol pa/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las mngon tu thos te/ mngon su bdu bzung ngo // bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i du ram 'jig pa'i rlung 'byung bde na/ ku
56b4(dkon brtsegs): tu 'jom pa chen po zhes bya ba'i rlung ldang ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ri rab dang bcas khong yug dang bcas/ ri dang bcas/ rgya mtsho dang bcas pa dngag chad brgyar mngon
56b5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'phen cing rab tu 'thor/ dpag tshad nyis brgya dang / dang ga tshad sum brgya dang / dpag tshad bzhi dang / dpag tshad lnga brgya dang / dpag tshad stong dang / dpag tshad nyi stong dang / sum
56b6(dkon brtsegs): stong dang / bzhi stong dang / lnga stong du mngon par 'angan cing rab tu 'thor/ dpag tshad brgya phrag mang po dang / dpag tshad stong phrag mang po dang / dpag tshad brgya stong phrag mang por mngon par 'phen cing rab tu
56b7(dkon brtsegs): 'thor te/ nga dag gi rdul yang mi snang na/ ri dang rdo rnams lta ci smos 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang rnams kyang dkrugs/ rab tu gtor te/ de dag gi rdul yang mi snang na/ gzhal
56b8(dkon brtsegs): med khang rnams lta ci smos/ dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gcan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bdud kyi ris rnams dang / tshangs pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dag rgyas kyi
57a1(dkon brtsegs): lha rnams kyi gsal med lang gi bang du/ de bzhin du rgyas par bya'o// ji ltar 'ang ba dral gyi dkrugs/ bcom rab tu gtor te krugs bcom tor bde dag gi rdul yang
57a2(dkon brtsegs): mi snang na/ gzhal med khang dang ra brnams lta ci smos/ shA ri'i bu dA la ta de lta bu'i rlung langs kyang / des de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi mtha' ma'i rtse mo tsom yang g.yos par mi nus ra/ chos
57a3(dkon brtsegs): gos sam/ chogos kyi grwa lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir nan/ de ba nar gshegs pa gri bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri bas pa gyis mi khyab pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
57a4(dkon brtsegs): spyod lam dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lab dang / bsam gyis mi khyab bi'i snying rje cher po dang ldan no// shA ri'i bu gal te de/ ngu'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor/ bar phyogs dang / lho dang / ru
57a5(dkon brtsegs): dang byang dang / 'og dang / stang dang / phyogs mtshams dang / phyobs bcu kur gyi 'jig rter gyi khams rad+d+hi klung gi bye ma snyed du rlung mngon par ldang yang / shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi
57a6(dkon brtsegs): khams 'jig par byang ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sor mo'i rtse mos bzlog kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gyi stobs bri ba yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
57a7(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi/ nga bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' mngon par dang / yang ches/ som nyi med/ the tsom mi za/ rgya cher
57a8(dkon brtsegs): dga' ragu ste/ rangs pa rnyed ras/ ngo mtshar dang rma du 'du shes srung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ngo 'di nyid rgya cher rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcang pa 'di dag gsungs so// 
57b1(dkon brtsegs): khams gsum sems can ji snyed pa// gnas brta me'u ngag la bu ji bzhin// rdzu 'phrul pha rol phyin pa yi// nyan thos mkhas par kun gyur pas// rdzu 'phrul thams cad rab bstan kyang // de bzhin gshegs
57b2(dkon brtsegs): pas sa 'di la// yungs kar gyi ni 'bru bzhag pa// g.yo ba bya bar mi nus so// gang rnams phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga yi ni bye ma snyed/ rnam 'thor rlung dang kun 'jom pa// rlung rnams phyogs
57b3(dkon brtsegs): bcur langs par gyur// de lta bu'i rlung chen ngas// thams cad gzigs pa'i chos gos kyi// mtha' ma skra'i rtse tsam yang // g.yo ba bya bar mi nus so// thub pa chen po spu gcig gis// rlung de rab tu zlog par
57b4(dkon brtsegs): mdzad// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'di 'dra ba// mtha' yas pa ni nam mkha' bzhin// de ltar shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul
57b5(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa la dang / yis ches pa nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes skyed do// yang shA ri'i bu ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' nga bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
57b6(dkon brtsegs): nga bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang / yang ches/ rab tu rtog/ som nyi med/ the tsom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed nas/ ngo tshar dang rmad du 'du shes
57b7(dkon brtsegs): skyeng ce na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ni bcu po 'di dag ste/ stobs de dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog gi gnas su dam 'tsha zhing / dge sbyong ngam/ 
57b8(dkon brtsegs): bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ sus kyang 'jig rten 'di chos dang 'thur bar ma bskor ba'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu skor ro// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gnas dang / gnas ma
58a1(dkon brtsegs): yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / las dang rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / mos bdum dang / mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stongos dang / khams dus dang / khams sngam
58a2(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi rim pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lab mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyom
58a3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / ldang ba mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / 
58a4(dkon brtsegs): 'chi 'pho dang skye bar ngon sum du byeng ba mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / zag pa zang ba mngon sub du byang ba mkhyen pa'i stobs so// shA ri'i bu de ba na gshegs pa'i
58a5(dkon brtsegs): stobs bcu po de dag ste/ stobs de dag dang ldan pas/ de ban na gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du yang dag par seng+ge'i sgra sgrog cing / khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che ba nas/ 
58a6(dkon brtsegs): sus 'jig rten du chos dang 'thun par ma bskor ba/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i bar du'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas dang / gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ 'di
58a7(dkon brtsegs): la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis/ gnas kyang gnas su/ gnas ma yin pa yang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
58a8(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mkhyen to// sa gnas gang / gnas ma yin pa gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu gang lus kyis nyes par spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa/ 'dod pa dang / sdug pa dang / dga' ba dang / yid du 'ong
58b1(dkon brtsegs): ba mngon par 'grub pa ni/ gnas ma yin te skabs mang ngo // gang lus kyi nyes par spyad pa dang / ngag gis nyes par spyad pa dang / yad kyis nyes par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa mi 'dod pa dang / 
58b2(dkon brtsegs): mi sdug pa dang / mi dga' ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba mngon par 'grub pa de ni gnas de skabs yod do// gang lus kyis legs par sbyad ba dang / ngag gis leDa par spyad pa dang / yid kyis leb par spyad
58b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rnam par smin pa mi 'dod pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / mi dga' ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba mngon par 'grub pa de ni gnas ma yin te skabs mang ngo // gang lus kyis legs par spyad pa dang / ngag gis legs
58b4(dkon brtsegs): par spyad pa dang / yid kyis legs par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa 'dod pa dang / sdug pa dang / dga' ba dang / yid du 'ong ba mngon par 'grub pa de ni gnas te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu 'di ni
58b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang ser snas longs sgyu nga chen po mngon par 'grub pa de ni gnas ma yin no// gang ser snas dbul por 'gyur ba de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// 
58b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang sbyin pas dbul por 'gyur ba de nig yin no// gang sbyin pas longs spyod chen po mngon par 'grub pa de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu 'di ni gnas
58b7(dkon brtsegs): ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyis lha dang mir skye ba rnyed pa de ni gnas ma yin no// gang 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyis sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / 
58b8(dkon brtsegs): gshin rjes 'jig rten du skye ba de ni gnas yin te/ skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang tshul khrims kyis sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / 
59a1(dkon brtsegs): gshen rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba de ni gnas pa yin no// gang tshul khrims kyis lha dang mir skye ba thob pa nga ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med
59a2(dkon brtsegs): de gang gnod sems kyis gzugs mdzes pa mngon par 'grub pa nga ni gnas ma yin no// gang gnod sems kyis gzugs mi sdug pa mngon par 'grub pa de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu gnas ma
59a3(dkon brtsegs): yin zhing skabs med de/ gang bzod pas gzugs mi sdug pa mngon par 'grub pa de ni gnas ma yin no// gang bzod pa'i gzugs mdzes pa mngon par 'grub pa de ni gnas yan te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu
59a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang la los 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba de ni gnas mi yin no// gang le los 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas yin
59a5(dkon brtsegs): te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med/ de/ gang brtson 'grus kyis 'thob pa dang / mngon ma/ ra rtogs par mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no// gang brtson 'grus
59a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang sems g.yengs pas nges par gyur pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba/ 
59a7(dkon brtsegs): da ni gnas mi yin no// gang sems g.yengs pas nges par gyur pa la mi 'jug pa de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang sems rtse gcig pa nges par gyur pa la
59a8(dkon brtsegs): 'jug par mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no// gang sems rtse gcig pa nges par gyur pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang 'chal
59b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i shes rab kyis/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par 'jom pa de ni gnas ma yin no// gang 'chal ba'i shes rab kyis bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par 'jom
59b2(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing bskabs med de/ gang shes rab kyis bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par 'joms par mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas
59b3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no// gang shes rab kyis ngag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang ga par 'joms pa de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang srog gcod pa'i skyes bu gang
59b4(dkon brtsegs): zag srog gcod pa'i rgyus tshe ring por 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yi na no// yang shA ri'i bu srog gcod pa'i skyes bu gang zag tshe 'a bung bar 'gyur ba de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu gnas
59b5(dkon brtsegs): mi yin zhing skabs med de/ gang srog gcod pa spangs pa'i skye/ sa bu gang zag tshe thung bar 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no// yang shA ri'i bu gang srog gcod pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag tshe ring
59b6(dkon brtsegs): bor 'gyur ba de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang ma byin par len pa'i skyes bu gang zag longs spyod chen po rnyed pa de ni gnas ma yin no// yang shA ri'i bu ma byin
59b7(dkon brtsegs): par len pa'i skyes bu gang zag dbul por 'gyur ba de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// yang shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag dbul por
59b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no// gang mo byan bar len pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang
60a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa la log par g.yeb pa'i skyes bu gang zag chung ma 'gran zla med pa rnyeng pa de ni gnas pa yin no// yang shA ri'i du gang 'dong pa la log par g.yem pa'i skyes bu gang zag cung
60a2(dkon brtsegs): ma 'gran zla yod pa rnyed pa nga ri gnas yin te/ skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu gnas ma yir zhing skabs mang nga / gang 'dod pa la log par g.yam pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag chung ma 'gran zla dang bcas
60a3(dkon brtsegs): pa rnyed pa de ni gnas ma yin no// yang shA ri'i bu 'dong pa la log par g.yems pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zab chung ma 'gran zla med pa rnyed pa dang gnas yin te skabs yod do// gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ das pa
60a4(dkon brtsegs): dang mi dge ba'i las kyi lam gsum po de dag bstan pa de bzhin du/ mi dge babacu'i las kyi lam thams cad la'ang bya'o// gang brdzur du smra ba des skur pa 'thob par mi 'gyur ba de ras mi yar ro// 
60a5(dkon brtsegs): gang thob par 'gyur ba de ri gnas so// gang brdzur smra ba spang sa pas/ skur pa thob par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no// gang thob par mi 'gyur ba ni gnas so// gang bram zer bas mi phyed
60a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i g.yog rnyed pa de ni gnas ma yin no// gang rnyed par mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas so// gang phra ra spangs pa'i g.yog byed par 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no// gang g.yog mi phyed pa rnyed pa de ni gnas so// 
60a7(dkon brtsegs): gang tshig rtsub po smra bas rtag par yid du 'ong ba thos par 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no// gang yang du mi 'ong ba thos par 'gyur ba de ni gnas so// gang tshig rtsub po spangs pas yid du mi 'ong ba thos par 'gyur bde
60a8(dkon brtsegs): ni gnas ma yin no// gang yid du 'ong ba thos par 'gyur ba na gnas so// gang tshig kyal pa smra bas/ shin tu gdod mi za ba'i spobs par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no// gang mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas
60b1(dkon brtsegs): so gang kyal bar smra ba spangs pas shin tu gdon mi za ba'i spobs par mi 'gyur ba ni gnas mi yin no// gang shin tu gdon mi za ba'i spobs par 'gyur ba ni gnas so// yang brnab sems can longs
60b2(dkon brtsegs): spyong rab tu nyams par mi 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no// gang 'gyur ba ni gnas so// gang brnab sems spangs pa longs spyod rab tu nyams par 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no// gang mi 'gyur ba ni gnas so// gang
60b3(dkon brtsegs): gnod sems can sems can dmyal bar mi 'gro ba ni gnas mi yin no// gang 'gro ba ni gnas so// gang gnod sems spang ba bang 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du mi 'gro ba de ni gnas ma yin no// gang 'gro ba ni/ 
60b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas so// shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang log par lta bu'i skyes bu gang zag/ log par lta ba bzung ba'i rgyu'i lam rnyed par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no// yang shA ri'i
60b5(dkon brtsegs): bu gang log par lta ba'i skyes bu gang zag/ log par lta ba bzung ba'i rgyus lam mi rnyed pa ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu yang yang dag par lta ba'i skyes bu gang zag/ yang
60b6(dkon brtsegs): dag par lta ba bzung ba'i rgyus/ 'phags pa'i lam mi rnyed pa de na gnas ma yin te skabs med do// yang shA ri'i bu yang dag par lta ba'i skyes bu gang zag/ yang dag par lta ba bzung ba'i rgyus/ 'phags
60b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lam rnyed pa de ni gnas yin te bskabs yod do// gang mtshams med pa byed pa'i sems gnas par 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no// gang mi 'gyur ba ni gnas so// gang tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i
60b8(dkon brtsegs): sems gnas par mi 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no// gang 'gyur ba ni gnas so// gang dmigs par lta bas rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa 'thob pa de ni gnas ma yin no// gang thob par mi 'gyur ba ni gnA
61a1(dkon brtsegs): so gang stong pa nyid la mos pas rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa mi 'thob pa ni gnas ma yin no// gang thob par 'gyur ba ni gnas so// yang 'gyod pa la gnas pa'i sem
61a2(dkon brtsegs): shin tu byang ba rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no// gang mi 'thob pa ni gnas so// gang kun tu dkris te 'dug pa'i sems las sems shin tu byang bar 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no// gang mi 'gyur ba/ 
61a3(dkon brtsegs): nigan so// gang bung med 'khor los sgyur gyi rgyal por gyur gi po// gang skyes bu 'gyur ba ni gnas so// gang bud med lha'i dbang po brgya byin du 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no// gang skyes bu 'gyur ba ni gnas so// gang bud med tshadra
61a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dbang byed du 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no// gang skyes bu 'gyur ba ni gnas so// gang bud med sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni gnas ma yin no// gang bud med kyi lus bsgyur nas sangs rgyas
61a5(dkon brtsegs): su 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni gnas so// gang skyes bu gang zag brgyad pa 'bras bu ma thob par ldang ba ni gnas ma yin no// gang 'bras bu thob nas ldang ba ni gnas so// gang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i srid
61a6(dkon brtsegs): pa brgyad po mngon par sgrub pa ni gnas ma yin no// gang phung po de nyid kyos yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ni gnas so// gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba srid pa gsum pa mngon par sgrub pa ni gnas ma yin no// gang
61a7(dkon brtsegs): phung po de nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ni gnas so// gang lan cig phyir 'ong bsrid pa gsum pa mngon par sgrub pa ni gnas ma yin no// gang phung po de nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni gan+da
61a8(dkon brtsegs): so// gang phyir mi 'ong ba 'jig rten 'dir 'ong ba ni gnas ma yin no// gang de nyid du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni gnas so// gang dgra bcom pa mtshams sbyor ba'i gnas su 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin/ 
61b1(dkon brtsegs): no gang mi 'gyur ba ni gnas so// gang 'phags pa'i gang zag ston pa gzhan tshol ba 'am/ rgyal mtshan gzhan bzung nas spyod pa ni gnas ma yin no// lha gzhan med par 'gyur ba ri gnas so// gang mi skye
61b2(dkon brtsegs): ba la bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phyir ldog pa ni gnas ma yin no// gang byang chub rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ba ni gnas so// gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug
61b3(dkon brtsegs): nas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas par ldang ba de ni gnas mi yin no// gang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
61b4(dkon brtsegs): par sangs rgyas nas ldang ba de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa la bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba snang ba de ni gnas ma yin
61b5(dkon brtsegs): no gang yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bag chag/ sa kyi mtshams sbyor thams cad yang dag par bcom pa ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu gang de bzhin gshegs
61b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ye shes thogs par 'gyur ba de gnas ma yin te skabs mang ngo // gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes thogs pa med pa ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing
61b7(dkon brtsegs): skabs med de/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor la las bltar mthong bde ni gnas ma yin no// gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gtsug tor bltar mi mthong ba ni gnas yin pa skabs yod
61b8(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu gnas mi yin zhing skabs med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems dang spyod pa snang ba ni gnas ma yin no// yang shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems dang spyod pa
62a1(dkon brtsegs): mi snang ba ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu gnas na 'i shing skabs med nga/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa la mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems dmigs par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin
62a2(dkon brtsegs): no yang shA ri'i bu gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyam par bzhag pa ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa la mi bden pa'i tshig
62a3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba de ni gnas ma yin no// gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams log par mi gsung zhing gzhan ma yin par gsung ba ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang sangs
62a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la 'khrul pa dmigs par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la 'khru ga pa med de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams tshig mi 'phrul
62a5(dkon brtsegs): pa ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// de bzhin du mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams rgyas par bya ste/ shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med
62a6(dkon brtsegs): de gang de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar byung ba'i dus la chags pa dang / sgrib par bcas pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug pa'i bar du ni gnas ma yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams da ltar gyi dus
62a7(dkon brtsegs): la chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs mtha' yas bu med do// 
62a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar shA ri'i bu de bas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs mtha' yas mu med de/ shA ri'i bu gang nam mkha' mtha' 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
62b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs kyi mtha' 'dong ngo do// byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i ston
62b2(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa de thos nas/ mngon par dang / yid ches/ rab tu rtog/ soma'i med/ the tsom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa ning ngas/ de mtshar dang / rmang du 'du shes bskyed do// bcom ldan 'das
62b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bang bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/ ston pa yang 'di skad gsungs so// ji ltar phyogs bcu'i ram mkha' tshad med datha' yas pa/ de bzhin rgyal ba'i gnas dang gan
62b4(dkon brtsegs): min mkhyen mtha' yas/ 'gro ba'i gnas dang gnas min de bzhin rab mkhyen nas// ston pa chos mchog rgya chen yang dag rab tu 'chad// mi gang thar pa dag gi lam gyi snod gyur pa// stor pas de dag spyod pa mkhyen nas
62b5(dkon brtsegs): chos kyang 'chang // sems can gang dag snod du gyur pa ma yin pa/ gnas dang gnas min reg nas de dag btang snyoms 'jog/ nam mkha' 'di g.yos sa la 'bras bu byung yang ni// bde bar
62b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i gnas dang gnas mir gzhan mi 'gyur// 'jig rten pa las 'jig rten 'das pa stobs bcu ldan// yon tan mchog chad rnams kyi ye shes bsam mi khyab// shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
62b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang po ste/ stobs de dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor gyi nang du seng+ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog ste/ khyu mcheg
62b8(dkon brtsegs): gi gnas su zhal gyis 'tshe zhing / tshangs pa 'am/ brgya byin nam/ sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par ma bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i bar du'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i las rnam par smin
63a1(dkon brtsegs): pa mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa bla mang pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / 
63a2(dkon brtsegs): da ltar byung ba'i las len pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa gnas dang / rgyu yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
63a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyis/ gang 'das pa'i las len pa/ dge ba'i rgyu las byung ba/ mi dge ba dang bral ba gung ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ dge pa'i rgyu 'byin pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// las len pa gang mi rgyu
63a4(dkon brtsegs): dri'i rgyu las byung ba/ dge ba dang bral ba gang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ mi dag ba'i rgyu 'byin pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// las len pa gang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ dman pa la sten par 'gyur
63a5(dkon brtsegs): ba de yang / de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// las len pa/ gang da ltar gyi dus na/ khyad par la sten par 'gyur ba de yang / de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// las len pa gang
63a6(dkon brtsegs): da ltar gyi dus na/ khyad par du sten la/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dman pa la ston par 'gyur ba de yang / de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// las len pa gang da ltar gyi dus na/ dman pa la sten la ma 'ongs pa'i
63a7(dkon brtsegs): dus na khyad par du sten par 'gyur ba de yang / de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// las len pa gang da ltar gyi dus na yang / dman pa la sten la ma 'ongs pa'i 'dus na yang / 
63a8(dkon brtsegs): dman pa la sten par 'gyur ba de yang / debazhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// las len pa gang da ltar gyi dus na yang / khyad par du sten lam 'ongs pa'i dus na yang / khya
63b1(dkon brtsegs): bar tu sten par 'gyur ba de yang / de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// las len pa gang 'das pa'i dus na sbyor ba dman la/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ sbyor ba rgya chen por 'gyur ba de yang / de bzhin gshegs pas
63b2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mkhyen to// las len pa gang rtsom pa chung la khyad par chen por 'gyur ba de yang / de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// las len pa gang rtsom pa che la/ khyad par chung ngur 'gyur ba de yang // de bzhin gshegs
63b3(dkon brtsegs): bas rab tu mkhyen to// las len pa dang / nyan thos su 'gyur ba'i rgyu 'byin pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// las len pa gang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rgyu 'byin pa de yang / de bzhin gshegs pas
63b4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mkhyen to// las len pa gang / sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i rgyu 'byin pa da yang / de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// las len pa gang / da ltar sdug bsngal la/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ rnam
63b5(dkon brtsegs): par smin pa bde ba de yang / de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// / las len pa gang / da ltar bde la/ ma 'ongs pa na rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal ba de yang / de bzhin gshegs pas rab
63b6(dkon brtsegs): tu mkhyen te/ las len pa gang / da ltar yang sdug bsngal la/ ma 'ongs pan yang rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal ba yang / de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// las len pa gang da ltar yang bde la/ 
63b7(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs pa na yang rnam par smin pa bang ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// 'di ltar shA ri'i bu 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi dus na/ sems can thams cad kyi las gang dang / rgyu gang
63b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / rnam par smin pa gang / de bzhin dang / de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa dang / gzhan mi yin par sten pa de yang / de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// mkhyen nas kyang de bzhin du de bzhin
64a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa chos stong ngo // de ltar ma shA ri'i bung bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi las
64a2(dkon brtsegs): len pa'i rgyu gang yin pa dang / gnas gang yin pa dang / rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa gang yin pa de ni mtha' yas mu med do// 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shA ri'i bu nam mkha' mtha' yas mu med pa de bzhin du/ 
64a3(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i las rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs de yang mtha' yas mu med do// shA ri'i bu gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi las rnam par smir
64a4(dkon brtsegs): pa mkhyen pa'i stobs kyi mtha' 'dod pa de ni nam mkha'i mtha' 'dod ngo // byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i las rnam par smin par mkhyen pa'i stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa de thos nas/ mngon
64a5(dkon brtsegs): par dang / yid ches/ rab tu rtog/ som nyi med/ the tsom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed nas/ nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/ ngo mtshar dang smad du
64a6(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes skyed do// 'di la chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu dang smin la mkhas/ spyad ldan las rnams kun gyis bsgrub pa mkhyen// dus gsum la ni rgyal ba chag
64a7(dkon brtsegs): ba mang // sems can kun gyi spyod pa rab tu mkhyen// 'gro ba lnga'i sems can thams cad kyi// bde dang sdug bsngal rgyur ni gang 'gyur dang / 'jug pa gang dag sdug bsngal rgyur 'gyur ba// de dag de bzhin bde
64a8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs rab tu mkhyen// ngagar nag las rnams kyi ni rnam smin dang // rgyu dang rnam smin ji ltar 'gyur ba yang // de dag de bzhin bde gshegs rab mkhyen te// phyag ga mthil na yid bzhin nor bu bzhin/ 
64b1(dkon brtsegs): las gang rnam smin chung ngu'i rgyud dag las// 'bras bu dag ni tshad meng 'byin pa dang / tshad meng gang dang chung ngu'i rgyur 'gyur ba// de dag de bzhin / shegs rab tu mkhyen// nyan thos nyid du 'bras bu rmin 'gyur dang / rang
64b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal byang chub rgyur ni gang 'gyur dang / bla med ye shes stobs ni sbyin gyur pa// de dag ma lus bde bshegs rab tu mkhyen// lus kyi rgyu gang sdug bsngal smir byung ba// de yang bde ba'i 'bras bu smin byed dang // las kyi
64b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyu gang bang ba smin byed pa// sdug bsngal 'bras bu bya ba thams cad mkhyen// sdug bsngal rgyus ni sdug bsngal nyid gnas dang // bde ba'i rgyus kyang bde ba nyid gnas dang // las kyi rang bzhin rang bzhin mi yin pa// rgyur ldan
64b4(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen// 'gro ba lnga'i sems can thams cad kyi/ dus gsum sdug bsngal bgrod pa ganga' drug pa// nyams med de nyid de bzhin gzhan min par// sangs rgyas
64b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pas rgyal ba rab tu mkhyen// shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhinagashegs pa rnams kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gnyis pa ste/ stobs de dag dang ldan pas/ de bzhin ga
64b6(dkon brtsegs): pa 'khor gyi nang du seng+ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog cing / dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa gajigs kyang / 'jig rten 'dir chos dang 'thun par ma bskor ba/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rag
64b7(dkon brtsegs): tu skor// 'phags pa dkon mchog gartsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa// bam po lnga pa// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas mos
64b8(dkon brtsegs): bdu ma dang / mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs kyis sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag gi mos pa du ma dang / mos pa sna tshogs rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// skyes bu gang
65a1(dkon brtsegs): zag gang 'dod chags la gnas shing zhe sdang la mos pa'ang rgyas par bya ste/ gti mug la gnas shing zhe sdang la mos pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// gang zag
65a2(dkon brtsegs): gang mi dge ba la gnas shing / mi dge ba la mos pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// gang zag gang dge ba la gnas shing dge ba la mos pa de dag kyang de bzhin ga
65a3(dkon brtsegs): pas yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// gang zag sbyor ba dman zhing / mos pa rgya chen po la mos pa de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen to// gang zag gang sbyor ba rgya che zhing
65a4(dkon brtsegs): dman pa la mos pa de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// gang zag gang sbyor ba dman zhi nga // khyad par la gnas par 'gyur ba de dag kyang / de bzhin gshe/ 
65a5(dkon brtsegs): pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// mos pa gang gis khyad par la sbyor ba dman pa la gnas par 'gyur ba de da ga kyang / de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab
65a6(dkon brtsegs): tu mkhyen to// mos pa gang gis log pa nyid du nges pa'i khams thob par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// mos pa gang dag gis yang dag pa nyi du nges pa'i kham
65a7(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur ba de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pas yang ba ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// mos pa gang gis yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur pa de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs
65a8(dkon brtsegs): bas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// mos pa gang gis 'dod pa'i khams su 'gro bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba'i zhan rab tu mkhyen to// mos pa gang gi
65b1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyi khams su 'gro bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// mos pa gang gis gzugs med pa'i khams su 'gro bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang / de bzhin pa bye
65b2(dkon brtsegs): bas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// mos pa gang gis khams gsum du 'gro bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// mos pa gang gis dman pa la sten cing
65b3(dkon brtsegs): dman pa nyid gnod pa dang / khyad par la sten cing khyad par la gnod pa de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// mos pa gang gis khyad par du song nas/ dman pa la gnas
65b4(dkon brtsegs): pa 'gyur ba de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag bi ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// mos pa gang gis skye ba tha dad pa dang / kha dog tha dad pa dang / yongs su longs spyod tha dad pa rab tu 'dzin par
65b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// mos pa gang gis rtse mo las nya mas par 'gyur ba de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag
65b6(dkon brtsegs): ba ji lta ba'izhin rab tu mkhyen to// mos pa gang gis rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur ba de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// mkhyen nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to// 
65b7(dkon brtsegs): de ltar na shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs gang yin pa de ni/ mtha' yas mu med de/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing mnyam mo// byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i
65b8(dkon brtsegs): mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs de bos nas/ mngon par dang / yid ches/ rab tu tog/ som nyi med/ the tsom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed nas/ nam mkha' lta bur bsam
66a1(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/ ngomatshar dang mang du 'du shes skyed ngo // de das bcom ldan 'das kyis ngo 'di nying rgya cher bsdar ba'i phyir/ ngo se ma tshogs su bcang ba 'di dag gsungs so// 'jig rten 'di
66a2(dkon brtsegs): mos sna tshogs dang / de bzhin blo gros tshad med pa// de dag gi ni mos pa'i sems// thams cad 'dren pas rab tu mkhyen// gang dag 'dod chags mos pa la// zhe sdang la ni gnas 'gyur dang // zhe sdang gnas shing gti mug
66a3(dkon brtsegs): la gang dag mos pa rab tu mkhyen// gti bug gnas shing 'dod chags kyi// sems rgyud bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bar bar du ni 'jug pa dag/ de dag 'dren pas rab tu mkhyen// gang dag sbyor ba dman 'gyur la/ 
66a4(dkon brtsegs): rgya chen la ni mos pa dang // sbyor ba dam pa de dag gis/ dman par 'a gyur pa 'dren pas mkhyen// log pa'i rjes su song ba dang // 'gro ba me nga bar byung ba dang // khams gsum las ni rnam grol ba'i// mos
66a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dag kyang rab tu mkhyen// skye dang kha dog pa dang dang // nye bar spyod pa'i khyad par dang // gang dag spyi bo las nyams pa// rkang gnyis ga tso bos rab tu mkhyen// mos pa sna tshogs rab mkhyen nas/ 
66a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa chos rnams ston pa mdzad// sangs rgyas kyi ni stobs gsum la// rgyal ba'i thugs sras rab tu mos// shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gsum pa ste/ de bzhin
66a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa stobs de dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'tshe zhing 'khor gyi nang du seng+ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog ste// dge sbyong
66a8(dkon brtsegs): bram ze'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang 'thun par ma bskor ba tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu skor ro// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pas khams dum dang / kham
66b1(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs kyis 'jig rten nams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// khams gang gis 'jig rten bsod nams kyi 'du byed sogs pa de yang / de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
66b2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mkhyen no// khams gang gis bsod nams ma yin pa'i 'du byed sogs pa de yang // de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// khams gang gis mi g.yo ba'i 'du byed sogs pa de yang // de bzhi
66b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// khams ga gas 'byung ba'i khams su 'jog par 'gyur ba de yang / de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pas mig
66b4(dkon brtsegs): gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to// ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid du rab tu mkhyen to// 
66b5(dkon brtsegs): yad kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes bi khams kyi bar du yang rab tu mkhyen te/ ji ltar rab tu mkhyenam/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa
66b6(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyi bar du ba tu ma byenato// sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / mo'i 'bras dang / rlung gi khams rab tu mabyed to// ji ltar rang tu mkhyen cen/ nam mkha'i khams ji lta bang 'i'on durabatu mkhyen to// 'dod ba'i
66b7(dkon brtsegs): khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams rab tu mkhyen to// ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ kun tu rtog pa las byung bar rab tu mkhyen to// 'dus byas kyi khams ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan
66b8(dkon brtsegs): nying du rab tu mkhyen to// 'dus ma byas kyi khams ni mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu mkhyen to// kun nas nyon mongs pa'i khams ni phyis 'jung ba'i nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid du rab tu mkhyen to// rnam par byang ba'i
67a1(dkon brtsegs): khams ni rang bzhir gyis 'o gsal ba'i mtshan nyid du rab tu ma khyen to// 'du byed kyi khams ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa ma rig pa'i mtshan nyid du rab tu mkhyen to// mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings ni tshul
67a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin rig pa'i mtshan nyid du rab tu mkhyen to// ji ltar 'jig sa d+hi la bang yi dang dzin gnas pa dang la gnas pa dang / khams gang la rjes su chags pa dang / khams gang la gnas pa dang / khams gang la sbyor ba dang / khams gang gis
67a3(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa dang / khams gang la nges par sems pa dang / khams gang la sten pa de yang / de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// mkhyen nas kyang chos ston to// de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin ga bye
67a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i khams du ma dang / khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs mtha' yas mu med de/ nab mkha'i ngang mtshungs shing mnyam mo// byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i khams du ma dang / 
67a5(dkon brtsegs): khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs la mngon par dang / yid tshe sa/ rab tu rtog/ som nyi med/ the tsom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs brnyed nas/ nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis
67a6(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab pa'i phyir/ ngo mtshar dang rmang du 'du shes skyed do// 'di la chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// 'jig rten kun na sems can gang // sna tshogs khams la gnas pa dag khams gang 'jug
67a7(dkon brtsegs): pa ci 'dra la/ sangs rgyas kyis ni rab tu ma khyen// bsod nams bsod nams min mi g.yo// 'byung bar 'gyur ba'ang de bzhin te// khams rnams gang la gnas nas su// mya ngan 'das bzhi la reg/ mig gi khams
67a8(dkon brtsegs): dang gzugs kyi khams// mig gi rnam par shes nyid dang / rna ba sna dang lce dang lus/ yid kyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen// chos kyi khams dang yid kyino// rnam par shes pa nyid kyang mkhyen/ 
67b1(dkon brtsegs): nang gi khams ni stong pa dang // phyi rol dag kyang stong par mkhyen// sa dang chu dang me dag dang / rlung gi khams kyang de bzhin te/ khams rnams bzhi po de dag ni// nam mkha' mtshungs par rab tu mkhyen// 'dod pa'i kham
67b2(dkon brtsegs): dang gzugs kyi khams gzugs med pa'i khams nyid kyang // kun tu rtog las byung bar ni// de ltar sangs rgyas rab tu mkhyen// ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' yas pa/ de bzhin khams mu mang de/ thams cad sangs rgyas rab
67b3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen kyang / mkhyen to snyam du rloms sems med// khams ni skye ba mi yin zhing // rnam pa kun tu 'gag med de// khams 'di mya ngan 'das par ni// skyes bu dam pas rab tu mkhyen// ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' yas pa/ 
67b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas ye shes de 'dra ste/ mos pa sna tshogs rab sprul pa// ye shes des ni rab tu mkhyen// mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen nas su// sems can bye ba rnam par 'dul// sangs rgyas stobs ni bzhi
67b5(dkon brtsegs): pa la nga rgyal ba'i thugs sras dang bar byed// shA ri'i bu' de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bzhi pa ste/ sus kyang 'jig rten 'dir chos dang 'dun
67b6(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par bya'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi rim pa mkhyen pa'i stobs kyis sems can gzhan dang / gang zag gzhan rnams kyi dbang
67b7(dkon brtsegs): bo dang / brtson 'grus kyi rim pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ dbang po rtul ba 'ang rab tu mkhyen to// dbang po badra ma 'ang rab tu mkhyen to// dbang po rno ba'ang rab tu
67b8(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen to// dbang po dmang pa'ang rab tu mkhyen to// yongs su rtog pa'i dbang po dza lta bus mthar phyin pa'i 'dod chags skye ba dang / mthar phyin pa'i zhe sdang skye ba dang / mthar phyin pa'i gti mug skye ba de
68a1(dkon brtsegs): yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// yongs su rtog pa'i dbang po ji lta bus/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gang mug brgyad pa skye bar yang
68a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// yongs su rtog pa'i dbang po ji lta bus/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug yang dag pa skye ba de yang / de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa
68a3(dkon brtsegs): ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// yongs su rtog pa'i dbang po ji lta bus/ snal zhi'i 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug skye ba de yang nga bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// yongs
68a4(dkon brtsegs): su rtog pa'i dbang po ji lta bus tshar bcad cing 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug skye ba de yang / de bzhin gshegs pas yang nga/ ga pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// dbang po gang dag mi dge
68a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rgyu las byung ba dang / dbang po gang dag dge ba'i rgyu las byung / ba dang / dbang po gang dag mi g.yo ba'i rgyu las byung ba dang / dbang po gang dag 'byung ba'i rgyu las byung ba de dag kyang / de bzhin
68a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi dbang po yang dag pa ji lta ban rab tu mkhyen pa nas/ long ma bzhan du sbyad te/ rna ba dang / snang
68a7(dkon brtsegs): lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi dbang po yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// pho'i dbang po dang / me'i dbang po dang / srog gi dbang po dang / bde ba'i dbang po dang / sdug bsngal gyi dbang po dang / yid mi
68a8(dkon brtsegs): bde ba'i dbang po dang / btang snyoms kyi dbang po yang / yang dag pa ji lta bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// dang pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang
68b1(dkon brtsegs): bo dang / shes rab kyi phung po yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes ldan pa'i dbang po dang / yang dag ji ba bzhin
68b2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mkhyen to// dbang po gang mig gi dbang po'i rgyu las byung la/ rna ba'i dbang po la gnas par 'gyur te/ sna la mi yin/ lce la ma yin/ lus kyi dbang po la ma yin pa de yang / de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa
68b3(dkon brtsegs): ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// gang rna ba'i dbang po'i rgyu las byung la/ sna'i dbang po la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / gang sna'i dbang po'i rgyu las byung la/ lce'i dbang po la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / gang lce'i dbang po'i
68b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyu las byung la/ lus kyi dbang po la gnas par 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhye na to// sems can gang sbyin pa'i dbang po can yin la/ de yang
68b5(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims la sbyor bde la/ de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang mchog mi yin pa mkhyen pasang la sbyin pa'i gtam ston to// gang zag tshul khrims kyi dbang po can yin la/ 
68b6(dkon brtsegs): yang sbyin pa la sbyor ba de la/ de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas/ tshul khrims kyi gtams ston to// sems can gang bzod pa'i dbang po can yin la/ de yang brtson 'grus
68b7(dkon brtsegs): la sbyor ba de la/ de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang mchog mi yin pa mkhyen pas bzod pa'i gtam ston to// sems can gang brtson 'grus kyi dbang po can yin la/ de yang bzod pa la sbyor ba de la/ de bzhin/ 
68b8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam ston to// sems can gang dag bsam gtan gyi dbang po can yin la/ de yang shes rab la sbyor ba nga la/ de bzhin
69a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas/ bsam gtan gyi gtam ston to// sems cad gang shes rab kyi dbang po can yin la/ de yang shes rab la sbyor
69a2(dkon brtsegs): ba de la/ de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang mchog mi yin pa mkhyen pas/ shes rab kyi gtam ston to// gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad la yang bya'o// sems can
69a3(dkon brtsegs): gang nyan thos kyi theg pa'i dbang po can yid la/ de yang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sbyor ba de la/ de bzhin gshegs ngas dbang po mchog dang mchog mi yin par khyer pas/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam
69a4(dkon brtsegs): ston to// sems can gang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i dbang po ca na yin la/ nga yang nyan thos kyi theg pa la sbyor ba de la/ de bzhi ngan gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang mchog mi yin par khyen
69a5(dkon brtsegs): pas rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam ston to// sems/ can gang theg pa chen po'i dbang po cani yan la/ de yang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sbyor ba de la/ de bzhin gshegs
69a6(dkon brtsegs): pas dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas// theg pa chen po'i gautam ston to// sems can gang tha ma'i dbang po can yin la/ de yang theg pa chen po la sbyor ba de la/ de bzhin gabye
69a7(dkon brtsegs): pas dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas/ dbang po tha mi'i gtam ston to// sems can skal pa med pa'i dbang po can/ skal ba med par snang ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pas
69a8(dkon brtsegs): skal ba med cing snod ma yin par rig nas btang snyoms su 'jog go// sems can skal pa yod pa'i dbang po can// skal pa yod par snang ba dag la de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa yod cing snod du rig nas ri mor
69b1(dkon brtsegs): byas shing chos ston te/ de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su smin pa rnams kyang rab tu mkhyen/ dbang po yongs su ma smin pa rnams kyang rab tu mkhyen/ 'byung ba'i dbang po
69b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang rab tu mkhyen/ 'byung ba ma yin pa'i dbang po rnams kyang rab tu mkhyen to// sems can gyi dbang po'i rnam pa gang yin pa dang / sbyor ba gang yin pa dang / bsam pa gang yin pa dang / gang gis rgyu las byung ba
69b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / rkyen gang yin pa dang / dmigs pa gang yin pa dang / rgyu 'thun pa gang yin pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po'i mthar gang yin pa de dag thams cad/ de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu
69b4(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen to// bcom ldan 'das kyis skad ces gsungs te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad bka' stsal nas/ ston pas yang 'di skad gsungs so// 'gro ba'i dbang po de ni dbang po'i pha rol song / 
69b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyi spyod dang bsam pa'i cho ga mkhyen// 'gro ba ga/ nga dag gi ni dbang po ci 'dra ba// de 'drar mi'i sreng+ga de la chos 'changango // dbang po dag ni rab 'bring tha mar gyur pa rnams/ de la de
69b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs ye shes rmad du byung ba 'jug/ sems can bsam pa thar pa'i snod du gyur mkhyen nas// spyod pa mkhyen cing mkhas pa mchog ga chos ston to// gang dag mthar phyir skye zhing nyan mongs brtan pa dang / 
69b7(dkon brtsegs): mi gang rnams kyi dbang po yang bar 'gyur ba dang // skyes bu gang gi dbang po snrel zhir gyur pa ya// spyod pa mkhyen nas de ltar 'thun pa'i chos ston to// skyes bu gang gis dge ba'i dbang por gyur pa dang / mi dge ba'i dbang
69b8(dkon brtsegs): por gyur pa rnams kyang bzhin mkhyen/ mig nas bzung ste yid kyi bar gyi dbang po dang / ying mi bde dang sdug bsngal dbang mkhyen chos kyang sto// dang brtson dran dang ting 'dzin bzhin shes rab ga/ skyes bu gang la
70a1(dkon brtsegs): bang po 'di dag yod me// de sa pa'i gtam sto de bzhin 'artson 'grus dang / bsam gtan shes rang ga kyang ngas pa'i dong du smon// mi'i dbang po'i rnam pa spyod pa'i bye drag sa
70a2(dkon brtsegs): mi gang bsam pa ci 'jug de yi dbang po yang // chos mchog rtogs pas de dag gi ni spyod mkhyen nas// sdug bsngal kun las thar par byed pa'i chos 'chang ngo // gang gi dbang po sangs rgyas byang chub phyir nges la// nya
70a3(dkon brtsegs): thos shes pa'i rjes 'jug cho ga mi shes pa// de la byang chub reg 'gyur rgya chen gtam rab ston// bde gshegs stobs ni mtha' yas thul dka' lnga'o// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi/ de bzhir gabye
70a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i stobs lnga bste/ sus kyang 'jig rted 'dir chos dang 'dra na par zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ 'di la shA ri rtsa
70a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam yang dag ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mabyin to// ji lta rab tu pabye chen/ yang dag par nges pa'i sems can gyi khams rab tu mkhyen/ yang ba
