93a8(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab pa de thos nas/ mngon par dang / yid ches/ rab tu rtog/ so ma nyi med/ the tsom mi za ba nas/ nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/ ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi rab tu du
93b1(dkon brtsegs): shes skyeng ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ don li cing rgya cher bsnyad pa'i phyir/ de'i tshetshigs su lang pa 'di dag gsungs so// rtsa ba med cing gnas med par// sangs rgyas kyis ni byang chub reg/ ji ra rtogs pade
93b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du/ srog chags rnams ni kun la ston// rang gi mig gi stong pa ste// phyi rol gzugs kyang stong pa'o// zhi dang nye bar zhi ba yid// sangs rgyas kyis byang chub reg/ zhi nga nye bar zhi ba de// sems can khong dur
93b3(dkon brtsegs): chud pas// tshig don rtogs nas sems can la// de dag la ni snying rje 'jug/ byang chub rang bzhin 'od gsal zhing // rnam dag nam mkha' 'dra ba de// sems can rnams kyis mi shes pas// de dag la yang snying rje 'jug/ 
93b4(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams kun la 'dzin pa dang // rab tu 'dzin pa yod ma yin// blang med dor ba med pa yin// sangs rgyas kyis ni byang chub reg/ sems can 'di dag mi shes pas// de dag la ni snying rje 'jug/ 
93b5(dkon brtsegs): mtshar ba med cing dmigs pa med// 'phags pa rnams kyi spyodayul 'di// byis pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa// sangs rgyas kyis ni byang chub reg/ gang dag mi mkhas bcings yi// so so
93b6(dkon brtsegs): skye bos mi shes pas// de bzhin gshegs pa sems can la// snying rje chen po rab tu 'jug/ rang bzhin gyis ni 'dus ma byas// skye ba med cing 'jig pa med// de la gnas pa yod min te// mtshan nyid gsuM
93b7(dkon brtsegs): las rnam par grol// 'dus byas rnams kyi rang bzhin ni// byis pas khong du mi chung bas// de dag la yang steng rje 'jug/ tshul ni gang gis sangs rgyas pa// byang chub lus kyis mi rtogs te// sems kyis kyang
93b8(dkon brtsegs): ni 'tshang mi rgya// lus ni bems po'i rang bzhin te// sems kyang sbrum lta bu'o// lus dang sems kyi bang bzhin te// byis pas long du ma chung bas// tshul 'di khong du drar gyur nas// de dag
94a1(dkon brtsegs): la ri sIng rje 'dug/ rang thung ba ni byang chub dbang rgya cher mchog reg ste/ shing mchog drung du bzhugs nas sems can khams la rngam par gzigs// 'khor ba'i 'khor lor zhugs shing
94a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gro rgyud sna tshogs 'khyam gyur pa// de dag gzigs nas sangs rgyas kyi ni snying rje mi bzang 'jug/ nga dang rgyags pa dag la chags shing lta ba'i dra bas gzigs// sdug bsngal bde dang mi rtag rtag dang sdug par
94a3(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes shing // bdag dang sems can dngan srog tu lta bar chags pa rnams// gzigs nas de dag la ni sangs rgyas snying rje mi zang 'jug/ sems can khams ni gau mug ling tog khebs shing bsgribs pa kun/ 
94a4(dkon brtsegs): nyi ma sprin khebs bzhin du snang med lan mer mi 'gyur ba// de dag gzigs nas ye shes snang ba dri bad 'ong bya zhes// de dag la ya nga sangs rgyas kyi ni snying rje mi bzang 'jug/ ngan tshogs 'gro bar
94a5(dkon brtsegs): zhugs shing lam stor rab tu 'khyam pa rnams// sems can sems can dmyal bdud 'gro yi dwags rgyud ltung ba// de dag ga zigs nas sngon gyi rgyal bas spang ba'i lam bstad ces// de dag
94a6(dkon brtsegs): la yang sangs rgyas kyi ni snying rje mi bzang 'jug/ de bzhin nyid ltar de bzhin nyid du chos rnams thams cad ni/ nam mkha' mtshungs 'dra de dag ma bcings ma grol rab mkhyen te/ 'gro ba dag cing bzang ba'i chos
94a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams mi shes gzigs nas su// de dag la yang sangs rgyas kyi ni snying rje mi bzang 'jug/ de ltar shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon
94a8(dkon brtsegs): par dang yid ches/ rab tu rtog som nyi med/ the tsom miza rgya char dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed nas nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang spang 'du shes skyed do// 
94b1(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchog rtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bad yang shA ri'i bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres
94b2(dkon brtsegs): bra la mngon par dang / yid ches/ rab tu rtog pa nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes skyed ce na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ni bco brgyad po 'di dag
94b3(dkon brtsegs): ste/ chos de dag dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi mang du seng+ga'i sgra yang dag par sgrog cing / khyur chog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che ste/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ 
94b4(dkon brtsegs): dung ngam/ sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang 'thun par ma bskor ba/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu skor ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu gang gi phyir lus kyi
94b5(dkon brtsegs): 'khrul pa gang las byis pa 'am/ mkhas pa chos dang 'thun pas rgol bar bya ba'i lus kyi 'khrul pa de bzhin gshe gas pa la med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom
94b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rnams ni/ lus kyi las 'khrul pa med pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod la ma mdzes pas kun tu gzigs pa dang / rnam par gzigs pa dang / skum pa dang / myang ba dang / chos
94b7(dkon brtsegs): gos snam sbyar dang / chos gos dang / lhung bzed bsnams pa dang / mngon du gshegs pa dang / slar gshegs pa dang / byon pa dang / bzhud pa dang / bzhengs pa dang / bzhugs pa dang / mnal
94b8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / grong dang / grong khyer du 'jug pa dang / 'byung ba na/ zhabs kyi mthilas la mi reg ste/ 'khor lo rtsibs stong pas las 'byung zhing / dri yid du 'ong ba'i pad+ma mngon par 'byung ste/ de la
95a1(dkon brtsegs): nga bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs 'jog go// de la gang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can dag gis nga bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la reg na/ de bzhi/ de dag gtan du
95a2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bden pa dang ldan par 'gyur// shi 'phos nas kyang bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la chos gos sor bzhi tsam gyis mi reg mod kyi/ rnam par 'thor/ 
95a3(dkon brtsegs): rlung gis kyang bzlog par mi nus so// ku'i 'od kyis mnar med pa'i bar gyi sems can bde ba'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ro// de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la 'khrul pa med ces bya'o// yang shA ri'i bu gang gi phyir
95a4(dkon brtsegs): ngag 'khrul pa gang las byis pa mkhas pa chos dang 'thun pas no/ la bar byed pa'i ngag gi 'khrul pa de bzhin gshegs pa la med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs
95a5(dkon brtsegs): pa ni pha dus su smra ba/ yang dag par smra ba/ bden pa ra sma ga tshigs su smra ba/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa'o// shin tu nges pa'i tshig go// sems can thams cad
95a6(dkon brtsegs): tshim par byed pa'i tshig go// mi slob pa'i tshig gi/ don dang yi ges shin tu brgyan pa'i tshig go// skad cig brjod pas sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa tshim par byed pa ste/ de'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan
95a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das rnams kyi ngag gi las 'khrul pa med ces bya'o// yang shA ri'i bu sems can 'khrul pa gang las byis pa 'am/ mkhas pa chos dang 'thun pas rgol bar byed pa'i sems kyi 'khrul pa de bzhin gshegs pa la med
95a8(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ mnyam par bzhag pa'i dngos po mi 'dor zhing / sangs rgyas kyi bya ba thams cad byed kyang / sems der mi 'dong zhing / chos thams cad la
95b1(dkon brtsegs): de'i chags pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la sems 'khrul pa med ces bya'o// ji ltar de'i sems 'khrul pa med pa de ltar sems can rnams kyi sems 'khrul pa spangs pa'i
95b2(dkon brtsegs): phyir chos stor te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang po'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu ca co gang las bdud dab/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu 'am/ gzhan bu stegs can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ba'i
95b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa la med do// yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la ca co 'am/ rjes su ca co'i byin pa med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni rje su chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang bral ba ste/ de sems can thams
95b4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis bkur bsti byas kyang mtho bar mi sems/ sems can thams cad kyis bkur sti ma byas kyang 'khrug pa med do// de ga dang las 'gyod pa 'am/ rjes su ca co 'byin par 'gyur ba'i ba ba
95b5(dkon brtsegs): mchog gam/ mthar phyin pa ci yang de bzhin gshegs pa la med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'jig rten dang mi rtsong pas de'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ca co med do// de bzhin pa rtse
95b6(dkon brtsegs): pa ni nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa ste/ nga'i bamed/ 'dzin pa med/ len pa med/ mdung pa thams cad dang bral ba ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la tsa co med do// ji ltar de la caco med do// ji ltar
95b7(dkon brtsegs): nga la ca co med pa de ltar sems can thams cad kyi ca co thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos ston te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gnyis pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu bsnyel ba gang las chos gang la yang rlong
95b8(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba'i bsnyel pa de bzhin gshegs pa la med de/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la thogs pa med cing / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa
96a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / g.yo ba la rnam par lta ba'i phyir/ de bzhi gshegs pa la rmongs pa med do// so sor mi rigs par chos stod pa'i bying / kun tu nyams pa med do// 'das pa dang / ma
96a2(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs pa dang / da lta la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i phyir/ don dang / chos dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / slobs pas so yang dag par rig pa la kun tu 'ams pa med do// ji ltar bdag kun
96a3(dkon brtsegs): nyams pa med cing / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba de ltar/ sems can thams cad brjed ngas par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston te/ 'di ni
96a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gsum pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems mi dmigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'chag gam/ 
96a5(dkon brtsegs): banangs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mnal tam/ bshos gsol lam/ gsung ngam/ cang mi gsung bar gyur kyang rung / ste/ rtag tu mnyam par bzhag cing / ting nge 'dzin zab mo
96a6(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i mthar phyin pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i bsam gtan la bsam gtan byed pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs ma gtogs par/ sems can gyi ris na/ sems can gang mnyam
96a7(dkon brtsegs): par bzhag kyang rung / mnyam par ma bzhag kyang rung ste/ su yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems la lta bar nus pa med do// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa de ltar/ ting nge
96a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin la lta bas sems can rnams la chos ston ste// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bzhi pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de tha dad pa'i 'du shes gang las sems mi
96b1(dkon brtsegs): mnyam par gnas 'gyur ba'i tha dad pa'i 'du shes de bzhin gshegs pa la mad de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha' bzhin du zhing mi zad pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la zhing tha dad pa'i 'du shes
96b2(dkon brtsegs): med do// rang bzhin gyis tha dad pa med pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la sems can tha dad pa'i 'du shes med do// chos kyi dbyings dbyer med cing mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyir// de bzhin gshegs
96b3(dkon brtsegs): pa la sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa'i 'du shes med do// 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid kyi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la chos tha dad pa'i 'du shes med do// de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshul khrims
96b4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i sems can la yang rje su chags pa med/ tshul khrims 'chal pa la yang khong khro ba med/ phan par gyur pa la yang lan du phan 'dogs pa med// gnod par
96b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba la yang gnod par byed pa med/ 'dul bar 'ongs pa la yang mnyam pa nyid du mi yan/ log par nges pa 'i sems can la yang smon pa ma yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs
96b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos thams cad la mnyam par gnas ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la tha dad pa'i 'du shes med ces bya'o// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa tha dad pa'i shes med pa de ltar/ sems can
96b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi tha dad pa'i 'du shes spang ba'i phyir chos ston te/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa lnga pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la so sor ma ba
96b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i btang snyoms mang ngo // de'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni lam bsgoms pa'i yin te/ lam ma bsgom pa'i ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni/ sems
97a1(dkon brtsegs): bsgobs pa dang / tshul khrims bsgribs pa dang / shes rab bsgom pa'i yin te/ shes rab ma bsgoms pa'i ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms
97a2(dkon brtsegs): ni ye shes dang ldan pa'i yin te/ gti mug dang ldan pa'i ba yin ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni/ 'jig rten las 'das pa yin gyi/ 'jig rten pa'i rnam par lhung ba ma
97a3(dkon brtsegs): yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni/ 'phags pa'i nges par 'byung ba yin la/ 'phags pa ma yin pa nges par 'byung ba ma yin no// de bzhin ga/ shegs pa'i btang snyoms ni tshangs
97a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'khor lo skor ba ste/ sems can la snying rje dang bral ba ni ma yar no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni rang gi ngang gis grub pa ste/ gnyen po'i rjes su song ba ni ma yin
97a5(dkon brtsegs): no yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms de/ ni/ mtho ba ma yin/ dma' ba ma yin te/ mtho na dman med par gnas pa/ mi g.yo bar gyur pa/ 
97a6(dkon brtsegs): gnyis dang bral ba// rtog pa dang sel ba las shin tu 'das pa/ dus la lta ba/ dus las ma yol ba/ mi g.yo ba/ rlom sems med pa/ ma brtag pa/ rnam par ma gtags pa/ ma
97a7(dkon brtsegs): bsgoms pa/ bstan du med pa/ yang dag pa/ de kho na/ de bzhin nyid/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/ gzhan mi yin pa de bzhin nyid de/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni de lta bu'i btang snyoms
97a8(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs pas/ sems can thams cad btang snyoms su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos ston te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa drug pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu
97b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dud pa nyams pa med do// de la 'dun pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa'o// de yang gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do// snying rje chen
97b2(dkon brtsegs): po la 'dun pa nyams pa med do// chos ston pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do// sems can 'dul ba la 'dun pa nyams pa med do// rab tu dben pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do// byang chub sems dpar yang dag par 'dzud pa
97b3(dkon brtsegs): la 'dun pa nyams pa mang ngo // dkon mchog gsum rgyun mi gcod pa 'dun pa nyams pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dun pas 'gro ba ma yin gyi/ ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
97b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dun pa'o// sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i thams cad mkhye na bar 'dun pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bdun pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i
97b5(dkon brtsegs): bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni brtson 'grus nyams pa med ngo // de la nga bzhin gshegs pa'i brtson 'grus ni 'di lta ste/ 'dul ba/ 'i sems can lal bar mi 'dor ba'i brtson 'grus dang / chos
97b6(dkon brtsegs): nyan pa brnam par med pa'i brtson 'grus so// gal te de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi snod/ chos nyan pa gang bskal par nyan kyang skyo bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu brnyes nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang chos
97b7(dkon brtsegs): ston cing / zhal zas dang bral ba'i rgyud kyis bskal par yang mi bzhengs so// de bzhin gshegs pa sems can la lta bas tha na/ gang na sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can gcig gi phyir yang / sangs rgyas
97b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'da' zhing bzhung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa la lus ngal ba 'am/ ngag ngal ba 'am/ sems ngal ba med do// de bzhin gshegs pa ni lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa'o// 
98a1(dkon brtsegs): brtsor 'grus brtsams pa'o// 'artsod 'grus kyi bsngags pa gsung ba ste/ brtson 'grus kyis yang dag par rab tu sbyor ba gang gis sems cad 'phags pa'i rngang par grol pa thob pa
98a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus te/ sems can rnams la bsngags par dzad de/ shA ri'i bu 'di ning bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa
98a3(dkon brtsegs): ni thams cad kyi thams cad/ rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du dran pa 'ams pa med cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i drang pa'i brtul babang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhen/ gang de'i zhar gshegs pa d+mar reng ba yang
98a4(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ma thag tu/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi sems can gyi sems kyi rgyud la rnam par bltas kyang / de la de bzhin
98a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la phyis dashin tu drang pa bsnyel ba med do// sengs kyi spyo 'ji lta ba bzhin du shes kyang / de la de bzhing gshegs pa'i ye shes byis gtang bar bya ba med do// phung po gsum du rnam
98a6(dkon brtsegs): par bzhag pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po la 'jug pa dang / sems can gyi bsam par 'jug pa la sems can gyi spyod par rnam par lta bas/ de bzhi gshegs pa'i dran pa yongs su nyams pa med do// 
98a7(dkon brtsegs): nga bzhin gshegs pa'i dran pa ni drar bar bya ba dang / bsam par bya ba dang / brtag par bya ba med kyang sems can rnams la chos ston pa 'bri bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir ner/ 'di ltar de'i dran pa la nyams pa med
98a8(dkon brtsegs): dong de ji ltar drang pas bdag dran ming mi brjed pa de bzhin du sems son rnams la chos ston to// 'di ring bzhi gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa dgu la// ga'adasang shA ri'i bu de ba'i gshegs pa'i
98b1(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med do// gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzi ngo / chos thabs cad panyam pa nyid de/ chos thams cad mi nyam pa pa yin no// chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhi na pa'o// ci'i phyir de bzhin
98b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin las mi nyams she na/ de bzhin nyid gang dang mnyam pa ting nge 'dzin kyang de dang mnyam mo// ting nge 'dzin gang dang mnyam pa de bzhin nyid kyang de dang mnyam ste/ mnyam pa nyid de la zhugs pas de'i phyir
98b3(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa zhes bya'o// 'dod chags kyi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa/ 'dod chags med pa'i mtha' 'ang de dang mnyam mo// zhe sdang gi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa/ zhe sdang med pa'i mtha' 'ang de dang mnyar ro// gti
98b4(dkon brtsegs): mug gi mtha' gang dang pa'ab pa/ gti mug med pa'i mtha' 'ang de dang panyam mo// 'dus byas kyi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa/ 'dus ma byas kyi mtha' 'ang de dang mnyam po// 'khor ba'i mtha' gang dang
98b5(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' 'ang de dang mnyab bo// mnyam pa nyid de la stobs par zhugs pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzid 'bas pa med ces bya'o// de ci'i phyir
98b6(dkon brtsegs): na ma'am pa nyid mi nyams/ yongs su mi nyams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin de yang mig dang ldan pa ma yin/ rna ba dang / snga dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / ldan pa ma yid mong kyi/ 
98b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po ma tshang ba yang ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin ri sa'i khams la mi gnas/ chu dang / mdang / rlung gi khams la mi gnas/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khangs la mi bar+tha
98b8(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten pha rol la mi gnas te/ mi gnas pas na nyams pa med do// de'i phyir de bzhin ga shags pa'i ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med de/ sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin
99a1(dkon brtsegs): rnyeng ba bya pa'i chos sdod to// shA nga'i du 'di di ba'i di gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu pa'o// gzhang yang shA ri'i bung bzhid ga shegs pa'i shes rab thams pa
99a2(dkon brtsegs): mang ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab gang zhe na/ gang ches thams cad rab tu shes pa ste/ gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i shes pa'o// sems cad gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag 'chos
99a3(dkon brtsegs): go bar byed pa'i shes pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa mi zad pa la mkhas pa'i shes pa'o// tshig thams cad rab tu dbye ba shes pa'o// tshig gcig la 'jug pas bskal pa brgya stong du mi chad par stod par shes
99a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// ji lta bu ci 'dra zhes dris pa/ ji lta ba bzhin du bcom gcod pa'i shes pa'o// thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i shes pa'o// / theg pa gsum rnam par dgod pa bstan pa shes pa'o// sen
99a5(dkon brtsegs): gyi sems kyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong yongs su shes pa'i shes pa'o// chos kyis phung po brgyad khri ba ni stong ci rigs par yang dag pa rarab tu stongan pa shes pa'o// 'di ni shes rab mi zad pa bskur
99a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir/ nga bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab mtha' yas mu med/ zad mi shes pa'o// gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab nyams pa med pa de bzhin du/ sems can rnams kyi shes rab kyang mi
99a7(dkon brtsegs): zad par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu gcig pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba nyams pa med do// 
99a8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba gang zhem can thos rnams kyi rnam par grol bani sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba'o// rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam par grol ba ni/ rkyes pong du chung pa'o// sangs rgyas
99b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par grol ba ni/ chags pa dang gnyis su 'dzin pa thams cad dang bral bas/ rnam par grol ba zhes bya ste/ sngor gyi mthar yang ma bcings/ phyi ma'i mthar yang mi la'o// da ltar
99b2(dkon brtsegs): byung ba la yang mi gnas te// mig dang gzugs la gnyis su 'dzin pa las rnab par grol ba'o// de bzhin du rna ba dang sgra dang / snang dri dang / lce dang / ro dang / lus dang reg bya la gnyis su 'dzin pa las rnam
99b3(dkon brtsegs): par grol te/ mi 'dzin/ mngon par mi chags par gnas pa'i rnam par grol ba'o// sems kyi rang bzhir 'od gsal ba de bzhin du shes pas/ de de'i phyir sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa
99b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shes bya'o// ji ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de ltar/ nga bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams la chos ston to// shA ri'i
99b5(dkon brtsegs): bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa bcu gnyis pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ de bzhir gshegs pa'i lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes
99b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis rjes su 'brang ngo // lus kyi las de dang ldan pas/ nga bzhin ga/ shags pa gzigs pas kyang sems can 'dul/ bsubs kyang sems cad 'dul/ cang mi gsung bas kyang sems can 'dul/ bshes
99b7(dkon brtsegs): gsol bas kyang sems can 'dul/ spyong la bgyis kyang sems can 'dul/ mtshan gyis kyang sems can 'dul/ dpe byang bzang pos kyang sems can 'dul/ gtsug tor bltar mi snang ba dang / lngas
99b8(dkon brtsegs): pa tsam dang / 'od gtong ba dang / gom pa 'dor ba dang / 'jog pa dang / grong khyer du 'jug pa dang / 'byung bas kyang sems can 'dul te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyod lam gyis kyang sa
100a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dul bar mi 'gyur ba meng ngo // de phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus thams cad ye shes sngong du 'gro 'ang ye shes kyi rjes su 'dreng ba zhes bya ste/ shA ri bri 'di ri de bzhin
100a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu gsum pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag gi las thams cad ye shes ster du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
100a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston pa'o// phyang par lung ston pa'o// shin tu nges pa'i tshig sla ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag de yang kur shes par byed pa/ rnam par shes par byed
100a4(dkon brtsegs): pa mi mthong ba/ mi dma' ba/ ma yob/ 'dar 'dar be ma yi na pa/ gya gyu med pa/ mi brlang ba/ mi rtsub pa/ gzing ba pa yin pa/ mnyen pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ ma 'chal ba/ lag leg
100a5(dkon brtsegs): red pa mi 'tshe ba/ pi byung ba/ rab tu byung ba ma yin pa/ shin tu rnam par phye ba/ shin tu nges pa'i tshig rab tu gnyen pa/ shin tu san pa/ dbyangs snyan pa rab tu gsal ba bsgrags pa/ 
100a6(dkon brtsegs): nges pa/ 'jam pa/ phar pa dang bcas pa/ dga' bar 'gyur ba/ mchod par 'gyur ba/ mdzes pa/ rdul meng pa/ rdul dang bral ba/ za ba med pa/ dri ma med pa/ ma rmongs pa/ gsal ba thogs pa med
100a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par sbyong ba/ 'od gsal ba/ dang ba/ 'jungs pa ma yin pa/ dum bu ma yin pa/ dge dag po ma yin pa/ bde ba skyed pa/ lus sim par byed pa/ sems tshim par byed pa/ 'dod cha
100a8(dkon brtsegs): zhingar byed pa/ zhe sdang zhi bar byed pa/ gti rug sel ba/ bdud 'jom pa/ sdig pa sel ba/ rgol ba 'dul ba/ go bar byed pa/ rnga'i sgra/ mkhas pa dga' bar byed pa/ ka la ping ka'i sgra byaH/ 
100b1(dkon brtsegs): drang ba ste/ mam pa'i sgra/ rgya mtsho rdzas kyi sa/ Id kyis/ sa'i sla byas/ khrung thung gi sgra/ rna 'i sgra dadu/ khu zug gi ng+ga/  ga 'ug sa/ rang pa'i sman
100b2(dkon brtsegs): ri dgas kyi rgyal po'i sgra/ khong du dang / pi wang dang / khar rnga dang / dung dang / sil snyad rab tu bsgrags pa'i sgra/ kun shes par 'gyur/ rnam par shes par 'gyur ba/ zung phyin pa/ yid
100b3(dkon brtsegs): du 'ong ba/ mnyan par 'os pa/ zab pa/ lkugs shing dag pa ma yin pa/ bang ba dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa/ tshig dang yi ga ma nyams pa/ shin tu nges par smra ba/ tshig 'bru dang / dor gyi tshig
100b4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa/ chos kyi tshig dang ldan pa/ dus dang ldan pa/ tshed dang ldan pa/ dus las mi 'da' ba/ dbang po mchog dang mcho ga ma yin pa shes pas bstan pa/ sbyin pas brgyad pa/ tshul
100b5(dkon brtsegs): khrims kyis sbyangs pa/ bzod pas bsgrub pa/ brtson 'gru sa kyis 'bar bar byas pa/ bsam gtan gyis yid du 'ong bar byas pa/ shes rab kyis nges par brtags pa/ bams
100b6(dkon brtsegs): pas shin tu gsag pa/ snying rjes mi skyo ba/ dga' ba'i 'od gsal ba/ btang snyoms nges par brtags pa/ theg pa gsum rnam par brtags pa// theg pa gsum rnam par 'jog pa/ dkod mchog
100b7(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyis rigs mi gcod pa/ phung po gsum 'jog pa/ rnam par bar ba gsub sbyong ba/ bden pa yongs su bsgoms pa/ ye shes yongs su bsgoms pa/ mkhas pa ma smad pa/ 'phags pas
100b8(dkon brtsegs): ston pa/ ram mkha' tshad med pa'i rjes su seng ba rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'o// shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag ni de 'dra ste// de lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag ni de 'dra ste/ 
101a1(dkon brtsegs): de lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing / ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ste/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs
101a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu bzhi pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyis rjes su 'brang ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin
101a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa ni sems kyis brjod pa ma yin/ yid kyis ma yin/ rnam par shes pas ma yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye shes kyis rab tu phye ba ste/ ye shes kyi dbang du gyur pa'o// gang
101a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i me shes de yang / sems can thams cad kyirjes su song ba'o// sems can thams cad kyi yid kyi rjesu zhugs pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi rnam par shes pa lnga
101a5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dben pa'o// chos thams cad nges par sems pa'o/ tid da 'dzin thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'o// dmigs pa las shin tu las pa'o// rkyen las skye ba dang
101a6(dkon brtsegs): bral ba'o// srid pa gsum gyi 'gro ba sel ba'o// nga rgyal gyi rnam pa mas cad las shi tu 'das pa'o// bdud gyi las thams cad las nges par sgrol ba'o// smyung ngag po thams cad dang bral ba'o// 
101a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa da 'a 'i rji ba spangs pa'o// ma rig pa dang/  ga mug gi srud pa dadu'i rgyug meng ba'o/ lam gyi yin lag yin tu yongs su dgongs pa'o// rnamam par dzas sus shing rnam par mi rtog ngan/ 
101a8(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyis dang byed med pa lta/ shA ri bu de lta bu ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i meng shes sngon du dgro ba'i ying kyi las so// shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhing gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco ldang 'o// 
101b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhad yang shA ri'i bu 'das pa'i dus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchags ma sogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug go// ji ltar 'jug cen/ 'dil shA ri'i bu 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ning byung ba dang 'byung 'dzi srid pa
101b2(dkon brtsegs): dag thams cad bgrang ba'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par mkhyen to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed pa de'i rtsa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman dang / nags tshal byung ba de dag thams cad rab tu mkhyen
101b3(dkon brtsegs): to/ ngasangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed pa de'i sems can gyi tshogs sems can du btags pa byung ba de dag thams cad me tu khyen to// de dag na sems can sna tshogs byung baji snyed pa gzugs tha dad pa las sogs pargyas
101b4(dkon brtsegs): par bya ste/ sangs rgyas byung ba ji snyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs ba re res chos bstan cing brjod pa ji snyed pa yang gong ma bzhan du sbyar ro// sems can ji snyed nyan thos kyi theg pas btul ba dang / 
101b5(dkon brtsegs): ji snyed cig rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas btul ba yang gong ma bzhin/ du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par phye ba yang rab tu mkhye na to// dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams par phye ba dang / tshe'i
101b6(dkon brtsegs): tshad rnam par phye ba yang rab tu mkhyen to// chos gnas pa rnam par phye ba yang rab tu mkhyen to// dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba yang rab tu mkhyen to// zas kyi mchog gi longs spyod kyang rab tu mkhyen to// sems can 'das pa'i rnam
101b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// dbang po tha dad pa dang / spyod pa tha dad pa dang / bsam pa tha dad pa yang rab tu mkhyen to// sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu mkhyen to// sems
101b8(dkon brtsegs): can gang gi 'og tu sems can gang 'byung ba de dag thams cad kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis/ mngon sum gyi ye shes dang / rjes su 'gro ba'i ye shes kyis rab tu mkhyen to// de bzhin gshegs pa la 'das par
102a1(dkon brtsegs): gtong ba'i sems kyi rgyun kyang mi dmigs te/ de bzhir gshegs pa ring lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas/ sems car gyis bsapa pa la nyams pa red par ches sten to// shA
102a2(dkon brtsegs): bu 'di ri nga bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu drug pa'o// gzhar yang shA ri'i bu ma 'ongs pa'i dus la de bzhin gshegs pa ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug go// ma 'ongs
102a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang dag 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de dag kyang rab tu mkhyen to// bskal pas tshig par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / chus
102a4(dkon brtsegs): sdud par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / rlung gis sdud par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnas par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni/ sa'i khams ji snyed po
102a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / rdul phra rab ji snyed pa dang / rtsa dang / shing gel pa da/ nga / sman dang / nags tshal ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / skar ma'i gzugs ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / 
102a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byam re re na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / rang sangs rgyas ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos ji skang 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / byang
102a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dnga'aji snyed 'thung bar 'gyur ba dang / zas kyis longs spyod dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba dang / 'chag pa dang / sdug pa dang / spyod la ba ji snyed 'thung bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gtso
102a8(dkon brtsegs): ba rab 'byam re re las sems can ji snyed nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas/ rnam par thar par 'gyur ba dang / sems can ji snyed thag pa chen pos/ rnam par thar par 'gyur
102b1(dkon brtsegs): ba de dag thams cad kyang de bzhir gshegs pas rab tu bakhyen to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab bya pa re re nas/ sems cad skye ba'i gnas ji snyed 'thung bar 'gyur ba dang / sems dang sems las byung ba skye ba dang / 
102b2(dkon brtsegs): skye bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'ongs pa'i sams kyi rgyud bskal par
102b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba pa yin te/ de bzhad gshegs pa ma 'ongs pa la gzigs pas sems can rnams la ches ston te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa bcu bdun pa'o// 
102b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang shA ri'i bu da ltar gyi dus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ma chag sa ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug go// ji ltar 'jug ce na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i da ltar gyi phyogs
102b5(dkon brtsegs): bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad bgrang ba'i tshul rnam pa gsum gyis rab tu mkhyen to// da ltar gyi chos thams cad rab tu mkhye na to// da ltar gyi byang chub sems dpa' thabs cad dang / 
102b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du ltar gyi nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang rab tu mkhyen to// da ltar gyi skar ma'i gzugs thams cad kyang rab tu mkhan to// da ltar gyi rtsa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman
102b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / nags tshal thams cad kyang rab tu mkhyen to// da ltar gyi phyogs bcu'i sa'i khams rdul phra rab rdul gyi char blags pa thams cad kyang babrang ba'i tshul gyi rab tu mkhyen te// phyogs bcu'i chu'i khams
102b8(dkon brtsegs): skra'i rtse mes blangs pa'i thigs pa thams cad kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to// phyogs bcu'i me'i khams kyi 'od 'phro ba skyes pa dang 'gags pa thams cad kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu
103a1(dkon brtsegs): mkhyed do// phyogs bcu'i rlung gi khabs thabs cad kyang gzugs kyi khangs sgrub pa bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tus khyen to// phyogs bcu'i rnam mala'i khangs thams cad kyang sna'i rtse
103a2(dkon brtsegs): cha shas kyis bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyed do// nga ltar gyi sems can gyi khams rnam pa gsub yang rab tu mkhyen to// da ltar gyi sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems cad gyi khams kyang rangab tu mkhyen to// de'i skye bo
103a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to// ldang ba'i rgyu yang rab tu khyen to// nga ltar gyi dung 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems cand gyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to// de'i skye ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to// ldang ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen
103a4(dkon brtsegs): te/ ngad ltar gyi gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can gyi la mas kyang rab tu mkhyen to// de'i skye ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to// ldang ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyed to// da ltar gyi mi'i sems can
103a5(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to// de'i skye ba'i rgyu yang rab tu ma khyen to// da ltar gyi lha'i sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu ma khyen to// de'i skye ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to// da ltar gyi sen
103a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu mkhyen to// de dag gi nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa 'ang rab tu mkhyen to// nyon mongs pa dang bral ba 'ang rab tu mkhyen to// da ltar gyi sems can thams cad kyi 'dul ba'i dbang po yang
103a7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mkhyen to// 'dul ba ma yin pa'i dbang po yang rab tu mkhyen to// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa la gnyis kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par shes pa med
103a8(dkon brtsegs): de/ gnyis su med pa la gzhugs pa'i phyir/ sems can rnams la chos ston te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad pa'o// shA ri'i bu sangs
103b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byab ma lus pa thams cad du/ 'khor gyi nang du gzi brjid dang / grags pa dang / 
103b2(dkon brtsegs): dpal dang / ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos nyid kyis 'khor rnams zil gyis mnar nas/ lam me/ lhan na/ snang nge'o// de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
103b3(dkon brtsegs): bco brgyad mtha' yas ru med do// 'di lta ste/ shA ri'i bu ma mkha' mtha' yas mu med pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yang mtha' yas mu med do// gang de
103b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa rnams kyi mtha' 'dod pa de ni nam mkha'i mtha' 'dong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
103b5(dkon brtsegs): chos ma 'dres pa de dag thos ras/ mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog/ soma'i phreng / the tsom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed cing / nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis
103b6(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab pa'i phyir/ ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes skyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pas ngor 'di bka' stsal nas/ ston pa yang 'di skad gsung ngo // 'dren pa la ni 'khrum
103b7(dkon brtsegs): pa yod pad de// lus dang ngag rnams ni sems mi g.yo// de bzhin srog chags rnams la chos ston te/ de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// khebs par mi 'gyur 'dud par mi 'gyur te/ khong
103b8(dkon brtsegs): rjes su cha gras las mngon par 'das// nyon mongs med la gnas shing nyor mongs grol// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// 'dren pa la ni dran pa bsnyel ba med// rnam thar
103b9(dkon brtsegs): spyod yul chos ni mngon par mkhyen// so so yang dag rig pa bsnyel med de/ de ni rgyal ba rnam sa kyi ma 'dres chos// mnyam par bzhag pas bzhugs shing bshos kyang gsol// 'chag
104a1(dkon brtsegs): dang brdal bar yang mnyam par bzhag/ g.yeng ba med cing sems can 'du shes med// de 'i rgyal ma rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// rgyal ba dang ni ling dang sems can la/ 
104a2(dkon brtsegs): dang 'du shes bde bar gshegs la med/ bsam pa chen po mnyam pa nyid la gnas// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ de dag la ni ma btags btang snyoms med/ shin tu nges pa'i la
104a3(dkon brtsegs): ni rab bsgoms pas/ de la rtog dang rnam par rtog med de/ da ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ dge ba la ni 'dun pa nyams pa med// ston pa rtag tu snying rje rab sbyor zhing / sems can rgya chen dpag tu
104a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa 'dul// deni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// nam yang brtson 'grus la nyams pa med// 'dul bamatha' dang pa ro med mthong nas// lus dang ngag rnams dang ni yid kyis 'dul
104a5(dkon brtsegs): de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// byang chub snying pongs ngas rgyas byang chub bar// de dri ba rnam par chud mim gang chos rtogs pa de ni rtogs bya min// de ni rgyal
104a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi sa 'dres chos// rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog med par// rang thung ting nge 'dzi la mnyam gnas te// chos rnams kun la mi gnas bsapa gtan byed// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres
104a7(dkon brtsegs): chos/ 'dren pa'i shes rab kyis ni rab ston cing // sems can kun gyi spyod pa rab mkhyen te// de dag la ni bsams bzhin chos kyang 'chang // de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ 
104a8(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos rnams kyi rnam grol sa phyir 'gro/ rang rgyal gyi ni rkyen gyi 'du shes te// sangs rgyas rnams kyi btang stobs bsams mi khyab// chags las rab 'das dri med nam mkha' badzin// sem
104b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi rgyud 'di rang bzhin rna ba grol te// sems ni snga nas bcings par gyur pa med// ji ltar rnam grol de ltar chos ston te// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// gshegs dang bzhugs dang grong khyer
104b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa dang // spyod labadag ni mthong na mig kyang 'phrog/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi dpe byad bzang po dang // mtshan dang 'od rnams thams cad 'dul bar zhugs// sems can snying po nam zhig 'od gtong che/ 
104b3(dkon brtsegs): srog chags bye ba mang po bder 'gyur te// 'od kyis reg pa dag ni 'dul bar 'gyur// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// rang byung ba ni gsung gcig brjod pas na// sems can bsam pa bzhin
104b4(dkon brtsegs): du gsungs thos te// drag cha lta bur de'i gsung yang thos// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// ye shes kyis ni 'dren pa'i las byas te// bde bar gshegs la sems las cung
104b5(dkon brtsegs): zang med// sems can bsam las ye shes rjes su zhug/ sa// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// ting 'dzin bsam gtan dang ni rab ldan te/ spros pa thams cad kyi
104b6(dkon brtsegs): yang rgyu ba med// ram mkha' lta bur mnyam pa nyid du gnas// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// 'das pa'i dus la de'i ye shes zhugs// 'gro ba sna tshogs rnam 'bad shes pa ya// chos
104b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kun la sgrib pa med par 'jug/ de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// ma 'ongs dus na gang dag 'jig rten du// 'byung bar 'gyur dang 'byung bar mi 'gyur dang // sems can zhing dang rgyal ba
104b8(dkon brtsegs): bshangad ba dang // de dag thams cad sangs rgyas ma lus mkhyen/ ma 'ong de la rjes su rab lta zhing // de bzhir sems can rnams kyi chos kyang mkhyen// de'i sems ri g.yeng bar mi 'gyur te/ 
105a1(dkon brtsegs): de ri rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// da ltar lam gang 'jug par 'gyur ba dag/ thams cad rgyal bas chags med rab tu mkhyer// 'dren pa'i spyod yul dam mkha' lnga
105a2(dkon brtsegs): bung ste// de ni rgyal nga rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos ni ma 'dres pa// bco brgyad gsungs pa bsam gyis mi khyab ste// de bzhin gshegs pa dang mkha' 'dra bar ni// dang mkhas
105a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' dad par byed// shA ri'i bu 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa bco brgyad de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag dang ldang pas// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
105a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor gyi nang du gshegs nas// seng+ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog cing / khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che ste/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'a
105a5(dkon brtsegs): lha 'am/ bdud ngam/ sus kyang 'jig cem du chos dang 'jun bar ma bskor ba'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu ster ro// shA ri ra bu de ltar dang ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bsam pa 'ang
105a6(dkon brtsegs): bcus// de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par dang / yid ches/ rab tu rtog/ soma'ini byed/ the tsom miza/ rgya cher dga' bu ste/ rangs pa rnyed cing / ngo mtshar dang rmang du 'du shes skyed do// 
105a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa/ 
105a8(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de ltar ngang pa la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis snod du rig byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi sdong du rig/ 
105b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du rig nas/ de'i drung du gshegs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam yang dag par rab tu ston to// de ltar bas na shA ri'i bu rnam grangs 'dis kyang / de ltar dad pa la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub
105b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis snod du rig/ byang chub sems dpa'i snga snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi snod du rig/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi sdod du rig nas/ de'i drung du gshegs te/ 
105b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi lab yang dag par rab tu ston par de ltar rig par bya'o// shA ri'i bu sder byung ba 'das pa'i dus/ bskal pa grangs med pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa/ yangs pa/ tshad rang ba/ bsam gyis
105b4(dkon brtsegs): ri khyab pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhid gshegs pa dgra bco ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phung po cher po zhes bya @/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 
105b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten pakhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ blan med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi stong pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ gang 'di ltar bcas pa'i
105b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten dang / bdud du bcas pa dang / tshangs par bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten rang gi ngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas
105b7(dkon brtsegs): tabasgrubs ras gnas so// de chos stong te tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha bar dge ba/ dor bzang ngo po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su
105b8(dkon brtsegs): ngag ze/ yongs su byang ba/ yang dag par rab tu ston to// shA ri'i bu de bzhi gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phung po chen po'i nyan pos khrag khrig bdud bcu rtsa gnyis kyi nyan thos
106a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshogs cheran po byung ste/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag bzang pa/ nyon mongs pa bad pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang das pa'i pha rol tu phyid pa sha stag go// shA ri'i bu de'i dus
106a2(dkon brtsegs): na rgyal po che rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba/ chos can chos kyi rgyal po'i'i thung ngo // yang shA ri'i bu rgyal po che rnam par rgyal ba'i grong khyer rnam par rgyal ba'i mtshan zhes bya ba/ rgyal po'i gnas 'byor pa/ mang/ 
106a3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bde ba/ le legs pa/ dga' ba/ 'gro ba mang po dang mis gang ba zhig yod de/ yang shA ri'i bu rgyal po che rnam par rgyal ba'i khye'u gzhon nu brtsom grus spyod pa zhes bya ba/ sngon dge ba'i rtsa
106a4(dkon brtsegs): ba bskrun pa/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas la bya ba byas pa/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la snyed bkur byas pa/ gar+b+ha gas bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ bltan sdug pa/ kha dog bzang/ 
106a5(dkon brtsegs): zhing rgyas pa'i mchog dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ yang shA ri'i bu / 'i dus na gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod btsun mo'i 'khor dang wA na cig tu bskyed pos tshal gyi sar byung bar gyur to// de nas nga
106a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phung po chen pos/ e ma'o gzhon nu 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi sdong ngo // e ma'o gzhon nu brtson 'grus
106a7(dkon brtsegs): spyod 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod ngo zhes de ltar rig nas/ bskyed mos tshal gyi sa ga la ba dang / gzhon nu brtson 'grus sbyong ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs
106a8(dkon brtsegs): te gnor nu brtson 'grus spyod la byang chub kyi lam yang dag par ston to// de la byang chub kyi lam gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson pa dang / 
106b1(dkon brtsegs): bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams kyi rjes su 'jug ste/ de ni byang chub kyi lam zhes bya'o// de la sems cad thams cad la byams pa gang zhe na/ 'di la gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can gyi khams ji tsam pa de tsam du byams
106b2(dkon brtsegs): pas khyab par byed do// sems can gyi khams ji tsam pa// sems can gyi khams kyang de tsam mo// gzhon nu 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i khams 'dis khyab par ma gyur pa gang yang med do// gzhon nu de
106b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa 'dis sems can gyi ris na/ gang khyab par ma gyur pa'i sems can de gang yang mang ngo // 'di lta ste/ gnon nu sems can gyi khams dpag tu med pa de bzhin du/ gzhon
106b4(dkon brtsegs): ru byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa bsgom pa yang dpag tu med do// gzhon nu de ltar nam mkha' mtha' yas pas/ sems can mtha' yas/ sems can mtha' yas pas byams pa mtha' yas so// 
106b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu yang sems can gyi khams mi ches mang gi/ sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams ri de lta ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang gzhon nu sems can gyi khams
106b6(dkon brtsegs): tshang med pa ji tsam pa de'i ngom shes par bya ba'i phyir dpe bstan to// gzhon nu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / de bzhin du
106b7(dkon brtsegs): phyogs mtshams dang / phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rter gyi khams pad+ma'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa de dag thams cad chus yongs su gang ba'i rgya mtshor gyur pa'i rgya mtho chen po gcig tu gyur pa la yongs su brtag pa
106b8(dkon brtsegs): bzung ste/ de la sems cad pad+ma'i klung gi byem snyeng 'dus nas/ brgyar btsal ba'i sgra'i rtse mos chu'i thigs pa gcig blangs/ gzhan yang sems can gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'dus nas/ brgyar btsal
107a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i skra'i rtse mos chu'i rigs pa gnyis pa blangs/ gzhan yang sems can gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma sdeng 'dus nas/ rgyar brtsal ba'i skra'i rtse mos chu'i thigs pa gsum pa blangs na/ 
107a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan du yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/ de lta bu'i thabs kyis chu'i phung po chen po bzang par gyur kyang / sems can gyi khams ni tshang dang mtha' mad de/ gzhon du sems can gyi khams de ltar dpag tu med cing // 
107a3(dkon brtsegs): de ltar mtha' yas pa/ de thams cad la byang chub sems dpa'i byams pas khyab par byed do// gzhon nu de ji snyam du sems/ gang de ltar dpag tu med par byams pa bsgom pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i tshad gzung bar nus
107a4(dkon brtsegs): sam gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de ma lags so// gzhon nu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi/ byams pa chen po sgom pa'i ngag
107a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba ni dpag tu med pa yin te// gzhon nu de'i byams pa ni bdag tu srung ba yin mchog tu gnod sems med pa/ khro ba dang gnod sems kyi za ba dang bral ba/ zhes pa 'jobs
107a6(dkon brtsegs): pa rjes su chags pa'i kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba/ ngang pa kun tu ston pa/ 'khrul pa thams cad la nyes par lta ba/ yongs su gdung ba med pa/ lus dang ngag dang sems bde ba skyes pa/ gzhan gyi gnod
107a7(dkon brtsegs): bar bya ba thams cad du ma lhung ba// 'jig pa thams cad dang bral ba/ 'phags pa'i lam dang 'thun pa/ ga sha ba dang khros pa la dang bskyed pa// g.yul thams cad las sgrol ba/ dbyig pa dang / mtshon
107a8(dkon brtsegs): cha mi thogs pa/ sems can rab tu bar bar bya ba la dga' ba/ khong khro ba thams cad dang bral ba/ tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gas ga dang / 'dring ba dang / gzhog slongs thams cad dang bral
107b1(dkon brtsegs): rang gi rnyeng pa dang / bkur bsting nga / tshigs su bcang pas nye bar 'chog/ brgya byin dang tshangs pas phyag byas/ rang gi gzi brjid kyis brgyan pa/ mkhas pas bston pa/ byis pa thams cad rjes
107b2(dkon brtsegs): su srung ba/ tshangs pa'i lam dang 'thun pa/ 'dod pa'i khams dang ma 'dres pa/ thar pa'i lam gyi gtso bor gyur pa/ theg pa thams cad kyis yang dag par bzung ba/ zang zing med pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs
107b3(dkon brtsegs): bsags pa/ rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po thams cad kyis zil gyis mi nor pa// mtshan sung cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang pos yang dag par brgyan pa/ dbang po nyams shing mtshang thams
107b4(dkon brtsegs): cad spangs pa/ bde 'grong nga mya ngan las 'da' ba'i lam thams cad du 'gro ba/ ngan song thams cad dang / mi khom pa brgyad las bzlog pa/ chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos pa/ 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams
107b5(dkon brtsegs): cang dang / dbang po dang / rgyal srid la mngon par mi dga' ba/ sa mas can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems kyis/ sbyin/ ba la rab tu spyod ba/ tha dad pa'i 'du shes dang bral ba/ tshul
107b6(dkon brtsegs): khrims dang bslab pa thams cad kyi sgo dang lam/ tshul khrims 'chal ba thams cad kyi skyabs/ bzod pa'i stobs kun tu ston pa/ nga rgyal dang rgyags pa dang / dregs pa thams cad bral ba/ mi 'khrims pa'i
107b7(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus rtsom pa/ yang dag pa'i sbyor bar bya ba sgrol pa/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / stobs par 'jug pa'i rtsa ba/ 'od mongs pa las 'byung ba/ sems
107b8(dkon brtsegs): can nges par rtog pa/ thos pa 'dzin pas/ shes rab kyi rgyu skyed pa'i byams pa/ bdag gi phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs 'jom pa// bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i phyogs sel ba// 'grogs na
108a1(dkon brtsegs): bde ba/ ldang ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba'i spyod la srung bar byed pa/ rgong pa'i rang bzhin yid la byed pa thams cad sel ba/ dri zhim pos byugs pa/ khrel yod pa dang / 
108a2(dkon brtsegs): ngo tsha shes pas byugs pa/ mi khom pa dang / nyon phongs pa dang / ngan 'gro thams cad sel ba'i byams pa/ 'gro ba thams cad skyob pa'i byabs pa chen po bdag gi bde ba btang ba sems can la bde b.rab
108a3(dkon brtsegs): tu sbyin pa ste/ gzhon nu nyan thos rnams kyi byams pa ni bdag skyob pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa ni/ sems can thams cad la skyob pa'o// yang gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems
108a4(dkon brtsegs): dang po bskyed pa rnams kyi byams pa ni/ sems can la dmigs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi byams pa ni chos la dmigs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' bzong pa rab tu bas
108a5(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi byams dpa' ni dmigs pa med pa'o// gzhon nu 'di// ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bya/ mas pa zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa de la rab tu
108a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas pas/ sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed do// de la gzhon du byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po gang zhe na/ gzhon nu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
108a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'i sngon du 'gro ba ni/ snying rje chen po'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gzhon nu skyes bu'i srog yi dbang po'i sngon du 'gro ba ni/ dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa'o// gzhon nu de bzhin du
108a8(dkon brtsegs): theg pa chen po yang dag par sgrub pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sngon du 'gro ba ni snying rje chen po'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gzhon nu 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i rin po che thams cad kyis sngon du 'gro ba ni/ 'kho
108b1(dkon brtsegs): le rin po che yin no// gzhon nu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang sngon du 'gro ba ni snying rje chen po yin te/ snying rje chen po nga yang sems can thams cad
108b2(dkon brtsegs): rjes su mi gtong ba'o// gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po sems can thams cad la ji ltar 'jug ce na/ gzhon nu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas 'jigs tshogs la lta bas bcings shing / lta bar
108b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa rnam pa mang po la chags pa'i sems can mthong na/ de dag gi 'jig tshogs la lta bas bcings pa spang ba'i phyir chos bstan to// zhes sems can rnams la/ byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug/ 
108b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang gzhon nu byang chub sapas dpa' sems cad yang dag pa ma yin/ ba/ phyin ci log gi gnas la gnas te/ mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa dang / sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes
108b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / mi sdug ba la sdug par 'du shes pa mthong na/ de dag gi yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyin ci log spang ba'i phyir chos bstar to zhes sems can
108b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// gzhan yang gzhon nu byang chub sems dpas phyin ci log gi 'dod pa la sred pa'i sems can de dag ma la yang g.yem pa dang / sring mo la yang g.yem pa mthong
108b7(dkon brtsegs): na byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di dag ni/ 'phags pa ma yin pa 'dus ste/ mu cor sbubs yongs su gang zhing ngo tsha mi shes pas yongs su gang ngo // 
108b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar ma'i rus mngal gyi lang na 'dug 'dug ste/ de nyid kyi mngal gyi sgo nas byung la/ de nyid dang yang lhard cig tu 'dong bstan par byed pa lha ga la srid/ mngal gcigs lhan cig tu 'dug 'dug pa'i
109a1(dkon brtsegs): sring mo dang 'du cing / 'khrig pa byed pa lta ga la srid nga/ kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni brlag go// rnam par brlag go// rab tu brlag go// 'dod chags kyis g.yen spyo'o// zhe sdang gis gar+b+ha
109a2(dkon brtsegs): spror nga gti mug gi g.ye sbyor// mi shes pas ga yer sprol// chos las rnams shing chos ma yin pa la gnas so// mi 'thun pa'i chos la rab tu spyang ngo do// sems can dmyal ba spyod yul ba'o// dud 'gror
109a3(dkon brtsegs): skyes gnas spyod yul ba'o// gshen rje'i 'jig rten spyod yul ba'o// log pa'i lam la spyod yul ba'o// snyam mo// gzhon nu 'di lta ste dper na/ wa dud khrod kyi mthar g.yang so chen po dang nye ba zhig na mtshan
109a4(dkon brtsegs): mo khyis gtses nas/ g.yang sa chen po nas lhung ba de bzhin du/ gzhon nu sems can 'di ngas kyang wa dang 'dra'o// gzhon nu 'di lha ste dper na/ dmus long gtses na/ g.yang sa chen po dang
109a5(dkon brtsegs): nye bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ kye ma'o gzhon nu sems can 'di/ ngag kyang dmus long dang 'dra'o// gzhon nu 'di lta ste dper na// phag ni mi gtsang bza zhing / mi gtsang ba la spyod yul ba ste/ 
109a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhon du kye ma'o de bzhin du sems can 'di dag kyang phag dang 'dra ste/ de nyid ma yin/ de nyid sring mo yin na de chung mar bya ba lta ga la srid snyam ste/ sems can nyon mongs pas g.yon skye ba dang / 
109a7(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyi phyogs kyi spyod yul ba dang / bdud kyi zhags pas bcings pa dang / 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba de dag gi/ 'dod pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub
109a8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i snyi sa 'jug go// gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas sgrib pa lngas bsgribs pa'i sems can 'dod pa'i zug rngus zug pa mthong na/ skye mched drug la chags shing zhen pa mig gis gzu/ 
109b1(dkon brtsegs): mthong na/ mtshan mar 'dzin par mi 'gyur zhing / mngon rtags su 'dzin pa dang / rnabs s+tha/ snas dri/ lces ro/ lus kyis reg pa la reg nas/ mdzad par 'dzin cing / mngon rtags su 'dzin
109b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur te/ kye ra'o sems can 'di dag ni khong khro ba mang zhing phan tshun mi mdza ste/ de dag dor rnyed pa'i phyir ni mdza bor yang mi shes/ gnod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ni gcig la gcig bsod do// kye ma'o sems
109b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag ni gnyeng dang rmugs pa mang ba ste/ zhan cing slong ba/ mi shes pa'i ling tog gis khebs shing mi dge ba'o// kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni 'gyod pas kun nas bskor ba la glo bur gyi nyon mongs pas/ 
109b4(dkon brtsegs): sems kun nas sdug bsngal ba'o// kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni/ the tsom gyis yongs su dkris pa/ chos zab mo la nges par ma gyur pa ste/ de dag sgrib pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos ston to// 
109b5(dkon brtsegs): zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// gnon nu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas sem sa can nga rgyal gyis non pa/ che ba'i nga rgyal gyis non pa/ nga rgyal
109b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal las kyang nga rgyal gyis non pa/ nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyis non pa/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis non pa/ cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyis non pa/ log pa'i nga rgyal gyis nor pa/ dpa' ba bas bdag mtho
109b7(dkon brtsegs): bar sems pa/ mtshungs pa bas bdag kyang bdag ches lhag par lta ba/ de dag gzugs la bdag ces khas len nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la bdag ces khas len pa/ khong du ma chud par khong du chud snyam/ 
109b8(dkon brtsegs): du shes pa/ gus par smra bar 'os pa la gus par mi smra ba/ phyag bya bar 'os pa la phyag mi 'tshal ba/ rgad pa dang gnod pa la mi 'dud pa/ bla ma la rim gro mi byed pa/ mkhas pa la dge ba gang / 
110a1(dkon brtsegs): dge gang / bskyed pa bya ba gang byas 'a bye ba gang / khangam po ba dang bcas pa gang / 'anam po meng pa gang / lab gang / ting nge lan gang / rnam par grol
110a2(dkon brtsegs): gang zhes mi 'dri ba dang / bdag cing la bdag ni gtso bo/ bang sa ni mchog go sdang du rlom sems su byed pa mthong na/ 'di ltar nga rgyal gyi rnam pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos bstar to zhes sems can rnams la
110a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// gnor nu ga nar yang byang chub sems dpas sred pa'i bcings pas bcings pa/ srang pas khol ba/ chung ma dang / bu po dang / bu mos zer pa/ gnod
110a4(dkon brtsegs): pas zing pa/ don dang bas zir pa/ 'khor ba'i gtan pas zin pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshan rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyis zad pa/ srid pa'i yi
110a5(dkon brtsegs): pas zin pa/ rang 'am med pa/ rang dbang med pa'i sems can mthong na/ de dag rang nyam dang / rang dbang dang / gang dud/ ga' bar 'gro ba dang / mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro bar bya ba'i
110a6(dkon brtsegs): chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas dge ba'i bo shes gnyen dang bral ba/ sdig pa'i grogs pos 'khor ba de
110a7(dkon brtsegs): dag/ sdig pa'i grogs pos non pa/ ming ge ba'i las la chags pa 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / 
110a8(dkon brtsegs): phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig kyal pa dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba'i sems can mthong na/ 'di ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsdu ba dang / mi dge ba'i
110b1(dkon brtsegs): las las bzlog pa dang / dge ba cu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'azung ste/ spyod par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to// zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// gnon nu gzhan
110b2(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpas gti mug gis bsgribs pa/ ma rig pa'i mun pa nag gi ling tog gis kun tu bsgribs pa/ bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / skye ba po dang / shad las skyes pa dang / 
110b3(dkon brtsegs): shed bu dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga'ir 'dzin pa la mngon par chags pa'i sems can mthong na/ de dag 'phags pa'i
110b4(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi mig rnam par sbyang zhing / lta bur gyur pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos bstan to// sems can rnams la byang chub sem sa pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub
110b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can mtho ngan/ de dag phung po lnga'i gshed ma las rab tu thar par bya/ ba dang / 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa las rab tu bzla ba dang / 
110b6(dkon brtsegs): khams gsum thams cad las gdon pa'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas sems can 'khrug par gyur pa/ rtsa
110b7(dkon brtsegs): mun dza dang / bal ba dza lta bu mi drang ba ltar 'chos pa/ 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du/ 'jig rten pha rol nas/ 'jig rten 'dir kun tu rgyug cing 'khor ba/ 'gro ba lngar 'gro ba la phyogs pa/ 
110b8(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba la/ phyir ltas pa mthong na/ de dag gi mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sgo dbye ba'i phyir chos bstan to nas/ sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// gzhon
111a1(dkon brtsegs): de ltar byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi khams mthong na/ rnam pa bcu po 'di dag gis snying rje chen po 'jug go// bsam pa las byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang g.ye
111a2(dkon brtsegs): med par 'jug go// lhag pa'i bsam pa las shin tu byung ba'i phyir// de'i snying rje chen po de yang mnyam par 'jug go// lam las byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po nga yang / drang po bcos ma ma yin par 'jug go// 
111a3(dkon brtsegs): sems gya gyu med pa'i sems la shin tu gnas pa las byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang gya gyu med par 'jug go// 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la 'dud pa dang / ngag 'tshal ba las shin tu byung
111a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir/ de'i snying rje chen po de yang bdag gi bde ba gtong bar 'jug go// 'di lta ste/ bdag gi sems yongs su dag pa las byung ba'i phyir/ de'i snying rje chen po nga yang pha rol rjes su
111a5(dkon brtsegs): srung bar 'jug go// 'di lta ste/ g.yo zhing 'gul ba'i sa mas dang bral ba/ rab tu gnas pa'i sems las byung ba'i phyi/ ra/ de'i snying rje chen po de yang shes rab brtan par 'jug
111a6(dkon brtsegs): ge nga 'di lta ste/ pha rol la bde ba sbyin pa las rab tu byung ba'i phyir/ de'i snying rje chen po nga yang bdag gi bde ba gtong bar 'jug go// brtson 'grus brtan pa las rab tu byung ba'i phyir/ de'i snying rje chen
111a7(dkon brtsegs): bo dra yang sems can thams cad kyi khur khyer bar 'jug ste/ gzhon nu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po ni rnam pa 'di dag dang / gzhan yang rnam pa bcus 'jug go// gzhon nu 'di ltar gang la/ 
111a8(dkon brtsegs): la theg pa chen pos nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang snying rje chen pos 'byung ste/ de'i phyir snying rje chen po zhes bya'o// sbyin pa byed pa dang / tshul khrims byed pa dang / bzod pa byed pa dang / 
111b1(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed pa dang / shes rab byed pa ni snying rje chen po ste/ de'i phyir snying rje chen po zhes bya'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa byed pa dang / yang dag par spong ba byed pas/ 
111b2(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen po'o// dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / mchog tu dga' bar bya ba'i las dang mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang / 
111b3(dkon brtsegs): tshe gang dag thams cad kyang rgyas par bya'o// snying rje chen po ni rang byung gi ye shes sgrub par byed pas na/ de'i phyir snying rje chen po zhes bya'o// rang gi bya ba dang / legs par byed pa bya ba dang / mi 'gyur ba'i
111b4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba dang / sems can thams cad la bya ba ci yod snyam pa ste/ de'i snying rje chen por yang sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba ba zhin du yongs su rdzogs par byed pas/ 'di ni byang chub sems
111b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje de dang ldan pas/ sems can 'di 'dra ba'i gnas thob pa mthong na/ de dag
111b6(dkon brtsegs): la snying brtse ba dang / snying rje'i sems skyed do// de la byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba gang zhe na/ gang dge ba'i chos rnams dran pa dang / rjes su dran pa dang / dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rab tu dga'
111b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / dge ba'i chos la mi zhub pa dang / mi 'gong pa dang / yongs su mi skyo ba dang / mi dga' ba thams cad spong ba dang / chos thams cad la dga' bar gnas pa dang / sems rab tu dga' ba dang / 
111b8(dkon brtsegs): lus rab tu tshim pa dang / blo rab tu dga' ba dang / yang rab tu mgu ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la mngon par dga' zhing mos pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan kun tu tshol ba la dga' ba dang / 
112a1(dkon brtsegs): chos nyan pas yongs su mi skyo zhing dga' ba dang / chos kyi phyir 'brang ba'i nan tan la rab tu dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba'i chos la mgu ba dang / sems can rnams la khong
112a2(dkon brtsegs): khro ba med pa dang / byang chub la dga' ba dang / chos rgya chen po la mos pa dang / nyi tshe ba'i thog pa sel bar sems skyed pa dang / ser sna tshar gcod pa dang / slong ba la dga' ba dang / gtong ba la rab tu dga'
112a3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / tshul khrims bcal ba dag sdud cing bams pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa la rtag tu dad pa dang / bdag gi tshul khrims yongs su dag pas/ ngan 'gro dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las yang rab
112a4(dkon brtsegs): tu 'da' bar dbugs 'byed pa la rab tu dga' ba dang / pha rol ngan tu byer ba dang / ngan par brjod pa'i tshig gi lam bzod cing rab tu dga' ba dang / lag pa dang rkang pa dang / mig dang / mge
112a5(dkon brtsegs): bcad kyang bzod par nus te/ sems mi nyams shing rab tu dag/ 'ab dang / rgan rabs la 'dud cing zhes byed pa la dgarab dang / rtag tu bzhin 'dzum pa la dga' ba dang / khro gnyer
112a6(dkon brtsegs): med cing gsong por smra ba la dga' ba dang / chus 'chos pa dang / khags ga dang / gzhog slongs med pa la rab tu dga' ba dang / sdong po dang ldan pa'i chos la 'jug par rab tu dga' ba dang / byang chub sad/ 
112a7(dkon brtsegs): la ston pa bzhin du phangs pa dang / chos la bdag bzhin du phangs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la srog bzhin du 'phangs pa dang / bla ma la pha ma bzhin du phangs pa dang / sems can thams cad la bu
112a8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du phangs pa dang / slob dpon la mig bi nan du bangs pa dang / nan tan la yan lag gi dab pa mgo bzhin du phangs pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa la 'ag pa dang / rkang pa bzhin du langs pa dang / 
112b1(dkon brtsegs): chos smra ba la ring po che thams cad bzhin du pangs pa dang / chos yongasu tshol ba la sman bzhin du phangs pa dang / skul zhing dran par byed pa la sman pa bzhin du phangs par sems pa'o// gzhon 'di ni dga' ba zhes
112b2(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ba de la rab tu gnas nas/ rtag tu chos tshol ba la dga' bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la mi skye'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams
112b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis btang snyobs gang zhe na/ btang snyoms rnam pa gsum ste/ rnam pa gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyon mongs pa la btang snyoms pa dang / bdag dang gzhan rjes su srung ba'i btang snyoms
112b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / dus dang dus ma yin par btang snyoms pa'o// de la nyon mongs pa'i btang snyoms pa gang zhe na/ gang bkur sti byas kyang ma thor mi sems pa dang / bkur sti ma byas kyang dpa' bar mi sem
112b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / ma rnyeng pas yI mi 'chad pa dang / tshul khrings dang ldan/ ba dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa la blo mnyam pa dang / grags pa la dga' ba med pa dang / ma grags pa la zhum pa
112b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / smad pa la yi bi gsod pa dang / bstod pa la chos nyid du shin tu gnas pa dang / sdug bsngal los sor rtog pa'i stobs dang / bde ba la mi rtag par rtog pa'i stobs dang / rjes su chags pa
112b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dor ba dang / khong khro ba spong ba dang / mdza' ba dang mi mdza ba la sems mnyam pa dang / legs par byas pa dang / nyes par byas pa la gnyis su mi byed pa dang / sdug pa dang mi sdug pa la mi
112b8(dkon brtsegs): lta ba dang / bsnyen bkur mi byed pa la dga' bar bya ba med pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / mi snyan par smra ba la rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba med pa dang / kun myang ba'i nyes pa la mtshungs par yongs
113a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jal ba dang / bdag dang sems can gzhan la bsam pa nyam pa dang / lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang / sems can rab 'bring ba ma la 'od zer pa'am pa dang / bsngags pa dang / 
113a2(dkon brtsegs): ma bsngags la chos nyid mnyam pa dang / bden pa dang mi bden pa la bdag gi bden pa yongs su dag pa ste/ gzhon nu 'di ltar bdag la gnod par byed pa de la byang chub sems dpa' gtang snyoms pa yin no// de la bdag
113a3(dkon brtsegs): dang gzhan rjes su srung ba'i btang snyoms gang zhe na/ gang yan lag dang nying lag gi sha bcad kyang btang snyobs pa yin no// yan lag gi sha bcad kyang / 'dod pa med cing tshol ba med pa de btang snyoms pa yin
113a4(dkon brtsegs): roro/ lus kyang mi 'gyur/ ngag kyang mi 'gyur/ gnyi ga ba zod pas de'i phyir btang snyomabs shes bya'o// mig gi rnam pas ma yin/ bzugs kyi rnam pas ma yin te/ gnyi gas
113a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang tha mi phyin pa nas/ yid kyi rnam pa dang / chos kyi rnam pa'i bar gyis rma mi phyin pas/ de'i phyir btang stoms shes bya'o// rma mi phyin cing spang ba med pas/ de'i phyir 'a
113a6(dkon brtsegs): snyoms shes bya'o// rma phyung ba la rma mi 'byin pas de'i phyir btang snyoms shes bya'o// bdag dang pha rol gnyi ga las bzod pas de'i phyir btang snyoms shes bya'o// phan par byed pa dang / phan par mi byed pa la mnyam
113a7(dkon brtsegs): par sbyor bas de'i phyir btang snyems shes bya'o// btang snyoms ni rtsod pa med pa lhur byed pa'o// btang snyoms ni rang gi sems nges par rtag pa'o// btang snyoms ni bdag la so sor rtog pa'o// btang snyoms ni gzhan
113a8(dkon brtsegs): la med pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btang snyoms ni mnyam par banag pa'i dngos po ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la btang snyoms pa gnang bar mi mdzad
113b1(dkon brtsegs): / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu 'bad par bya'o// rtag par rgyun mi tshang bar dge ba yongs su brtsal ba la brtson par bya ste/ dus dus su btang snyoms bsgobs par bya'o// de la dus dus su btang
113b2(dkon brtsegs): snyoms sgom pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ snod ma yin pa'i sems can la btang snyoms pa dang / bsnyen bkur mi byed pa la btang snyoms pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang / spang ba dang / ma grags pa dang / sdug bsngal
113b3(dkon brtsegs): ba la btang snyoms pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa nges par 'gyur ba la zhugs pa rnams la btang snyoms pa dang / sbyin pa'i dus na tshul khrims nye bar sgrub pa btang snyoms dang / bzod pa'i dus na sbyin pa dang / tshul
113b4(dkon brtsegs): khrims dang / brtson 'grus nye bar sgrub pa btang stobs pa dang / 'artson 'grus kyi dus na/ tshul khrims kyi rjes su 'jug pa btang snyo/ mas pa dang / bsam gtan gyi dus ma/ sbyir ba'i pha rol
113b5(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa btang stobs pa dang / shes rab kyi dus na pha rol tu phyin pa lnga la dmigs pa nye bar sgrub pa btang snyoms pa ste/ 'di ni dus dus btang snyoms pa zhes bya'o// de ltar gang
113b6(dkon brtsegs): mi bya ba'i chos mi byed pa'i ni btang snyoms shes bya ste/ de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni mi dge ba'i phyogs thams cad la btang snyoms su byed pa'o// gzhon nu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
113b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms shes bya'o// de ltar shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phung po chen po ngas gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod la byams
113b8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyong sa mdor bstan pa dang bcas/ rgyas par bstan dang bcas te/ rgya cher yang dag par bstan to// gzhon du brtson 'grus spyod pa des de thos nas/ 
114a1(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson 'grus brtsams par gyur to// byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// 
114a2(dkon brtsegs): de la shA ri'i bu pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson pa gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag nyid yid te/ gang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag nyid yin te/ gang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la
114a3(dkon brtsegs): brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do// drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
114a4(dkon brtsegs): dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bas pa gtan gyi ba rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug rnams so// de laskyed pa'i pha rol tu phyin
114a5(dkon brtsegs): pa gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni dge sbyong dang / brab ze dang / phongs pa rnams kyis sbyin bdag yin te/ 'di lta ste/ zas kyis phongs pa zas/ skom gyi pheng
114a6(dkon brtsegs): pa la skom/ gnon pa dang / gos dang / spos dang / brang ba dang / byug pa dang / gnas dang / yo byad dang / na ba'i sman dang / mar ma dang / sil sAn dang / bran po dang / dran mo dang / gser dang / 
114a7(dkon brtsegs): nor bu dang / mu tig dang / baiDUR+Ya dang / dung dang / me shel dang / byi ru dang / rin po che thams cad dang / rta dang glang po che dang / shing rta dang / skyed mos 'tshal dang / dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang / bu
114a8(dkon brtsegs): dang bu mo dang / chung ma dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba dang / gling bzhi'i rgyal po chen po'i longs spyod kyi bde ba thams cad dang / brtse ba dang / dga' ba thams cad dang / lag pa dang / 
114b1(dkon brtsegs): rkang pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / mig dang / mgo dang / sha dang khrag dang / rkang dang / rus dang / 'jig rten gyi yo byad gang yang slong ba la/ yongs su mi gtong ba med do// sbyin pa de rnam pa bcus
114b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag par sbyin par byed de/ bcu gang zhe ra/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mi 'thun pa'i longs spyod yongs su tshol zhing sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'jigs shing skrag nas sbyin pa med
114b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yongs su gtang ba la mgron du gnyer ba'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdong du lta zhing sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sems can pa dad par sbyin pa med/ 
114b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mdza' bas sbyir ba med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sdang bas sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la zhing tshol zhing skyid pa med/ 
114b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sems can thams cad la sbyir gnas mi yin zhes bsdus shing sbyin pa med de/ ri bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de rngam pa de bcus
114b6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag par sbyin par byed do// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de gzhan rnam pa bcus yongs su dag par smin par byed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la
114b7(dkon brtsegs): las kyi rnam par smin pa 'dod cing / sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bsam pa log par sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yongs su skyo ba'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub
114b8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams la nye bar bstan nas/ sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rjes su mi dga' ba'i sbyir pa med/ byang chub sems rnams la 'gyod pa'i sbyin pa med/ byang
115a1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams la tshul khrims dang ldan pa la/ bkur te sbyin pa med/ tshul khrims 'chal ba la bsnyas te sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rnam par smid pa
115a2(dkon brtsegs): la re ba'i sbyin pa med de/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de rnas pa de bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed do// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyidan pa de bzhin rnam pa bcus
115a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag par sbyin par byed de/ bcu gang zhen/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la smad nas sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gzhan du phyogs ras sbyin pa med dod gi myed ya
115a4(dkon brtsegs): dang drag do/ dgongasapal ston cing sbyin pa med/ ri mor mi byed par sbyin pa med/ rang gi la gnas ma yin par sbyin pa med/ ji tsam spa gas pa las 'bri zhing sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa'
115a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams skye ba 'dod cing sbyin pa med de/ shA ri'i bu byang chub/ sems dpa' sbyin pa de bcus yos su pang par sbyin par byed do// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de gnan
115a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa bcus yongs su dag par skyid pa byed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mi brtan par sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la tshod 'dzin cing sbyin pa med/ yongs su chad par sbyin
115a7(dkon brtsegs): pa med/ gzhan gyi dring 'jog ste sbyin pa med/ nyung zhes cung zad tsam sbyin pa med/ gzugs dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug la mngon par dga' ba'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la
115a8(dkon brtsegs): brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lhar skye ba thams cad 'dod pa'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar sngo zhing sbyin pa med/ 
115b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mkhas pas smang ba'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la thams cad mkhyen par ma bsngos pa'i sbyin pa med de/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin
115b2(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams bde bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed do// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyid pa de gzhan yang bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed de/ bcu yang zhe na/ ji tsam 'dus
115b3(dkon brtsegs): byas las nges par 'byung ba dang / 'dus ma byas thob par bya ba'i phyir/ de ltar sbyin pa byin na/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i phan yon bcu thob par 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/ bza' ba byir
115b4(dkon brtsegs): bas tshe dang spobs pa dang / bde ba dang / stobs dang / 'dog phun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob bo// btung ba byin pas nyon mongs pa dang / sreng ba thams cad bsal ba/ phur sum tshogs
115b5(dkon brtsegs): ba rab tu 'thob bo// bzhon pa byin pas bde ba thams cad kyi dngo sa po phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// bgo ba sbyin pa sa khrel yod pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / gser ltar kha
115b6(dkon brtsegs): dog yongs su dag pa/ phung sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// spos dang / phreng 'byin pas tshul khrims dang / bos pa dang / ting 'dzin gyi dri dang / byug pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu tham/ 
115b7(dkon brtsegs): drib tu zhipa pi'i spos dang / phye ma dang drug pa byin pas/ lus kyi nan tan gyi dri zhib po phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// dbyin pas ro bro ba'i nang na mchog gi ro bro ba'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan phur sum
115b8(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// gnas byin pas sems can thams cad kyi gnas dang / rten dang / gling dang / skyabs dang / dpung gnyen phung sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// rang ba la sman byin pas
116a1(dkon brtsegs): mi dgas mi 'chi/ shi ba med pa'i bde ba yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// yo byad sna tshogs byin pas/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi yo byang yongs su/ 
116a2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob ste/ sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' byang chub 'dod pas/ de ltar sbyin pa byin na/ sbyin pa'i phan yon bcu po de dag yengasu bzung bar 'gyuraro// gzhan yang sha ri'i bu byang chub sems
116a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' ban yon gzhan bcu rab tu 'thob bo// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mar me byin pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan lnga yongasu dag pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// sil spyan byin pas/ lha'i rna ba yongasu dag pa
116a4(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// gser dang nor bu dang / mu tig ta 8/ bai DUR+Ya dang / drung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / rin po che thams cang byin pas/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongasu rdzogs
116a5(dkon brtsegs): pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// rin po che tha dad pa sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs byin pas/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu yodasu rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab 'thob po// rta dang glang po che dang / 
116a6(dkon brtsegs): shing rta byin pas/ rgyas pa dang / yangs pa dang / che ba phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// bskyed mos tshal dang / ga'athub kyi nags chal byin pas/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / snyoms par
116a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa yongasu rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// nor dang 'bru dang / mdzod dang bang ba byin pas/ chos rin po che thams cad kyi mdzod yongasu rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob po// bran po dang / bran mo dag
