183a5(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed pa dang / dag pa'i gshes gnyen la mi bsten pa dang / go ma bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du'ang myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o// sha ri
183a6(dkon brtsegs): bu 'di lta ste/ khyi ltogs pa keng rus sha med pa khrag gis 'babs pa blangs na/ de srang gi sgon gnas te/ kha chus gos pa de 'chang ba las danas/ rgyal rigs shing sa la chen por lta bu dang / bram ze shing sA la
183a7(dkon brtsegs): chen po lta bu dang / khyim bdag shing sa la chen po lta bu khyi ltogs pa de log su 'ong ba/ khyi des rgyang ma nas 'ong ba mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ni bdag gi kha zas ro zhim po 'di 'phrog pa zhig go snyam nas/ 
183a8(dkon brtsegs): de shin tu thugs shing mi gatshugs lta la drang bsnyer te/ skad cher zugs na/ shA ri'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu dedakeng rus sha med pa khrag gis 'babs de 'dod pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
183b1(dkon brtsegs): de ma lag so// bde bar gshegs pa de ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyi de ci'i phyir shin tu zugs shing mig tshug su lha la drang bsnyer te/ skad cher zugs/ gsol pa/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ 
183b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi zas ro zhim po 'di 'phrog pa zhig go sA ma ste/ shin tu zugs shing mig tshug su lha la drang bsnyer te/ skad cher gzug so// bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu de bzhin du/ gang khyir gyi ser sna la brtson pa bshang ba dang / 
183b3(dkon brtsegs): ci bas kun tu bskor ba la chags pa'i dge slong dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta bu'i ngal ba phur sum tshogs pa rnyed nas/ nges chud zos par byed pa de dag ni/ ngas khyi dang 'dra'o zhes brjod de/ de dag 'ba' zhig gis
183b4(dkon brtsegs): phyir de bzhin gshegs pa 'di lta bu'i brjod pa'i gnas byed pa ma yin gyi/ yang sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ngag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir/ 
183b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi ye shes tshol ba de dag ni bdag gis sha yang yod su gtong na/ gzhan gyi khyim la rtog cing bsnyen pa'i phyir/ phrag dog dang ser sna byed par mi 'gyur ba lta ci smos// 
183b6(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkor mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs ste/ da phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu bzhi pa/ yang sha ri'i bu skyes bu gti mug pa de dag ni/ 'tshe ba'i phyir zang zing dang bran dang / 'jig rten gyi
183b7(dkon brtsegs): zang zing lhur byed cing / zas dang srog la lhar byed pa stog cing bsnyen pa'i phyir/ gzhan gyi khyim la phrag dog dang / ser sna skyed par 'gyur te/ sha ri'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i dge slong na/ phrag dog dang ser sna skyed de/ 
183b8(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni sngan chang 'dir shes na phyi ma 'di ga las 'ongs pa zhig/ 'di ni sngon bdag dang 'thams pa yin na/ phyi ma 'di ga las 'ongs pa zhig ces zer zhing gal te/ de'i khyim bdag de dag gis lhung bzed dang / chos
184a1(dkon brtsegs): gos dang / bsod snyoms dam bcas par gyur pa dang / mal stan dang na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad khas blangs par gyur pa rnams sngon bdag dang dam bcas par gyur mod kyi/ phyis 'ongs
184a2(dkon brtsegs): ras sbyin par mi 'gyur grangs snyam nas// de de la nyes pa gsum skyed de/ gsum gang zhe na/ gnas la nyes pa skyed de/ gnas de nas 'gro'o// snyam sems pa dang / shes par bya ba ma yin par shes shing / shes par bya ba
184a3(dkon brtsegs): mi shes la/ gang chung zad sten pa yang mi brtan pa dang / de khyim pa las nyes pa skyed pa ste/ dge slong de gnas gsum brjod par byed do// gsum gang zhe na/ gnas kyi nyes pa brjod pa dang / nyams pa mi dga' brjod cing / 
184a4(dkon brtsegs): khyim gtong bar byed ba dang / mi bde ba'i gangam ze zhing / skyes bungs pa ma yin pa 'di dag g.yo byed do// zhes yang ston pa'i sbyor bas/ ngabaca' bar bya ba'i chos yang dag par rab tu ston pa ste/ shA ri'i bu
184a5(dkon brtsegs): de ltar na khyim la ser sna byed pa/ chos dkar po yongasu nyams par 'gyu/ ra ba'o// yang sha ri'i bu khyim la ser sna byed pa la gnas pa/ skye/ sa budam pa ma yin pa de dag gis/ sdom pa dang sdom pa la gnas
184a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yongasu btang bar 'gyur te/ sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjesu slob par mi 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu de bas na/ rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar shes par bya
184a7(dkon brtsegs): ste/ shA ri'i bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa yangs pa/ tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur pa/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo
184a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston
184b1(dkon brtsegs): pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de lo bya ba phrag dgu bcu'i bar du bzhugs so// de'i nyan thos kyang bye ba khrag khrig brag dgu bcu'i nyan thos rnams kyis nyan thos 'dus pa chen po byung ste/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa
184b2(dkon brtsegs): zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa dbang dang ldan par gyur pa nas/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyis dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag gi bar du'o// yang de'i tshe khyim bdag rab tu rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba phyug cing nor che la
184b3(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod che zhing / longs spyod mang ba/ bdag dbang ba mang ba/ nor dang yo byad mang po dang ldan zhing / 'gron bu dang gser dang nor bu dang mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byur ru dang dngul dang / sa le sbram mang
184b4(dkon brtsegs): po dang ldan pa/ bran po dang dran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'a/ ba mang zhing / glang po che dang / rnga dang ra lug mang gnor dang / 'bru dang mdzod dang / bang bamang po dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ de'i khye'u de gzugs
184b5(dkon brtsegs): bzang ba mdzes pa/ lta na sdug pa kha dog bzang po rgyas pa'i mchog dang / ldan pa/ sdom pa zhes bya ba dang / sdom pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i sa byung ste/ de gnyis dus gzhan zhig na// khang thog tu dong bar gyur
184b6(dkon brtsegs): to/ sha ri'i bu de ras bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags te snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ chos gos dang / sham thabs bsdams lhung bzed bsnam
184b7(dkon brtsegs): dedage slong gi dge 'dun gyis bskor cing / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du bdar nas/ bsod snyoms kyir grong khyer der gshegs pa dang / mdzes pa dang / dga' bar 'gyur ba dbang po zhi ba/ yid zhi ba/ mchog tu dul
184b8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang zhi gnas kyi mchog thob pa/ shin tu dul zhing ni gnas thob pa/ dbang po thul cing sbas pa/ glang po ltar rab tu dul ba/ mtsho ltar dang zhing sgog pa med la gsal ba/ gser gyi mchod sdong lta bu/ sa le sbram/ 
185a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi ri lta bu/ rin po ches yongasu gang ba'i mtsho lta bu/ lhas kun nas bskor ba'i brgya byin lta bu/ yid rab tu zhi ba'i tshangs pa lta bu yi// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
185a2(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par 'bags mdzes shing dga' bar 'gyur ba de rgyang ma nas byon pa/ khye'u de gnyis kyis mthong ngo // sha ri'i bu de na gang sdom pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gzhon nu des/ 
185a3(dkon brtsegs): dang po nyid du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags sngar mthong nas/ des nu bo de la smras pa/ sems can gyi rgyal po 'di lta bur mdzes pa/ 
185a4(dkon brtsegs): nu bo khyod kyis sngon nam yang res 'ga' mthong ngam/ nges bu bo la/ phu bo sems can gyi rgyal po mdzes pa 'di lta bu bdag gis sngon lan 'ga' yang ma mthong ngo zhes de skad smras pa dang / des nu bo nga ni 'di
185a5(dkon brtsegs): dang 'dra ba nyid du 'gyur bar bya'o zhes de dag smras so// sha ri 'i bu de na/ sa khye'u sdom pa la gnas pas/ khye'u sdom pa la tshig su bcad/ pa 'di dag smras// sdom pa ji ltar mthong ba bzhin// de 'dra bar ni ngag
185a6(dkon brtsegs): bsgyur te// bdag ni de bas mang ba yi// dge slong dge 'dun bsdu bar bya// byang chub kyi ni lam gyi phyir// zas dang skom ni mi bza'o// sdom pa 'di ni rgyal ba ste// bdag ni khyim 'dir dga' ba med// sems can kun gyi mchog 'di
185a7(dkon brtsegs): ni dzang skar mang dbus na zla ba bzhin// mthong nas dad par su mi 'gyur// khyim nas mi 'byung su zhig yod// sha ri'i bu de nas khye'u sdom pas// khye'u sdom pa la gnas pa la slar tshig su bcad pa 'di smra so// tshig du byas
185a8(dkon brtsegs): pas mi 'gyur gyis// sgra bo che ni ma 'byin cig/ nga ni tshig tu mi smra ste// 'tshang rgya gang myur shes par bya// sha ri'i bu de nas khye'u sdom pa la gnas pas// khye'u sdom pa la slar tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bdag
185b1(dkon brtsegs): nyid ser sna sems pa dang // zhum pa dag gis lam min te// mi mchog sangs rgyas 'gyur ro zhes// bzang po'i sgra ni bdag gis bsgrags// bdag nor shes par mi 'gyur ba// ser sna can gyi rtags yin no// bdag ni
185b2(dkon brtsegs): mi smra mi bya ste// bdag gtong nor lta ga la zhig/ khyim 'di dag ni khyod kyi'o// nga ni byang chub lam phyir ze khyim dang nor ni khyod kyi ste// bdag ni sangs rgyas dga' ba'o// sum cu rtsa gnyis mchog gi mtshan// 'di 'dra ba
185b3(dkon brtsegs): ngag mthong gyur na// lta ba nyams pa ma gtogs par// byang chub mchog ni su mi tshol// khyim bdag dang ni nor rnams dang // pha dang ma dang gnyen pa rnams// bdag gis de dag kun spangs te// sangs rgyas drung du
185b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bar bya// 'jig rten mgon po 'ong mdzad pa'i// 'jig rten snang mdzad rab tu dkon// bskal pa bye ba stong du yang // de ni thos par shin tu dkon/ 
185b5(dkon brtsegs): na mkha' dag pa'i zla ba ni// sa la lam mer 'dug pa ltar// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor zhugs nas// dge slong dge 'dun mdun du byas// 'od zer stong pa'i 'o ma ni// bar snang gnas la lhang nge ba/ 
185b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin sangs rgyas sras dbus na// kun nas rab tu mdzes par snang // ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni// rin chen bdag nyid mdzes par snang // de bzhin sangs rgyas mdzes pa yang // dge slong dge 'dun mdun du byas// sku'i
185b7(dkon brtsegs): gzi brjid 'bar ba ni// 'gro ba 'di dag rnams la snang // gzi brjid phung po'i gzugs can te// rkang gnyis dam pade mdzes so// lha dang klu dang mi rnams ni// rdzu 'phrul dag gis rab sdud cing // rgyal po'i pho brang 'kho
185b8(dkon brtsegs): zhugs nas// cho 'phrul dag ni rnam par ston// sum cu rtsa gnyis bsod nams dam mchog mtshan// chos kyi bdag po 'di 'dra mthong nas// byis pa ma bslabs pa dag ma gtogs par// theg pa dman la su zhig 'jug
186a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// shin tu dkon pa rab tu mdzes byung ba// mi mchog 'di ni bdag gis mthong bsan// byang chub phyir ni mngon par zhugs gyur nas// bde bar gshegs pa'i drung du nye bar// 
186a2(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu de nas khye'u sdom pas// khye'u sdom pa la gnas la tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smraso// bdag ni le lo'i lam ngag nas// sangs rgyas drung du mi 'gro ste// khang tog 'di nas phyi rol du// bdag gi lus ni mchod par
186a3(dkon brtsegs): bya rabadag tu 'du shes bsal gyur nas// srog la blta bar mi bya ste// ye shes mchog ni yongs btsal zhing // sangs rgyas drung du 'gro bar bya// pha la chags dang ma la chags// khyim la chags pa mi bzad pa// de
186a4(dkon brtsegs): ngag thams cad rnam spangs nas// sangs rgyas drung du 'gro bar bya// 'di 'drar 'gyur ba gang 'dod pa// de ni sangs rgyas dga' ba yin// rin po che ni kur spangs nas// khyim med par ni rab tu 'byung // de ltar
186a5(dkon brtsegs): sha ri'i bu khye'u sdom pa la gnas pa ni// khyim gyi skas las pa bas te// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco ma pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags
186a6(dkon brtsegs): ga la ba der song ngo // yang sha ri'i bu khye'u sdom pa ni/ kha thog de nas mchongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags ga la ba der shin tu myur du song ngo // khye'u sdom pa la gnas pa ni
186a7(dkon brtsegs): phyi nas song ngo // sha ri'i bu de nas khye'u sdom pas/ bcom ldan 'das de la/ na bza' srang bye ba ri ba phul te// de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// bdag ni gzugs rnams tshol ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas
186a8(dkon brtsegs): na bza 'bul ma lags// me mchog dag ci 'dra ba// de 'dra bar ni 'gyur bar bgyi// ye shes phung po dang ldan pa dang / brtson 'grus stobs la rab gnas shing / sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mngara' ba// rkang gnyis
186b1(dkon brtsegs): dam par gyur par shog/ stobs bcu rnams dang ldan gyur cing // mi 'jigs pa la rab gnas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa ci 'dra bar// de 'dra bar ni gyur par shog/ khyod kyis chos gang mkhyen pa dang // gang la bzhugs
186b2(dkon brtsegs): par lha de ga/ byang chub dam par sangs rgyas nas// bdag ni chos de ston par shog/ bdag ni gzugs rnams mngon par tshol ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas na bza' mchog 'bul ma lags kyis// lhar bcas 'jig rten
186b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams la phan pa'i phyir// byang chub mchog gi zhi ba mngon par tshol// gnyisu med nga'i chos mchog der gnas shing // pha rol rgol ba kun gyis mi g.yos pa// chos de nyid ni mngon par 'tshal ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas
186b4(dkon brtsegs): la ni na bza' mchog 'bul lo// lhar bcas 'jig rten dag la sman pa'i phyir// gang na skye rgan 'chi ma mchis shing // mya ngan dang ni smre sngags ma mchis pa// zhi ba'i chos de bdag ni ston par shog/ gang
186b5(dkon brtsegs): na 'dod chags sdang ma mchis shing // gti mug ma mchis sred pa ma mchis pa// bsil dngos bdud rtsi 'dus ma bgyis pade/ bdag ni byang chub sangs rgyas ston par shog/ gang la khyod bzhu
186b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can lha klu dang // de bzhin mi dang sems med dngos po dang / de ltar sems dang ldan pa rab 'dud pa// bdag ni zhi ba'i chos de ston par shog/ gang gnas sangs rgyas zhing du snang ba dang // phyogs bzhi dag na kun
186b7(dkon brtsegs): tu snang ba/ mur pa chen por 'od zer phung lta ba'i// bsil dngos bdud rtsi'i de la reg par shog/ 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams dag dang // de bzhin gzugs med khams la rtag gnas// dga' dang
186b8(dkon brtsegs): mi dga' thams cad rab dben pa'i// chos kyi dam pa de ni bdag ston shog/ shA ri'i bu de nas khye'u sdom pa la gnas pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
187a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags de la shing lham thar bzung gcig phul lo// yul nas kyang tshig su bcad ba 'di dag gsol to// sems can rnams kyi gnas rten dang / dpung gnyen 'gon du
187a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur par shog/ ngan pa'i lam du mi 'chi zhing // rtag tu lam rnams sten par shog/ byis pa rnams kyi spyod yul 'di// 'dod pa nam yang sten ma 'gyur// 'dus byas ngag kyang rnam spangs nas// rtag tu sangs rgyas 'byung
187a3(dkon brtsegs): snyed gyur// 'jig rten snang mdzad mthong nas kyang // skad gnyis dam pa mchod par gyur// srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir// me tog phreng ba spos rnams dang // rgyal mtshan dag dang gdugs rnams kyis// glang po chen
187a4(dkon brtsegs): po bkur bsti bgyi// srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir// chos gos ngag dang bsod snyoms dang // mal stan rnams dang gding ba yi// sangs rgyas rnams la mchod par bgyi// srog chags kun la
187a5(dkon brtsegs): phan pa'i phyir// rnga dang dung dang rnga chen dang // sil snyan ngag dang pi wang gis// 'jig rten snang mdzad mchod par shog/ bza' ba na bca' ba dang // dus kyis me phye bza' ba rnams// de dag gis
187a6(dkon brtsegs): ni 'jig rten mgon// skyob pa bdag gis mchod par bgyi// srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir// mchod par rgya chen bgyis gyur nas// de nyid du ni rab byung ste/ tshangs par spyod pa bdag gis sbyang // srog chags kun
187a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi mgon du bdag gyur cig/ bdag ni lam gol nam yang 'gro ma 'gyur// yan lag brgyad ldan lam mchog rab gnas nas// bdag gis srog chags bye ba de nyid dgrol// dman pa 'phags min mchog du smad
187a8(dkon brtsegs): ba yi// 'dod la bdag ni nam yang sten ma gyur// bag med thams cad yongasu spangs gyur nas// bdag ni rtag tu bag yod gyur par shog/ mi khom brgya lam nam yang skye ma 'gyur// rtag tu dang pa'i rigasu skyes gyur/ 
187b1(dkon brtsegs): cig skyes par gyur nas mi mchog rnams mthong la// mngon nas de la bdag ni ngang par shog/ 'di 'bri'i ye shes de ni btsal ba'i phyir// ngang ba'i sems kyis me tog phreng ba dang // byug pa dag dang rdza rnga chen dang / rnga
187b2(dkon brtsegs): dang gling bu dag gis ri mor bgyi// bskal pa bye mang rnam pa sna tshogs kyi// mchod pa chen po dag ni bgyis gyur na// myur du 'dong pa spangs te rab byung la// tshangs par spyad pa bdag ni spyod par shog/ de dag phyogs
187b3(dkon brtsegs): gang du 'dug ste bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po de la tshig su bcad pa'i klu dbyangs kyis bstod pa'i sa phyogs der
187b4(dkon brtsegs): tsan dan dmar po las byas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug la ga khang // rgyar dpag tshad bzhi/ 'phang du dpag tshad phyed pa byas te// de dag gis gtsug lag khang de byas nas/ de bzhin ga
187b5(dkon brtsegs): pa la phu lo// phul nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po la tshig su bcad pa 'ding ga gsol to// gnas pa gang la khyod ni zhugs gyur pas
187b6(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi rgyal bas bzhi po gang bsngags pa/ gnas pa de ni brtsal bar bgyi ba'i phyir// gtsug lag khang 'di bde bar gshegs la 'bul// gnas pa dag ni gang la zhugs na// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar
187b7(dkon brtsegs): byung ba yi// sems ni srog chags bye bas mi 'tshal ba'i// spyod pa de ni bdag gis btsal bar bgyi// spyod pa gang dag pha rol son pa ni// yang dag spong dang de bzhin rdzu 'phrul rkang // mchog bzhi rnams kyi so so yang
187b8(dkon brtsegs): ngag rig/ spyod pa de dag bdag gis btsal bar bgyi// de dag gis gtsug lag de nyid du// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po de dang // dge slong gi dge 'dun bcas pa la zla ba phyed kyi
188a1(dkon brtsegs): bar du sti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod bar byed de/ de dag gi gtsug lag khang der de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bcas pa la// ste stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ 
188a2(dkon brtsegs): ri mor byas/ mchod par byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid kyi drung du/ skra dang kha spu bregs nas/ gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas// dge ba'i chos tshol ba la brtson par gyur
188a3(dkon brtsegs): te/ dge ba'i chos tshol ba la yid brtson par gyur to// de na gcig gis smras pa// 'jig rten mgon po 'od byed par// bdag ni dang po sngar gyur cig/ gcig shogs kyis smras pa// ded dpon mi'i gtse bar yang // bdag
188a4(dkon brtsegs): ni dang po sngar gyur cig/ de na sha ri'i bu gang sdom pa zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de// bcom ldan 'das dpa ni ngan gshegs par ngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po nga'i spyan sngar
188a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dug nas yid dam bcas// stan ngag la'ang ring dug cing // bdag ni mal du mi nyal lo// srog chags rnams kyi don 'tshal gyi 8// bdag gis byang chub lam btsal lo// bdag nyid kyi yang
188a6(dkon brtsegs): lus dang ni// srog kyang yongasu spang bgyis te// le lo dag ni kun spangs nas// byang chub dam pa btsal bar bgyi// sha rnams dang ni de bzhin khrag rnams dang // pags pa dang ni rgyus skams srog bor te// le lo tham
188a7(dkon brtsegs): cad yongasu spangs bgyis nas// byang chub mchog phyir brtson 'grus brtsam par bgyi// sha ri'i bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdom pa la gnas pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
188a8(dkon brtsegs): chen po sdom pa la tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras// bdag cag gnyis ni 'dus gyur nas// srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir// byang chung spyod pa rnams spyad cing // brtson 'grus dam pa brtsam par bya// lus rnams
188b1(dkon brtsegs): dang ni de bzhin sreg bor te// sha dang khrag ri rtag tu skams gyur kyang // sring pa stong du khyod kyi rjes slob cing // byang chub mchog phyir brtson 'grus brtsam par bya// gang du chos kyi bdag po bzhugs mdzes pa// ye shes
188b2(dkon brtsegs): dam pa yongasu btsal bya zhing // dgon pa'i gnas kyi ri dang chu drung du// the tsom med par brtson 'grus brtsams par bya// sha ri'i bu ngan byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa dang / sdom pa la gnas pas/ lo stong du lan 'ga' yang
188b3(dkon brtsegs): tha na sa gol gtogs pa srid yang // rmags pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur to// lo stong du lan 'ga' yang nyal lo snyam du nyal ba'i sems ma bskrad do// lo stong du lan 'ga' yang 'dag go snyam du stan 'dod par ma gyur
188b4(dkon brtsegs): to// de gnyis bshang ba dang gci ba'i tshe ma gtogs par/ lo stong du ba na lan 'ga' yang rtsog rtsog por ma 'dug go// nam kha zas za ba na yang 'greng bzhin du khams gsum gsum tsam za zhing chu bor gang tsam
188b5(dkon brtsegs): 'thung ngo // de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang kha zas 'dod pa'am bkres na myur du kha zas rnyed par dka' ba ma bskyed do// de gnyis kyi lo stong du lan 'ga' yang / kha zas de las lhag par
188b6(dkon brtsegs): ma zos so// de gnyis kyis lo stong du kha zas za ba na/ lan 'ga' yang kha zas la mngar ba dang / sbyar ba dang / bro ba dang / tsha ba dang / kha ba dang / bskor bar tha na sems bskyed pa gcig tsam yang 'du shes ma bskyed do// 
188b7(dkon brtsegs): de gnyis kyis lo stong du bsod snyoms sgrub pa la nged la bsod snyoms sbyin pa 'di// bud med dam/ skyes pa 'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo su zhig ces lan 'ga' yang gdong du ma blta so// de gnyis kyis lo stong du shing gi drung
188b8(dkon brtsegs): na gnas pa shing de la byed du lar 'ga' yang ma bltas so// de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang chos gos gnyi su ma brje so// de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang tha na sems bskyed pa gcig kyang 'dod
189a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rnam par rtog pa ma brtags// gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa ma brtags 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa ma brtag so// de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang tha na/ sems bskyed pa gcig kyang
189a2(dkon brtsegs): zla ba la song ba 'am/ nyi ma la song ba 'am/ pa la song ba 'am/ ma la song ba'am/ spud la song ba 'am/ sring mo la song ba 'am/ nye du la song ba'i rnam par rtog pa ma bskyed do// de gnyis lo stong 'das kyi bar du lan 'ga' yang tha
189a3(dkon brtsegs): na/ sems bskyed pa gcig kyang khyim la gnas pa'i rnam par rtog pa ma gtogs so// de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang / zla ba'am/ rim 'am/ skar mi'i gzugs sam// bar sdang la gyen du ma blta so// de gnyis
189a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis lo stong du la na 'ga' yang rtsig pa'am// shing lam bsnyes so// de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang / mar ram/ 'bru mar gyis lus ma bsku so// de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang
189a5(dkon brtsegs): tha na/ sems bskyed pa gcig kyang mar dang ldan pa'i sems ma bskyed do// de gnyis kyis lan 'ga' yang tha na sems bskye nga pa gcig kyang lus la skyob ma bskyed do// de gnyis kyis lo stong du/ 
189a6(dkon brtsegs): lan 'ga' yang tha na/ sems bskyed pa gcig kyang // bdag cag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus shes lus ngal ba ma bskyed do// de gnyis lo stong du lan
189a7(dkon brtsegs): 'ga' yang lus na pa 'am// sems na par ma gyur to// de dag gis lo stong 'das kyi bar du nam yang skra bregs par sems ma bskyed de// gzhan du na rgyal po bzhi 'ongs nas mgo la byugs te/ skra khyer nas phyir 'dong ngo // 
189a8(dkon brtsegs): de dag skra khyer nas mchod rten 'dzugs so// de dag gis lo stong gi bar du rgyal po chen po de dag 'ongs pa dang / song ba la nam yang 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba'i sems ma bskyed do// de gnyis kyis lo stong du grib ma bab na/ 
189b1(dkon brtsegs): nyi ma dang nyis pas po bar grib ma'i sems pa bskyed do// de gnyis kyis lo stong du grang ba'i dus na yang / lan 'ga' yang lus la g.yog pa'i dus shes ma bskyed do// de gnyis kyis lo stong du lar 'gar yang 'jig rten
189b2(dkon brtsegs): gi tshig ma smra so// yang sha ri'i bu de'i dus na/ dran ba rmongs byed ces bya ba'i bdud cig byung ste// 'di lta ste dper ma/ da ltar gyi nga'i bdud sdig can bzhin no// sha ri'i bu bdud drad pa rmongs byed kyis byang chub sems dpa' sngob
189b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'chag sar ral gri so bsdams pa byas par gyur pa dang nges ral gri'i se nga la/ ral gri'i so 'du shes bskyed nas/ nges bdag ni bag ni bag med pa la gan so// bdag ni ngag med pa la gnas so// zhes sgra byung ba dang / 
189b4(dkon brtsegs): sgra nges stong gsum gyi stong cher po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpyang sa kyis go bar gyur to// de ltar sha ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar byas pa dang / de ras steng
189b5(dkon brtsegs): gi bar snang las bdud kyi ris kyis lnga bye ba phrab stong gis/ ma'o byang chub sems dpa' shi 'phos su ma gyur to// shi 'pho sum gyur to zhes sgra phyung ngo // sha ri'i
189b6(dkon brtsegs): bu de ras byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa de ltar chags pas sems bskyed pa de'i rjes su zhugs te// yang sha ri'i bu lha dang bcas pas sgra gnyis pa phyung ba de byang chub sems dpa' sdom pas ma thos so// 
189b7(dkon brtsegs): gang lha'i sgra dang / gang sdom pa'i sgra de gnyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa la gnas pas ma thos te// shA ri'i bu skyes bu dam pa de gnyis spyod lam de lta dang / spyad pa de lta bu dang nan tan de lta bu dang / 
189b8(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen po nga lta bu dang / rtul ba de lta bu dang ldan par gyur te/ de gnyis kyis lo stong du sangs rgyas rje su dran pa bsgoms so// gang gi bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal ba de
190a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / de ras lnga zhig 'ongs nas rigs kyi bu dab de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngana'ang so zhes sbyar te// de gnyis kyis yongasu mya ngan las 'das so zhes
190a2(dkon brtsegs): thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i khri gang na yod pa der song ste// 'greng bzhin du thal mo sbyar nas/ nyi ma bdun gyi bar du mig gi 'dzums par lta ste/ byams pa dang ldan zhing 'gran zla med par gus pas rjes dran par byas
190a3(dkon brtsegs): te/ de dag gis brtson 'grus ma btang bas/ 'geng bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byaso// de dag de nas shi 'phos nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes so// de gnyis tshangs par gyur nas slar log ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag
190a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i mchod rten byas nas/ lo ba ni khri bar du/ mchod rten gyi yo byad kyi las so// de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi gdugs bzugs zir
190a5(dkon brtsegs): par shes nas// lo bdun khri'i bar du 'greng bzhin du thal mo sbyar to// gnas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de la phyag/ byed do// de dag tshe'i mthar phyin te// shi 'phos nas yang 'dzam
190a6(dkon brtsegs): bu'i gling nyid du skye te// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigasu ma'i mngal du tshe mar skyeso// de gnyis skyes ma thag du gcig gis gcig dran nas/ bdag cag bag yod pa la gnas par bya'o// bdag cag bag yod pa'i mchog
190a7(dkon brtsegs): bsgom par bya'o zhes smras nas/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smra so// 'byor dang shing rtag tu lo legs pa'i// yang 'od rgyal po'i rigasu bdag cag skyes// bag med rgyags pa rab tu spangs bya ste// byang chub dam pa rab tu
190a8(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub par bya// 'dod dang longs spyod de bzhin rgyal po'i srid// yid brtan mi rung ring por mi thogs te// byang chub dam pa yongasu tshol ba na// mkhas pa de la 'dod pa mi skyed do// srog chags pan phyir byang chub
190b1(dkon brtsegs): gang bzhugs pa/ 'dod dang longs spyod la ni 'dod mi skyed/ myur du 'dod pa spangs shing rab byung nas/ tshangs par spyod pa dam pa mchog spyad de// sngon 'das dus ni shin tu rgyas pa nas// lnga rdzas dag dang mi yi bzang
190b2(dkon brtsegs): po dang // 'dod pa'i yod tan lnga dag brten gyur kyang // de la nam yang ngoms pa ma rnyed do// de phyir rgyal srid rgyas dang gnyen tshogs dang // 'dod pa'i yon tan 'di dag spang byas te// lus skyes nas ni myur du rab byung
190b3(dkon brtsegs): la byang chub phyir ni brtson 'grus tsam par bya// de gnyis skyes nas lo bcu drug lon pa dang 'dra bar gyur nas/ skra dang khas spu bregs te/ gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ ngang pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung
190b4(dkon brtsegs): ste lo nyi khri'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa spyang ngo // de nas shi 'phos nas// slar yang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes so// tshangs pa nga'i 'jig rten nas/ shi 'phos nas slar yang 'dzam bu'i gling du
190b5(dkon brtsegs): skyes so// yang sha ri'i bu de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs padagra com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri mchog ces bya ba/ rig pa dang nab su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig
190b6(dkon brtsegs): rted mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha ler sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de de gnyis kyis mnyes par bya ste// de gnyis
190b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa de'i drung du skra dang / kha spu bregs nas/ gos ngur smrig bgos te// dang pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung // de gnyis rab tu byung nas/ lo bye ba tshang bar tshangs par spyod pa spyang ngo do// sha ri'i
190b8(dkon brtsegs): burnam grangs des/ sangs rgyas khri mnyes par byas ste// byang chub sems dpa' sngor bas thams cad du tshangs par spyod pa spyang ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa la gnas pas ni nga bzhin gshegs pa
191a1(dkon brtsegs): gcig gi drung na/ tshangs par spyod pa spyad do// de la sha ri'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa zhes bya ba de sngar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
191a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brtson 'grus 'bar ba zhes bya ba/ rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba kha
191a3(dkon brtsegs): lor sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ de la lo bye ba phrag dgu bcu'i bar du gan so// de'i nyan thos kyang bye ba phrag dgu bcu'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen
191a4(dkon brtsegs): po byung ngo // sha ri'i bu de la gang byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa la gan sa shes bya ba de ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ba rtson 'grus 'bar ba byang chub thob pa/ de'i 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal
191a5(dkon brtsegs): bor gyur te/ des de bzhin gshegs pa de dang / dge slong gi dge ra dun du bcas pa la zla ba gsum gyi bar phun bza' dang / zas nga snyoms dang / mal stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad
191a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis sti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mer byas/ mchod pa bya'o// de nas sha ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brtson 'grus 'bar ba des/ rgyal
191a7(dkon brtsegs): bo 'ong bar mkhyen nas/ rgyal po la bskul ba'i phyir// de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsung so// sangs rgyas chos rnams 'thob pa la// brtson 'grus dam pa mchog yin ste// 'dod la brkam pa'i sems can rnams// se
191a8(dkon brtsegs): can don byed shin tu dkon// 'dod la brkam pa'i don rnams gang // de ni mkhas pa'i don ma yin// khyod ni don med gnas pa ste/ mchog gi don ni tshol ma yin/ nga nyid dang ni khyod nyidu// sngon ni spun du gyur pa ste/ rdzogs
191b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas myur grub ces// de na bdag cag dam bcas so// ngas ni byang chub thob gyur te// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor bar ltos// khyod ni khyim dang chung ma dag/ rtag tu srung zhing gnas pa dag/ mkhas pa rnams ni 'di la
191b2(dkon brtsegs): yid mi ston// 'dod pa 'di dag ngan ces rgyal bas gsungs// skye bo dag ni bag med don spyod de// de phyir don min rtag tu rnam par spangs// blo gros ngan pa don med khur khyer te// khyed ni don med pa la rab tu gnas// 'pha
191b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dag gis 'byung ba rab tu bsngags// 'dod yon sdug bsngal 'thob byeng mi sheso// bcom ldan 'das de'i tshig su bcad pa de dag gis de bskul pa dang / de bu la ma bltas// chung ma la yang ma bltas/ tshong dpon dang / glon po
191b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / pha dang ma dang / mkhar gyi rgyal po dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang rgyal srid thams cad la yang ma bltas// nor gyi phung po thams ca nga la yang ma chags par stan las langs te// bcom ldan 'das
191b5(dkon brtsegs): de'i spyan sngar 'dug nas/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smraso// sa ngas rgyas kyi ni byang chub phyir// bdag gi sha yang skams par bgyi// khyim kun kyang ni spang bar bgyi// dgon par mchis nas
191b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gum par bgyi// srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir// khyim med par ni rab byung nas// dgon pa rab dgon ste gyid cing // phyir yang brtson 'grus brtsam par bgyi// byis pa smra ba sdig pa yi// 'dod pa phyir yang mi
191b7(dkon brtsegs): stan te// nga la gnas par gyur pas na// bdag ni rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur// 'dod dang longs spyod rgyal srid dang // thams cad rnam par spangs gyur te// 'jig rten mgon gyi bstan pa la// de nyid bdag ni rab tu
191b8(dkon brtsegs): 'byung // byang chub phyir ni spyang pa spyod byed na// mkhas pa su zhig 'dus byas yid ston byed// gang du bdag gis 'dod la zhugs gyur pas// brtson 'grus brtsam kyang byang chub reg ma gyur// de bas 'dod pa'i
192a1(dkon brtsegs): yon tan bdag spangs te// longs spyod de dang rgyal srid bde spangs nas// rgyal ba'i bstan la che du rab byung la// byang chub mchog brtsor 'grus brtsam par bgyi// nges tshig su bcad pa de dag smras
192a2(dkon brtsegs): nas la bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi drung du/ sgra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ ngang pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo // rgyal po mngon par byung zhing // rab tu byung bar shes nas/ srog chags bye ba
192a3(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drag bcu dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das yongs mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel la mchod pa byas nas/ de nas shi 'phos ma thag tu/ dga' ldan ris
192a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi lha'i rgyal por skyes so// de dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas bskal pa de nyid la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de bzhin gshegs
192a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas legs skye/ de ces bya bar 'jig rten du byung ste// rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa na/ sa// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shes bya ba'i bar du ste/ de lo bye ba
192a6(dkon brtsegs): tshang par gan so// de'i nyan pos kyang bye ba khrag khrig tshang ba'i nyan thos chen po 'dus par gyur te/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zang ba nas/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag gi
192a7(dkon brtsegs): bar du'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgya phrag stong yang / bla na med pa yang dge bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i bar du bko // chos bstan nas/ sems can tshad med grangs
192a8(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i don byas te// yongasu mya ngan las 'ad so// de yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos ni bskal pa las lhag par gnas par gyur to// de'i ring bsrel yang rgyas par gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nga da yongasu
192b1(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das nas/ ring srel rgyas par 'gyur ba bzhin no// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa la gnas pa'i rjesu byang chub sems dpa bslab cing / brtson 'grus ma nyams par brtson 'grus kyi
192b2(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin pa sbyang ba'i bya'i// sems can keng rus la gnas pa dang / ser sna la gnas pa dag gi rje su slab par mi bya'o// sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang la la byang chub 'dod la/ gzhan gyi khyim la
192b3(dkon brtsegs): sar sna skad na/ de'i tshe nga la 'jigs pa gsum 'byung bar shes par bya'o// gsum gang zhe na/ gzhan gyi khyim dag tu kha zas kyi phyir smra/ kun tu smras pa'i phyir/ 'phags pa'i dge slong gzhan mthong na/ phrag dog dang / ser sna skyed cing / 
192b4(dkon brtsegs): khong khro ba'i sems gcig tsam gyis kyang mi 'thun par byed ma nges sems can dmyal ba'i lam yongasu bzung bar 'gyur// dmus longs gi sa bon btab par 'gyur/ mtha' 'khob tu skye ba'i gnas yongasu bzung
192b5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro// sha ri'i bu gang la las 'phags pa'i dge slong mtho ngan/ khro ba'i zil gyis non te/ khros pa'i sems kyis mi smra zhi ga/ ser sna skyed do// khong khro ba'i sems gcig tsam kyang mi 'thun par byed
192b6(dkon brtsegs): nanges sems can dmyal ba'i lam yongs su bzung bar 'gyur// dmus long gi sa bon btab par 'gyur// mir skye na yang / mtha' 'khob kyi mi'i yul phyogasu skye ba'i gnas yongasu bzung bar 'gyur/ khong khro mang bar
192b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ dmus long bar 'gyur/ gzhan gyi dring 'jog cing bskur ba mang bar 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi khyim phrag dog dang ser sna skye ba de'i tshe de dag 'jigs pa 'di gsum yid la bya'o// 
192b8(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la/ de ltar rnyed pa legs par rnyed/ de bzhin
193a1(dkon brtsegs): / gshegs pas khyim gyi ser sna las byung ba 'di lta bur bshad pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'am thos rnams la yang khyir gyi ser sna las byung ba legs par ba shadu gsol// bcom
193a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag cag kyang sems can dmyal ba las thar par 'tshal ba lags kyi/ bdag cag dmus long 'tshal ba ma lag so// bdag cag gcugs ma mchis pa'i khor mi 'tshal to// bdag kyang skur pa 'debs pa 'tshal
193a3(dkon brtsegs): bam la gso// bdag cag mtha' 'khod kyi gnas 'tshal ba ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni yul gyi dbus kyi phyogs 'tshal te// bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dang / chos mnyan pa yongs
193a4(dkon brtsegs): sum bta // de skad ces gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ri'i bu khyod 'di ltar gnam zhing drang bar gyur te/ gang khyod de bzhin gshegs
193a5(dkon brtsegs): pa don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni legaso lagaso ngo mtshar to// de bas na sha ri'i bu gang 'jig rten na sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa/ la slob par 'dod pa de dag gi phyir bshad par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
193a6(dkon brtsegs): sha ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa slob par 'dod pa de dag gi mdun du bshad par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu ma bslabs na 'thab pa'i rtsa brtsod par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni dad pa dang / dang
193a7(dkon brtsegs): ba mang zhing / sems can rnams kyi skyabs kyi phyir/ yun ring por lta ba dang / dus ring po lta bur 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du song nas/ yongasu 'dri bar byed/ des 'di lta bu'i chos 'di thos nas ngag
193a8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / ngang pa dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po 'thob par 'gyur te// nan tan gyis kyang sgrub mod kyi/ sha ri'i bu gang lhag pa'i bsam pas/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa 'dod pa'i sems can de dag ni nyung bar
193b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te// phal cher dngos po gsum la gan so// gsum gang zhe na/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigasu bcad pa tshol ba dang mdza' bo'i khyim dang / slong ba'i khyim tshol ba dang / gnas yongasu 'dzin pa'i byug pa
193b2(dkon brtsegs): tshol/ dngos po gsum po 'di dag la gnas so// de bas na gang dngos po 'di gsum la gnas pa de dag ni// ngan song gsum las yongasu mi 'thar ro// de dag sems can dmyal ba las thar pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / 
193b3(dkon brtsegs): gshin rje'i 'jig rten las thar par bya ba la spro bachung zhing // de dag mtho ris zad par 'gyur ba dang / gleng ba dang / 'bad pa dang / rtson pa dang / 'breg pa dang / 'gyed pa la brtson zhing lta bur 'gyur ro// de dag ma dang
193b4(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pas mdza' ba mang pos yongasu zin nas/ dgon par gan sa pa spong ba rje su 'thob par 'gyur te/ de dag la khyim pa dag tshe dang ldan pa khyod dad kyi gnas dang nye bar gnas par gyis shig dang / nged
193b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad kyis bsnyen bkur bya'o// tshe nga ldan pa dgon pa la gnas na/ nged kyis kyang khyod mi mthong / khyod
193b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis kyang deng mi mthong zhes/ de skad zer zhing de dag phar tshur smra ba mang bas gnas la chags nas/ mngon par dga' ba skyed de/ de dag gnas la sred pa skyed par 'gyur// ring du gnas par 'gyur/ mdza' ba'i khyim dang / slob pa
193b7(dkon brtsegs): mang ba'i khyim mang bar 'gyur te/ de dag phyi phyir zhing mthong na/ gcig la gcig srer 'gyur te// de la gang dge slong thor bu 'ongs pa de dag la bsngags pa ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur te/ mang du thos pa ma yino// rgyun tu zhugs
193b8(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yi no zhes smra bar byed// lan cig phyir 'ongs pa ma yin no zhes smra bar byed/ dgra bcom pa ma yin no zhes smras par byed de/ gzhan yang bsngags pa ma yin parjod par bya ba la spro bar bye'o// shi ri'i bu de la
194a1(dkon brtsegs): khyim pa de dag gang dag dge slong thor bur 'ongs pa de dag ni bdag cag gi drung ma/ yun ring du gnas pa ma yin gyi/ gang dge slong 'khong pa dag ni// bdag cag gcig gi gcig don
194a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi pho nya yin no// zhes da snyam du sems te ngag gcig la gcig ser na byed par 'gyur ro// sha ri'i bu de la kha cig ni chos 'di lta bu khong du chud par 'a gyur/ khong du chud par mi 'gyur te// de dag thams cad mdo sde 'di lta bu dag
194a3(dkon brtsegs): spong bar gyur/ spong bar byed/ spong bar 'gyuraro// yang sha ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu'i tshig dang 'bru'i rnam grangs thos nas/ thos ma thag tu mos par mi byed kyi// sems can gang ngan
194a4(dkon brtsegs): sang du 'gro ba'i sems can de lta bu dag ni/ smod pa byed par 'gyur// sha ri 'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus ma nyams pa ni/ ser sna dang phrag dog gi gzhi 'di lta bu ngan song du 'gro ba'i las
194a5(dkon brtsegs): thos nas khyim gyi ser sna ma byas pa yang mi byed/ khyim gyi sesna byas pa'ang chags par 'gyuraro// sha ri'i bu de ltar byang chub/ sems dpa' brtson 'grus ma nyams pa/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
194a6(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa la spyod do// gzhan yang sha ri'i bu brtson 'grus ma nyams pa'i byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod na/ sems can thams cad la nad par 'du shes bskyed sems can de dag thams cad
194a7(dkon brtsegs): ni gdung pa'i nad 'di gsum gyis rtag tu gdungaso// gsum gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags kyi gdung ba dang / zhe sdang gi gdung pa dang / gti mug gi gdung ba'o// sman dang rtsis bsku ba'i sbyor gang gis sems
194a8(dkon brtsegs): can rnams 'dod chags rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / zhe sdang rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / gti mug rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i chos kyi sman dang rtsis bsku ba'i sbyor ba bdag gis bsdu bar bya'o zhes de ltar sems
194b1(dkon brtsegs): shing / de chos kyi sman dang rtsis slu ba'i sbyor ba'i gang gis/ sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags pa tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / zhe sdang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / gti mug rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i chos kyi slar dang rtsis bsku
194b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sbyin bsdud par byed do// de ni byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus ma nyams pa brtson 'grus kyis pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu sems can thams cad ni gdung ba'i rang gsum gyis rtag tu gdu
194b3(dkon brtsegs): nas na ba ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags kyis gdung ba dang / zhes sdang gi gdung ba dang / gti mug gi gdung ba'o// sems can gang dag sems can dmyal bar skyes pa de dag kyang gdung ba 'di gsum gyis rtag tu gdungs te/ 
194b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags kyi gdung ba dang / zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang / gti mug/ jigs gdungs pa'o// gang dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang / gang gshi na rje'i 'jig rten pa dang / gang mi'i 'jig rten pa dang / gang lhar skyes
194b5(dkon brtsegs): bi'i sems can de dag kyang 'dod chags kyi gdung ba dang / zhe sdangagis gdung ba dang / gti mug gi gdung ba 'di gsum gyis rta ga tu gdung ste/ gang sems can de dag gi sman pa gso' bar byed kyang / 
194b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags kyi gdung ba dang / zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang / gti mug gi gdung ba 'di gsum gyis rtag tu gdungs te/ de la sman pa gzhan dang sman gzhan bsku ba'i sbyor ba sems can de dag gi 'dod chags kyi gdung ba dang / 
194b7(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang / gti mug gi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar mi nus kyi/ gzhan du na de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i sman pa'i rgyal po chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi sku thob pas/ sen
194b8(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi 'dod chags kyi gdungs pa dang / zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang / gti mug gi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed nus so// de bas na sha ri'i bu rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ gang sman pa phal dang / sman kyis
195a1(dkon brtsegs): bslu ba'i sbyor ba phal gyis sems cad de dag gi 'dod chags kyi gdung ba dang / zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang / gti mug gi gdung pa rab tu zhi bar nus pa slab ma yin gyi/ gzhan du rang / 
195a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i sman pa'i rgyal po chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi sku thob pas/ sems can de dag gi 'dod chags kyi gdung ba dang / zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang / gti mug
195a3(dkon brtsegs): gi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar nus par rig par bya'o// sha ri'i bu de ji snyam sems/ sems can gyi khams rab tu mang ngam/ gsol pa/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gi 'tshal te/ sems can gyi
195a4(dkon brtsegs): khams ni mang gi sa'i khams ni de lta ma lags chu'i khams ni de ltar lags/ me'i khams ni de lta ma lags/ rlung gi khams ni de lta ma lags so// bka' stsal pa de de bzhin no// sha ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ 
195a5(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu sems can gyi khams ni rab tu mang gi/ sa'i khams ni de lta ma yin/ chu'i khams ni de lta ma yin/ me'i khams ni de lta ma mi/ na/ klung gi khams ni de lta ma yin no// yang sha ri'i bu sems can
195a6(dkon brtsegs): skal ba mnyam par gyur pa 'di las phyi rol gyi drang srong gi lha'i mig la snang bar gyur pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi lha'i mig la snang bar ma gyur pa yang ngo // sha ri'i bu gang shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam khyon la
195a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i spyan la snang bar gyur pa ni rab tu mang ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu ni de lta ma yi no// de ltar sems can gyi khams dpag tu med do// 
195a8(dkon brtsegs): sha ri'i bu ji tsam stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can sgo nga las skye ba 'am/ mngal nas skye ba 'am/ drod gsher las skye ba 'am/ rdzus te skye ba 'am/ gzugs can nam/ gzugs med
195b1(dkon brtsegs): pa 'am/ 'du shes can nam/ 'du shes med pa 'am/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min nam/ snang ba 'am/ mi snang ba 'am/ ji tsam sems can gyi khamasu btags pa de thams cad yongasu brtags pa de dag thams cad yong
195b2(dkon brtsegs): su brtags te/ skad cig thang cig la snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/ de dag thams cad mir gyur nas kyang sman par gyur te/ tshe'i tshad kyang bskal par gnas par gyur nas/ yongasu brtags pa bzung ste/ slob dpon
195b3(dkon brtsegs): khams gso ba la mkhas pa 'di lta ste/ shA ri'i bu da ltar gyi sman pa'i rgyal po gso byed lta bu de dag thams cad 'dus nas/ sems can gcig gi 'dod chags kyi gdung ba rab tu ni bar bya ba dang / zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang / gti
195b4(dkon brtsegs): mug gi bdung ba rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir 'bad cing smad parare res kyang / kha sil ba'i yan lag gi sman ri ra bo tsam gyi phung po bsdus nas/ de dag thams cad sems can cig gi 'dod chags kyi gdungs pa rab
195b5(dkon brtsegs): tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ bsil ba'i yan lag gi sman gyi phung po btags te bskus par gyur kyang // sha ri'i bu sman pa tshe'i tshang bskal pa ra gnas pa thams cad skyo bar gyur la/ bsil ba'i yan lag
195b6(dkon brtsegs): gi sman gyi phung po de dag thams cad yongasu 'gribs shing zad par 'gyur kyang / sems can gcig gi 'dod chags kyi gdungs pa dang / zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang / gti mug gi gdung pa de rab tu zhi bar mi nus kyi/ de ltar de
195b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas mi sdug pa'i chos kyi sman dang / bsku ba'i sbyor bas ni sems can du ma/ sems can brgya phrag du ma/ sems can steng phrag du ma/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong du ma/ sems can khrag
195b8(dkon brtsegs): khrag dkrigs phrag du ma/ sems can gdams phrag du ma nas brjod du med pa'i bar gyi sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags kyi gdung ba mi sdug pa'i sman dang rtses bsku ba'i sbyor bas rab tu ni bar bye'o// byangs
196a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos kyi sman dang / rtsis slu ba'i sbyor bas sems can du ma'i zhe sdang gi gdung pa rab tu zhi bar byed de/ brjod med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar gyi sems can rnams kyi zhe sdang gi
196a2(dkon brtsegs): gdung pa rab tu zhi bar byed do// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i sman dang / brtsis bsku ba'i sbyor bas/ sems can du ma'i gti mug gi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed/ brjod med pa'i yang brjod med pa'i bar gyi sems can rnams
196a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi gti mug gi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi sku thob pas kyang / bdag nyid chos kyis sman du gyur par byin gyi brlabs nas/ sems can du ma'i 'dod chags kyi gdung ba
196a4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu zhi bar byed/ zhe sdang gi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed/ gti mug gi gdung pa rab tu zhi bar byed do// sems can brjod med pa'i yang brjod med pa'i bar gyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug
196a5(dkon brtsegs): gi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar bye'o// de bas na sha ri'i bu rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos kyi sku la gnas nas bdag nyid chos kyi
196a6(dkon brtsegs): smad du gyur par byin gyis brlabs nas/ sems can rjod med pa'i yang brjod med pi'i bar gyi 'dod chags kyi gdung pa rab tu zhi bar byed/ zhe sdang gi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed/ gti mug gi gdung pa rab tu zhi bar byed do// 
196a7(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu ngas mngon par shes pa bskal pa drangs med pa/ de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shes bya ba'i bar du'o// 
196a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad des ngal gzhon nu khyod ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa grangs med pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
196b1(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad des nga la gzhon nu khyod ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa grangs med pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar
196b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro las lung bstan to// yang sha ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan ma thag tu ngas chos kyi sku thob par 'gyur te/ 'chos kyi
196b3(dkon brtsegs): sku dang ldan par gyur nas// mar me mdzad kyi 'og tu lha'i dbang po brgya byin mig mdzes shes bya ba/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi bdag po rdzu 'phrul che ba/ dbang che bar grags par gyur te// yang de'i tshe 'dza ng+ga'i gling 'dir
196b4(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong phrag bani byung ngo // grong dang tshong 'dus dang / ri khrod stong phrag mang po byung ste/ grong khyer chen po dang / tshe'adus dang / ri khrod stong phrag mang po de dag za nga/ srog chags
196b5(dkon brtsegs): bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong mang pos gang bar gyur to// yang de nad chen po'i bskal pa bar ma byung ste/ sems can phal cher lus rman can du gyur te/ lus rul pa dang / dpa' ba dang / 'bras
196b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / me dpal dang / g.yan pa dang / rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bdakan kyis rgyas par gyur to// de na sman pa brgya stong phrag mang po sems can de dag gi nang rab tu zhi bar bya ba la brtson par bye'o// sha ri'i bu de nas
196b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag gso ba ma rnyed de/ mgon med/ skyabs med nas sgra cher byung ba// lha dag dang ni klu rnams dang // gnod sbyin dri za srin po dang // mi dang mi ma yin pa dag/ bdag cag nad las thar byed gang // bdag cag
196b8(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal bar byed la// der rnams thams cad sbyin par byed// de'i bka'i rjesu 'jug/ byas pa dag kyang gzo bar bya// yang sha ri'i bu ngas mi las 'das pa'i lha'i mig rnam par dag pas/ sems can de dag nad kyis
197a1(dkon brtsegs): gzir te/ de dag phal cher lus rman can du gyur te/ lus rul ba dang / lgang dang / 'bras dang / me dpal dang / g.yan pa dang / rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad karan gyis rgyas pa mthong // mi las 'das
197a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i lha'i rna ba rna par dag pas// sems cad de dag gis sgra cher phyung ba thos te/ mthong zhing thos nas sems cad de dag la snying rje chen po skyes te/ de dag las ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ nga sems can 'di dag gi
197a3(dkon brtsegs): gnasu gyur cig/ sems can skyabs med pa rnams kyi skyabasu gyur cig/ sems can rten med pa rnams kyi rten du gyur cig/ sems can gso ba med pa rnams kyi gso ba sbyar bar bya'o snyam ste/ sha ri'i bu ngas brgya byir gyi
197a4(dkon brtsegs): lus chen po mi snang bar byas nas/ grong khyer chen por ku ru nas shin tu mi ring ba zhig tu/ nges pa zhes bya ba'i srog chags zhig tu rdzus teskyes nas/ steng gi bar snang la 'dug te/ 'dza pU'i gling gi skya
197a5(dkon brtsegs): po'i tshogs thams cad la tshigasu bcang ba 'di dag gis bskul to// grong khyer ku ru nas mi ring na/ des shes bya'i srog chags rnam pa yod// gang dag de'i shal yongs zag/ da kun ma las yongs
197a6(dkon brtsegs): su thar par 'gyur// 'jigs shing skrag pa dag tu ma byed par// de'i sha ni ji ltar 'dod 'gar long // de ni gnod par mi sems khro gshe med/ de ni 'dzam bu gling gi rtsi yod do// de ltar sha ring bu grong khyer chen po brgyad khri
197a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhi stong phrag bzhi pod dag dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / tshong 'dus dang / ri khrod stong po de dag na sems can na ba ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyis sgra de thos nas/ grong khyer chen po ku ru zhes bya ba ga la ba dang / 
197a8(dkon brtsegs): srog chags kyi rnam pa nges pa gang na yod pa der song ste phyin nas/ srog chags nges pa zhes bya ba'i lus las sha bcang cing bcang cing khyer nas/ de'i lus las sha yongasu zad par mgyur to// de kyi tshogasu bcad pa 'di
197b1(dkon brtsegs): ga byung ngo // gang phyir bden pas byang chub reg 'gyur zhing // ye shes phung po de zad mi 'gyur te// nga'i tshig de bden par 'gyur zhe na// lus la sha ni nam yang zad ma gyur// de ltar sha ri'i bu 'dzam du ni gling kun gyi skye bo
197b2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs thams cad kyis// des pa zhes bya ba'i srog chags kyi sha bcad cing bcad cing khyer yang / de'i lus bri ba 'am/ gang bar yang mi mngon te/ yang bcang yang bcad kyang slar de bzhin du skye'o// yang sha ri'i bu
197b3(dkon brtsegs): gang sems can na pa rnams kyis/ nges pa zhes bya ba'i srog chags kyi sha zos na/ de dag gi nang thams cad byang ste/ nad med cing bde ba las mi 'gyur bar gyur te// de bzhin du mthar kyis 'dzam bu gleng sar ba thams cad
197b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi nang sna tshogs byang ste// nang med par byas nas bde zhing 'gyur ba med do// de nas 'jam+bu gling gi skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / mi thams cad 'di snyam du sems te/ nges pa zhes bya ba'i sreg
197b5(dkon brtsegs): chags nges bdag cag nang las yongasu thar te/ bde zhing gyung ba me dpar byas na/ bdag cag gis de la mchod pa dang / bkra/ ra bsti ci zhig bya snyam ste/ de dag thams cad bdag du 'dus
197b6(dkon brtsegs): so/ 'dus nas nges pa zhes bya ba'i srog chags ga la ba der song ste byin nas/ srog chags nges pa la khor yug tu bskor te/ slar tshig su bcad pa 'di smras so// khyod ni gnas dang skyabs legs te/ 
197b7(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni sman pa khyod zhing sman// khyod la mchod pa ci bgyi ba/ bdag cag la ni bka' stsal cig/ sha ri'i bu e ma'o skye bo'i tshogs rnams 'dus par gyur to// snyam du ngas shes nas/ lus chen po de mi snang bar byas te/ 
197b8(dkon brtsegs): rang gi brgya byin gyi cha byad du 'dug nas/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po nga dag la smras pa// kye grogs po dag nga yi grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor mi dges/ gro
198a1(dkon brtsegs): po gang la ni zhing gi dngos po dang / khyim gyi dngos po dang / tshong 'dus kyi dngos po dang / 'gron bu dang / gser dang nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bedUR+Ya dang / dung dang man shel dang
198a2(dkon brtsegs): ru rnams mi dgos so// grogs po dag nga la glang po che dang / rta dang rnga mo dang / ba lang dang / bong bu dang / lug dang / khyim bya dang / pag rnams mi dgo so// skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / bran po dang
198a3(dkon brtsegs): las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba'i ri rnams mi dgos so// bza' ba dang btung ba dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byang dang / skyeng mos 'tshal dang / dka' thub kyi nags tshal gyi longs spyod rnams
198a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang mi dgoso// kye grogs po dag khyed kyis srog gcod pa dag spongs la/ srog gcod pa las slar ldog par gyis shig/ ma byin par len pa spongs lam byin par len pas slar ldog par gyis shig/ 'dod pa la
198a5(dkon brtsegs): log par ga yem pa spangs la/ 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa las slar ldog par gyis shig / brdzun du smra ba spongs la/ badz+ra na du smra ba las slar ldog par gyis shig// bral spongs la/ phra ba las
198a6(dkon brtsegs): slar ldog par gyi shig/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ ngag rtsub po dang / tshig kyal ba dang brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba'i bar du spongs la/ log par lta ba las slar ldog par gyis shing // de'i
198a7(dkon brtsegs): tshe skye tshogs chen po 'i'atshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras// ngal 'gror bu mi dgos te/ gser phung ri rab tsam yang dgos pa med// bung med lha mo 'dra ba mi dgos te/ bza' dang btung dang kha zas zas mi dgos
198a8(dkon brtsegs): nges pa'i srog chags la nim chod 'dod mams kyi lem ni rab dag bcu po 'di khams cad 'dus nas de dag srung bar gyis// pham nun du yang byams pa'i yid kyis ltos/ las lam bcu po rdzogs
198b1(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di dag rnams// thams cad gcig tu 'dus te spangs shig dang // de tshe nga la mchod pa byas par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' nor dang 'bru mi tshol// nga la nor rnams dgos pa ma yin te// bza' btung dag dang dbyig
198b2(dkon brtsegs): nor 'bru mi dgos// rta dang glang chen shing rta mi dgos te// bud med mchog dang rin chen dgos mi dgos// phan tshun du ni byams sems dag pa dang // phan pa'i dngos po dag gi sems skyed la// thams cad kun kyang
198b3(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu 'dus gyur la/ dge bcu'i las lam ngag rdzogs srung bar gyis// dbang pos mi rnams de dag rab bskul ba// tshig de dag ni thos par gyur pa dang // dag pa bcu'i las lam rnam dag pa// dge ba rnams ni yang
198b4(dkon brtsegs): ngag rab tu len// sha ri'i du ngas skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag la chos kyi gtam kun bstan// yang dag par dzin tu btsud/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas/ de nyi du mi snang bar gyur pa de ni
198b5(dkon brtsegs): nga yin no// sha ri'i bu ngas mngon par shes te// 'dzam+bu'i gling gi skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / ming snyed/ thams cad kyis/ srog chags nges pazhes bya ba'i sha zos pa las
198b6(dkon brtsegs): tha na sems can gcig kyang / de nas 'chi ba'i dus byas te/ shi 'phos nas log par ltung bar song bar ma gyur te/ de dag thams cad de nas shi 'phos/ 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams
198b7(dkon brtsegs): drang skal ba mnyam par skyes so// shA ri'i bu ngas de dag la chos kyi gtam kun bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag pa gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas/ de dag thams cad nyan thos
198b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi theg pa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / bla na med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / theg pa gsum la nges par gyur te/ de la la la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das/ la la ni yongasu mya ngan las 'da'/ 
199a1(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyuraro// sha ri'i bu ngas de ltar lus gcig yongasu btang bas/ sems can de snyed kyi theg pa gsum dag la yongasu smin par byas so// / 'phags pa dkor
199a2(dkon brtsegs): mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyis rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bco8// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi sku la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po ci 'dra ba dang / rathu chen po
199a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ba dang / che bar grags pa ci 'dra ba la ltos// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sku de
199a4(dkon brtsegs): ci 'dra/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu byang chub se/ rnams dpa'i chos kyi sku ni brtan pa/ sra ba mi shigs pa/ rdo rje'i sku 'chi 'pho med pa/ mi skye ba ste/ de ni sku tha dad pas 'dul ba/ 
199a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyi 'dul ba'i dbang gis tha dang du 'gyur yang / mes mi 'tshig/ mtshor gyis mi tshugs te/ rdo rje lta bu brtan pa/ mi shigs pa yin no// sha ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems
199a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chos kyis sku la gnas pa/ brtson 'grus ma nyams pa/ brtson 'grus kyis pha rol tu phyin pa la lhud kyis grub par spyod cing // lus kyis sems can yongasu smid par byed kyang sems pa med/ yang su rtog pa med
199a7(dkon brtsegs): de lus dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyis kyang chos thams cad dben pa'i mtshan nyid rje su shes la/ lus dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyis/ chos thams cad kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid la gnyi su yang mi byed de/ mtshan nyid
199a8(dkon brtsegs): gang lus dben pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i mtshan nyid de ni chos thams cad dben pa'i mtshan nyid de/ dben pa'i mtshan nyid gcig gis rje su 'jug go// nang gi chos mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ rang gi lus dben pa'i mtshan/ 
199b1(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis kyang / sems can thams cad kyis lus dbad pa'i mtshan nyid du mnyam par byed do// de sems can thams cad kyi lus dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyang / chos kyi dbyings dber ba'i mtshan nyid kyis rje su shes/ chos
199b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbyings dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyang / chos thams cad dper ba'i mtshan nyid kyis rjesu slongab ste/ de rang gis lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis sems can gyi lus kyi de bzhin nyid rje su sheso// de sems can thams cad kyi lus
199b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi ngo bzhin nyid kyis rang gis lus kyi de bzhin cing rjesu she so// rang gis lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis// chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rjesu shes so// chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid
199b4(dkon brtsegs): rjesu shes so// rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid rje su sheso// rang gis
199b5(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar thung / ba'i de bzhin nyid rjesu shes so// 'das pa dang / me 'ongs dang / nga lngar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid rjesu shes te/ 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid
199b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis kyang / ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin zhing 'gal bar mi byed/ 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis kyang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid 'gal bar mi byed/ da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis kyang / 'das pa'i de bzhin
199b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gal bar mi byed/ ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis kyang / 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid 'gal bar mi byed/ 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis kyang / ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'gal bar mi byed/ ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid
199b8(dkon brtsegs): kyis kyang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid 'gal bar mi byed/ da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis kyang / ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'gal bar mi byed/ ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis kyang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin
200a1(dkon brtsegs): ming 'gal bar mi byed/ da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin cid kyang / 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid 'gal bar mi byed/ 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis kyang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid 'a
200a2(dkon brtsegs): bar mi byed/ yang 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid/ phung po dang khams dang / skye mched kyi de bzhin nyid do// phung po dang khams dang / skye mched kyi de
200a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i de bzhin nyid do// kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid mya ngan las 'das pa dang / 'khor ba'i de
200a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin nyid do// 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yi na pa de nyid mngon par 'du byed pa'i de bzhin nyid do// mngon par 'a du byed pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa 'du byed thams cad kyi
200a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin nyid kyang de nyid yin to// yang sha ri'i bu de bzhin nyid ces bya ba ni de kho ma'o// de bzhin nyid do gzhan ma yin pa nyid do// bral ba med ba'o lus med pa'o// de bzhin nyid la ni lus gang yang med
200a6(dkon brtsegs): de lus med pa'i de bzhin nyid do// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus shes bya'o// de'i phyir 'di ni nga bzhin nyid kyi lus te de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus shes bya'o// lus de lta bu ri lus thams cad de
200a7(dkon brtsegs): nas byang chub sems dpa' yus thams cad kyang ston la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus kyang mi byed de/ lus med brtsod pa med pas/ gzugs kyi lus thams cad ston la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zas kyang 'khrugs
200a8(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbrul so sor rtog ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mnyam pa nyid kyang / rang gi lus mnyam pa nyid dus sor tog/ rang gi lus ma ma/ 
200b1(dkon brtsegs): banyid kyis lus dang lus bad pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid so sor rtog go// lus dang lus med pa thams cad kyis shin tu lus meng pa'i lusu mthong ngo // lus thams cad rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar yang shes// shes nas
200b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang chos kyi sku mngon par smra'o// de chos kyis sku mngon par bsgrubs nas/ chos kyi sku nyid yin gyi phung po dang khams dang / skye mched kyi lus ni ma yin no// de chos kyi skus rab tu phye bas mthong bas kyang sems can rnams
200b3(dkon brtsegs): 'du'o// bos pas kyang sems can rnams 'dul lo// reg pas kyang sems can rnams 'du'o// sems can rnams kyi don byed do// sha ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper ma sman pa'i rgyal po gso byed kyis/ rtsi thams cad bsdus nas/ 
200b4(dkon brtsegs): rtsi'i shing mang po sbyar ba las/ bu mo gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa/ balnga na sdug pa la dog bzang po rgyas pa'i mchog dang ldan pa shin tu rdzo gas par zin pa/ byi ngor byas pa zhi gabs nas/ de'ong bdang
200b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang 'dug pa dang / nyal ba byed kyang mi rtogs rna ma par mi rtog mod kyi/ bya ba de dag kyang stor to// ngan rgyal po 'am/ rgyal bu 'am/ rgyal po'i blon po chen po 'am/ tshong dpon ram/ 
200b6(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag gam/ mkhar gyi rgyal po yang rung ste/ gang na ba tsha ba de dag 'ongs na de dag la sman pa'i rgyal po gso byed kyis sman gyi bu mo dang sprad pa dang / phrang ma thag tu nad thams cad nub par 'gyur// min par 'gyur te/ 'gyur
200b7(dkon brtsegs): ba med cing bde bar 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu de ltar sman pa'i rgyal po gso byed 'jig rten gyi nang pa gso ba shes pa de sman pa gzhan dag la med do// sha ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sku phye ba yang 'di lta
200b8(dkon brtsegs): steng byang chub sem sa dang 'jas pa skyes pa dang dung med dang / khye'u nga bu mo sems cadan ji rkeng 'dod chags dang / ge sdang dang / ba'i dug gis gdungs pa rnams kyis reg na/ de dag rig ma thag dubya
201a1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' de'i sngon gyi smon lam shin tu yongs su dag pas/ nang thams cad byang zhing gdung ba yang med par 'gyur ro// shari'i bu yang byang chub sems dang 'a chos kyi lus
201a2(dkon brtsegs): can ni zas dang skom gyis gso ba ma yin/ zas kham gyi za bas lus gzo ba ma yin te/ de kha zas thams cad yongasu shes pas sems can thams cad li snying brtse ba'i phyir zas za'o// de zas za yang gtong bar mi byed do// 
201a3(dkon brtsegs): zas za yang lus kyi nang du gtang bar mi byed/ chos kyi sku'i stobs la mi nyams yong su mi 'am so// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi lus cad la tshe dang 'chi 'pho dang skye ba yang med la/ sems can yongs su
201a4(dkon brtsegs): smin par bya ba'i phyir 'chi 'pho dang skye ba yang ston to// de 'chi 'pho yang chos thams cad 'chi 'pho med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa ma yin par rab tu shes so// skye yang chos thams cad 'pho ba med par rab tu shes sa/ 
201a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung yang chos thams cad skye ba med par rab tu shes so// dechos kyi lus dang / chos kyi zas dang / chos kyi stobs dang // chos la rton pas sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir sngon gyi
201a6(dkon brtsegs): smon lam lhun gyis grub pas/ brtson 'grus ma nyams par brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgyas par brtan pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag
201a7(dkon brtsegs): gsungaso// de dag lus ni rdo rje lta bur mi shegs pa// 'dul ba'i dus shes nas ni tha dad ston par 'gyur// mtshon kyis mi tshugs mes ni tshigs pa ma yin yang // 'dul ba'i sems can mthong nas tshugs
201a8(dkon brtsegs): shing mes tshig 'gyur// sems can nab mthong nas sman rnams su yang 'gyur// de bzhin ta skyes pa rnams la rdzas dang skom du 'gyur// 'on kyang chos kyi dbyings la rnam rtog ci yang med// chos kyi sku dang lus
201b1(dkon brtsegs): med tshul gcig rab tu 'jug/ sheng las skyes dang gso dang sheng yod mar te// chos sa cag ni rten cing 'brel te 'byung bar shes// gang de'i rkyen yod par sdug bsngal lams 'byung ste// rkyen med pa na sdug bsnga/ 
201b2(dkon brtsegs): lam ni 'chang bar 'gyur// gzugs 'di dbu ba rdos pa 'dra ste snying po med// tshor ba chu'i chu bur mtshungs shing 'dra bar sems// 'du shes dpyid kyi dus kyi smig rgyu rgyu ba 'dra// 'du byed rnams ni chu skyes shing dang 'dra bar
201b3(dkon brtsegs): blta ji ltar gar la lta bar sgyu ma bslabs pa rnams// skad cig gis ni gzugs rnams sna tshogs sngon byed pa// mi bden byed pa de lta rnam shes shes 'gyur nas// mkhas pa de dag thams cad du yang smon pa med/ longs
201b4(dkon brtsegs): spyong rnams ni ri gzar chu dang mtshungs shing 'dra// glog dang mkha' sprin phung po lta bur byung nas med// longs spyod 'gyur ba bcu drag 'phangs pa'i mnga' ltar shes// mkhas pa rnams ni kun tu longs spyod
201b5(dkon brtsegs): smon pa med// lha'i 'jig rten lha rdzas bde ba ma myong ba// 'jig rten gsum po dag na sems can gang yang med slar yang sems dmyal sdug bsngal myong gyur nas// bde bshegs sras bro
201b6(dkon brtsegs): de mthong mtho ris 'gro mi byed// yid ni nam mkha' 'dra ba de dag gnas med de// gnas dang bral ba rnams la 'byung ba srid pa yin 'byung ba med rnams skye dang 'chi 'pho med par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' skye ba
201b7(dkon brtsegs): midra mi 'chi 'thob/ sha ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus ma nyams pa/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ 'di ltar slob ste/ kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni/ gang 'dong
201b8(dkon brtsegs): nang chen por rab tu mi shes// zhe sdang nad chen por rab tu mi shes// gti mug nang chen por rab tu mi shes te/ gsum po 'di dag nang chen por mi shes pa'i sman pa mi mkhas pa sha stag gis yongasu gang / slar
202a1(dkon brtsegs): pa mi shes pa sha stag gis yongs su gang nas// nang cher po gsum bong dag gis srad gsum mi shes te/ 'dod chags kyi nang chen po'i sman chen po mi gtsang ba yin par rab tu mi shes/ 
202a2(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang gi rang cher po'i sman chen po byams pa yin par rab tu mi shes/ gti mug gi nang chen po'i snad chen po rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yin par rab tu mi shes te/ kye ma'i sman pa de dag ri nang gzhan dang gzhan dag gas
202a3(dkon brtsegs): nus kyi// nang thams cad ni gso par mi nus te// kye ma'o sngan pang dag gi slar dere re zhig gas nus pa men gyi/ gdan tu gso bar byed pa ma yin no// de bas na bdag cag gis ri smad pa de dag gi rjes su bslab par mi bya'i/ 
202a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la mkhas pa bla na med pa/ sman pa'i rgyal po skyes bu nang thams cad gso bar byed pa de'i rjes su bslab par bya'o// bdag gis nang thams cad
202a5(dkon brtsegs): gso bar bya'i// nang gzhan dang gzhan dag gso bar mi bya/ re zhig / so bar mi bya ste/ bdag cag gis gtan tu gso bar byed par bya'o// gang gi sgra thos pas 'dod chags kyi nang chen po rab tu zhi bar
202a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / zhe sdang gi nang chen po rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / gti mug gi nang chen po rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos kyi sman dang / rtsi byug pa'i sbyor ba bsdu bar bya'o// shA ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' se
202a7(dkon brtsegs): chen po brtson 'grus ma nyams pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod par/ de bzhin gshegs pa sman pa'i rgyal po bla na med pa'i chos thams cad la mkhas pa ma gtogs par/ gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs
202a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyas thams cad la med pa de 'dra ba'i chos kyi sman dang / rtsis bslu ba'i sbyor ba bsdung bar byed de// chos kyi sman dang / rtsis bsku ba'i sbyor ba des chos kyi dung chen po la bskus nas yongasu sgrog ste/ de'i sgras
202b1(dkon brtsegs): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di mngon par go bar byed do// den sems can du ma sems can brgya phrag du ma sems can stong phrag dum sems can brgya stong phrag du ma/ sems cad bye ba dum/ sems
202b2(dkon brtsegs): can bye ba brgya phrag du ma/ sems can bye ba stong phrag du ma sems can bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma/ sems can dgrag gis phrag du man+da/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ brjod du med
202b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yang brjod du meng ba'i bar gyi sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nang chen po rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te/ sha ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper ma gangs ka'i ro'i rgyal po la sman gyi rgyal po chen po 'bral bar byed
202b4(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de'i dris dug gis drag shul thams cad las rab tu thar par 'gyur te/ dpag tshad brgya tsam na 'khod pa dag kyang dug med bar 'gyur ro// sha ri'i bu gal te dung ngam rnga la sngar gyi rgyal po
202b5(dkon brtsegs): chen po 'bral bar byed pas skus te bus sam brdungs na/ sems ca/ na dug brdungs pa 'am/ zos pa 'am/ bskus pas zug par/ gyur pa ji snyed pa de thams cad / de'i sgra thos mdug med
202b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// sha ri'i bu gang sngar gyi rgyal po 'bral bar byed pa de lta du de ri/ sman pa'i rgyal po gso byang ma togs par sman pa thams cad kyis mi shes so// sha ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
202b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po yang de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad la mkhas pa sman pa'i rgyal po chen po sems can thams cad kyi nang thams cad sel ba ma gtogs par gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la med
202b8(dkon brtsegs): pade 'dra ba'i chos kyi sman dang / rtsis bsku ba'i sbyor bsdung bar byed de/ chos kyi sman dang rtsis bslu ba'i sbyor ba des chos kyi dang chen po la bskus nas yongasu sgrog ste/ de'i sgras stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
203a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig can gyi khams 'di mngon par go bar byed do// de na sems can du mas de thos nas/ 'dod chags kyi nang chen po rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ zhe sdang dang gti mug gi nang chen po rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ 
203a2(dkon brtsegs): sems cad du pa/ sems can brgya phrag du ma/ sems cad stong phrag du ma/ rgya stong dum/ sems can bye ba phrag dum/ sems can de ba brgya brag dum/ sems can bye ba stong phrag dum/ sems can stong phrag dum/ sems
203a3(dkon brtsegs): can bye ba khrag du ma/ sems can dkrigs phrag du ma nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ brjod du med pa'i yang rjod du me'i yang yang bar gyi sems can rnams kyi sgra de thos nas 'dod chags kyi nad chen po rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ zhe sdang dang
203a4(dkon brtsegs): gti mug gi nad chen po rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// de gang nas sdud par byed/ ce na/ gang du byang chub sems dpa' de'i nor bzhag pa naso// byang chub sems dpa' de'i nor gang du bzhag ce na/ byang chub sems
203a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs las gud na ma yin no// sha ri'i du de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson du/ grus ma nyams pa/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa na/ 
203a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i sde snong rgya chos kyi rnam grangs rab san no// 'dzin to// 'chang ngo // klog go// kun chub bar byed do// gzhan la yang 'chad cing rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa/ shari'i bri bas na byang chub sem
203a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus ma nyams pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs shin tu nyan par byed/ 'dzin par byed 'chang bar byed/ klog par
203a8(dkon brtsegs): byed kun chu bar byed/ gzhan la 'ang 'chad cing rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston te/ ga ri'i bu bsan rnam grangs 'dis kying 'di lta rigs par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang brtson
203b1(dkon brtsegs): 'grus ma 'ams pa/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu byed pan/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde sdod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'an par byed/ 'dzin par byed/ 'chang bar byed/ klog par byed/ kun rku bar byed/ gzhan la yang 'chang
203b2(dkon brtsegs): cing rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par byed do// yang sha ri'i bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa yangs pa dpag tu med pha rol gyi yang shin tu pha rol tu gyur pa
203b3(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe// de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma bla ma zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shes bya ba'i bar du'o// sha ri'i bu nga
203b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i bla ma de 'di lta ste/ nyan thos bye ba phrag brgya bcu'i nyan thos 'dus pa chen po gcig byung ste thams cad kyang dgra bcom
203b5(dkon brtsegs): pa zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa nas// sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag go// sha ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad
203b6(dkon brtsegs): ma'i bla ma ngo'i tshe'i tshad ni lo brgya khri thub par gyur ro// sha ring bu pad ma'i bla ma yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas/ dam pa'i chos lo lnga brgya'i bar du gnas so// lo lnga brgya'i bar du yang ngas pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan
203b7(dkon brtsegs): gnaso// sha ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i bla ma yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel yang rgyas par gyur te/ 'di ga ste dper na/ ngang yangasu byas
203b8(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa'i ring bsrel rgyas par 'gyur ba bzhin no// sha ri'i bu de'i tshe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i bla ma de yongasu mya ngan 'das nas lo brgya lon pa na byang chub sems dpa' gcig gcig
204a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan zhig nas shi 'phos te de'i gsung rab la rgyal rig su skyes par gyur te/ de btsas ma thag tu bdag ni chos mang ba'i rigasu skyes kyis/ bdag gis chos spyad par
204a2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o zhes tshig de skad smras te/ de'i ming chos spyod ces btags so// shA ri'i bu de nas rgyal bu chos sbyong dbang po yongasu smin pa'i rgyus skyes nas/ lo nyi shu lon pa 'dra ba de dang bas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ dgon
204a3(dkon brtsegs): pa nags tshal gnas pas mtha'i gnas mal du granas so// de gcig pu dben par song ste/ nang du yang dag 'jog pa na/ lnga zhig 'ongs nas dge slong khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dag btsem pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
204a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas sgra grags par 'gyur gyis// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs la brtson par gyis shig/ ma thob par brtson 'grus nyams par ma byed cig ces don de bstan pa dang ngas
204a5(dkon brtsegs): lha de las tshig de bos nas// ngaga' mgu yid rangs rab tu dag ba ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor
204a6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldongs nas ljongs su byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kun tu tshol zhing rjes spyod de/ de gang dang gang du dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra bar dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma mthong ba dang / de dag
204a7(dkon brtsegs): gri gam du song nas 'phags pa byang chub sems dpas gang la bslabs na/ sangs rgyas kyis chos rnams kyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs gang lags zhes dris pa dang / 
204a8(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis smras pa/ dge slong bdag cag gis// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i chos kyis rnam grangs de ci 'dra ba de mi shes te dge slong bdag cag gis ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sde snod kyi chos kyi
204b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs kyi ming deng gdong rnapas thos bang ngo gas smras pa dang / de 'di sam du sems te/ lhani rdzun mi zer gyis ji srid du byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod rgya chos kyi rnam grangs ma thos pa sri brtson 'grus mas
204b2(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o snyam nas/ nges tshe dang ldan pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i bla ma gang du zhugs la bzhen ces dris pa dang / de dag gis dge slong sa phyogs 'dir/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga rtse
204b3(dkon brtsegs): ba pad+ma'i bla ma de zhugs la bzhen te// zhes phyogs de bstan nas/ nges phyogs ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / sa phyogs der bskor ba byas nas// sa phyogs de nyid du phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
204b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa pad+ma'i bla ma de mngon du byas nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te// ji srid du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs papa de'i bla ma de las/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyis chos kyi rnams
204b5(dkon brtsegs): grangs mngon du ma thos pa de srid du/ bdag sa phyogs 'di nas mi ldang zhing // skyil mo krungs mi gzhig go snyam mo// sha ri'i bu de ltar rgyal po drang srong brtson 'grus ma nyams pas de lta bur
