226a7(dkon brtsegs): pa rab rib sdug po bsal ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad la snang ba thob ste// shes rab kyi snang ba'o// de snang thob nas/ dge ba'i ngang mi dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu shes te/ de srog gi phyir yang mi dge ba'i chos la mi gnas
226a8(dkon brtsegs): te rnga de mi dge ba'i chos rnams spang ba'i phyir// ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams rtogs pas nas/ dge ba thub pa zhi ba zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsung so// ji ltar mun pas khyab sgribs
226b1(dkon brtsegs): bang khyim du zhugs par gyur na ni// yod par gyur pa'i gzugs rnams kyang // mig gis mthong bar mi 'gyuraro// de bzhin du ni 'di la yang // la la'i mi ngag skyes gyur kyang // dge ba dang ni sdig pa'i chos ma thos par ni shes par
226b2(dkon brtsegs): 'grub/ thos nas chos rnams rnam par shes// thos nas sdig pa sten mi byed// thos nas gnong par spong bar byed// thos nas mya ngan 'das pa thob// thob par 'dod pa'i 'thob pa 'phel/ thos pa shes rab 'phel rab 'gyur/ shes
226b3(dkon brtsegs): rab kyis ni don rnams sbyong // don thob nas ni bde thob 'gyur/ don thob de ni yid rdo ste// tshe 'di la ni mya ngan 'das// chos la sbyor zhing gtsang la mkhas// shin tu bde ba 'thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ni/ thos nas
226b4(dkon brtsegs): chos cing gnas par 'gyur/ 'jig rten la ni snang gyur nas/ byang chub kyi ni spyad pa skyo/ sha ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// sha ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpar
226b5(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod 'dzin pa'i gang zag la dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du she/ sa bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grang
226b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di zhing la/ shin tu byung bar byed/ rnam par dag par byed de/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod 'di'i don gyi phyir// 'dun pa skye 'bang bar byed// brtson 'grus rtsom par byed/ sems la rab tu 'dzin par byed/ de yang dag par
226b7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'jog par byed de/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi la rab tu zhugs pas/ chos thams cad sgrib pa med pa'athob bo// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsung so// chos smra ba ni gang yin pa/ 
226b8(dkon brtsegs): de la dge ba'i bshesu sems// rtag par nan tan gnas gyur nas// chos la nan tan byas te nyan// rtag par 'dun pa 'bri mi byed// rtag par brtson 'grus shin tu 'phags// rtag par shes rab rnam par spyod // ye shes
227a1(dkon brtsegs): la ni rtag tu gnas// de ni bdag nyid chos shes te// nga pa'i phyir ni 'gro ma byed// sangs rgyas kyis ni gang bshad pa// mi g.yo ba'i chos sheso// mkhas pa de dag tshig rnams 'byed la ma la/ 
227a2(dkon brtsegs): bslabs pa don la khong du chud par byed// de dag dkar po'i phyogs ni rnam par sbyong // nag po'i phyogs ni rtag tu sbyong bar byed// de'i sems la nams kyang nyams pa med// de ni chos rnams chos gang la'ang zhum pa med// lus
227a3(dkon brtsegs): yang de bzhin gshegs dang brtson 'grus dang // 'dun pa'ang myur du thob par 'gyur// chos thos nas ni shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur/ ye shes rnam par rtogs nas dran mi nyams// dran dang ye shes la ni rtag gnas na/ dge
227a4(dkon brtsegs): dang mi dge ba'i chos ni rab tu shes// bla na med pa'i chos rnams pa slangs nas ni// rtogs dang dran pa shes rab rtogs mchog bo// ji ltar bdag nyid yun ring bslabs pa bzhin// des ni sems can
227a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi bsams pa shes// chos bslabs nas ni khyad par 'thob/ 'gyur te/ khyad par 'thob cing ye shes ngag gyur nas// de ni/ sems can rnams kyi bsams pa shes// de phyir bsam pa bzhin du
227a6(dkon brtsegs): chos ston to// sha ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya
227a7(dkon brtsegs): pad bam po bcu bdun pa// sha ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ de ltar blo sbyangs pa dang / de ltar chos snang ba'i sgo shin tu yongs su dag pas 'di ltar slob ste/ 'phags
227a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yang dag par lta ba 'byung ba ni/ rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ gzhan gyi sgra dang / bdag nyid tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'o// de 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhan gyi sgra de gang bdag nyid tshul bzhin yid la
227b1(dkon brtsegs): byed pa de gang zhe na/ de de ltar tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na/ 'di snyam du sems par 'gyur te// rnal 'byor rgyas dang ngag byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma thos// 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba ma thos par/ 
227b2(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin tsam gyis dga' ba rnyed nas// nga rgyal gyi dbang gyis che ba'i nga rgyal du lhung ba de dag ni/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 
227b3(dkon brtsegs): 'khrug pa las yongs su mi thar/ sdug bsngal gyi phung po las yongs su mi thar te/ de dag la de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs nas/ 'di skad gsung so// pha rol le rje su 'thun pa thos pa ni dga' ba dang / 'chi ba las rnam
227b4(dkon brtsegs): bar grol ba'o// yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs ga chos rnam/ ras thos nas rnam par shes// thos nas sdig pa mi byed de// bos nas gnod pa spong bar 'gyur// thos nas mya ngan 'das pa 'bob// bos 'dod
227b5(dkon brtsegs): thos pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro// thos pas shes rab 'phel bar/ 'gyur// shes rab kyis ni ngon rnams skyong // don rnyed nas ni bde/ 'phob 'gyur// don rnyeng de ni yid rdo ste// tshe 'di la ni mya ngan 'das// chos
227b6(dkon brtsegs): gtsang mkhas pa gtsang ba dang // mchog tu bde ba thob par 'gyur// sha ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa'/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs/ 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba shin tu mnyan par bya/ 
227b7(dkon brtsegs): blang bar bya/ gzung bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o// sha ri'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs mi nyan pa dang / tshul bzhin
227b8(dkon brtsegs): du sbyor bar mi byed pa de dag ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yongasu nyams par mi 'gyur te// de la dgongs nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'di skad bdag nyid tshul bzhin yid la byed pa mi rga ba dang / 'chi ba las grol ba'o// zhes
227'a1(dkon brtsegs): gsung ngo // nga 'di ltar slob ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhin sbyor ba ni gang / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhir sbyor ba yin sA pa nas/ de 'di ltar slob ste/ byang chub sems dpa' yin
227'a2(dkon brtsegs): gang stso la byed/ rang tu sbyor bar mi byeng// tshul bzhin du sbyor ba zhes bya ba de ni/ mi sbyor ba'i tshig bla drag so// gnan yang byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du sbyor ba'i sgra 'byin par mi byed/ zlos pa 'byin par mi byed/ 
227'a3(dkon brtsegs): gang nas sgra 'byung ba de yang mi dmigs// sgra de nyid gang nas byung // gang du 'gag ces sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' la rtog par byed de// gang smras pa dang / gang smra ba dang / gang smra bar 'gyur ba dang / gang gis smras dang / gang
227'a4(dkon brtsegs): gis smra bar 'gyur ba dang / gang spong ba'i phyir smras pa dang / gang spong ba'i phyir smra ba dang / gang spong ba'i phyir smra bar 'gyur ba dang / gang khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir smras pa dang / gang khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir sla ba
227'a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / gang khong du chud bar bya ba'i phyir smra bar 'gyur ba de thams// cad yongasu btsal na// 'das pa'i rnam pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i rnam pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i rnam par mi dmigs pa de ni/ de'i tshul
227'a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin sbyor ba'o zhes de de ltar slog/ byang chub sems dpa' de ltar tshul bzhin du sbyor bas/ ji ltar mtshul bzhin du mthong zhe na/ de 'di ltar slob ste/ gang gi chen byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad// 
227'a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gyis 'gags par mthong de'i tshe/ tshul bzhin mthong ngo // gang gi tshe chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis nye bar zhi bar mthong ba de'i tshe/ tshul bzhin mthong // gang gi tshe chos thams cad rnam par zhi bar
227'a8(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba de'i tshe/ tshul bzhin mthong // gang gi tshe chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis snyoms par ma zhugs par mthong ba de'i tshe/ tshul bzhin mthong ngo // gang gi tshe chos thams cad ma skyes par mthong ba de'i tshe tshul
227'b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin mtho // gang gi tshe chos thams cad ma byung bar mthong ba de'i tshe/ tshul bzhin mthong ngo // gang gi tshe chos thams cad shin tu yang dag par ma byung bar mthong ba de'i tshe tshul bzhin mthong // gang gis chos thams cad
227'b2(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das par mthong ba de'i tshe/ tshul bzhin mthong // de gang gis mthong ba de la yang rtog ste/ ci nas kyang mi mthong ba dang / mi rtog pa de ltar mthong ngo // de ltar mthong na tshul bzhin mthong ba zhes bya'o// yang 'di ltar
227'b3(dkon brtsegs): slob ste// byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni/ chos gang la yang the tsom dang rmongs pa med do// tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni chos gang la yang sgrib pa medado// tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni chos gang la yang gang thar pa'i sgor mi
227'b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba med do// tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni chos gang yang spang bar bya ba 'i phyir 'bad pa medo// tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni chos gang la yang rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'bad pa med de/ gang chos thams cad yang dag par mtho
227'b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba de ni yang dag par lta ba'o// chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta/ ste ma mthong ba'o// ma mthong ba zhes bya ba de ni ma skyes pa'i tshig bla
227'b6(dkon brtsegs): drag so// ma skyes pa zhes bya ba ni yang dag par ma byang ba'i tshig bla drag so// yang dag par ma byung ba zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ de ni mi snang ba'i tshig bla dwags te/ de bzhin gshegs pas de la dgongs nas/ 'du byed thams
227'b7(dkon brtsegs): cang mi skye bar mthong na/ yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la 'jug ste/ 'di lta ste yang dag pa nyi du nges pa la 'jug pa de ni// yang dag par lta ba'o zhes de skad gsung ngo // de 'di snyam du sems te// ci'i phyir zhe na yang dag pa
227'b8(dkon brtsegs): nyi du nges pa la 'jug pa zhes bya zhes de 'di ltar slob ste/ chos thams cad gang dang mnyam pa sangs rgyas kyi chos de dang mnyam ste// de bas na yang dag pa nyi nges pa la 'jug pa'o// de lta bas na yang dag pa nyi nges
228a1(dkon brtsegs): pa la 'jug 'dod pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zhing shin tu mnyan par bya/ blang bar ba/ gzung bar bya/ klag par bya/ kur chud par bya'o// byang
228a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid la yang tshul bzhin du sbyor bar bya ste/ sha ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod// sha ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub se der
228a3(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ltar/ blo shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa dang / de ltar chos snang ba'i sgo shin tu yongs su dag pas// tshul bzhin du 'jug pa la brtson/ tshul bzhin gyi tshig mthong // de la tshul
228a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du 'jug pa gang / tshul gyi tshig gang zhe na/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i tshig bzhin du 'jug pa ni/ 'di lta ste zhi gnas kyi gnas la 'jug pa dang / lhag mthong rnam par rtog pa la 'jug
228a5(dkon brtsegs): pa ni tshul bzhin du 'jug pa'o// lus dben par 'jug pa dang / sems yid du 'ong bar 'jug pa dang / chang pa ma yin par 'jug pa dang / rtag pa ma yin par 'jug pa dang / rgyu dang rkyen
228a6(dkon brtsegs): la 'jug pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gang zag med pa la 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs ma phyin mi gnas pa la 'jug pa dang / mi 'pho ba dang / 
228a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyu dang 'bras bu chud mi za ba dang / rgyu stong pa nyid du rnam par 'byed pa la 'jug pa dang / mtshan ma med pa 'dris par bya ba la 'jug pa dang / smon pa med pa rab tu shes pa la 'jug kyang stong pa nyid dang / smon pa med pa lnga
228a8(dkon brtsegs): par 'jug pa ma yin pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa len pa la 'jug kyang / ting 'dzin gyi dbang gis skye ba la mi 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa'i ye shes len pa la 'jug kyang / zag
228b1(dkon brtsegs): pa zad pa la mi 'jug pa dang / mi skye bar rtog pa la 'jug kyang / nges par gyur par 'gro ba la mi 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad bdag med par rtog par 'jug kyang / snying rje chen po gtong ba la mi 'jug pa dang / 
228b2(dkon brtsegs): skye ba thams cad 'jig par mthong ba 'jug pa dang / srid pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa len pa la 'jug pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa 'dod pa la 'jug kyang / chos mngon tu bya ba la mi 'jug pa dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan
228b3(dkon brtsegs): gyi dga' ba btang snyoms pa la 'jug kyang / chos kyi dga' ba 'dor ba la mi 'jug pa dang / rtog pa spros pa thams cad gtong ba 'jug kyang / thabs mkhas pa gtong ba la mi 'jug pa ste/ shA ri'i bu de ni tshul bzhin
228b4(dkon brtsegs): du 'jug pa zhes bya'o// sha ri'i bu tshul bzhin gyi tshig ces bya na na/ rigs pa'i tshig de ni tshul bzhin gyi tshi go/ sha ri'i bu gzha na yang tshul bzhin gyi tshig de ni tshul gyi tshigo// de ni sgo'i tsho go// de ni
228b5(dkon brtsegs): kha'i tshig go// de ni rgyu'i tshigo// de ni rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i tshig go// de ni 'gal ba'i tshig go// de ni mi rtsod pa'i tshigo/ de ni btang snyoms kyi tshi go/ mi len pa'i tshig dang / mi 'dor ba'i tshig
228b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / ma spros pa'i tshig dang / mi bsnang ba'i tshig dang / mi 'bri bi'i tshig dang / mi skye ba'i tshig dang / rtsod pa'i bzhi med pa'i tshig dang / mi ldog pa'i tshig dang / gnyen po med pa'i tshig dang / de kho na tshig dang / de bzhin kho ni
228b7(dkon brtsegs): tshig dang / ma log pa de bzhin nyid kyi tshig dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi tshig dang / de bzhin nyid kyi tshig dang / ji lta ba bzhin nyid kyi tshig dang / dus gsum mnyam pa'i tshig dang / yong su chad pa'i tshig dang / gzug
228b8(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i gnas med pa'i tshig dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gnas med pa'i tshi go// de ni mig dang / gzugs dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams gnas med pa'i tshig/ 
229a1(dkon brtsegs): de ni rna ba dang / sgra dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gnas med pa'i tshig go// de ni sna dang / dri ngang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gnas med pa'i tshig go// de ni lce dang / ro dang / lce'i/ 
229a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i khams gnas med pa'i tshig go// de ni lus dang / reg dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gnas med pa'i tshi go// de ni yid dang / chos dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gnas med pa'i tshi go// de ni
229a3(dkon brtsegs): don la rton pa'i tshig go// da ni ye shes la rton pa'i tshi go// de ni nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la ston pa'i tshig ste/ sha ri'i bu de ni tshul bzhin gyi tshi go// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du 'jug pa la brtson pa/ tshul bzhin gyi
229a4(dkon brtsegs): tshig mthong ba ni/ de gang gis mthong ba de nyid mthong ste/ ji ltar mi mthong rnam par mi mthong ba de ltar mthong // de ltar mthong na tshul bzhin mthong ba zhes bya'o// shA ri'i bu yang byang chub sems dpa' tshul
229a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du sbyor ba ni/ chos gang la yang rmongs par mi 'gyuro// byang chub se/ mas dpa' tshul bzhin du sbyor ba la chos gang yang gang thar/ pa'i sgor mi 'gyur ba medado// tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni chos gang yang
229a6(dkon brtsegs): spong ba'i phyir 'bad pa me do// tshul bzhin du sbyor ba chos gang yang rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'bad pa med de gang chos thams cad yang dag par mthong ba dang / ji lta ba bzhin mthong ba de ni yang dag par lta ba'o// chos thams cad
229a7(dkon brtsegs): ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste mi mthong po mi mthong ba gang zhe na/ de ni ma skyes pa'i tshig bla drag so// ma skyes pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ de ni mi snang ba'i bar gyi tshig bla dwag so// rgya cher ji ltar snga bzlas pa de
229a8(dkon brtsegs): ltar de bzhin du bzlas par bya ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod // shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'di ltar slob ste// chos pa'o/ 
229b1(dkon brtsegs): tshul bzhin te/ ji ltar bdag med pa de bzhin du/ chos thams cad bdag med par mthong ngo // ji ltar sems can bdag med pa de bzhin du/ chos thams cad bdag med par mthong ste/ de ltar mthong na tshul bzhin du mthong ngo // 
229b2(dkon brtsegs): gang tshul bzhin 'khor ba'i khams mthong ba de tshul bzhin mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams dang ldan par mthong ba ste/ de ni tshul bzhin du sbyor ba zhes bya'o// de ni chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin du
229b3(dkon brtsegs): bye brag med pa dang ldan par mthong ngo // rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor mi yin pa yang mi snyem so// tshul bzhin du sbyor bas tshul bzhin mthong ste// tshul bzhin gyi sbyor ba ji snyed pa sems can gyi gnas thams cad kyang de snyed
229b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi gnas kyang mi mthong / chos kyi gnas kyang 'khrug par mi byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhin sbyor ba ste/ sha ri Ni bu de ltar na rnam pa 'di dang thos pa ni// tshul bzhin du 'jug pa
229b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di dang / tshul bzhin mthong ba 'di dang / ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba'i/ rgyu 'thun pa 'di dang / 'di dag ni shes rab ces bya ste/ sha ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
229b6(dkon brtsegs): pa la spyod do// sha ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ 'dus byas la spyod pa'i chos thams cad la shes rab kyis gnas pa yin te/ 'di lta ste ma rig pa dang lhan cig tu
229b7(dkon brtsegs): mi gnas/ 'du byed rnams dang lhan cig tu mi gnas pa nas rgyas par bya ste/ rga shi'i bar du lhan cig tu mi gnas// bdag tu lta ba dang ldan gcig tu mi gnas/ bdag tu lta ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i lta bar gyur pa
229b8(dkon brtsegs): drug bcu brtsa gnyis dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ mtho bar sems pa dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ dma' bar sems pa dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad rnams dang / lhan cig tu mi gnas/ 
230a1(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal dang / che ba'i nga rgyal dang / log pa'i nga rgyal nas le ba'i nyon mongs pa'i shu'i bar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ cher po dang / 'bring po dang / phra mo ras nyon phongs pa thams cad kyi bar dang ldan
230a2(dkon brtsegs): cig tu mi gnas/ gti mug gi bud pa rab rib kyi ling ngong gis sgrib pa dang / chod par byed pa kun tu dkris te 'dug pa nas ngas pa'i chos thams cad kyi bar dang ldan cig tu mi garas rtsod pa'i sdog pa dang / nyon mongs dang
230a3(dkon brtsegs): phung po dang / lha'i bu dang / 'chi bdag gi bdud nas bdud thams cad kyi las kyi bar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ bdag dang sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / gang zag dang / shed bu dang / shed las skyes pa nas bdag
230a4(dkon brtsegs): tu lta ba thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ las kyi sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / lta ba'i sgrib pa dang / rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pa dang / mi shes pa'i sgrib paras bag chags
230a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig tu mi gan/ sa/ kun tu rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / mtshan ma dang / dmigs pa dang / mthong ba dang / dran pa dang / rnam par rigs pa dang / 
230a6(dkon brtsegs): mdud pa'i sgro 'dogs pa thams cad dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ ser sna dang / gtong ba dang / tshul khrims dang / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / gnod sems dang / brtson 'grus dang / le lo dang / bsam
230a7(dkon brtsegs): gtan dang / g.yeng ba dang / shes rab dang / 'chal pa'i shes rab nas pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs dang mi 'thun pa'i phyogs dang / shes pa dang / mi shes pa'i bar thams cad dang / lhan cig tu mi gnas nges pa dang / 
230a8(dkon brtsegs): mnges pa dang / log par nges pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / kha na ma tho ba dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa nas chos thams cad kyi gnyen po'i bar dang lhan cig mi gnas/ 
230b1(dkon brtsegs): zhing sna tshogs dang sangs rgyas sna tshogs dang / sems cad sna tshogs dang / chos sna tshogs nas/ sna tshogs thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas mi shes pa dang / rnam par shes dang / kun rdzob dang / don dam
230b2(dkon brtsegs): pa nas sems can thams cad kyi mtshan ma yid la byed pa dag dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ shes rab mi rgyu ba dang / lus med pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / mtshan pa med pa dang / 'du ma byas nas yid la byed pa tham
230b3(dkon brtsegs): cang dang / sems dang rnam par shes pa'i gnas dag gi bar dang / lhan cig tu mi gnas te/ de dge gzhan yang 'dus byas la spyod pa'i chos dpag tu med pa dag dang lhan cig tu mi gan so// de ltar na byang chub sems
230b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab de ni/  dus byas kyi sbyong ba thams cad dang lhan cig tu mi gnas te/ sha ri de'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir ba la
230b5(dkon brtsegs): spyod // shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la gnas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'byed mkhas pa
230b6(dkon brtsegs): yir te/ chos thams cad la mkhas pa rjesu 'thob bo// de la shes rab rnam par 'byed pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phung po la mkhas pa dang / khams la mkhas pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa dang / bden pa la mkhas pa dang / so
230b7(dkon brtsegs): so yang dag par rig pa la mkhas pa dang / rton pa la mkhas pa dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ye shes la mkhas pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa dang / lam la mkhas pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas
230b8(dkon brtsegs): pang bcu ste/ mkhas pa rnam pa bcu po 'di dag gi rnam par byed pa gang yin pa de mi shes rab rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya'o// de ladung po mkhas pa gang zhe na/ gang di pung po rnams kyi per bya ba bstan pa/ 'di lta ste/ 
231a1(dkon brtsegs): dbu ba rdos pa lta bur bstan pa dang / smig rgyu lta bur bstan pa dang / chu bur lta bur bstan pa dang / chu shing lta bur bstadang dang / sgyu ma lnga bur bstan pa dang / rmi lam lta bu
231a2(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa dang / brag ca lta bur bstan pa dang / mig yor lta bur bstan pa dang / gzugs brnyan lta bur bstan pa'o// gzugs ni chu'i dbu ba lta bu ste/ dbu ba la yang bdag med sems can med/ srog med/ gang zag med/ skyes bu
231a3(dkon brtsegs): bengang shes las skyes pa med/ dbu ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa/ gzugs kyang de'i rang bzhin te/ gang de la mkhas pa de ni phung po ma khas pa zhes bya'o// tshor ba ni chu'i chu bur lta bu ste/ chu bung la yang bdag med/ sems can srog
231a4(dkon brtsegs): med gang zag med/ shed bu med sheng las skyes pa med/ skye ba po med de chu bur gyi rang bzhin gang yin pa tshor ba yang rang bzhin yin te/ gang de la mkhas pa 'di ni phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// 'du shes ni
231a5(dkon brtsegs): smig rgyu lta bu ste/ smig rgyu la yang bdag med/ sems can med pa nas skyes bu'i bar du med do// smig rgyu'i rang bzhin gang yin pa'// du shes kyang de'i rang bzhin yin te/ gang de la mkhas pa de ni phung po la
231a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa zhes bya'o// 'du byed rnams ni chu shing lta bu ste/ chu shing la yang bdag med/ sems can med/ srog med pa nas skyes bu'i bar du med pa ste/ chu shing gi rang bzhin gang yin pa 'du byed dag kyang de'i rang bzhin
231a7(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ gang de la mkhas pa de ni phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu ste sgyu ma la yang bdag med/ sems can med/ srog med/ gang zag med/ sheng du med/ sheng las skyes pa med/ byed pa po
231a8(dkon brtsegs): med/ tshor rab po med pa ste/ sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gang yin pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yang dayin te/ gang de la mkhas pa de ni phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang phung po rnams shes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten yin
231b1(dkon brtsegs): te 'jig rten kyang 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid // 'jig rten rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa/ phung po rnams kyi rang bzhin yang de yin// yang 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi rtag pa'i rang bzhin dang / sdug bsngal
231b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi rang bzhin te/ phung po yang de'i rang bzhi no// gang de mkhas pa de ni phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' phung po la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de la mkhas la mkhas
231b3(dkon brtsegs): pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyi khams ni sa'i khams mod kyi/ chos kyi khams sra ba'i mtshan nyid ma yino// chos kyi khams ni chu'i khams mod kyi/ chos kyi khams brlan pa'i mtshan nyid mi yi no// chos kyi khams ni
231b4(dkon brtsegs): me'i khams mod kyi/ chos kyi khams tsha ba'i mtshan nyid ma yino// / chos kyi khams ni rlung gi khams mod kyi/ chos kyi khams g.yo ba'i mtshan nyid ma yino// chos kyi khams ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i
231b5(dkon brtsegs): khams mod kyi/ chos kyi khams mthong ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin// chos kyi khams rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mod kyi tshe sa kyi khams sgra rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid ma yino// chos kyi khams ni sngan
231b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i khams mod kyi/ chos kyi khams dri sdom pa'i mtshan nyid ma yino// chos kyi khams ni lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mod kyi/ chos kyi khams ro myong ba'i mtshan nyid mi yi no// chos kyi khams ni
231b7(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i mod kyi/ chos kyi khams reg pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// chos kyi khams ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mod kyi/ chos kyi khams rnam par bsgom pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// chos kyi khams
231b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / bdag gi khams de ni mtshung so// 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams ni mtshung so// 'khor ba'i khams dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams de mtshung so// de ltar chos
232a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi khams dang / namakha'i khams de tshungs te/ spong pa cing dang mtshungs/ mi 'gyur ba dang mtshungs pas mtshungs te/ 'dus byas kyi kham su 'jug pa dang / 'dus
232a2(dkon brtsegs): ma byas kyi khamasu 'jug pa'i phyir/ de la bshad pa dpag tu med de/ gang khams la 'jug pa des rab tu rnam par 'byed pa de ni mkhas pa zhes bya'o// de ltar na khams la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sed
232a3(dkon brtsegs): ngan po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de la byang chub sems dpa' skye mched la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ 'di la mig bdag dang bdag gi stong pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' mig gi rang bzhin 'di lta bu'o zhes/ 
232a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' skye mched la mkhas pa'o// gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ de bzhi na du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid bdag dang / bdag
232a5(dkon brtsegs): gis stong pa ste byang chub sems dpa' yid kyi rang bzhin ni 'i/ lta bu'o zhes/ yang dag paji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes me de bsogs pa'i phyir gang skye mched la kun pasogs pa dang / sna tshogs/ 
232a6(dkon brtsegs): sogs pa de dag sogs par mi byed cing / dge dang mi dge ba'i chos rnams la 'du shes gnyi su mi 'jug ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye mchod la mkhas pa'o// 'di ni mig gi skye mche // 'di ni gzugs kyi skye ma
232a7(dkon brtsegs): ngo zhes de ltar mig dang gzugs rnams la 'dod chags med par mthong yang 'dod chags med pa mngon du mi byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa'o// rna ba dang / sgra dang / sna dang dri/ lce dang ro// yid
232a8(dkon brtsegs): dang chos/ gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' yid dang chos kyi bar du/ 'dod chags med par mthong mod kyi/ 'dod chags med pa mngon du mi byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched
232b1(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa'o// skye mched ces bya ba yang 'phags pa'i skye mched dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye mched de/ de la 'phags pa'i skye mched ni gang lam sdud par bye'o// 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye mched ni gang lam gtong ba
232b2(dkon brtsegs): byed pa 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa ni/ sems can lam la brtson pa bor zhing gnas pa la/ snying rje chen po 'thob cing / lam gyi skye mched kyang mi gtong ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la
232b3(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa'o// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gang la byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la 'jug pa
232b4(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa ni/ rnam pa bzhi ste/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid bdag dang bdag gis stong pa de/ byang chub sems dpa'i yid kyi rang bzhin ni 'di lta bu'o zhes/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes
232b5(dkon brtsegs): te/ dge ba sogs pa'i phyir gang skye mched la kun sogs pa dang / sna tshogs sogs pa de dag sogs par mi byed cing / da ge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos rnams la 'du shes gnyi su mi 'jug te/ 
232b6(dkon brtsegs): de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa'o// 'di ni mig gi skye mched // 'di ni gzugs kyi skye mched do zhes de ltar mig dang gzugs rnams la 'dod chags med par mthong yang 'dod chags med pa mngon
232b7(dkon brtsegs): tu mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa'o// rna ba dang sgra/ snga dang dri/ lce dang ro// lus dang reg ying dang chos/ gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' yid dang chos kyi bar du/ 'dod
232b8(dkon brtsegs): chags meng bar mthong med kyi/ 'dod chags med pa mngon tu mi byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa'o// skye mched ces bya ba yang / 'phags pa'i skyer ched dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye mched
233a1(dkon brtsegs): deng de la 'phags pa'i skye mched ni dang 'am sdud par byed pa'o// phags pa ma yin pa'i skye mched ni gang / lam gtong bar byed pa 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa ni/ sems can
233a2(dkon brtsegs): la la brtson pa bor zhig gnas pa la/ snying rje chen po 'thob cing / lam gyi skye mched kyang mi gtong ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa'o// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skye mched la mkhas pa shes rab
233a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de la byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la 'jug pa mkhas pa ni/ rnam pa bzhi ste/ 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal shes pa dang / 
233a4(dkon brtsegs): kun 'byung ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / lam shes dnga'o// de la sdug bsngal shes pa gang zhe na/ gang phung po rnams la mi skye bar shes pa de ni/ sdug bsngal shes pa zhes bya'o// de la
233a5(dkon brtsegs): kun 'byung ba shes pa gang zhe na/ gang sred pa 'joms bden kun 'byung ba shes pa zhes bya'o// de la 'gog pa shes pa gang zin/ gang mi 'ardud mi 'jig pa'i shes pa de ni/ 'gog pa shes pa
233a6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o// de la lam shes pa gang zhe na/ gang mnyam pa nyid thob pa'i chos rnams la sgro 'dogs pa de ni/ lam shes pa zhes bya'o// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bden pa 'di bani de ltar shes rab kyis
233a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir mngon tu mi byed pa de ni/ bden pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang bden pa la mkhas pa rnam pa gsum ste/ 'di lta ste/ kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang / don dam pa'i bden
233a8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mtshan nyid kyi bden pa'o// de la kun rdzob kyi bden pa na/ 'jig rten gyi tha srad ji snyed pa dang / yi ge dang / sgra dang / brdar bstan pa ste/ de ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa zhes bya'o// de la don dam pa'i bden pa gang zhe na/ 
233b1(dkon brtsegs): gang la sems kyi rgyu ba yang med na/ yi ge lta ci smos te/ de ni don dam pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// de la mtshan nyid kyi bden pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan nyid thams cad mtshan nyid gcig la/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ni
233b2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid med pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' kun rdzob kyi bden pa 'chad pas mi skyo/ don dam pa'i bden pa mngon du mi byed par mi ltung / mtshan nyid kyi bden pa mtshan nyid med pas rtogs par byed pa de ni/ byang
233b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang bden pa ni gcig pu gnyis ma yin pa ste/ 'di lta ste 'gog pa'i bden pa'o// de la bden pa gcig pu la gang sgro mi 'dogs pa dang / sems can sgro 'dog
233b4(dkon brtsegs): par ltung ba rnams la bden pa sbyor bar byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang phung po lnga rnams ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang phung po lnga rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi mtshan
233b5(dkon brtsegs): shing de ni/ sdug bsngal zhes bya'o// sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid kyi gang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid rtogs de ni/ sdug bsngal 'pha/ gas pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// gang phung po lnga rnams kyi bag la
233b6(dkon brtsegs): nyal rgyu sred pa las byung ba'i lta ba de ni/ kun 'byung ba'i bden pa'o// gang sred pa'i rgyu lta ba de la yang sgro mi 'dogs/ mi len mi snyems pa de ni/ kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// gang phung po lnga rnams shin tu
233b7(dkon brtsegs): zang po'i phyir/ 'gog pa sngon gyi mthar ma byung / phyi ma'i mthar mi 'pho ga nga ltar byung bar mi gnas pa/ de ni 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// gang lam la brten nas sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba
233b8(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa la ying reg par byed pa/ rjes las rtogs pa'i shes pa yang thob par byed pa de ni/ sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gyur ba lam 'bas pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// gang bden pa shes pade
234a1(dkon brtsegs): la rnam par rtog pa de dang / sems can yongs brtags pa la rtog par byed pa de byang chub sems dpa' bden pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang tshor ba thams cad sdug bsngal/ 
234a2(dkon brtsegs): ba ste/ de la tsher bar byas pa rnam par 'byed pa dang / blos rig pa nyid/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes pa'o// rgyu gang gis kun 'byung ba shes pa'i rgyu de ji lta ba yang dag par rab tu shes pa de ni kun 'byur
234a3(dkon brtsegs): ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// gang tshor ba gtong zhing ma tshor ba tshor bar byed pa dang / 'gog pa la yang so sor rtog la/ tshor ba 'gog pa yang mngon tu mi byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags
234a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// tshor ba gang gis gzings dang 'dra ba'i lam de sdud par byed la/ tshor ba dgos pa yang ma yin/ lam gyi dgos dpa yang ma yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sdug bsngal 'gog
234a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// de ltar rta/ gas nas bden pa de bzhi la mnyam par mthong zhing / mthong ba shin tu dag pa'ang ma yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa
234a6(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang skye ba sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang mi skyo ba la so sor rtog pa shes pa de ni/ sdug bsngal shes pa zhes bya'o// srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba ste/ gang srid pa 'jig par shes pa de ni/ kun
234a7(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba shes pa zhes bya'o// skye ba thams cad gang gis mi skye ba shes la/ de la 'gog pa gang yang med cing / gang mi 'gog par shes pa de ni/ zad pa 'gog par shes pa zhes bya'o// gang de ltar tshor ba dang / 'jal
234a8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / yongasu tshol ba dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / 'jug pa'i shes pa de ni lam shes pa zhes bya ste/ gang bden pa'i shes pa de la gzhog par byed kyang / bden pa'i shes pa de la mi gnas pa de ni/ byang chub
234b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i bded pa la mkhas pa ste/ de ltar dubyang chub sems dpa bden pa la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de la byang chub 'ad mo ga lag sa gnen padang tu dumamasas
234b2(dkon brtsegs): rigs pa spe/ bani gang shen/ 'di sa stedo/  yang ga ni pa dang chos sol / yin na sa rlo rjod cig so// de la don so so yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na/ gang chos rnams la don dam pa'i tshig tu shes pa dang / gnyi su med pa'i rgyu shes
234b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rkyen shes pa dang / 'dus shes pa dang / mtha' med pa'i rjesu 'gro ba dang / rten pa las 'jug pa shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa shes pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyi rje su 'jug pa shes pa dang / yang
234b4(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i mtha'i mi gnas pa shes pa dang / stong pa nyid rjes gas pa shes pa dang / mtshan ma med pa rtogs pa shes pa dang / smon pa med pa la smon pa med par shes pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed
234b5(dkon brtsegs): pa la mngon par 'du mi byed par shes pa dang / tshul gcig tu 'ju ga pa shes pa dang / sems can med par 'jug par shes pa/ dang / bdag med par 'jug pa shes pa dang / srog med pa byed pa
234b6(dkon brtsegs): gcig pa shes pa dang / gang zag med pa don dam par shes pa dang / 'das pa'i dus la ma chags par shes pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la mtha' med par shes pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus la thams cad du shes pa
234b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / phung po rnams la sgyu mar shes pa dang / khams rnams la sbrul gdug pa dang mtshungs par shes pa dang / skye mched rnams la stong pa nyid du nges par rtog pa shes pa dang / nang zhi ba shes pa dang / phyi rol du
234b8(dkon brtsegs): mi rgyu ba shes pa dang / yul la yul med par shes pa dang / dran pa la gnasu shes pa dang / rtogs pa la khong du chud par shes pa dang / blo gros la mngon sum du shes pa dang / bden pa la rab tu rtog par shes
235a1(dkon brtsegs): bdang / sdug bsngal la mi 'byung bar shes pa dang / kun 'thung ba la mngon par 'du mi byed par shes pa dang / 'gog pa la mtshan nyid med par shes pa dang / las la sgrol bar shes pa dang / chos la tshig
235a2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu tha dad par shes pa dang / dbang po rnams la 'jug par shes pa dang / stobs rnams la mi rdzi bar shes pa dang / zhi gnas la gnasu shes pa dang / lhag mthong la snang bar shes pa dang / sgyu ma la sgrub par shes pa dang / 
235a3(dkon brtsegs): smig rgyu la 'khrul par shes pa dang / rmi lam la mi bden pa mthob par shes pa dang / brag cha la rkyen la 'jug par shes pa dang / mig yor la 'pho bar shes pa dang / mtshan nyid sna tshogs la mtshan nyid gceg
235a4(dkon brtsegs): tu shes pa dang / 'du ba la 'bral bar shes pa dang / rab tu sbyangs pa la phyir mtshams sbyor ba med pa shes pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa dal sgra'i rjesu 'gro bar 'byug pa shes pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg
235a5(dkon brtsegs): ba la rten pa la 'jug par shes shing / dben pa'i mchog tu shes pa dang / theg pa cho ga la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs bsags pa tha mas cad shes pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i don so so yang dag
235a6(dkon brtsegs): par rig pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang don so so yang dag par rig pa ni/ gang don la rton pa ste/ chos thams cad kyi chos nyid kun gyi don la rton pa nyid kyi rje su 'brang ba'o// de ci'i phyir ga/ chos thams cad ma lus par stong pa ste/ stong pa'i
235a7(dkon brtsegs): don gang yin pa de ni don no// chos thams cad ma lus par mtshan ma med pa ste/ mtshan ma med pa'i don gang yin pa de ni don no// chos thams cad lam lus par smon pa med pa ste/ sngon pa med pa'i don gang yin pa de ni don no// chos thas
235a8(dkon brtsegs): cad ma lus par rnam par phye ba ste/ rnam par phye ba'i don gang yin pa de ni don no chos thams cad ma lus par sems can med/ srog med/ gang zag med pa ste/ gang zag med pa'i don gang yin pa de ni don no// gang de lta bu'i chos rnams rtog
235b1(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni ngan so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya ste/ gdod stong pa de ni gnas med pa ston pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa ni rtogs pa'i don ston pa yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gnang ba rje su yi rang ba/ 
235b2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa/ de kho nar gzhan mi man pa/ shes rab kyis shin tu rtogs pa/ thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i don so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// de la chos so so yang dag par rig pa gang
235b3(dkon brtsegs): zhen gang dge ba dang / mi dge pa dang / kha na ma tho ba bcas pa dang / g.yo med pa dang zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / kun nas
235b4(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa dang / rnam byang ba'i cha dang 'thun pa dang / 'khor dang mya ngan las 'das par nye bar 'gro ba'i chos rnams la 'jug pa shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid shes pa dang / byang chub snyams
235b5(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid shes pa dang / khams mnyam pa nyid shes pa ste/ de ni chos so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang chos sos yang dag par rig pa ni gang 'dod chags spyod pa rnams la sems
235b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa shes pa dang / bcos pa'i 'dod chags spyod pa rnams dang / 'dod chags brtan par spyod pa rnams dang / 'dod chags chungang sbyong ba rnams dang / rnam par mi ldang ba'i 'dod chags spyod pa rnams dang / mtha' ma rtag
235b7(dkon brtsegs): tu med pa'i 'dod chags sbyong pa rnams dang / da ltar byung ba rkyen kyis 'dod chags spyod pa rnams la 'jug pa ste/ sems can gang dag nang du 'dod chags la phyi rol du 'dod chags pa med pa dang / phyi rol du 'dod chags
235b8(dkon brtsegs): la nang du 'dod chags med pa dang / nang du'ang 'dod chags med/ phyi rol du yang 'dod chags med pa dang / nang du phyi rol du 'dod chags dang / gzugs la 'dod chags la sgra la 'dod chags med pa dang / sgra la 'dod
236a1(dkon brtsegs): chags la gzugs la 'dod chags med pa dang / gzugs dang sgra la 'dod chags pa dang / gzugs dang / sgral 'dod chags med pa dang / dril 'dod chags med pa dang / dril 'dod chags la
236a2(dkon brtsegs): reg la 'dod chags med pa dang / re la 'dod chags la ro la 'dod chags med pa dang / ro la 'dod chags la gzugs la 'dod chags med pa dang / dri la 'dod chags med pa de ni/ 'dod chags spyod pa rnams kyi 'jug pa ste/ 'jug pa de ni
236a3(dkon brtsegs): sgos 'dod chags spyod pa rnams la nyi khri cig stong / zhe sdang spyong pa rnams la nyi khri cig stong / gti mug sbyong ba rnams la nyi khri cig stong cha mnyam par spyod pa rnams lanyi khri cig stong ste/ gang de dag gi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi
236a4(dkon brtsegs): stong gi sems 'jug pa shes pa dang / ji ltar rigs par bstan pa shes pa dang / mi mang mi nyung bar bstan pa shes pa dang / 'dod pa las yang dag par 'da' bar shes pa dang / snod kyi khyab par shes pa dang / 'bras bu yong ba bsta/ 
236a5(dkon brtsegs): pa shes pa de ni/ chos so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// den nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na/ gang skad/ thams cad la skad med par 'jug pa shes pa dang / lnga'i skad dang / 
236a6(dkon brtsegs): klu'i skad dang / gnod sbyin gyi skad dang / dri za'i skad dang / mi 'am ci'i skye dngang / lto 'phye chen po'i skang dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i skad dang / 'gro ba sngar skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi skad dang / sgra dang dbyangs rnams
236a7(dkon brtsegs): las skad des de dag la chos 'chad pa ste/ de ni nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya ste de ltar chos de dag brtag par bya'o// de ltar chos de dag bsdu bar bya'o// de ltar chos de dag rje su rgyun chags par bya'o// 
236a8(dkon brtsegs): de ltar chos de dag yi ger snams kyis sbrel bar bya'o// de tshig gcig gi bla dwags shes/ tshig gnyis pa'i bla dwags shes/ tshig mang po'i bla dwags shes/ bud med kyi tshig shes/ skyes pa'i tshig shes/ ma ning gi tshig
236b1(dkon brtsegs): shes 'dus pa'i tshig shes/ rgyas pa'i tshig shes/ spang ba'i tshig shes/ 'das pa'i tshig shes/ ma 'ongs pa'i tshig shes nga ljar byung ba'i tshig shes/ yi ge gcig gis spro btags pa shes yi ge mang pos sgro
236b2(dkon brtsegs): btags pa shes te/ de ni nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa zhes pa'o// gang de'i nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ni 'khrul pa ma yin/ zlos pa ma yin/ brtags pa ma yin/ dod gsal ba'i yi ge yings
236b3(dkon brtsegs): su byang ba ste/ ci ras kyang 'khor yang dag par dga' ba snga tshogs pa/ zab pa/ zab par snang ba/ kun rdzob dang don dam pas brgyan pa/ bdag gi sems mthong ba'i shes pa la rag lus pa/ sangs rgyas kyis gnas pa/ 
236b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad dga' bar byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa gang zhe
236b5(dkon brtsegs): na gang tshig bzang ba'i gnas par lus bstar po ston pa/ rgyan mi 'chang pa/ spongs pa phyung ba spobs pa 'gyogs shing phyu rab/ spobs pa mi rmongs pa/ spobs pa ji ltar dris pa bzhin pa/ spob
236b6(dkon brtsegs): pa yongasu pa nyams pa/ spobs pa mi 'gal la/ spobs partsod pa med pa/ spobs pa chos la rab tu dga' ba/ spobs pa bzod pa la gnas pa/ spobs pa zab pa/ spobs pa sna tshogs kun rdzob dang / don dam pa la spobs
236b7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khribs dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab thams cad la gnas pa'i slebs pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
236b8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong la spobs pa/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dziran dang / stobs par 'jug pa dang / bden
237a1(dkon brtsegs): pa la 'jug pa thams cad shes pa'i spobs pa/ theg pa thams cad la spobs pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa spobs/ tshig mi lkug pa'i spobs pa/ tshig mi rtsub pa'i
237a2(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa/ tshig mi 'chal ba'i spobs pa/ tshig rtsub mo ma yin pa'i spobs pa/ tshig mnyen pa'i spobs pa/ tshig dag pa/ tshig grol ba/ tshig ma chags pa/ tshig btsun pa/ tshig 'brel pa/ tshig ldan pa/ tshig ma nyams
237a3(dkon brtsegs): pa tshig snyan pa/ tshig 'jam pa/ tshig ma smad pa/ tshig 'phags pa thams cad kyis stong pa ste/ zhing mtha' yas pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rjesu song ba'i sgra/ tshangs pa'i sgra skad kyi dbyangs dang 'dra ba rtogs par byed pa'i sgra bcig
237a4(dkon brtsegs): ba sangs rgyas kyi gnang ba'i spobs pas/ sems can gzhan dang / gang zag gzhan dag la chos ston to// de'i chos bstan pa de yang byung bar byed pa/ dbyed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur ba ste/ 
237a5(dkon brtsegs): de ni byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa// zhes bya'o// de ni byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa la mkhas pa ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa la mkhas pa shes
237a6(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong ngo // de la byang chub sems dpa'i rton pa la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rton pa 'ang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don la rton gyi tshig 'brul ma yin pa dang / 
237a7(dkon brtsegs): ye shes la rton gyi rnam par shes pa la ma yin pa dang / nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde rnams la rton gyi/ drang ba'i don rnams la ma yin pa dang / chos nyid la rton kyi gang zag la ma yin pa'o// de la don gang gi tshig 'bru gang
237a8(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ tshig 'gru zhes bya ba ni/ gang 'jig rten gyi chos kyi bya ba la 'jug pa'o// don ces bya ba ni gang 'jig rten las 'angs pa'i chos la rtogs pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / sdom pa dang // 
237b1(dkon brtsegs): nges pa bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni dul ba dang / zhi gnas dang / sar pa ma yin pa dang / rnyigs pa ma yin par shes pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor ba yongasu bshad ba sgrogs pa'o// don ces bya ba ni mi dmigs pa la
237b2(dkon brtsegs): tor pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan yongasu sgrogs pa'o// don ces bya ba ni chos rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnam par mi rtog pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni theg pa ji ltar rnam
237b3(dkon brtsegs): par bzhag pa bzhin du 'chang ba'o// don ces bya ba ni chos tshul gcig pa rtogs par shes bya'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni/ sems can thams cad mi gtong bar bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni/ 'khor gsum yongasu dag pa'o// 
237b4(dkon brtsegs): tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni/ lus dang ngag yid sdom zhing bslab pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan thams cad yang dag par len par bstan pa/ 'o// don ces bya ba ni lus dang / ngag dang / yid mi dmigs shing mngon
237b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'du mi byed pa yongasu dag pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sems kyi tha ba dang / khro ba dang / ngargyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa 'joms zhing bzod pa dang / nges pa bstan pa'o// 
237b6(dkon brtsegs): don ces bya ba ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba la brtson 'grus rtsom pa thams cad bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni/ mi len mi gtong ba la gnas pa'i brtson 'grus so// 
237b7(dkon brtsegs): tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / tingange 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa shes pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni/ thos pa thams
237b8(dkon brtsegs): cad 'dzin pa shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// don ces bya ba ni brjod du med pa don to// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni/ gang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos rnams rab tu bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni/ gang
238a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos rnams char ngan du byed pa'i 'bras bu ngon sum du byed pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni/ sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / lam rab tu
238a2(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni 'gog pa mngon tu byed pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni/ ma rig pa lnga sogs te/ cha shi'i bar du bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni/ ma rig pa 'gog pa'i gnas rga shi'i bar du 'gog pa'o// tshig 'bru lde
238a3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi tshogs bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni/ reg pa dang rnam par grol ba shes pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni/ gang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / cha mnyam par spyod pa rnams
238a4(dkon brtsegs): la chos bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni/ sems can gyi rnam par gro la ba'i mi 'khrugs pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni/ sgrib par bye/ dad pa'i chos thams cad rab tu ston pa'o// don ces bya ba ni/ sgrib pa
238a5(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i ye shes rnam par thar pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni/ dkon mchog gsum gyi yon tan bsngags pa mtha' med parayang dag par rab tu bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni/ gang chos 'dod
238a6(dkon brtsegs): chags med pa dang / 'dus ma byas pa'i dge 'dun gyi yon tan sgrub pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni/ gang byang chub sems dpa'i thog ma sems bskyed nas byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du bslab pa dang / yon tan rtsom par bstan
238a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'o nga don ces bya ba ni/ sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'o// mdor na chos kyi phung po brgyad khri zin stong gi bar du bstan pa de ni/ tshig
238a8(dkon brtsegs): 'bru zhes bya'o// sgra dang / yi ge dang / tshig 'bru thams cad brjod med pa'i don ni don to// de la drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde gang zhe na/ gang tshig 'bru ba shang ba ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du rgya cher khong du chud par bya ste/ 
238b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag ni drang ba'i ror gyi mdo sde dgo// ngas pa'i don kyi mdo sde gang zhe na/ don gang bshad pa ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du rgya cher khong du chud par bya ste/ de dag ni nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde nga'o// de ltar na chos la rtor gyi gang zag
238b2(dkon brtsegs): la ma yin zhe na/ gang drang ba'i don de ni gang zag gi dor yin pas/ de ni la mi rton gyi/ gang nges pa'i ngor de ni chos nyid ji ltar ba bzhin pas/ de la rngor pa ste/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' ston pa bzhi'o// de ltar na byang tub
238b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rngon pa la mkhas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// / 'babs pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs stong
238b4(dkon brtsegs): drag brgya pa/ dam pa bas brgyad pa de la byang chub sems da ba' rnams kyi tshig 'bru la mkhas pa/ gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos gnyis la mkhas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
238b5(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa la spyod do// chos gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par shes pa la mkhas pa dang / ye shes la mkhas pa yino// de la rnam par shes pa gang zhe na/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'i
238b6(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ rnam par shes pa'i gnas pa bzhi'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ gzugs la zhugs pa'i rnam par shes pa yongs su gnas shing / gnas pa dang / tshor ba la zhugs pa dang / 'du shes la zhugs pa dang / 'du byed
238b7(dkon brtsegs): la zhugs pa'i rnam par shes pa yongasu gnas shing / gnas pa ste/ de ni rnam par shes bya'o// de la ye shes gang zhe na/ gang len pa'i phung po lnga rnams la gnas pa/ rnam par shes pa'i phung po yongasu
238b8(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni/ ye shes zhes bya'o// gang sa'i khams rnam par shes pa dang / chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams rnam par shes pa de ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// gang yang ye shes khams pa
239a1(dkon brtsegs): la mi gnas pa/ chos kyi dbyings tha mi dang ba shes pa de ni/ ye shes zhes bya'o// bzhan yang rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni/ gang ming gi rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams
239a2(dkon brtsegs): la shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba'i sgra rnams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba'i dri rnams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba'i ro rnams dang / lus kyi rnam par
239a3(dkon brtsegs): shes pas shes par bya ba'i reg rnams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba'i chos rnams shes pa dor/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// gang yang nang gi skye mched rnams la le ba pa ni zhing / phyi rol rgya skye mche na
239a4(dkon brtsegs): largyu ba med pa/ ye shes la rton pas/ chos gang yang gzhog par mi byang bde ni ye shes zhes bya'o// gzhan yang rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni/ dmigs pa las rnam par shes pa skye ba dang / yongasu rtog pa
239a5(dkon brtsegs): las rnam par shes pa skye ba ste/ de ni rnam par shes pa skye ba zhes bya'o// nga yang mi 'dzin pa mi snyems pa/ mi dmigs pa/ rnam par mi/ rig pa/ mi 'khrugs pa de ni ye shes zhes bya'o// gzhan yang 'dus
239a6(dkon brtsegs): byas la spyod pa'i chos rnams la rnam par shes pa gnas kyi/ 'dus ma byas pa la rnam par shes pa rgyu ba med de/ gang yang 'dus ma byas shes pa de ni yo sheso// gzhan yang skye ba dang / 'jig pa la gnas pa ni rnam par
239a7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'o// gang yang mi skye mi 'gag mi gnas pa de ni ye shes zhes bya'o// de la nges pa'i mdo sde gang / drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde gang zhe na mdo sde gang dag lam la 'jug par byed pa de dag ni/ drang ba'i don ces bya'o// 
239a8(dkon brtsegs): mdo sde gang dag 'bras bu la 'byug par byed pa de dag ni/ nges pa'i don ces bya'o// mdo sde gang dag kun rdzob sgrub par byed pa de dag ni drang ba'i don ces bya'o// mdo sde gang dag don dam pa bstan pa de dag ni nges pa'i
239b1(dkon brtsegs): don ces bya'o// gzhan yang mdo sde gang dag las kyi bya ba la 'jug pa de dag ni drang ba'i don ces bya'o// mdo sde gang dag las dang nyon mongs pa zang bar bstan pa de dag ni nges pa'i don ces bya'o// zhan yang mdo sde gang dag
239b2(dkon brtsegs): kun nas nyon mongs pa yongasu bshang ba'i phyir/ bstan pa de dag ni drang ba'i don to// mdo sde gang dag rnam par byang ba rnam par dag pa'i phyir bstan pa de dag ni nges pa'i don to// mdo sde gang 'khor bas skyon par byed pa de dag ni/ 
239b3(dkon brtsegs): drang ba'i don to// mdo sde gang dag 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa gnyisu mi 'jug pa de dag ni nges pa'i don to// mdo sde gang dag yi ge dang tshig sna tshog su snyan pa de dag ni drang ba'i don to// mdo sde gang dag zab pa/ balnga
239b4(dkon brtsegs): dka' ba/ rdzogs par dka' ba de dag ni nges pa'i don to// mdo sde gang bgatshig 'bru mang ba/ sems can rnams kyi sems rangs par byed pa de dag ni/ drang ba'i don to// mdo sde gang dag tshig dang tshig 'bru
239b5(dkon brtsegs): nyung la nges par rtogs par byed pa de dag ni nges pa'i don to// gzha na yang mdo sde gang dag bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang // skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / sheng las skyes dang / byed pa
239b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / tshor ba po'i sgra sna tshogs bdag po med pa/ bdag po yod pa bzhin du bstan pa de dag ni drang ba'i don to// mdo sde gang dag stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mi 'byung ba dang ma skyes pa dang / 
239b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par mi 'byung ba dang / sems can med pa dang / gang zag med pa dang / dus gsum las rnam par thar pa'i sgo bstan pa de dag ni nges pa'i don ces bya'o// de la chos gang zag gang zhe na/ gang zag tu lta ba la
239b8(dkon brtsegs): gnas te/ chos kha cig la rtsom pa de ni gang zag ces bya'o// gang zag tu lta ba rtsom pa de'i gang chos gnas pa/ chos kyi dbyings de ni chos shes bya'o// gzhan yang gang zag ni so so skye bo gang zag dang / so so
240a1(dkon brtsegs): skye bo dge ba'i gang zag dang / dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i gang zag dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i gang zag dang / brgyad pa'i gang zag dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i gang zag dang lan
240a2(dkon brtsegs): cig phyir 'ong ba'i gang zag dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i gang zag dang / dgra bcom pa'i gang zag dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi gang zag dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang zag dang / skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo
240a3(dkon brtsegs): mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / lha dang / mi'i skye bo phal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir gang zag gcig 'di 'jig rten du skye ba 'byung ba'i 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ de bzhin
240a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/ gang zag gi sgra de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas kun to/ ba kyi gnas kyis sems can rnams gzung ba'i phyir bstan
240a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'o// nge la gang mngon par chags pa de dag ni rton pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o// de dag rton pa la dgod pa'i chos nyid la rton par bya'i/ gang zag la ma yino zhes/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung
240a6(dkon brtsegs): tede la chos nyid gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi 'gyur ba dang / sgrom btags pa/ mi byed pa/ rnam par mi byed pa/ mi gnas pa/ gnas med pa rtsa ba med pa/ thams cad du mnyal ba/ mnyam pa la mnyam pa/ mi nyam
240a7(dkon brtsegs): la mnyam pa/ mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa la mnyam pa/ la mnyam pa/ rnam par mi rtog pa/ mi rtsom pa/ nges par gyur pa thob pa/ chos thams cad la shin tu ngo bo nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid de ni chos nyid
240a8(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ste/ gang dag chos nyid de la rten par byed pa de dag ni/ khams gang la yang rton par mi byed de/ de bas na chos kyi tshul gyi sgra la 'jug pa 'dis/ chos thams cad la rton pa'i chos thams cad de lta
240b1(dkon brtsegs): bu'i chos nyid yin no// dengag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ston pa bzhi zhes bya ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rton pa la mkhas pa'o// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rton pa la mkhas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
240b2(dkon brtsegs): byin pa la sbyong ngo // de la byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la ma khas pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshogs ni 'di gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsod dpas kyi tshogs dang / ye shes kyi
240b3(dkon brtsegs): rogs so// de la bsod nams kyi tshogs gang zhe na/ spyir ba las byung ba'i bsod rnams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / sgom pa las byung ba'i bsod rnams
240b4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i dngos po dang / byams pa'i sems snyoms par 'jug pa dang / snying rje'i sbyor ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rtsom pa dang / bdag dang pha rol gyi sdig pa 'chags pa dang / dus gsum du gtogs pa'i sems
240b5(dkon brtsegs): bar thams cad dang / slong ba thams cad dang / mi slob pa thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / sems chen po bskyed pa rnams dang / spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams dang / phyir mi ldog
240b6(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa la rje su yi rang ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dge ba
240b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi rdza su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa thams cad la chos gsol ba 'debs pa dang ldan pa'i bsod rnams bya ba'i dngos po dang / 
240b8(dkon brtsegs): dge ba thams cad byang chub tu bsngo ba dang / ldan pa'i bsod rnams bya ba'i dngos po dang / sems can byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa rnams byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnam
241a1(dkon brtsegs): la pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam ston pa dang / dbul po rnams la longs spyod kyis sdud pa dang / nad pa rnams la sman sbyin pa dang / gus par bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / mdu chung ba rnam
241a2(dkon brtsegs): la bzod cing dang du len pa dang / ltung ba rnams mi 'chab pa dang / sdig pa chags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams la bsnyen bkur dang / ri
241a3(dkon brtsegs): mo thams cad byed pa dang / slob dpon dang / mkhan po rnams la ston pa bzhin du ri mo byed pa dang / chos la rin po che rin thang med pa bzhin du/ yongasu tshol ba'i brtson 'grus dang / chos smra ba la dga' zhing dpag
241a4(dkon brtsegs): tshad brgyar yang song ste/ chos nyan pas chog mi shes pa dang / zang zing med par chos 'chang ba dang / pha dang ma la rim gro byad pa dang / byas pa bzo ba dang / byas pa shes pa dang / 'gyod pa
241a5(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / bsod nams bsags pas cho ga mi shes pa dang / lus bsdams shing tshul 'chos pa med pa dang / ngag bsdams shing ngag tshul 'chos pa med pa dang / ying bsdams
241a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yid la tshul 'chos pa med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten btsugs pa'i phyir/ tshangs pa'i bsod rnams yongs su 'dzin pa dang / mchod sbyin gtan pa med pa bsags pas/ mtshan
241a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs sna tshogs bsags pas/ dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pa dang / nga rgyal med pas lus brgyan pa dang / ngag gi nyes pa thams cad spangs pas ngag
241a8(dkon brtsegs): brgyan pa dang / blo thogs pa med pas sems brgyan pa dang / mngon par shes pa sprul pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rkyen dang / ye shes yongs su dag pas/ chos kyi mtshan nyid kyi rgyan dang / phra ma dang
241b1(dkon brtsegs): zhe gcod pa dang / dbye ba'i tshig yongs su spangs pas/ 'khor mang po'i rgyan dang / chos 'dzin pas 'dod chags med pa'i chos kyi rgyan dang / rab tu dga' nas leg so zhes bya ba byin nas/ chos kyi gtam mi 'dzi
241b2(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa dang / sgrib pa dang / chod pa rnam par spangs shing gus par chos nyan pas/ 'bras bu yod par chos 'chad pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams la bka' thub kyi nags tshal phul bas/ byang chub kyi shing gi rgyan dang / 
241b3(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sngon du 'gro zhing / byang chub sems mi gtong bas/ byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan dang / las dang nyon mongs pa mi dmigs pas/ tshe dang shi 'phos yongs su dag pa dang / rin po che phangs pa'i
241b4(dkon brtsegs): dngos po thams cad yongasu gtong bas/ lag na rin po che dang / mi zad pa'i smon lam thob pas longs spyod mi zad pa dang / khro gnyer med pas mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams dad cing / bzhin
241b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pas gsong por smra ba dang / sems can thams cad la 'od zer snyoms pas/ mnyam pa nyid kyi rgyan thob pa dang / ma longs ba la mi brnyas pas 'od mang po gtong ba dang / tshul khrims kyi bcwa
241b6(dkon brtsegs): nams bsags pas/ skye ba yongasu dag pa dang / ltung ba la mi rtsod pas mngal yongasu dag pa dang dge ba bcu'i las yongasasu dag pas/ lha dang mir skye ba dang / rje su bstan pa thams cad la rab tu rtog pa gdon mi za bar
241b7(dkon brtsegs): gnon pa dang / chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med pas chos kyi dbang phyug dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa yong su dag pas 'jig rten thams cad la mngon sum pa dang / nyi tshe ba'i spyod pa mi 'dod pas/ rgya chen po'i chos
241b8(dkon brtsegs): la dad pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems mi 'dor bas/ bsod nams thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa dang / dad pa sngon du 'gro bas nor bdun yongs rdzogs pa dang / sngon dam pa nyam su lon par byed
242a1(dkon brtsegs): bas/ 'jig rten thams cad mi slu ba dang / dge ba'i chos yongasu rdzogs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi tshe
242a2(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi tshogs la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ rgyu gang gis ye shes skye ba skye/ de ltar rgyu dang rkyen gang dang gang gis ye shes rtogs pa'o// de la rgyu gang rkyen gang zhe na/ chos
242a3(dkon brtsegs): tshol ba la rab tu 'dun pa dang / ye shes kyi rje su song ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la rton gyi/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mi rton pa dang / de dag la nga rgyal mi byed pa dang / 
242a4(dkon brtsegs): bla ma la dga' ba dang / ston pa la dga' ba dang / der dge ba'i gshes gnyen de dag gis 'di ni bsam pa dang ldan par shes nas/ ye shes kyi gtam gang yang mi rton pa med pa dang / snod du shes nas par
242a5(dkon brtsegs): tshad med par sems rtse gcig tu chos ston pa dang / des chos thos nas/ chos kyi tshogs la brtson par byed de/ gang chos kyi tshogs la brtson par byed de/ gang chos kyi tshogs la brtson par byed pa de
242a6(dkon brtsegs): nyid de'i ye shes kyi tshogs la brtson pa yin no// de la chos kyi tshogs la brtson pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don nyung ba dang / bya ba nyung ba dang / sgra nyung ba dang / srid dang the rangs la mi nyal zhing rnal 'byor la brtson pa dang / 'brel pa'i
242a7(dkon brtsegs): don la yongasu rtog pa dang / phyir zhing yongasu tshol ba dang / sems la rnyog pa med pa dang / sgrib pa gnon pa dang / ltung ba las 'byung bar shes pa dang / 'gyod pa med pa dang / kun nas ldang ba med pa dang / nan tan snying por
242a8(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / chos pa gzhol ba dang / chos la 'bab pa dang / chos la bab pa dang / chos la rtul ba dang / rtag par mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba lta bu dang / ye shes tshol ba de nyid la gnas dang / mi lhod pa dang / 
242b1(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus mi gtong ba dang / khyad par du 'gro ba dang / 'du 'jilas dben pa dang / gcig pu dga' ba dang / dgon pa'i ba pa yid la byed pa dang / 'phags pa'i rigs la dga' ba dang / spangs pa'i las mi 'gyur ba dang / 
242b2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyis klu dag la dga' zhing mos pa dang / 'jig rten rgyang phan pa'i gsang tshig la ri mor mi byed pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos tshol ba la dran pa mi nyams pa dang / rtogs pa la don rtogs pa'i rje su 'gro ba dang / blo gros
242b3(dkon brtsegs): la lam gyi rje su 'thun par byed pa dang / mos pa la sdom pa dang / rkyen la sngo shes kyi rje su rig pa dang / khrel yod pa dang / rnga ma shes pa'i rgyan dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'gros kyi rjesu 'gro ba dang / mi shes bsel ba dang / ma rig pa
242b4(dkon brtsegs): dang gti mug gis ling tog sel ba dang / shes rab kyi mig rnam par dag pa dang / rab tu rnam par dag pa dang / blo rgyache ba dang / blo ma zhum pa drang / blo rab tu tha dad pa dang / mngon sum du shes pa dang / gzhan lar/ 
242b5(dkon brtsegs): ma lus pa'i yon tan dang / rang gi yon tan gyis mi snyems pa dang / pha/ rol gyi yon tan la rtog pa dang / legs par bya ba'i las byed pa/ dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la mi 'gal bar byed pa dang / las
242b6(dkon brtsegs): yong su dag par shes pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes kyi tshogs shes bya'o// gzhan yang ye shes kyi tshogs ni sbyin pa bzhi ste/ chos smra ba la gro ga dang / smyugu dang / snag tsha dang / glegs
242b7(dkon brtsegs): bam sbyin pa dang / chos smra ba la chos kyi stan sna tshogs sbyin pa dang / chos smra ba la rnyed pa dang / bkur bsti dang / tshig su bcad pa thams cad sbyin pa dang / chos smra ba la chos kun bsdu ba'i phyir/ ge yo med par legaso zhes bya ba
242b8(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa ste/ sbyin pa bani po de dag ni ye shes kyi tshogs sogs par 'gyur ba'o// kun snang ba bzhi rnams ye shes kyi tshogs bsags par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos smra ba rnams kyi lus yongs su spang ba dang / dge
243a1(dkon brtsegs): bsrung ba dang / yul dang ldeng su 'jug pa la yongs su srung ba dang / phan pa'i dngos po yongasu srung ba ste/ kun srung ba ni bzhi po de dgo/ nye bar brtan pa bzhi ye shes kyi chog su 'gyur te/ 
243a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/ chos smra ba rnams kyi chos nye bar rton pa dang / ye shes nye bar rton pa dang / zang zing lte bar rton pa dang / byang chub nye bar rton pa'o// stobs lnga ye shes kyi tshog su 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mos
243a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir dad pa'i stobs dang / thos pa tshol ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i phyir dran pa'i stobs dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi chos la nges par rtogs pa'i phyir/ ting 'dzin gyi stobs dang / 
243a4(dkon brtsegs): thos pa'i stobs kyi phyir shes rab kyi stobs te/ stobs lnga po de dag ye shes kyi tshogasu 'gyur ro// tshul khrims bzhi ye shes kyi tshogs so/ gas par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos la nges pa'i tshul
243a5(dkon brtsegs): khrims dang / chos tshol ba'i tshul khrims dang / chos la nges par rtog pa'i tshul khrims dang / byang chub tu bsngo ba'i tshul khrim/ sa te/ tshul khrims bzhi po de dag ye shes kyi tshogs sogs par 'gyur
243a6(dkon brtsegs): ro/ bzod pa bzhi ye shes kyi tshogs sogs par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos tshol ba la mngon par brtson pas ngan du smras pa dang / ngan du brjod pa'i tshig rnams bzod pa dang / tshes tshol ba la mngon
243a7(dkon brtsegs): par brtson pas/ rlung dang tsha ba dang / grang ba dang dro ba dang / skom pa dang / bkres pa dang / chos tshol ba la mngon par brtson pas slob dpon dang / mkhan po'i rjesu 'jug pa dang / chos 'tshol ba la mngon par brtson
243a8(dkon brtsegs): pas pastong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos bzod pa ste/ bzod pa bzhi po de dag ye shes kyi tshogs sogs par 'gyuraro// brtson 'grus bzhi ye shes kyi tshogs sogs par
243b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thos pa'i brtson 'grus dang / gzungs kyi brtson 'grus dang / bstan pa'i brtson 'grus dang / nan tan gyi brtson 'grus te/ brtson 'grus bzhi po nga dag ye shes kyi tshogs sogs par 'gyuraro// 
243b2(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan gyi yan lag bzhi ye shes sogs par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dben pa dang / gcig pur dga' ba dang / ye shes dang mngon par shes pa tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la 'jug pa ste/ bsam
243b3(dkon brtsegs): gtan gyi yan lag bzhi po de dag ye shes kyi tshogs sogs par 'gyur ro// shes rab snang ba'i chos 'di bzhi ye shes kyi tshogs sogs par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'chang ba la mi gnas pa dang / rtag
243b4(dkon brtsegs): pa la mi 'jug pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / mi 'gal ba dang / bdag med pa la mos pa ste/ shes rab snang ba'i chos pa zhi po de dag/ ye shes kyi tshogs sogs par 'gyur ro// chos 'di bzhi
243b5(dkon brtsegs): thabs kyi ye shes kyi chog su 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 2jig rten pa'i rje su 'jug pa dang / mdo sde'i rjesu 'jug pa dang / chos kyi rjesu 'jug pa dang / ye shes kyi rje su 'jug pa ste/ chos bzhi
243b6(dkon brtsegs): po de dag thams cad kyi ye shes kyi tshog su 'gyur ro// chos 'di bzhi lam gyi tshogs kyi ye shes la 'jug par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi lam dang / yan lag brgyad
243b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i lam dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shesu 'gro ba'i lam ste/ chos bzhi po de dag lam gyi tshogs kyi ye shes la 'jug par 'gyur ro// mi ngoms pa 'di bzhi ye shes kyi tshogs sogs par te/ bani gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 
243b8(dkon brtsegs): thos phra mi ngom pa dang / bstan pas mi ngoms pa dang dpyod pas mi ngoms pa dang / ye shes kyis mi ngoms pa ste/ mi ngoms pa bzhi po de dag ye shes kyi tshogs sogs par 'gyu ro// gzhan yang ye shes kyi tshogs ni
244a1(dkon brtsegs): gang sems can thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang / zhi thams cad kyi rje su 'gro ba ste/ sbyin pa las kyang ye shes kyi tshog su blta'o// tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang
244a2(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms las kyang ye shes kyi chog su blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa'i rtsom pa de thams cad ye shes kyi kha
244a3(dkon brtsegs): lus pa/ ye shes sngon du 'gro ba/ ye shes la rtod pa ste/ de ye shes la gnas pas/ ye shes can thams cad kyi rton par 'gyur te/ bdud thams cad kyis kyang de la klags mi rnyed do// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs
244a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'thob/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la yang gzho ga par byed do// de gnyis ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs dang / ye shes kyi tshogs te/ byang chub sems dpa'
244a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po tshogs de gnyis la mkhas pa shes ra/ ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ 'di
244a6(dkon brtsegs): bizhi ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa ste/ bani gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus la lus kyi rjesu lta ba dran pa nye bar bzhag bsgom pa dang / tshor ba la tshor ba'i rje su lta ba dran pa nye bar 'anas
244a7(dkon brtsegs): bsgom pa dang / sems la sems kyi rje su lta ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgoms pa dang / chos la chos kyi rje su lta ba dran pa nye bar gzhag bsgom pa'o// de la lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag
244a8(dkon brtsegs): pa sgom pa gang zhen/ ga ba bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa 'a lus la lus kyi rjesu lta zhing gnas pade/ lus kyi sngon gyi mapa' la yang sa mar rtogs/ lus kyi phyi mi mtha' la yang so sar tog/ lus cing na/ 
244b1(dkon brtsegs): byung ba la yang so sor rtog ste/ kye ma'o lus 'di phyin ci log pas byung ba ste/ rgyu dang rkyen las skyes pa g.yo ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ bdag po med pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ phyi rol gyi rtsa
244b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / shing gel pa dang / sman dang nags tshal dag rgyu dang rkyen las byung zhing bdag po med/ yong su 'dzin pa med ga de bzhin du lus 'di yang rtswa dang rtsig pa dang / shing dang bong ba dang / mig yor lta bu phung po dang khams
244b3(dkon brtsegs): dang skye mched yongs su 'dzin pa dang / bdag dang bdag gi 'am/ rtag pa 'am/ brtan pa 'am/ ther zug gam/ mi 'gyur ba'i chos kyis skyong ste/ lus de lang yir mi bya'i/ lus snying po med pa des snying po blang bar bya'o// 
244b4(dkon brtsegs): de la snying po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni/ chos kyi sku/ rdo rje'i sku/ mi byed pa'i sku/ sra ba'i sku/ 'jig rten gsum thams cad khyad zhu
244b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sku/ bdag gis bsgrub par bya'o// bdag gis lus 'a de nyes pa du ma'i skyon chags mod kyi/ 'on kyang nyes pa thams cang dang bral ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thob par bya'o zhes
244b6(dkon brtsegs): de so sor rtog pa'i mthas legs pa mthong nas/ 'byung ba chen po'i gnas kyi lus yongs su srung bar byed de/ ngas lus ni sems can thams cad kyi ci dgos par zad par bya'o// 'di lta ste dper na/ phyi rol
244b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi 'byung ba chen po bzhi sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams sgo sna tshogs dang / dmigs pa sna tshogs dang / rnam grangs sna tshogs dang / yo byad sna tshogs dang / yongasu spyod
244b8(dkon brtsegs): pa sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams nye bar 'tshe ba de bzhin du/ bdag gi 'byung ba chen po bzhi las gyur pa'i lus 'di sgo sna tshogs dang / dmigs pa sna tshogs dang / rnam grangs sna tshogs dang / yongs
245a1(dkon brtsegs): su cong pa sna tshogs rnams kyis sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho bar gyur cig sa mo// de lus mi rtag pa nyidadu yang seM sang rtog mod kyi/ skye ba dang / shi 'phos kyang mi skye'o// lus
245a2(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal nyid du yang so sor rtog mod kyi/ lus kyi sdug bsdung la yong su mi gdung // lus bdag med pa nyid du yang rtog mod kyi sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la yang mi skya'o// lus ni banyi du so sor rtog mod kyi/ lus ni bas/ 
245a3(dkon brtsegs): btang snyom su yang mi ltung ngo // lus stong pa nyid dang / lus dben pa nyid/ yang so sor rtog mod kyi/ dben pa'i mur yang mi ltung ngo // de lus la lus kyi rje su lta zhing gnas pa na/ lus la rdzas dang snying por rje su mi mthong // nang ga
245a4(dkon brtsegs): lus la lus kyi rje su lta zhing gnas pa na/ nang gi rje su song ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyi/ go skabs mi 'byed do// ngi tsa'i/ de phyi rol gyi lus la lus kyi rje su lta zhing gnas pa na/ phyi rol gyi rje su song ba'i nyon
245a5(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig mi gan so// des lus nyon mongs pa med pas/ lus kyi las yongasu dag pa dang ldan pa yi no// de lus yongs/ su dag nas// mtshan kyis yang dag par brgyan pa'i sku 'thong
245a6(dkon brtsegs): po de lus brgyan par gyur nas/ lha dang mi rnams mngon tu 'du bar 'gyur te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus la lus kyi rje su lta ba'i/ dran pa nye bar gzhag bsgom pa'o// yang ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i tshor
245a7(dkon brtsegs): ba la tshor ba'i rjes lta ba dran pa nye bar gzhag bsgom pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang ci tshor yang rung / de thams cad sdug bsngal lo zhes de snyam du sems te/ nga ye shes kyis rtogs pa dang / shes
245a8(dkon brtsegs): rab kyis rtogs pa dang / thabs kyis rtogs pa'i tshor ba shin tu rtogs pas bde bar tshor ba/ tshor bar byed mod kyi/ 'dod chags kyi bag la nyal yang / bag la nyal bar mi byed do// sdug bsngal ba'i tshor bas reg na
245b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang / ngan song du skyes pa thams cad la snying rje chen po skyed cing ngag la nyal yang / bag la nyal bar mi bye do// bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i tshor bas reg kyang / ma rig pa'i bag la ya sa sa du da
245b2(dkon brtsegs): ga sdug bsngal ba'ag/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba gang tshor ba de dag las 'byung ba lta ba yin no// sems can thams cad kyi tshor ba yongasu shes shing zhi ba'i phyir yang 'jug ste/ sems can 'di dag ni tshor ba las
245b3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba mi shes pas/ de dag bde ba'i tshor ba la dga' bar byed/ sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba la zhe sdang bar byed bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba rmongs par mi byed kyis/ bdag ni shes rab dang ye shes kyi rjes
245b4(dkon brtsegs): su rtogs pa'i tshor ba/ tshor ba thams cad so sor sbyangs pa dang / thabs mkhas ba dang / snying rje chen pos yong su bzung ba'i rtsom pas sems cad ngag gi tshor ba thams cad rgyun gcad pa'i phyir/ chos bstan par
245b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'o// ci'i phyir tshor ba zhes bya zhe na/ rtogs pa'i tshor ba ni bde bar la gyur ro// ma rtogs pa'i tshor ba ni sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro// de la rtogs pa'i tshor ba gang zhe na/ 'di la bdag gam/ sems can nam/ 
245b6(dkon brtsegs): srog gam/ gang zag gang yang tshor ba'i byed pa me'o// chags pa ni tshor ba'o// yong su 'dzin pa ni tshor ba'o// len pa ni tshor ba'o// phyin ci log ni tshor ba'o// rnam par rtogs pa ni tshor ba'o// lta ba'i bag la nyal ni tshor ba'o// mig
245b7(dkon brtsegs): tu 'du shes pa tshor ba yin pas nas yid kyi bar du shes pa ni tsho ba'o// gzugasu 'du shes pa tshor ba yin pa nas/ cho su 'du shes pa'i bar du ni tshor ba'o// gang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen las byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba 'am/ 
245b8(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i bar du de ni tshor ba zhes bya'o// gong ma bzhin du nang dang phyi'i chos rnams la sbyar te/ yid kyi bar du 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen las byung ba'i tshor ba
246a1(dkon brtsegs): bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i bar du de ni tsher ba zhes bya'o// gzhan yang rnam grangs kyis tshor ba gcig ste/ sems gcig pus rnam par/ 
246a2(dkon brtsegs): rig pa'o// tshor ba gnyis te phyi dang nang gigo// tshor ba gsum ste/ 'das pa rnam par rig pa dang / ma 'ongs pa rnam par rig pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnam par rig pa'o// tshor ba bzhi ste/ de ni khams bzhi rnam par rig pa'o// tshor
246a3(dkon brtsegs): ba lnga ste/ de ni phung po lnga yid la byeng pa'o// tshor ba dag ste/ de ni skye mched drug yongs su rtog pa'o// tshor ba bdun ste/ de ni rnam par shes pa gnas bdun no// tshor brgyad de/ de ni log par nges pa'i sbyor ba brgyad do// tshor ba
246a4(dkon brtsegs): dgu ste/ de ni sems can gyi gnas dgu'o// tshor ba bcu ste/ de ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi la mo// gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ thams cad ni tshor ba ste/ dmigs pa ji snyed pa dang / yid la byed pa ji snyed pa de thams cad tshor
246a5(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o// de bas na sems can tshad med pa'i tshor ba tshad med pa zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba la tshor ba'i rje su lta zhing gnas pas/ sems can thams cad kyis tshor ba skyeb
246a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'jig pa dang / gnas pa la ye shes bskyed par bya ste/ gang sems can thams cad kyi dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i tshor ba la tshor ba'i shes pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshor ba'i rje su lta ba'i dran
246a7(dkon brtsegs): pa nye bar gzhag pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rje su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang zhe na/ gang byang chub sems dpa' de'i mi brjed pa dang / sba ba dang / kun srung ba dang / mi g.yeng ba'o// 
246a8(dkon brtsegs): de 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/ sems ni skyes nas 'jig cing zhu ste/ mi gnas pas na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol du yang mi 'pho ste/ gang bdag gi thog mar sems bskyed pa de yang zad med/ rnam par gyur te/ yul na/ 
246b1(dkon brtsegs): mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas pas/ de rnyed par mi nus ste/ sems gang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrubs pa de dag kyang zang med/ rnam par gyur/ yul ni mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gan so// gang yang byang chub tu bsngos pa'i sems
