290a2(dkon brtsegs): gzugs gang yin pa de ci rtag pa cig yin nam/ 'on te mi rtag pa cig yin/ bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs de ni mi rtag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
290a3(dkon brtsegs): pa gal te mi rtag pa yin na/ de sdug bsngal zhig yin nam/ 'o na sdug bsngal ba med pa zhig yin/ dga' bos gsol pa/ gzugs gang lags pa de ni sdug bsngal ba lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang mi
290a4(dkon brtsegs): rtag cing sdug bsngal ba de ni rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yinan/ 'phags pa'i nyan thos mang du thos pa dang ldan pa de lta bu'i bstan pa thos par gyur na yang / lus 'di ni 'di lta bu'i gzugs cano zhes 'dzin cing / de la bdag
290a5(dkon brtsegs): dang bdag gir 'dzin par byed dam/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma la gas te/ gzugs la bdag ces bgyi ba yang ma mchis la/ bang ga gi zhes bgyi ba yang ma mchis pa so// gzhan yang dga' bo 'di snyam du
290a6(dkon brtsegs): sems rnga tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de dag ci rtag pa cig yin nam/ 'on te mi rtag pa zhig yin/ bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
290a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad ni mi rtag pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te mi rtag pa yin na ci sdug bsngal ba zhig yin nam/ 'on te sdug bsngal med pa zhig yin/ dga' bos gsol pa/ 'di ltar phung po bzhi po de
290a8(dkon brtsegs): ngag ni sdug bsngal ba zhes bgyi ba lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ga gang mi rtag cing sdug bsngal ba de ni rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin na// 'phags pa'i nyan thos mang du thos pa dang ldan pa
290b1(dkon brtsegs): gang de lta bu'i bstan pa/ thos par gyur na yang / lus 'di phung po bzhi po dag la/ bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin par byed dam/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ phung po bzhi po dag la yang dag par bdag ces
290b2(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba yang ma mchis la/ bdag gi zhes bgyi ba yang ma mchis pa so// gzhan yang dga' bo 'di ltar bdag ces bya ba de ni 'das pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / nang dang phyi rol na yang yod pa ma yin la/ 
290b3(dkon brtsegs): rags pa dang / phra ba dang / bzang po dang / ngan pa dang / nye ba dang ring ba ma yin pas/ chos de dag thams cad ni bdag dang / bdag gi ma yin no// de ltar bas na dga' bo 'di yang dag par shes pas chos rnams la/ bdag
290b4(dkon brtsegs): med pas so sor brtag par rig par bya'o// 'phags pa'i nyan thos mang du thos pa dang ldan pa gang de ltar so sor brtags nas/ yo ngasu skyo ba med par byed na/ rnam par grol zhing mthar yongasu mya ngan las
290b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa thob par gyur te/ de ltar yang dag par bslabs nas/ chos 'di mngon par gyur pa'i tshe/ skye ba'i cha ni zad cing tshangs pa ra spyad pa yang dag par spyad pas/ bya ba byas nas/ yang srid pa phyi ma
290b6(dkon brtsegs): len pa mi 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo ni rdul spangs shing dri ma dang bral bas/ chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob par gyur to// dge slong lnga brgya po
290b7(dkon brtsegs): ngag ni chos rnams la len pa med par zag pa zad nas/ sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'khor mang po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
290b8(dkon brtsegs): bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i mdo stong phrag brgya ba las/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo mngal du 'jug par bstan pa'i dus pa ste/ 'dus pa bcu gsum pa rdzog so// 
291a1(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i mdo stong phrag brgya pa las/ gcung me'u 'gar po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dang po'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sem
291a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer ser skya na/ shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun tshad med pa rnams dang / thabs gcig tu
291a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs te/ de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das gcung me'u dga' bo zhes bya ba de'i lus gser gyi kha dog can/ mtshan sum cu dang ldan zhing / tshad bcom ldan 'das las sor bzhis thung ba zhig yod/ de'i chung ma sun da ri ka zhes
291a4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba bzang mo bltan sdug pa/ byang bzhin mdzes shing 'jig rten na go/  pa/ kha dog khyad par du 'phags shing mang po kun gyis lnga 'dod pa zhig yod pas dga' bo de la chags shing zhed par gyur pas/ 
291a5(dkon brtsegs): skad cig tsam du yang mi 'bral zhing / 'dod pa'i sems kyis shin tu chags par 'gyur te/ srog gis 'jal bar byed pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de gdul ba'i dus mkhyen nas/ snga dro'i dus kyi
291a6(dkon brtsegs): na bza' bsnams te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ zham ring ba tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / grong khyer du bsod snyoms la gshe gas te/ mthar kyis dga' bo khyim gangan pa der gshegs nas/ de'i sgor
291a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs te bzhug so// de nas thugs rje chen po'i thugs 'od zer gyi kha dog lta bu btang bas/ dga' bo'i khyim nang kun tu gser gtso ma lta bu'i kha dog tu gyur pa dang / de'i tshe dga' bo 'di snyam du 'od zer kun
291a8(dkon brtsegs): tu snang bar gyur pas/ gdon mi za bar 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa yin no snyam du bsams nas/ mi zhig mngags te/ kye song la su yin pa ltos shing ces bsgo ba dang / des kyang bcom ldan 'das mthong nas/ 
291b1(dkon brtsegs): myur zhing rings pas slar log nas/ dga' bo la bcom ldan 'das sgo na bzhug so zhes smra so// des de skad ces smras pa thos nas myur du phyir byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das bsus te/ phyag bya bar byas pa las de'i tshe/ sun da ri ka 'di
291b2(dkon brtsegs): snyam du bdag gis gal te 'di btang bar gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gdon mi za bar rab tu dbyung bar 'gyur ro snyam du bsam nas/ gos kyi mtha' nas bzung te ma btang ba dang / dga' bos smras pa/ deng re shig/ 
291b3(dkon brtsegs): mthong shig dang / bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas nas/ bdag slar 'ong ngo // sun da ri kas smras pa/ bdag cag dam bcas nas gdod de bzhin bta // zhes de'i 'bral ba la thig leg sher ba'i mtshan ma btab nas/ 'di
291b4(dkon brtsegs): skad du thig le 'dim skams par slar gshegasu gsol/ gal te thogs pa gyur na/ gser gyi kar sha pa na lnga brgyas chad pas ba tsang zhes smras pa dang / dga' bos kyang de bzhin du bya'o zhes sgor byung
291b5(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhung bzed blangs nas/ slar khyim du chu gas te/ bza' ba dang / bca' ba bsod pa dag lhung bzed bkang nas/ slar
291b6(dkon brtsegs): sgor byung ba dang / bcom ldan 'das slar gshegs pas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed ma len cig par mtshan ma bstan to// de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa chen po ni shin tu gzi byin che
291b7(dkon brtsegs): bas gsheg su gsol zhes gsol ba'i thugs kyang ma thub nas/ yang kun dga' bo la byin pa dang / kun dga' bas smras pa/ khyod kyis lhung bzed 'di su las blangs/ smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das las blang so// kun dga' bos
291b8(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'on bcom ldan 'das la phul cig/ des smras pa/ bdag ston pa chen po la gsol ba'i thugs mi thu bo nas cang mi smra bar zham ring du song // bcom ldan 'das slar gtsug lag khang du gshegs nas/ phyag bcabs zhabs
292a1(dkon brtsegs): bsil te bdas bzhugs pa dang / dga' bos lhung bzed thogs pa de bcom ldan 'das la phul lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis zas kyi bya ba mdzad nas/ dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod nga'i ltung bzed
292a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi lhag ma za 'am/ bdag 'tshalo zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de la byin no// dga' bos zos zin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci khyod rab tu 'byung ngam/ des kyang rab tu 'byung zhes gsol
292a3(dkon brtsegs): tetede yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ yab yum dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma'i gnas gzhan rnams kyis rje su bstan pa dag dang nam yang 'gal bar ma mdzad pa'i phyir
292a4(dkon brtsegs): da ltar gang yang bka' las 'gal bar mi byed pa brnyes par gyur pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis dga' bo'i skra dang / kha spu bregs shig ces bka' stsal pa
292a5(dkon brtsegs): dang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du 'tsha lo// breg mkhan btsal nas/ de'i sgra dregs par brtsams pa dang / dga' bos 'breg mkhan de la bsgo ba kwa'i khyod mi shes sam/ nga ni ring por mi thogs par stobs
292a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po byed par 'gyur bas/ khyod kyis gal te ba'i skra bregs par gyur na/ khyod kyi lag pa gnyis 'khrig ma man gcad zhes bsdigs pas/ de shin tu skrag par gyur nas/ spu gri bsdus te phyir 'gro bar
292a7(dkon brtsegs): brtsam pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nyid dga' bo ga la ba der gshegs te/ dga' bo la ci khyod rab tu mi 'byung ngam des kyang rab tu 'byung zhes gsol
292a8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis ril ba bsnams te/ de'i mgo bo la chu blugs nas/ 'breg mkhan gyis skra dang kha spu breg pa dang / de 'di snyam du deng bdag re shig bcom ldan 'das la srid zhu byas te/ rab tu byung mod
292b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'on kyang dgongs ka slar khyim du 'gro'o sa so// dang dgongs ka slar lam du zhugs te song ba dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i 'gro ba'i lam du g.yangs sa chen po zhig sprul pa des mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sun da ri ka dang / 
292b2(dkon brtsegs): dus byas pa ni thag ring du gyur pas/ 'gro ba'i rkyen dang ldan par ma gyur te/ deng bdag gis de bsams pa nyid kyis gal te 'chi ba'i dus byed par gyur yang srid na gal te 'chi bar ma gyur na/ nam nangs te 'gro zhes su nad ri ka
292b3(dkon brtsegs): dran pa'i mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal gyis mtshan mo 'das par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod song la/ dga' bo de la khang skyong byos
292b4(dkon brtsegs): shig par sgo shig/ des kyang de bzhin du de'i thad du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khang skyong byos shig par bka' stsal to zhes bsgo ba dang / des kyang khang skyong zhes bya ba ji lta bu/ des bya ba ni ci zhig byed ces
292b5(dkon brtsegs): dris/ des smras pa/ gtsug lag khang du dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag zhal lta bya dgoso// smras pa/ tshul ji lta bur bya ba'i rigs smras ba/ khang skyong zhes pa ni gal te dge slong rnams bsod snyoms mdong na/ 
292b6(dkon brtsegs): gtsug lag khang nang gis rnams phyags nas chag chag gdab par bya'o// ba lang gi lci ba sar ba blangs nas/ go rims bzhin du 'jam por bsku bar bya'o// legs par yid la byas te/ bsrung zhing stong rlag med par bya'o// gros
292b7(dkon brtsegs): bya ba yod na dge 'dun la gsol bar bya'o// dri dang me tog yod na/ dge 'dun la bram par bya'o// mtshan mo sgo gcod cing nam nangs na dbye bar bya'o// snam phyi sa dang / chab khungs brtag su bkru zhing byi dor bya dgo so// gal te gtsug lag
292b8(dkon brtsegs): khang zhig cing ral pa yod na bcos lagaso bya'o// zhes de skad bstan pa thos pa dang / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin du thams cad bdag gis de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes khas blang so// de nas ngag
293a1(dkon brtsegs): slong rnams snga dro'i dus kyi che/ chos gos dang / lhung bzed bogs te/ grong khyer ser skya'i gnasu bsod snyoms la bzung ba dang / dga' bo gtsug lag khang na su yang med par bathong nas bdag gi
293a2(dkon brtsegs): phyag dar byas zin pa dang / slar khyim du 'gro'o// zhes phyag dar byed pa la zhug so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de gzigs shing mkhyen pas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis phyags zin pa'i sa gtsang ma rnams slar phyag dar gyis gang bar byin
293a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis brlabs pa dang / des kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis phyag dang bor te/ slar khyim du 'gro snyam du bsams das/ phyags ma slar bsdus nas/ phyag dang zad par ma gyur pas// gnas khang gi sgo bcing / 'gro snyam du bsam pa dang / bcom ldan 'dra
293a4(dkon brtsegs): / kyis sgo gcig bcad zin pa nas/ sgo gzhan bcad tsam na/ sgo gan na yang bya bar byin gyis brlabs pas/ de nyon mongs pa skyes nas/ ga/ na yang 'di snyam du/ gal te rkun po gtsug lag khang 'di nyams par byas kyang 'di
293a5(dkon brtsegs): la gnod pa ci yod de/ bdag rgyal por gyur pa na/ 'di bas lha ga pa'i gtsug lag khang bzang po brgya stong brtsig par zad pas bdag ni slar khyim du 'gro ba rig so zhes/ gal te lam po car zhugs te
293a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro na ni bcom ldan 'das dang phrad du dogs pas/ gseb lam du zhugs te 'gro snyam du bsam so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ gseb lam nga nyid du zhugs te/ gsheg so// des rgyang nas bcom
293a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das mthong nas/ mi phrad par bya ba'i phyir/ lam gyi 'gram na ljon shing yal ga dang / grib mar ldan pa thur du 'jol ba zhig gi drung dugapa ste/ 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ljon shing de'i yal ga gyen tu brdzes nas/ 
293a8(dkon brtsegs): de'i lus mngon tu snang bar byin gyis brlabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la khyod gang nas 'ongs/ de'i phyi bzhin du shog shig ces bka' stsal pa dang / de yang skyengs te/ ngo tsha ba'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das
293b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhar ring du 'brangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di snyam du/ 'di chung ma la shin tu chags shing zhen par gyur pas/ de dang 'bral zhing phan gdags pa'i phyir/ grong khyer ser skya nas byung ste/ grong khyer mnyan yod du
293b2(dkon brtsegs): gsheg so snyam du dgongs nas/ de byon pa dang / ri dwags dgra'i mas ge'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di snyam du dga' bo blun po 'di ni rtag tu chung ma la chags shing zhen nas/ gtong bar
293b3(dkon brtsegs): mi byed pas/ 'di la thabs shig sbyar te/ sems nye bar zhi bar bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis sngon cad dri ldan zhes bya ba'i ri mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ ma mthong lag so// gal te de ltar
293b4(dkon brtsegs): na nga'i chos gos kyi granas zung shig/ des kyang na bza'i grwanas bzu nga ba dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du mkhar lding ste/ ri dri ldan du gshegs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang thabs gcig
293b5(dkon brtsegs): tu g.yas g.yon du gzigs pa las/ shing drung zhig na spra mo mi ga ya cig zhar ba zhig gdong bteg nas ma g.yo bar rtse gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la bltas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la
293b6(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis spra mo zhar ma 'di mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod ji snyam du sems/ spra mo zhar ma 'di/ sun da ri ka dang bskrur na/ gang bzang zhing byang
293b7(dkon brtsegs): bar du 'phags gsol pa/ sun da ri ka de ni shag kya'i rigs lags te/ lha'i bu mo dang 'dra bar byad bzhin mchog tu gyur cing / 'jig rtenar zla ma mchis pa lags pas/ spra mo 'di dang bskrun par gyur na/ brgya'i char yang
293b8(dkon brtsegs): nye bar mi 'chi/ stong gi cha dang / khri'i cha dang / 'bus gyi cha dang / grangs dang / tshe dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang rgyur yang mi bzod lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa khyod kyis lha'i gzhal med khang mthong ngam/ gsol ba
294a1(dkon brtsegs): ma mthong lag so// 'on yang chos gos kyi grwanas zung shig/ des kyang naza' la bzung ba dang nga pa'i rgyal po bzhin namakha' la mngon par 'phags nas/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i gnasu gshegs te/ 
294a2(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la khyod song la/ lha'i gzhal med khang khyad par du 'phags pa'i gnas rnams la ltos shig ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos kyang dga' ba'i tshal dang / shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal
294a3(dkon brtsegs): dang rtsub 'gyur gyi tshal dang / 'dres pa'i tshal dang / kun tu 'dus pa'i tshal dang / chos zangs khang las stsogs pa lnga rnams kyi kun dga' rab dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / rdzing dang / rdzing bu dang / rtseng mo rtse zhing dga' ma bu
294a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gnas rnamasu song ste/ kun tu khyab par bltas nas/ mtha ra kyis grong khyer rab snang du zhugs pa las/ gzhan yang rnga dang / pi dbang dang / rgyud rnam pa sna tshogs las sgra snyan pa las stsogs pa 'byin
294a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / gnas de dang / de dag tu lha'i bu mo dang / bu pho shi na tu mdzes bdag lhan cig rtse zhing 'khod pa dag mthong // da ga' bos kun tu brtags pa las/ gnas gzhan zhig gi gzhal med khang
294a6(dkon brtsegs): nang lha'i bu mo 'ba' shig yod kyi/ lha'i bu pho med par mthong / lha'i bu mo de dag la ci'i rgyus gnas gzhan na ni/ lha'i bu mo dang / lha'i bu pho 'dres pa gnas nas/ bde ba rnams myong bar byed na/ khyed ni gang gi phyir lha'i
294a7(dkon brtsegs): bu mo 'ba' shig lhan cig gnas shing lha'i bu mi snang bar gyur ces dris pa dang / lha'i bu mo de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi gcung dga' bo zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das las rab tu byung nas/ rtse gcig tu tshangs par
294a8(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa yang dag par spyad pa zhig yod do// de dus de las 'das pa'i 'og tu 'dir skye bar 'gyur bas/ bdag cag ni 'dir de sdod pa yin no zhes smra so// dga' bo de skad bos nas/ dganga' mgu rangs pas/ myur zhing rings par bcom
294b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ga la ba der song ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis lha rnams kyis khyad par du 'phags pa'i dngos po dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ mthong lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod kyis dngos po
294b2(dkon brtsegs): ci zhig mthong zhes bka' stsal pa dang / des kyang ji ltar mthong ba rnams rgyas par bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo khyed kyis lha'i bu mo rnams mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ mthong lag
294b3(dkon brtsegs): so/ lha'i bu do gsun da ri ka dang / bskrad na/ gang gzugs bzang zhing khyang par du 'phags/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sun da ri ka lnga'i bu mo de dag dang skrun na/ ji ltar ri dri ldan gyi spra mo nar ma sun da ri dang bskrun pa/ bzhin du brgya
294b4(dkon brtsegs): char yang nye bar mi mchi ste/ stong gi cha dang / khri'i cha dang / 'dun gyi cha nas rgyu bar yang mi bzod lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ dga' 'i tshangs par spyod pa'i yang dag par spyad na/ de lta bu'i lan
294b5(dkon brtsegs): yon khyang bar du 'phags pa dang ldan par gyur pas de satshangs par spyod pa brtan par steng cig dang / lhar skyes nas de lta du 'i bde ba myong bar 'gyuraro// ngas kyang de de nad du thos ngas dga' mgungs
294b6(dkon brtsegs): / cang mi zer bar 'du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang thabs gcig tu lha'i gnas nas mi snang por gyur te/ mnyan yod rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra bar ga sheg so// 
294b7(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo yang lha'i gzhal med khang la bsam bzhin tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par spyad par gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa/ thugs kyi mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
294b8(dkon brtsegs): bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod song la/ dge slong rnams la 'di ska du// khyed su yang dga' bo dang lhan cig 'am 'dug cig/ 'chags cig tu ma 'chag shig/ rdang bu gcig la chos gos lhan cig ma bzhag
295a1(dkon brtsegs): cig gnas gcig tu lhung bzed dang / ril ba lhan cig ma bzhagacig gnas gcig tu mdo sde blags par ma byed cig ces/ kha ton 'don par ma byed cig/ ces sgong shig/ tshe dang ldan pa
295a2(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bos kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin du dge slong rnams la bsgo ba dang / dge slong rnams kyi kyang 'phags pa'i bka' bzhin du 'tshalo zhes smra so// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yang mang po
295a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis spangs par yang mthong bas/ shin tu ngo tsha zhing gnod par gyur to// de nas dus gzhan zhig na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dge slong mang po rnams dang lhan cig tu dka' sa na/ chos gos 'drub pa'i las byed pa/ 
295a4(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos mthong nus/ 'di snyam dung dge slong mang po 'di dag ni bdag yong su spangs pas/ lhan cig tu ni/ gnas na/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di ni bdag gi nu mo yin pas/ cis
295a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang smad par mi byed snyam du bsams nas/ de'i tha du song ste/ lhan gcig 'dug pa dang / de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos yang / myur du langs te so // des smras pa/ kun dga' bo dge slong gzhan rnams
295a6(dkon brtsegs): ni bdag spong ba'i rigs na/ khyod kho bo'i nu bo yin na/ ci'i phyir bdag spong bar byed/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/ yang dag par de lta bu don dang ldan mod kyi/ 'on kyang khyod na lam gzhan du 'gro la/ bdag kyang lam
295a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan du 'gro bas/ de'i phyir phan tshun byol ba yino// smras pa/ gang ni kho bo'i lam yin/ gang ni khyod kyi tha ma yim smras pa/ khyod ni lhar skye bar mos nas/ tshangs par spyad pa spyod// bdag ni mya ngan 'das pa yongasu gnyer ba'i
295a8(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ 'dod pa kun nas nyon mongs pa rab tu bsal ba yino zhes de skad smras pa thos pa dang / shin tu mi dga' zhing mya ngan gyis non par gyu ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i sems kyi bsam pa thugs kyis
295b1(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod sngon cad sems can dmyal ba mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ ma mthong lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis nga'i chos gos kyis gra nas zung
295b2(dkon brtsegs): shig/ des kyang na bza' la bzung ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khrid nas/ sems can dmyal ba'i gnas gshegs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyogs gcig tu bzhugs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal
295b3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ khyod song la sems can dmyal ba rnams ltos shig tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos kyang de bo nan song lnga// sngar ni chu bo 'be har ni mthong ngo // de nas mthar kyis ral gri'i lo ma'i nags dang / bshang gci'i 'das rapa
295b4(dkon brtsegs): me nur gyi gnasu phyin te/ de dag tu zhugs te rnam par bltas pa las/ sems can mang po sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong ba dag mthong ste/ kha cig ni skam pas lce dang so dang mig phyung ba dang / kha cig ni sog les
295b5(dkon brtsegs): lus 'dra ba dang / kha cig ni ste res rka lag gtub pa dang / kha cig ni mtshon cha sha ti dang / dgra sta so gnyis pa dang / be rgas bsnun pa dang / kha cig ni lcags kyi thobs 'chog par byas pa dang / 
295b6(dkon brtsegs): kha cig ni lcags kyi thu lum khar bcug pa dang / kha cig ni ral gri lo ma can dang / ljon shing ral gri lo ma can la 'dzeg pa dang / gtun gyis brdung ba dang / ra thag gis 'thag pa dang / zangs kyis ka ba la 'jug pa
295b7(dkon brtsegs): dang lcags kyi khri la 'dug nas sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rnams myong bar mthong ngo // kha cig ni lcags pa zangs me lce rab tu 'bar zhing / khol ba rab tu che ba'i 'od byung ba/ sems can 'tshong pas de lta bu'i sdu/ 
295b8(dkon brtsegs): bsngal gyi dngos po myong ba dag mthong ngo // gzhan yang lcags zangs stong pa khol zhing me lce rab tu 'bar zhing tshab/ sems can med pa zhig mthong ba dang / shin tu skrag nas/ dmyal ba'i srungs ma la kye rgyu dang rkyen gang gi
296a1(dkon brtsegs): phyir lcags zangs gzhan rnams ni sems can 'tshod par byed pa la/ lcags zangs 'di 'ba' zhig ni stong bar lol zhes dris pa dang / des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bcung dgra/ 
296a2(dkon brtsegs): bo nus bya ba lhar skye bar smon nas/ sems rtse gcig tu tshangs pa'i spyad pa la yang dag par spyod pas/ lha'i 'jig rten du skyes nas/ re shig bde ba myong bar 'gyur yang / de shi ba'i 'og tu lcags zangs 'dir 'jug par
296a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur bas de'i phyir deng bdag cag lcags zangs me sbar nas/ bsdad pa yin no zhes smras po dga' bos thos nas/ shin tu 'jigs skrag pa skyes nas ba spu langs te/ lus las rdul byung nas/ 'di snyam du 'dis gal te
296a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag dga' bo yin par shes par gyur na ni/ gson po kho nar zangs kyi nang du bor bar 'gyuraro// snyam du sems nas/ myur zhing rings par bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su bros te song ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
296a5(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis sems can dmyal ba rnams mthong ma/ nges kyang snying rje ba'i tshul du mchi ma blags te ngus nas/ lce/ rmugs pa bzhin du skad phra mo phyung nas/ mthong lag so zhes gsol to// 
296a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis dngos po ci zhig mthong / des kyang ji ltar mthong ba rnams rgyas par bcom ldan 'das lag sol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo mer skye bar smon
296a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang lha'i 'jig rten yongasu tshol bas tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par spyad pa la nyes dmigs de lta bu yod pas/ de bas na deng khyod kyis mya ngan las 'das pa yongasu gnyer ba'i bsam pas tshangs par spyad par bya ba'i ltar
296a8(dkon brtsegs): skye ba la mngon par dga' bas rab tu brtson par mi bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos nas/ ngo tsha ba'i sems kyis cang mi zer bar 'dug pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa thugs
296b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis mkhyen nas/ sems can dmyal ba'i khams nas mi snang bar gyur te/ smar rgyal byed kyi tshal du gshegs nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / dge slong rnams la bka' stsal gnang gi drim rnam pa gsum yod de/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod
296b2(dkon brtsegs): chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gang yin pa ste/ de dag ni spang bar bya ba yin pas/ yongasu spang ba la rab tu brtson zhing bslab par bya'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du bzhugs nas/ ring por ma lon
296b3(dkon brtsegs): par rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gdul ba'i phyir/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu yul tsam par gshegs nas/ ga rga'i rdzing bu'i 'dram na bzhug so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dge slong lnga brgya dang / lhan cig tu
296b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zha sa la phyag byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong rnams phyogs gcig tu 'khod par mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan
296b5(dkon brtsegs): padaga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ nga la chos kyi rnam grangs thor/ mar dge bo/ bar du dge ga/ mtha' mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po ma 'dres pa/ yongasu rdzogs pa/ yongasu dag pa/ yongasu dkar
296b6(dkon brtsegs): bang tshangs par spyod pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ mngal du 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yod kyis/ shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas dang khyod la bshad par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos bcom ldan 'das
296b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du thos par 'tsha'o// zhes gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ga dga' bo ma'i mngal dang ldan par gyur kyang / mngal du 'jug par 'gyur ba yang yod/ 'jug par mi 'gyur ba yod// ji ltar skye ba len
296b8(dkon brtsegs): cing ma'i mngal du 'jug par 'gyur zhe na/ gal te pham gnyis 'dod pa'i sems kyis lhan cig 'khrig pa yang spyod par 'gyur/ ma'i mngal yang yongasu gtsang bar 'gyur/ dus kyi zla mtshan dang yang ldan par 'gyur la/ 
297a1(dkon brtsegs): bar ma do'i phung po yang mngon sum du snang bar gyur mngo'i tshe ma'i mngal du 'jug par rig par bya'o// de la bar mdo'i phung po'i dbyings de yang gnyisu 'gyur te/ kha dog sdug cing mdzes pa
297a2(dkon brtsegs): dang 'dog mi sdug cing mi mdzes pa'o// sems can dmyal ba rnams kyis bar mdo'i srid pa'i kha dog mi sdug pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na sdong bu tshig pa dang 'dra'o// dud 'gro rnams kyi bar ma do'i srid pa'i kha dog ni 'di lta ste/ 
297a3(dkon brtsegs): dper na dang pa dang 'dra'o// yi dgas kyi bar mdor srid pa'i kha dog ni 'di lta ste/ dper na chu bo dang 'dra'o// lha dang mi rnams kyi bar mdo'i srid pa'i kha dog ni 'di lta ste/ dper na gser gyi kha dog dang 'dra'o// gzugs kyi khams kyi
297a4(dkon brtsegs): bar ma do'i srid pa'i kha dog ni dkar por 'dug go// gzugs med pa'i khams kyi lha rnams ni bar ma do'i srid pa med/ 'di ltar de ni gzugs med ba'i phyiraro// bar mdo'i sems can kha cig ni lag pa gnyis dang / rkang pa
297a5(dkon brtsegs): gnyis dang ldan no// kha cig ni rkang pa bzhi dang rkang pa mang po dang ldan no// kha cig ni rkang pa med do// sngon gyi las kyi lta bab zhin du gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang dubyibs 'dra ba'i bar mdo'i srid
297a6(dkon brtsegs): ba mngon par grub par 'gyu ro// lha'i bar ma do'i srid pa gang yin pa de ni mgo gyen du lta'o// mi dang dud 'gro dade yi dwags rnams kyi thad kar lta ning 'gro'o// sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi bar ma do'i srid pa ni mgo thur
297a7(dkon brtsegs): tu lta'o// bar ma do'i srid pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pas// na mkha' la 'gro zhing / lha'i mig bzhin du skye ba'i gnas thag ring po yang mthong bar nu so// de la lus kyi zla mtshan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ 
297a8(dkon brtsegs): zla mtshan gyi dus la bab pa gang yin pa'o// dga' bo bud med kha cig ni zhag gsum dang / zhag lnga dang / zla ba phyed dang / zla ba gcig lon nas/ zla mtshan dang ldan pa yang yod do// kha cig ni rkyen la ltos pas yun ring
297b1(dkon brtsegs): zhig lon nas/ gdod zla mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba yang yod// bud med gang lus kyi mthu stongs med pa dang / sdug bsngal mang po myong ba dang / byang bzhin mi sdug pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba mi bsod pa dag zos
297b2(dkon brtsegs): shing 'thung ba de dag ni zla mtshan 'ongasu zin kyang myur du chad par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sa skam po'i phyogs chus chag chag btab pa'i tshe/ myur du skam par 'gyur ba bzhin no// bud med gang lus kyi mthu stobs ldan pa dang / 
297b3(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu bde ba myong ba dang / byad bzhin sdug pa dang / bza' bo dang / tung ba bsod pa dag zos shing 'thungs pa de dag gi zla mtshan ni myur du chad par mi 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sa gsher ba'i phyogasu chus chag chag btab pa'i
297b4(dkon brtsegs): tshe myur du skam par mi 'gyur ba bzhi no// ji ltar ma'i mngal du 'jug par mi 'gyur zhe na/ gal bu ba byung la/ me'i khu ba ma byung dang / ma'i khu ba byung ba la/ ba'i khu ba ma byung 'am/ gal te gnyis ga byung
297b5(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur na/ thams cad mngal len par mi 'gyuraro// gal te ma yongs su dag par ma gyur la/ pha yongasu dag par 'gyur ba' ma/ gal te pha yong su dag par ma byur la ma yong su dag par 'gyur ba
297b6(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ gal te gti mug yongasu dag par ma gyur na yang mngal len par mi 'gyuraro// gal te ma'i mngal gyi gnas rlung nad kyis yongasu zin par gyur tan/ mkhris pa dang bad kan gyis yongasu zin par gyur tam/ khrag gis
297b7(dkon brtsegs): non pas mngal mdud pa can du gyur tam/ shas gang bar gyur tam/ sman 'thungs sam/ dpung nas 'dra ba'am/ grog ma'i rkang pa 'dra ba 'am/ mngal gyi sgo rnga mo'i kha lta bur gyur tam/ dpung shing rtsa ba mang po can lta bur
297b8(dkon brtsegs): tam/ gshol mapo lta bur gyur tam/ shing rta'i tshigs bzhin sogs kar 'dug pa 'am/ sba lta bur 'dug pa 'am/ nas kyis gra ma skyes par lta bur gyur pa 'am/ mngal 'og tu zab pa'am/ steng du zab pa 'am ma
298a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi snod du rung nga ma yin pa 'am/ rtag tu drang zag pa 'am/ chu zag pa 'am khya rog bi mchu ltar rtag tu phye zhing 'dzum du mi btub pa 'am/ steng dang 'og dang / tha ma zhang cha chung mi mnyam pa
298a2(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ mthon dpan mi snyoms shing / 'bar 'bur du gyur pa 'am/ nang srin bus gtses pa 'am/ rul ning myags nas mi gtsang bar gyur pa gang yin pa ste/ gal te ma 'di lta bu'i skyon dang ldan par gyur na/ thams cad ma
298a3(dkon brtsegs): du 'jug par mi 'gyur ro// gal te pha mtsho rigs brdzun zhing bar ma do'i srid pa dman par gyur tam/ khar ma do'i srid pa cho rigs btsun zhing / pha ma dman par gyur na yang mngal 'grub par mi 'gyu ro// gal te pha ma dang
298a4(dkon brtsegs): bar ma do'i srid pa gnyi ga cho rigs btsun par gyur kyang / gal te las mthun par ma gyur na yang / mngal 'grub par mi 'gyu ro// gal te bar ma do'i srid pa mdun na snang ba'i yul la pho dang mo'i sred
298a5(dkon brtsegs): pa gnyis med par gyur na yang / skye ba len par mi 'gyur ro// dga' bo bar ma do'i srid pa ji ltar ma'i mngal du 'jug pa thob par 'gyur zhe na/ gal te ma'i mngal yang yongasu gtsang bar
298a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur la/ bar ma do'i srid pas 'dod pa'i bya ba spyod pa mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur bas na/ gong du bstan pa lta bu'i skyon mang po par yang med par 'gyur te/ pha ma dang bu dang phan tshun mngon par dad pa'i
298a7(dkon brtsegs): las dang ldan par gyur na/ gdong mi'i mngal du 'jug par 'gyuraro// gzhan yang bar ma do'i srid pa da ma'i mngal du 'jug pa'i tshe/ sems phyin ci log tu 'gyur te/ gal te pho yin na ni/ ma la ni chags pa skye bar
298a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur la/ pha la ni zhe sdang skye bar 'gyur ro// gal te mo yin na ni pha la ni chags pa skye bar 'gyur la/ ma la ni zhe sdang skye bar 'gyur te/ sngon 'das pa'i dus su mngon par 'dus byas pa'i las kyi dbang gis yang dag pa
298b1(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa'i 'du shes kyis log par shes pa'i bsam pa skyed par byed de/ grang ba'i 'du shes dang / rlung chen po langs pa dang / char chen po 'bab pa dang / gnam rmus pa'i 'du shes dang / skye bo mang po'i sgra ca co thos pa'i
298b2(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes bskyed par byed pas/ las kyi mtho dman ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes rnam pa bcu 'byung bar 'gyur// bcu gang zhe na/ deng bdag ni khang pa'i nang du 'jugo snyam pa dang / bdag ni khang pa'i brtse
298b3(dkon brtsegs): bi'i steng du 'dzeg go snyam pa dang / bdag ni gzhal med khang du 'jug snyam pa dang / bdag ni khril 'dze go snyam pa dang / bdag ni rtsa'i spyil bur 'jug snyam pa dang / bdag ni lo ma'i khyim du 'jug snyam pa dang / bdag gi
298b4(dkon brtsegs): rtswa sdug por 'jug go snyam pa dang / bdag ni nags kyi nang du 'jug go snyam pa dang / bdag ni rtsig pa'i bu gang 'dzulo snyam pa dang / bdag ni sab ma'i gseb du 'jug snyam du sems pa gang yin pa ste/ dga'
298b5(dkon brtsegs): bo de'i tshe bar ma do'i srid pa de de snyam du bsams nas/ ma'i mang la du 'jug par 'gyur ro// skye ba len pa de ni mer mer po zhes bya bar rig par bya ste/ da ni pha'i khu ba dang ma'i khrag yin te/ dngos po gan+d+ha
298b6(dkon brtsegs): ma yin yang pha dang ma'i khu ba dang khrag 'dus pa'i rgyu dang rkyen dang rnam par shes pa'i rkyen la rten te/ lhan gcig gnas par byed pas/ 'di lta ste dper na/ zho dang rdza ma dang bsrub shing dang / skye bu'i rtsol ba la rten
298b7(dkon brtsegs): nas mar 'byung gi gzhan las mi 'byung ba bzhin du pha ma'i mi gtsang ba'i khu ba dang / khrag las mngon par grub pa'i lusu mer mer po'i yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o// gzhan yang dga' bo dper rnam pa bzhi
298b8(dkon brtsegs): yod kyis khyod legs par nyon cig 'di lta ste dper ma rtswa sngon po la rten te/ srin bur skye bar 'gyur brgya sngon po yang srin bu ma yin/ rtsa las gud na yang srid bu med mod kyi/ 'on kyang rtsa la rten pa'i rgyu dang rkyen
299a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dus pa'i dbang gis srin bu skyes nas/ lus kyi kha dog kyang sngon por 'gyur ba de bzhin du// dga' bo nga'i zhu ba dang / ma'i khrag gis lus mer mer po yang 'di ltar rgyu dang rkyen 'dus pa las 'byung / 
299a2(dkon brtsegs): ba chen po'i dbang po skye bar rig par bya'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ba lang gi lci ba la rten nas/ srin bu skyes par 'gyur ga/ ba lang gi lci ba yang srin bu ma yin/ ba lang gi lci ba las gud na yang srin bu med mod kyi/ 'on kyang
299a3(dkon brtsegs): ba lang gi lci ba la rten pa'i rgyu rkyen 'dus pa'i dbang gis srin bu skyes nas/ lus kyi kha dog kyang ser por 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ dga' bo pa'i khu ba dang / ma'i khrag gis lus me re mer po yang 'di ltar rgyu rkyen 'dus pa
299a4(dkon brtsegs): las 'thung ba chen po'i dbang po skye bar rig par bya'o// 'dra da lta ste dper na/ rgya shug la brten nas srin du skye bar 'gyur ba/ rgya shug kyang srin bu ma yin/ rgyu shug las gud na yang srin bu med
299a5(dkon brtsegs): mod kyi 'on kyang rgya shug la brten pa'i rgyu rkyen 'dus pa'i dbang gis srin bu skyes nas/ lus kyi kha dog kyang dmar po ra gyur pa de bzhin du dga' bo pha'i khu ba dang / ma'i khrag gi lus mer
299a6(dkon brtsegs): mer po yang 'di ltar rgyu rkyen 'dus pa las 'byung ba chen po'i dbang po skye bar rig par bya'o// 'di lta ste dper na/ zho la brten nas srid bu skye bar gyur pa lus kyi kha dog kyang dkar por 'gyur zhes bya ba nas/ rgyu dang
299a7(dkon brtsegs): rkyen 'dus pa las 'byung ba chen po'i dbang po skye bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar du yang rgyas par sbyaro// gzhan yang dga' bo pha ma'i mi gtsang ba la brten pa'i mer mer po'i dbang gis/ sa'i khams mngon du snang bas/ 
299a8(dkon brtsegs): ni/ sra bi'i bya ba byed// chu la khams mngon tu snang bas ni gsher ba'i bya ba bye'o// me'i khams mngon tu snang bas ni dro ba'i bya ba byed// rlung gi khams mngon tu snang bas ni yang zhing g.yo ba'i bya ba bye do// dga' bo gal te pha ma'i mi gtsang
299b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i lus mer mer po de/ sa'i khams 'ba' shig dang ldan la/ chu'i khams med par 'gyur na ni/ skams te gyes par 'gyur bas/ 'di lta ste dper na/ lag pas phye dang thal bskam po las sogs pa bcangs pa bzhin
299b2(dkon brtsegs): du 'gyur// gal te chu'i khams 'ba' shig dang ldan la/ sa'i khams med par gyur na ni bor bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ 'bru mar ram/ chu lta bur gyur ba zhig na/ chu'i khams kyi dbang gyis ni sa'i khams gyes par
299b3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur la/ sa'i khams kyi dbang gis ni chu'i khams po bar mi 'gyur/ ngaga' bo gal te mer mer po'i lus sa dang / chu'i khams dang ldan par byung la/ me'i khams med par gyur na ni nyadul zhing myags par gyur te/ 'di
299b4(dkon brtsegs): lta ste dper na/ dbyar gyi dus sha'i gong bu grib ma la bzhag pa bzhin du 'gyur ro// dga' bo gal te mer mer po'i lus dang chu dang me'i khams 'ba' shig dang ldan la/ rlung gi khams med par gyur na ni/ 'phel
299b5(dkon brtsegs): zhing rgyas par mi 'gyur te/ 'di dag thams cad ni sngon gyi las kyi rgyus byas nas/ phan tshun gcig gi rkyen gcig gis rgyus byas pa 'i dbang gis rnam par shes pa skye bar 'gyur bas/ sa'i khams ni sa ni rten
299b6(dkon brtsegs): byed// chu'i khams ni sdud par byedado// me'i khams kyis ni yongasu smin par byed do// rlung gi khams kyis ni 'phel bar byed do// dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na/ khur ba mkhan nam/ de'i slob mas bur ram legs par btsos nas dbugs
299b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis bus nas/ rgya cher 'phel zhing nang khong stong du byed pa ji lta ba bzhin no// 'di lta ste dper na/ pha ma'i rtsa ba ji ltar ba bzhin du nang gis lus kyi 'byung ba chen po sa dang / chu dang me dang / rlung gi khams las kyi stobs kyis 'phel
299b8(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o// dga' bo pha mi'i mi gtsang ba las mer mer po'i lus 'byung ba yang ma yin/ ma'i mngal nas kyang ma yin las las kyang ma yin/ rgyu las kyang ma yin// rkyen las kyang ma
300a1(dkon brtsegs): yin mod kyi/ 'od kyang rkyen mang po 'di dag tshogs pa'i dbang gis mngal mngon par grub par byed/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sa bon sar pa rlung dang nyi mas nyams par ma byas pa sra zhing sring po dang bcas
300a2(dkon brtsegs): ga bugs byung ba/ shin tu legs par sbas pa/ zhing gshin pa la btab nas/ rlan gyis rgyu dang rkyen 'dus par gyur na/ gdod myu gu dang / sdong bu dang / yal ga dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rims kyi skye ning 'phel
300a3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur te/ dga' bo sa bon de yang rkyen 'dus pa dang bral ba las/ myu gu las sogs pa skyed par byed pa ma yin pa de bzhin du pham 'ba' shig dang / las 'ba' shig dang / rkyen gzhan 'ba' shig las mngal du skye ba
300a4(dkon brtsegs): thob pa ma yin gyi/ pha ma'i khu ba dang / khrag dang rgyu rkyen 'dus pa'i drabang gis mngal mngon par grub par rig par bya'o// dga' bo 'di lta ste dpe dra na/ mig dang ldan pa'i skyes bus me yongasu tshol ba'i phyir/ nor bu me shel khyed
300a5(dkon brtsegs): nas nyi ma la bzhag ste/ ba yang gi lci ba skam po de'i steng dug// zhag nas/ gdod me 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du pha ma'i khub// dang / khrag dang rgyu dang rkyen 'dus pa la brten pa'i phyir/ gdod mngal mngon
300a6(dkon brtsegs): par grub pa yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o// pha mi'i mi gtsang ba las mer mer po mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs shes bya'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni ming zhes
300a7(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/ da ni ming dang gzugs shes bya'o// ming dang gzugs kyi phung po shin tu smad par bya ba'i srid pa rnamasu skye ba len par byed pa 'di la ni ngas phyogs chung zad tsam 'am/ skad cig tsam du yang bsngags pa brjod
300a8(dkon brtsegs): par mi byedado// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ srid pa rnamasu skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni sdug bsngal chen po yin paso// 'di lta ste dper na/ skyugs pa ni ji ltar chung yang mnam par byed pa de bzhin du/ srid pa rnam su skyes
300b1(dkon brtsegs): ba gang yin pa de ni chung na yang sdug bsngal yin par rig par bya'o// nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni skye ba dang / 
300b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa dang / 'phel ba dang / nyams shing 'jig pa dang ldan te/ skye ba gang yin pa de ni sdug bsngal ba yin no// gnas pa gang yin pa de ni na pa yin no// 'phel ba dang / nyams shing 'jig pa gang yin pa de ni rga shi yin te/ de
300b3(dkon brtsegs): lta bas na/ dga' bo mkhas pa gang zhig srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i dang srid pa'i ro bskyed nas/ ma'i mngal na nyal zhing 'di 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa yang dag par nyam su myong bar byed/ gzhan yang dga' bo 'di ltar ma'i
300b4(dkon brtsegs): mngal tu zhugs pa de'i grangs kyang mdor bsdu na/ zhag bdu dan phrag sum bcu rtsa brgyad yod par rig par bya ste/ zhag bdun du/ ga dang po'i tshe ma'i mngal mi gtsang ba thog ma'i gan su nyal bas 'di lta ste/ 
300b5(dkon brtsegs): dper na zangs rab tu tsha ba'i nang du btsos shing brdos pa da zhin du lus kyis dbang po dang / rnam par shes pa lhan gcig tu sdug bsngal mi bzang ba myong ba gang yin pa de ni mer mer po zhes bya'o// de'i
300b6(dkon brtsegs): dbyibs ni 'di lta ste dper na/ 'bras kyi khu ba 'am/ zho'i phri ma dang 'dra bas zhag bdun gyi bar du nang du bcos rab tu btsos pas na/ sa'i khams sra ba nyid dang chu'i khams gsher ba nyid dang / me'i khams dro ba nyid das
300b7(dkon brtsegs): rlung gi khams yang zhing g.yo ba nyid gdong mngon tu snang bar 'gyuraro// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag gnyis pa la ma'i mngal na mi gtsang ba'i gnasu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ zangs kyi nang du btsos shing rdos pa bzhin du lus kyi
300b8(dkon brtsegs): dbang po dang / rnam par shes pa lhan cig tu sdug bsngal mi bzang pa myong ba na ma'i mngal nas kun tu reg pa zhes bya ba'i rlung sngon gyi las kyi dbang gis rang byung nas/ mngal de la reg pa gang yin pa de/ nur po zhes
301a1(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// de'i dbyibs ni no skab 'am/ mar 'khyags pa 'dra ste/ zhag bdun gi bar du bcos/ rab tu bcos pas na/ khams bzhi po dag mngon tu snang bar 'gyu ro// dga' bo zhag bdud phrag gsum pa la/ 
301a2(dkon brtsegs): yang rgyas par snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ ma'i mngal nas mdzod ka/ zhes bya ba'i rlung sngon gyi las kyi dbang gis byung nas/ mngal de la reg pa gang yin pa de ni ltar lngar po zhes bya'o// de'i dbyibs ni 'di lta ste/ lcags
301a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi thur ma'am/ srin bu grol ma 'dra ste/ zhag bdun gyi bar du bcos/ rab tu bcos pas na/ khams pani po dag mngon du snang bar 'gyur// dga' bo zhag bdun drag bzhi pa las yang rgyas par snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ ma
301a4(dkon brtsegs): mngal nas nang rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung sngon gyi las las byung nas mngal na gnas pa'i zug rngu rab tu 'bar ba 'bung bar byang ba gang yin pa de/ de mkhrang 'gyur ces bya'o// de'i dbyings ni bong ba 'am/ 
301a5(dkon brtsegs): mimagu 'dra ste/ zhag bdun gyi bar du zhes bya ba nas/ khams pa zhi dag mngon tu snang bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no// dga' bo nag bdun phrag lnga pa la yang rgyas par snga ma bzhin du sbyar
301a6(dkon brtsegs): te/ ma'i mngal nas yang dag par sdud pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal la reg par 'gyur ba na/ mtshan ma lnga po 'di lte/ dpung pa gnyis dang / brla gnyis dang / mgo bo'i mtshan ma mngon tu 'byung bar
301a7(dkon brtsegs): de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dbyar gyi dus char 'bab pa'i tshe/ ljon shing dang / nags tshal yal ga dang / lo ma rgyas shing 'phel bar byed pa de bzhin du mtshan ma lnga po dag rab tu snang bar byed/ dga' bo zhag bdun
301a8(dkon brtsegs): phrag drug pa la ni ma'i mngal nas rgya chen po zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal la reg par gyur pa na/ mtshan ma bzhi po 'di lta ste/ dpung pa gnyis dang / dbus mo gnyis 'byung bar byed/ 'di lta ste/ dper na// 
301b1(dkon brtsegs): byabyang char 'bab pa'i tshe/ rtswa shing yal la skye bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du mtshan ma bzhi po dag rab tu snang bar bye'o// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag bdun pa la ni ma'i mngal nas 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des
301b2(dkon brtsegs): mngal de la reg par gyur na/ mtshan ma bzhi po 'di lta ste/ lag pa gnyis dang / rkang pa gnyis 'byung bar byed de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dbu ba 'dus pa'am/ nya lcibs bzhin du mtshan ma bzhi po de dag dang ldan par 'gyur
301b3(dkon brtsegs): ro dga' bo zhag bdun phrag brgyad pa la ni mi'i mngal nas zlog cing bsgyur bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal la reg par gyur pa na/ mtshan ma nyi shu po 'di lta ste/ lag pa dang rkang pa'i sor mo bcu
301b4(dkon brtsegs): bcu thog ma kho nar snang bar byed de/ 'di lta ste dper na/ dbyar char 'bab pa'i tshe/ ljon shing gi rtsa ba dang por skyes pa ji lta ba bzhin no// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag dgu pa la ni ma'i mngal nas rnam par 'byed pa zhes
301b5(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal la reg par gyur pa na/ mtshan ma dgu po 'di lta ste/ mig gnyis dang / rna ba gnyis dang / snga gnyis dang / kha dang / bshang ba dang / bci ba'i bug rnams snang bar byed de/ 
301b6(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo zhag bdun phrag bcu pa la ni ma'i mngal nas/ sra bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ des mngal na gnas pa sra zhing brtan par byedo// zhag bdun pa de nyid kyi tshe/ ma'i mngal nas gzhan yang kun nas skye ba zhes bya ba'i
301b7(dkon brtsegs): rlung byung nas/ rlung nges mngal gyi gnas bus nas/ rgyas par byed de 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyas pa bus pa rgyas par gyur pa ji lta ba bzhi no// / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i
301b8(dkon brtsegs): mdo// bam po gnyis pa// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag bcu gcig pa la ni ma'i mngal nas bu ga snang ba zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal la reg par gyur pa na/ mngal khong stong du byed pas/ bu ga dgu po dag
302a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu snang bar gyur te/ gal te ma 'gro ba 'am/ 'greng ba 'am/ 'dug pa'am/ nyal ba 'am las dag byas par 'gyur na/ de'i tshe rlung de 'khyil pa nyid kyis khong stong du gyur nas/ bu la rnam/ 
302a2(dkon brtsegs): mthar kyis che bar byed do// gal te rlung steng gi phyogasu song na ni/ steng gi bu ga 'byin par byed la/ gal te 'og gi phyogs song na ni 'og gi bu ga'i 'byin par byed/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mgar ba 'am/ de'i slob mas sdud pa
302a3(dkon brtsegs): bus pa na/ steng dang 'og tu rlung rgyu zhing rlung gi bya ba byas nas/ 'gag par gyur pa ji lta ba bzhin no// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag bcu gnyis pa ni/ ma'i mngal nas yon po'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal
302a4(dkon brtsegs): bus pas/ g.yas g.yon gyi nang grol gyi rgyu ma rnams 'a byin par byed de/ 'di lta ste dper na/ pad mi'i rtsa ba bzhin du lus la brten te snol mar gan so// zhag bdun pa de nyid kyi tshe/ gzhan yang
302a5(dkon brtsegs): spu brgyus pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ mngal gyi nang nyid du lhag chad med par tshigs brgya sum cu skyed par byed do// gzhan yang rlung de'i stobs kyis gnad brgya rtsa gcig 'byung bar byed// dga' bo
302a6(dkon brtsegs): zhag bdun phrag bcu gsum pa la ni ma'i mngal nas snga ma'i rlung de nyid kyi stobs kyis bkres pa dang / skem par shes par byed pas mas zos shing 'thungs pa'i ro ji snyed pa dag lte bar zhugs nas/ de'i lus la
302a7(dkon brtsegs): phan 'dogs par byed do// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag bcu bzhi pa la ni ma'i mngal nas/ skud pa'i kha zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal na gnas pa de'i rtsa rgyus stong skyed par byed/ nyes brgya lnga bcu'i ni lus
302a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi mdun na gnas// nyis brgya lnga bcu ni lus kyi g.yas phyogs na gan so// nyis brgya lnga bcu'i ni lus kyi g.yon phyogs na gan so// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag bco lnga pa ni ma'i mngal nas pad ma zhes bya ba'i
302b1(dkon brtsegs): rlung 'byung ste/ mnga'an gnas pa'i car gyu ba rnam pa nyi shu bskyed dus/ rornams bzhi par byed/ de sang lus kyi mdunan lnga dang / lus kyi rgyang ma lnga nga / lus kyi g.yas lnga / lus kyis mngon lnga ma dang/ rtsa
302b2(dkon brtsegs): de yang ming sna tshogs dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pas/ ming ni sa ka zhes kyang bya/ stobs zhes kyang bya/ brtan pa zhes kyang bya/ mthu dang ldan pa gang zhes kyang bya'o// kha dog ni sngongan po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar
302b3(dkon brtsegs): po dang / sran ma dang / mar dang / 'bru mar dang / zho la sogs pa'i kha dog dang ldan pa gang yin pa dang / gzhan yang kha dog mang po phan tshun 'dres pa gang yin pa'o// dpa' bo rtsar rgyu ba nyi shu po de dag re re la yang yan lag bzhi
302b4(dkon brtsegs): bcu yod pas/ gcig tu bsdus pa dbugs bzhi pa'i rtsar rgyu ba ba/ rgyad brgya yod par 'gyur te/ lus kyi mdun dang / rgyab dang / g.yas dang / g.yon gyi phyogs re re la yang nyis brgya nyis brgya yod do// dga' bo rtsar
302b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyu ba brgyad brgya po de dag re re la yang rtsar rgyu ba'i yan la ga phan tshun 'brel pa brgyad brgya yod pas/ gcig tu bsdus na stong phrag brgya bcu yod par 'gyur to// stong phrag nyi shu ni lus kyi mdu/ 
302b6(dkon brtsegs): na yod do// stong phrag nyi shu ni lus kyi rgyab na yod// stong phrag nyi shu ni lus kyi g.yas phyogs na yod do// stong phrag nyi shu ni lus kyi g.yon phyogs na yod do// dga' bo rtswa rgyu ba stong phrag brgya bcu po de dag la yang du
302b7(dkon brtsegs): ga mang po yod pas/ bu ga gcig dang gnyis dang ldan pa'in/ bu ga bdun gyi bar ldan pa yang yod do// de dag re re la yang spu'i khung budu re re dang / so sor phan tshun 'brel te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ pad ma'i rtsa ba ga la
302b8(dkon brtsegs): bu ga mang po yod pa ji lta ba bzhi no// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag bcu drug pa la ni bdud rtsi'i 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung de'i sbyor bas mngal na gnas pa na/ de mig gi skye mched gnyis dang / rna ba gnyis
303a1(dkon brtsegs): dang sna gnyis kyi skye mched dang / kha'i sgo dang / ming pa'i bug dang / snying gi 'khor yug dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / 'cha' ba dang / myang ba rnams 'jug par 'gyur ba'i gnas rnam
303a2(dkon brtsegs): bar 'jog cing / dbugs phyi nang rgyu ba thogs pa med par byed/ 'di lta ste dper na/ rdza mkhan nam/ de'i slob mas 'jim pa'i gong bu blangs te/ 'khor lo'i steng du bzhag nas ji ltar mos pa bzhin du snod kyi rnam pa dbyibs
303a3(dkon brtsegs): tha dad pa sbrel zhing rnam par 'jog pa de bzhin du las kyi rlung gi dbang gis kyang / de bzhin du mig la sogs pa'i skye mched ji ltar mos pa bzhin du rnam par 'jog cing dadugs byi nang du rgyu ba thogs pa med par byed/ 
303a4(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo zhag bdun phrag bcu bdun pa la ni ma'i mngal nas bri gdong zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal na gnas pa de'i mi ngag dang / na ba dag / snga dang / kha'i sgo re/ ming ba dang / snying gi phyogs dang
303a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jug par 'gyur ba'i gnas rnams kun tu dang bar byed cing / dadu/ gas phyi nang du rgyu ba'i gnas rdzogs pa med par byed/ 'di lta ste dper/ na/ khye'u dang / bu bo mkhas pa zhig gis me long gi dkyil 'khor rdul gyis
303a6(dkon brtsegs): g.yogs pa blangs nas/ 'dru mar dang / thal ba dang / sa'i phye ma zhib mo dag gis byi dor byas nas/ gsal bar gyur pa bzhin du las kyi rlung gi dbang gis skye mched rnams rnam par 'jog cing thogs pa med par byed do// dga' bo nag
303a7(dkon brtsegs): bdun phrag bco brgyad pa la ni ma'i mngal nas dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ mngal na gnas pa skye mched drug po dag gi yongasu dag par byedado// 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sprin chen pos khebs pa/ 
303a8(dkon brtsegs): rlung drag po langs nas bus te/ phyogs bzhir gtor bar gyur na/ 'od dang ldan zhing yongasu dag par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ dga' bo las kyi rlung de'i stobs kyis mngal na gnas pa de'i dbang po drug yongasu dag par byed pa yang de
303b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du rig par bya'o// dga' bo nag bdun phrag bcu dgu po ni ma'i mngal na gnas pa/ de'i dbang po bzhi po mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang lce'i dbang po bzhi po dag mngon par 'grub par byed// dang po ri ma'i mngal du 'jug pa'i
303b2(dkon brtsegs): che thog ma kho nar dbang po gsum thob par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ lus ngang srog dang yid kyi dbang po gang yin pa'o// dga' bo nag bdun phrag nyi shu pa la ni ma'i mngal nas shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung de sems
303b3(dkon brtsegs): na gnas pa de'i rkang pa g.yon pa la brten te/ sor mo'i rus pa nyi shu bskyed par bye'o// rkang pa g.yas pa la brten te/ rus pa nyi shu dang / rkang pa'i rting pa rus pa bzhi dang / rje ngar gyi rus pa gnyis dang / pus mo'i rus pa gnyis
303b4(dkon brtsegs): dang brla'i rus pa gnyis dang / rked pa'i rus pa gsum dang / long ba'i rus pa gsum dang / rgal tshigs kyi rus pa bco brgyad dang / rtsib ma'i rus pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi skyed par byed do// gzhan yang lag pa g.yon pa
303b5(dkon brtsegs): la rten te/ sor mo'i tshigs kyi rus pa nyi shu dang / lag pa g.yas pa la brten te/ sor mo'i tshig chas kyi rus pa nyi shu skyed par bya'o// gzhan yang lag dar gyi rus pa gnyis dang / dpung ba'i rus pa
303b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhi dang / brang gi rung bdud dang / drag pa'i rus pa bdun dang / gzha' ba'i rus pa bzhi dang / 'gram pa'i rus pa gnyis dang / so'i rus pa sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / mgo'i rus pa bani skyed par byed de/ dga' bo 'di lta ste
303b7(dkon brtsegs): dper na/ gzugs mkhad dam/ gzugs mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pas/ sngar ni shing sra bi las de'i dbyibs byas nas/ de'i 'og tu srang bus bcings te/ phyis 'jim pa rnams bcu sa pa nas/ gzugs bstan mdzan
303b8(dkon brtsegs): par 'grub par byed pa de bzhin du lus kyi rlung gi stobs des/ rus pa rnams rnam par 'jog pa yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o// de dag rus pa phra mo ma gtogs par rus pa chen po'i skye ba'i grangs ni nyis brgya yod par
304a1(dkon brtsegs): rig par bya'o// dga' bo nag bdud phran nyi shu gcig pa 'a ni ma'i mngal nas yang dag par skyed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ mang lan gnas pa de ri lus la sha skye bar byed
304a2(dkon brtsegs): pas 'di lta ste/ dper na/ zhal zhal mkhan nam/ zhal zhal mkhan gyi slob ma 'jim pa'igs par sbyar nas/ rtsig ngos la zhal zhal byed pa bzhin du las kyi rlung des sha skyed par byed pa yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o// 
304a3(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo zhag bdun phrag nyi shu gnyis pa la ni ma'i mngal nas kun tu rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal na gnas pa de'i khrag skyed par byed do// dga' bo nag bdun phrag nyi shu gsum pa ni ma'i mngal
304a4(dkon brtsegs): nas yongasu dag par 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal na gnas pa de'i pags bskyed par bye'o// dga' bo zhag bdun du gnyi shu bani pa la ni ma'i mngal nas kun tu 'phyo ba zhes bya
304a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal na gnas pa de'i pags bskyong zhing mdog dang ldan par byed do// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag nyi shu lnga pa la ni ma'i mngal nas grong khyer 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i rlung
304a6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal na gnas pa de'i sha dang khrag rab tu dang bar byed// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag nyi shu drug pa la ni ma'i mngal nas skye ba mngon par 'grub par zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ mngal na gnas
304a7(dkon brtsegs): pa de'i lus kyi sku dang spu dang sen mo rnams skyed par byed de/ de dag thams cad kyang rtsa rgyas rnams dang phan tshun 'brel par blta bar bya'o// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag nyi shu bdun pa la ni mi'i mngal nas sman yon po
304a8(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal na gnas pa de'i sgra dang spu dang sen mo rnams mngon par 'grub par byedado// dga' bo mngal na gnas pa de gal te tshe rabs snga ma la sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mngon par
304b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas pas/ ser snas longs spyod bdog pa rnams 'phangs shing / shin tu brtan par mngon par zhen nas/ sbyin pa gtong bar mi byed pa dang / pha ma dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma'i gnas kyis
304b2(dkon brtsegs): rje su bstan pa dag mnyan par mi byed pa dang / lus dang ngag dang yid kyis mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'dus byas shing / nyin mtshan du 'phel bar byed pa zhig yin na ni/ 'di lta bu'i rnam par smin pa myong bar 'gyur
304b3(dkon brtsegs): teng gal te mir skyes par gyur na yang / 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yid du mi 'ong ba thob par 'gyur bas/ gal te 'jig rten pa rnams 'di ltar rings pos mdzes por gyur na ni/ de thung bar 'gyur ro// gal te/ 
304b4(dkon brtsegs): thung ngus mdzes par gyur na ni ring por 'gyur ro// sbom pos mdzes par 'gyur na ni de phra bar 'gyuraro// gal te phra mos mdzes par gyur na ni de sbom por 'gyuraro// gal te yan lag dang nying lag phan tshun thag nye bas
304b5(dkon brtsegs): mdzes par gyur na ni/ de thag ring por 'gyur// gal te thag ring pos mdzes par gyur na ni/ de zag nye bar 'gyuraro// gal te mang po sa mdzes par gyur na ni de nyung bar 'gyu ro// gal te nyung ngus
304b6(dkon brtsegs): mdzes par gyur na ni de mang bar 'gyuraro// gal te tsho ba 'dod na ni ring bar 'gyur// ring pa 'dod na ni tshe bar 'gyur// zhan zhing mnyen par 'dod na na gshor bar 'gyur// ga shor bar 'dod na ni zhan zhing mnyen
304b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// dkar ba 'dod na ni gnog par 'gyur ro// gnag par 'dod pa ni dkar bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyis dbang gis sdig pa mi dge ba'i rnam par smin pa 'on pa dang
304b8(dkon brtsegs): long ba dang / rmugs pa dang / glen pa dang / byang bzhin mi sdug pa dang / tshig smras pa rnams gzhan gyi mnyan pa'i 'o su mi 'gyur ba dang / rkang lag 'phye zhing 'gro ba dang / lus mi sdug cing yi dwags dang 'dra bas
305a1(dkon brtsegs): nye ga shes rnams kyang mthong bar mi 'dod na/ gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos pa dang / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las ji snyed btsal ba dag gzhan la smras na yang / gzhan gyis yid
305a2(dkon brtsegs): mi ches shing / yid la mi 'dzin pa dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des tshe rabs snga ma la sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'dus byas pa'i dbang gyis de ltar bu'i rnam par smin par thob par
305a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba so// dga' bo mngal na gnas pa de'i tshe rabs snga ma la bsod nams kyi las mngon par bsgrub pa dang / ser sna med par legs par sbyin pa gtong zhing / longs pa rnams la snying brtse ba dang / longs spyod
305a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams la phangs shing mngon par zhen pa'i sems med pa dang / dge ba'i las mngon par 'dus byas pa rnams nyin maman du 'phel bar byed pa zhig yin na ni/ 'di lta bu rnams par smin pa khyod
305a5(dkon brtsegs): par du 'phags pa myong bar 'gyur te/ mir skyes par gyur na yang 'bras bu rnam par smin par yid du 'ong ba thob par 'gyur/ bas/ gal te 'jig rten pa rnams ring pos mdzes par gyur na yang de
305a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du ring por 'gyur ro// gal te thung ngus mdzes par gyur na// de bzhin du thung bar 'gyur ba dang / phra sbom ran zhing yan lag dang nying lag 'tsham pa dang / mad nyung dang tsho ring dang ba shor yang de bzhin du
305a7(dkon brtsegs): mdzes shing yid mi 'ong ba med pa dang / dbang po drug tshang zhing byad bzhin sdug pas gzhan las khyad par 'phags pa dang / tshig gsal zhing dbyangs snyan pa dang / skyes bu'i mtshan phun sum 'tshogs shing
305a8(dkon brtsegs): gang gis mthong ba rnams dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las ji snyed btsal ba dang gzhan la bsnyad na yang / gzhan gyis yid ches shing gus pas yid la 'dzin par 'gyu ro// 
305b1(dkon brtsegs): ci'i phyir zhe na/ des tshe rabs snga ma la dge ba'i las rnams mngon par 'dus byas pa'i dbang gis/ de lta bu'i rnam par smin pa thob par 'gyur ba so// dga' bo mang lan gnas pa de gal te khye'u yid na ni ma'i rtsibs
305b2(dkon brtsegs): logs g.yas phyogasu cog pu 'dug la lag pa gnyis kyis gdong g.yogs nas/ ma'i sgal tshigs logasu bltas te 'du'o// gal te bu mo yin na ni ma'i rtsibs logs g.yon phyogasu tsog pur 'dug la/ 
305b3(dkon brtsegs): lag pa gnyis kyis gdong g.yogs nas ma'i lto log su kha ltas te/ ma zhu ba'i gnas kyi ni steng na/ ma zhu ba'i dngos pos ni thur tu mnan/ zhu ba'i dngos pos ni yang 'degs par byed pas/ 'di lta ste dper na/ gaH
305b4(dkon brtsegs): cings nas/ gsal shing rnor po'i khar gtsugs pa bzhin du gan so// gal te mas zas mang du zos sam/ nyung ngu zos na yang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gal te shin tu snum pa 'am/ shin tu
305b5(dkon brtsegs): rtsub pa 'am/ shin tu grang ba 'am/ shin tu tsha ba 'am/ la na tsa bro ba 'am/ mi bro ba'am/ kha ba 'am/ sbyar ba 'am/ mngar ba las sogs pa zas 'di lta bu dag zos na yang / thams cad du sdug
305b6(dkon brtsegs): bsngal myong bar 'gyuraro// gal te mas 'dod pa spyod par gyur tam/ dag tu song ngam/ brgyugs sam/ nyam nga ba'i phyogasu 'dug gam/ yun ring du 'dug par gyur tam/ yun ring du nyal bar gyur tam/ mchongs par
305b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur na yang thams cad sdug bsngal du myong bar 'gyuraro// dga' bo ma'i mngal du gnas pa na/ de lta bu'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs brjod kyis mi lang bas lus la nyon mongs par rig par bya ste/ mi'i 'gro ba na
305b8(dkon brtsegs): yang sdug bsngal de lta bu myong bar 'gyur na/ ngan 'gro sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dpe byar dka' ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de lta bas na/ dga' bo mkhas pa gang zhig 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho dpag tu med
306a1(dkon brtsegs): pa na/ gnas par mos shing sdug bsngal 'di lta bu nyam su myong bar byed/ dga' bo zhag bdud phrag nyi shu brgyad pa la ni ma'i mngal na gnas pa de phyin ci log gi 'du shes rnams pa
306a2(dkon brtsegs): skye bar 'gyuraro// brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ khyim gyi 'du shes dang / gzhon pa'i 'du shes dang / kun dka' ra ba'i 'du shes dang / khang pa brtsegs pa'i 'du shes dang / skyed mos tshal gyi 'du shes dang / khri la
306a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dug pa'i 'du shes dang / chu bo'i 'du shes dang / rdzing gi 'du shes te/ yang dag par 'di dag yod pa ma yin yang / yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa skyed par byedado// dga' bo zhag 'dun phrag nyi shu
306a4(dkon brtsegs): dgu pa la ni ma'i mngal nas med tog phreng ba zhes bya ba'i rlung / 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal na gnas pa'i de pags pa mdo gakun tu gsal zhing yongasu dkar ba dang / yongasu dag
306a5(dkon brtsegs): cing dang bar byed de/ las kyi stobs kyis kha cig ni kha dog nag por 'gyur/ kha cig ni kha dog sngon par 'gyur te/ gzhan yang kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang / kha cig ni rtsub la snum pa
306a6(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / kha dog dkar ba dang / kha dog gnag pa dag kyang ci rigs par 'byung bar 'gyuraro// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag sum cu pa la ni ma'i mngal nas lcags kyi sgo bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung ngas mngal na ga
306a7(dkon brtsegs): pa de bus pas/ skra dang spu dang sen mos rnams skye zhing 'phel bar byed/ sngon gyis las kyi dbang gis kha dog dkar nag las sogs pa ci rigs par snang bar 'gyur ba yang gong ma bzhin du rig par bya'o// dga'
306a8(dkon brtsegs): bo zhag bdun phrag sum cu gcig pa la ni ma'i mngal na gnas pa de mthar gyis ched skye bar byed de/ de bzhin du zhag bdun phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa'i bar du yang rgya cher skye zhing / 
306b1(dkon brtsegs): 'phel bar byed// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag sum cu lnga pa la ni/ ma'i mngal na gnas pa de'i ma'i mngal du ni yan lag dang nying lag thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuro// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag sum cu drug
306b2(dkon brtsegs): pa la ni ma'i mang lan gnas pa de ma'i mngal na 'dug pa mi 'dod par 'gyuraro// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag sum bcu bdun pa la ni ma'i mngal na gnas pa de phyin ci log ma yin pa'i 'du shes rnam pa gsum po 'di lta
306b3(dkon brtsegs): ste/ mi gtsang ba'i 'du shes dang / dri mi zhim pa'i 'du shes dang / mun nag gi 'du shes skye bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni phyogs gcig gi dbang du byas te bstan to// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag sum cu brgyad pa la ni ma'i
306b4(dkon brtsegs): mngal nas me tog sdung pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal na gnas pa da lus bsgyur nas thung du phyogs shing lag pa gnyis brkyang nas/ skye ba'i gnas kyi sgo log su phyogs par byed// gzhan yang de'i tshe
306b5(dkon brtsegs): zur du lta ba zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ las kyi stobs kyi rlung des mang lan gnas pa de bus pas/ mgo thur tu lta zhing rkang pa gnyis ni gyen tu phyogs par byas nas/ skye ba'i gnas kyi sgo nas
306b6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar 'gyuraro// dga' bo gal te mngal na gnas pa de tshe rabs snga ma la sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mang mo mngon par 'dus byas shing / gzhan gyi mngal lhung par 'gyur ba'i las byas pa zhig yin na ni/ 
306b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyu dang rkyen des mngal nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i tshe/ rkang lag log cing snol mer gyur nas/ bsgyur mi nus pas ma'i mngal nyid 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/ de'i tshe shes pa dang ldan pa'i bud med dam/ sman pa
306b8(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pas mar dang / 'bru mar 'jam pa 'am/ shing shal ma'i shun pa'i khu ba 'am/ gzhan yang dngos po 'jam po dag gis lag pa bskus nas/ lag pa'i sor mo gri rnon po blangs te/ snam phyi sa dang 'dra
307a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing mchog tu dri zhim pa/ sbub bro ba'i 'dam khung srin bu'i rigs brgya stong tshad med pa rtag tu gnas pa/ mi gtsang ba'i khu ba rtag tu 'dzag pa/ khu ba dang khrag rlung rnams rul zhing myags
307a2(dkon brtsegs): pa mthong na skyo bar 'gyur ba/ pags pa srab mos g.yogs pa/ sdig pa'i las 'byung ba'i lus rma dang bcas pa/ mi gtsang ba'i gnas der sor mo bcug ste/ deng bcug nas gri rnon pos mngal na gnas pa de'i lus
307a3(dkon brtsegs): dum bur gtubs nas/ ma'i mngal nas 'byin par byed pas/ des na yi du mi 'ong ba'i sdug bsngal shin tu mi bzad cing / tshe la rtsub pa dag myong ba'i rgyus ma de yang 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/ gal te shi bar ma gyur na yang
307a4(dkon brtsegs): shi ba dang bye brag medado// dga' bo gal te mngal na gnas pa de dge ba'i las mngon par 'grub pa zhig yin na ni/ gal te log par 'gyur na yang / ma la gnod pa med par bde bar btsas par 'gyur bas/ sdug
307a5(dkon brtsegs): bsngal yang myong bar mi 'gyuraro// dga' bo gang gegs 'di lta bu'i dang mi ldan pa de dag ni// zhag bdun phrag sum cu rtsa brgyad 'a ngas nas btsas par 'gyur ba'i tshe/ sdug bsngal chen po srog la bab
307a6(dkon brtsegs): pa myong nas/ gdod ma'i mngal nas 'byung bar 'gyur bas na/ dga' bo khyod kyis shin tu legs par brtags nas/ nges par 'byung ba yongasu btsal bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang de'i tshe tshe dang ldan
307a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo khyod kyis mngal na gnas pa'i sdug bsngal dang / bcas pa'i sdug bsngal shes par byas nas/ so so'i skye bo mngol nas skye ba len pa gang yin pa de dag ni shin tu sdug
307a8(dkon brtsegs): bsngal bar yin par rig par bya'o// dang po bcas pa'i tshe khye'u 'am/ bu ma yang rung ste/ lag pa'i steng ngam/ gos la sogs pa'i steng du lhung nas/ nyi ma 'am/ grib ma 'am/ bskul ba'i shing leb bam/ 
307b1(dkon brtsegs): stan nam/ pang pa'i steng du bzhag pa na/ rgyu dang rkyen des thams cad du sdug bsngal mi bzad ga/ che ba rtsub pa yid du mi 'ong ba myong bar 'gyur te/ dga' bo 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ba lang gson por pags pa bshus pa 'i/ 
307b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang nye bar gyur na/ rtsig pa la gnas pa'i srog chags kyis za bar 'gyur ba 'am/ gal te shing dang rtsa'i phung po dang nye bar gyur na/ shing dang rtsa la gnas pa'i srog chags kyis za bar 'gyur ba 'am/ gal te blags
307b3(dkon brtsegs): med par 'dug par gyur na bla gab med pa na gnas pa'i srog chags kyis za bar 'gyur zhing / thams cad du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du dang po btsas pa yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o// dang po btsas pa de la
307b4(dkon brtsegs): chu dron ran pas bkrus yang sdug bsngal chen po myong bar 'a gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu mdzes can pags pa rul zhing myags pa/ rnam khrag zag pa las yang lcag gis bzhus nas/ sdug
307b5(dkon brtsegs): bsngal mi bzad pa/ tshab rtsub pa myong bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du dang po btsas pa'i lus chu dron gyis bkrus pa yang de bzhin du ba lta bar bya'o// dang po btsas pa'i lus de yang phyis ma'i khrag gi dri ma
307b6(dkon brtsegs): thungs nas/ cher skye bar 'gyur te/ de khrag gi dri ma zhes bya ba ni/ 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba las nu zho nyid la bya bar bstan pas/ de blta bas na dga' bo 'di ltar shin tu mi bzad pa'i sdug bsngal rnam pa
307b7(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs dang ldan zhing / bdeb cung zad kyang mang na/ mkhas pa su zhig sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho 'di la rje su chags pa bskyed nas/ rtag tu 'khor ba'i rgyur phyog su 'jug cing rgyun 'chang pa med par byed/ dang po
307b8(dkon brtsegs): btsas bde zhag bdun lon pa dang / lus de nyid las srog chags srin bu'i rigs stong phrag brgyad bcu byung nas/ lus la za bar byed/ dga' bo srin bu'i rigs sgra la za ba zhes pa gcig yod/ skra'i rtsa ba lag
308a1(dkon brtsegs): nas rtag tu sbal za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs khang nga'i mdzod dang / mgo sbom zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ mgo la brten te gnas nas rtag tu mgo la za bar byed do// srin du'i rig
308a2(dkon brtsegs): mig 'khor zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ mig la gnas nas rtag tu mig la za bar byed// srin bu'i rigs dad pa dang / 'bros pa dang khang khyim dang / yong su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i bzhi yod de/ blad pa la gnas nas
308a3(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu glad pa la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rig su lu'i lo ma zhes bya ba cig yod de/ rna ba la gnas nas rna ba la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs mdzod sgro zhes bya ba gcig yod/ sna la gnas nas sA la za bar
308a4(dkon brtsegs): byed do// srin bu'i rigs 'phen pa dang / kun tu 'phen pa zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ mchu la gnas nas mchu la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs drang rtsi'i lo ma zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ so la gnas nas so/ 
308a5(dkon brtsegs): la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs shing gdong zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ so'i rtsa ba la gnas nas so'i rtsa ba la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs kha mchu zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ lce la gnas
308a6(dkon brtsegs): nas lce la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs kha rnon zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ lce'i rtsa ba la gnas nas lce'i rtsa ba za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs lag rdzogs zhes bya ba gcig yod do// dkan la gnas nas dkan
308a7(dkon brtsegs): la za bar byed do// srin bu rigs lag pa dra ba can dang / khyed sgur zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ lag mthil la gnas nas/ lag mthil la za bar byedado// srin bu'i rigs 'chang ba dang / rab tu 'phyang ba zhes bya ba gnyis
308a8(dkon brtsegs): yod de/ lag ngar la gnas nas lag ngar la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs dpung pa dang / nye ba'i dpung pa zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ dpung pa la gnas nas/ dpung ba la za bar byedado// srin bu'i rigs ming
308b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang nye ba'i ming ba zhes pa gnyis yod de/ ming pa la gnas nas mid pa la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs dpa' ba dang / dpa' ba chen po zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ brang la gnas nas brang la za bar bye // srin bu'i rigs
308b2(dkon brtsegs): dung dang / dung kha zhes bya ba gnyis yod do// sha la gnas nas sha la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs kha dog ldan dang stobs ldan zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ khrag la gnas nas khrag la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs
308b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bo dang / dri gdong zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ chu la gnas nas chul za bar byed do// srin du'i rigs mi mtho ba dang / kha spu zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ rgyab kyi skal tshigs la gnas nas/ rgyob kyis rgal tshigs
308b4(dkon brtsegs): la za bar byedo// srin bu'i rigs gnyi ga yang tshil gyi kha dog ces bya ba ga/ nyis yod de/ tshil la gnas nas tshil la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs mkhrims pa'i kha dog ces bya ba gcig yod de/ mkhris
308b5(dkon brtsegs): ba la gnas nas mi khris pa la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs mu tig ces bya ba gcig yod de/ mngal ma la gnas nas mkhal ma la za bar bye'o// srin bu'i rigaso mu tig chen po zhes bya/ 
308b6(dkon brtsegs): gcig yod de/ srin bu'i rigs ma 'ongs pa zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ mcher ba la gnas nas mcher ba la sa bar bye'o// srid bu'i rigs du srog dang / chu srog chen po dang / khab kyi mchung nga / mtshon mam thoms
308b7(dkon brtsegs): byab pani mang d+h+ru la gnas nas d+hum la thubar byed/ srid bu'i rigs zla brdzogs dang / zlab gtong dang / bsi la byed gting dag mo so gnas pazhis bya ba'i lnga mo dang / rtsi bas logs g.yas pa la 'om
308b8(dkon brtsegs): nas rtsi bas legs g.yas pa la bri bar bye// gzhan yang srid du'i rigs gong ma dang mi mthun ba lnga yod/ spobs logs g.yon pa la za bar byed// gzhan yang srin bu'i rigs mdun du 'bigs pa dang / 
309a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyab tu 'bigs pa dang / brtan par 'jigs pa dang / 'bigs te gnas pa zhes bya ba bzhi yo dang / rus pa la gnas nas rul pa la bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs cher dkar ba dang / cung zad
309a2(dkon brtsegs): dkar ba dang / sprir brtsegs dang / dri mi'i zhim zhes bya ba bzhi yod/ rtsa rgyus la gnas nas rtsa rgyus la za bar bye'o// srin bu'i rigs seng+ge dang / stobs ldan dang / mgyogs pa'i mnga' dang / pad+ma zhes bya ba bzhi yod/ mazhu
309a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gnas la gnas nas mazhu ba'i gnas la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs brtan pa dang / nye ba'i brtan pa zhes bya ba gnyis yod/ zhu ba'i gnas la gnas nas/ zhu ba'i gnas la za bar bye// srin bu'i rigs mug
309a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / phung po'i kha dang / dra ba kha dang / khye'u la zhes bya ba bzhi yod de// gci ba'i lam la gnas nas gci ba'i lam la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs byed pa dang / bye dngapa chen po dang / dbyibs cung dang / po tar
309a5(dkon brtsegs): ka zhes bya ba bzhi yod de/ bshang ba'i lam la gnas nas pa/ shang ba'i lam la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs kha nag dang kha chen po zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ bsla la gnA nA brlal za bar byed// 
309a6(dkon brtsegs): srin bu'i rigs mdzen can dang / mdzen can chung ngu zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ pus mo la gnas nas pus mo la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs myos pa'i rtsa ba zhes pa gcig yod do// byin pa la za bar bye'o// srin bu'i rig
309a7(dkon brtsegs): mgo nag ces bya ba gcig yod/ rkang pa la gnas nas rkang pa za bar byedado// dga' bo yongasu skyo bar bya ba'i lus 'di 'dra ba 'di la ni/ srin bu'i rigs 'di lta bu stong phrag brgyad bcu rtag par nyin mtshan du za bar byed
309a8(dkon brtsegs): pa des na/ lus la gdung ba dang / rab tu gdung ba dang / nyams chung zhing rmya ba dang / bkres pa dang / skom par byed cing / gzhan yang sems kyi sdug bsngal sna tshogs dang ldan zhing / gdud pa dang / rab tu gdud pa dang / 
309b1(dkon brtsegs): yongasu gdung ba dang / nad mang po rnams mngon tu snang bar byed pas/ smad pa mkhas pa gang gis kyang gso zhing gsal bar mi nus te/ dga' bo srid pa'i rgya mtsho chen po 'khor ba 'dir/ sdug bsngal de lta bu dang ldan
309b2(dkon brtsegs): pa yin na/ ci'i phyir 'di la rje su chags pa bskyed par byed/ gzhan yang gnod pa mang pos yongasu bzung ba 'di lta ste/ lha'i gdon dang / klu'i gdon dang / ka ta pu ta na'i bar gyi gdon rnams kyis yongasu zin pa dang / gzhan
309b3(dkon brtsegs): yang gcad zad gyi gdon rnams kyis yongasu zin pa dang / gzhan yang nyi ma dang zla ba dang / gza' dang rgyu skar gyi gdon las sogs pas yongasu zin nas/ nad sna tshogs kyis lus dang / sems nyon mongs par byed pa yod
309b4(dkon brtsegs): de brjod kyis mi la'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dga' bo mkhas pa su zhig 'khor ba 'di ma'i mngal du 'jug par mos shing / sdug bsngal mi bzad pa myong bar byed// de ltar btsas shing de ltar
309b5(dkon brtsegs): cher sbyar nas/ ma'i nu zho khrag dang 'dres pa thung zhing bza' ba dang / btung ba rnams zos shing thungs pa na yang / yang dag pa ma yin pa'i sems kyis zhim pa'i 'du shes skyed pa bye'o// mthar kyis
309b6(dkon brtsegs): cher bskyes nas lus bde zhing nad med pa dang / gos dang / zas dang / btung ba dang ldan zhing tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur na yang / tshe 'di nyid la gnyid kyis phyed bri bar byed do// dang po byis pa dang / de'i 'og tu gzhon nas/ 
309b7(dkon brtsegs): mthar kyis cher skyes pa'i bar du yang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / nang rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu gzir cing / sdug bsngal gyi reg pa brgya stong tshad med pa brjod kyis mi lang ba rnams kyis
309b8(dkon brtsegs): lus nyon mongs pa byed pas/ lus kyi sdug bsngal dang tu len par mi nus pa'i tshe/ gson par mi smon cing shi bar dga' bas na/ lus 'di ni sdug bsngal mngal bde ba chung ba yin te/ re shig rtsam du
310a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas par byed kyang / mthar 'jig par 'gyur bas/ dga' bo skye ba rnams ni thams cad kyang 'chi bar 'gyur bas/ rtag par gnas pa gang yang medo// gal te slad dang zas kyis gsos
310a2(dkon brtsegs): nas tshe ring por 'gyur na yang ma ra 'chi bdag gis rgyal pos gsod cing yul stong du skye bar 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir skye ba la dga' ba ci yang med par byas nas/ nan tan brtson 'grus kyis ma 'ongs pa'i tshogs bsags
310a3(dkon brtsegs): pa la bag yod par bya ba dang / tshangs par spyod ba la brtson zhing le lo mi bya ba dang don gyi spyod pa dang / chos kyi spyong ba dang / yon tan gyi spyod pa dang / dge ba 'ba' shig spyod pa la rtag par mos pas bsgom par bya'o// rtag
310a4(dkon brtsegs): par bdag nyid kyi dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i las rnam pa gnyis la so sor brtags nas/ sems la gtad te/ ma 'ongs pa na 'gyod pa che/ na po med par bya'o// rje su chags par bya ba'i dngos po thams cad ni mthar
310a5(dkon brtsegs): bral bar 'gyur zhe na/ dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las ji lta ba bzhin du tshe phyi ma len par 'gyuraro// dga' bo tshe lo brgya thub pa/ de yang gnas skabs bcu dang ldan par gyur te/ dang po ni byis pa'i gnas
310a6(dkon brtsegs): skabs te/ nyams chung zhing gan rkyal du nyal bar byed do// gnyis pa ni gzhon nu gyur pa ste/ byis pa'i rtsed mo la dga' bar byed do// gsum po la ni lang tshong la bab pa ste/ 'dod pa'i bde ba rnams myong myong bar byedado// 
310a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhi pa ni mthu dang ldan par 'gyur ba ste/ dpa' zhing stobs dang ldan pa yin no// lnga pa ni dar la bab pa ste/ shes rab kyi spobs pa dang ldan par yin no// drug pa ni yongasu rdzogs pa ste/ legs par dpyod la mkhas pa'i rang
310a8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin can yin no// bdun pa ni mthar gyis rgas pa ste/ chos kyi gzhung lugs rab tu shes pa yin no// brgyad pa ni rgas par gyur pa ste/ bya ba mang po rnams la mthu chung bar 'gyur ba yi no// dgu pa ni shin tu rgas pa ste/ 
310b1(dkon brtsegs): ci yang mi nus pa yin no// bcu pa ni lo brgya pa ste/ 'chi ba'i gnas skabs gang yin pa'o// dga' bo gnas skabs chen po de dag kyang mdor sdus ste bstan na/ 'di ltar zla ba bzhi zhing dus gcig tu byas nas/ lo brgya la dus
310b2(dkon brtsegs): sum brgya yod par 'gyur te/ dbying dang / dbyar dang / dgun gyi dus re re la yang dus brgya brgya yod pas so// lo gcig la zla ba bcu gnyis yod pas/ zla ba yang brgya phrag bcu gnyis yod par 'gyur la/ de yang zla ba
310b3(dkon brtsegs): byed phyed bgrangs na zla ba phyed kyang brgya brag nyi shu rtsa bzhi yod par 'gyur bas/ dus gsum po re re yang zla ba phyed brgyad brgyad rgyad brgyad yod pas/ mdor bsdus na nyin mtshan stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug tu
310b4(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro// nyin gcig la lan gnyisu za bas/ mdor bsdu na zas ni la stong phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis za bar 'gyur to// kye na gyis bar chad byas nas/ ma zos pa'i grangs der gtog so// zas ma
310b5(dkon brtsegs): zos pa'i rkyen ni 'di lta ste/ khros nas ma zos pa dang / sdu/ ga bsngal myong nas ma zos pa dang / btsal te ma rnyed nas ma zos pa dang / gnyid log nas ma zos pa dang / sdom pa blangs pa dang / 
310b6(dkon brtsegs): rtsa bas myos te ma zos pa dang / brel te ma zos pa dang / zos pa dang ma zos pa gcig tu bsdus na grangs de snyed yod do// ma'i nu zho thungs pa yang grangs der gtogs so// de ltar na ngas mi rnams kyi 'tsho ba'i
310b7(dkon brtsegs): tshe/ lo bad+ha ba'i lom dang / zla ba dang / nyin mtshan dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba zos pa dang / 'thungs pa'i grangs yongasu rdzogs par bstan pa yin gyis/ khyod kyis 'di la yongasu skyo ba skyed par bya'o/ 
310b8(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo de ltar btsas shing cher skyes pa'i lus la yang nad mang po 'di lta ste/ glang ba na ba dang / mig na ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / sman pa dang / len pa dang / son pa dang / rkog man pa dang / snying na ba dang / 
311a1(dkon brtsegs): ljon pa dang / lag pa na ba dang / rkang pan pa bas gnod pa dang / g.yan pa dang / mdze dang / myos pa dang / skrangs pa dang / lung ba dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan las sogs nad mang po rnams
311a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis yan lag dang nying lag na zhing sdug bsngal myong bar byed/ dga' bo mi lus la 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyi sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs yod do// gzhan yang rlung nad brgya rtsa gcig dang / mkhris pa'i nad brgya rtsa
311a3(dkon brtsegs): gcig dang / bad kan gyi nang brgya rtsa gcig dang / 'dus pa'i nad brgya rtsa gcig yod pas/ mdor bsdu na nad pani brgya rtsa ba ni nang gi lus las skye bar 'gyur bas/ dga' bo lus 'di ni 'bras dang 'dra zhin/ 
311a4(dkon brtsegs): zug rngu dang / 'dra bas/ nad mang po las mngon par grub pa/ sgra da cig tsam du yang mi gnas shing skad cig mar 'gyur ba/ rang bzhin gyis mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med
311a5(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa/ 'chi ba dang / nye zhing 'jig par 'gyur ba'i// chos can/ yid brtan du mi rung ba yin no// dga' bo 'di ltar/ sems can rnams na gzhan yang skye ba'i sdug bsngal 'di lta bu myong
311a6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ lag pa gcad pa dang / rkang pa gcad pa dang / mig byung ba dang / rna ba gcad pa dang / sna gcad pa dang lce gcad pa dang / mgo gcad pa dang / yan lag dang nying lag gcad pa'i sdug bsngal ba
